column2: France: Cardinali Ricard ari mu basenyeri 11 bagirizwa guhohotera abana
column3: Umu cardinali w’Umufaransa Jean Pierre Ricard yavuzwe izina na Ekleziya Katolika nk’umwe mu basenyeri 11 bagikorera canke bigeze gukorera iryo shengero bagirizwa guhohotera abana Mw'itangazo, uyo mu cardinali yanditse ko yahohoteye  umwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 igihe yari akiri padiri kw'iparuwase haraheze  imyaka mirongo 35,  kandi ko ubu ashobora gukura meza mu mabanga yiwe. H﻿araciye umwaka, umugwi washinzwe utoye ivyemeza ko hari ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bashurashuza abana, bakorera mw'ishengero Katolika ry'Ubufaransa mu myaka irenga mirongo ibiri. Uko   bagirizwa ari 11 bose barashengejwe mu butungane canke bahabwa ibihano na Ekleziya Katolika. I﻿bi vyagiye ahabona mu gihe mu gihe hariko haraba inama y'abepisikopi b'Ubufaransa i Lourdes, mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'Ubufaransa. Musenyeri mukuru Eric de Moulins-Beaufort yabariye abamenyeshamakuru ko muri abo 11 harimwo Musenyeri wa Creteil Michel Santier yagiye mu karuhuko ko muzabukuru mu mwaka uheze inyuma yo kwagirizwa ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina mu myaka  mirongo ibiri iheze. Bamwe bariko bakorwako amatohoza ajanye n'ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina  mu gihe abandi bagirizwa kubinuma. Musenyeri mukuru yasomeye ku mugaragaro ikete rya Cardinali Ricard, aho yavuze ko yitwaye nabi "mu buryo bukwiye guhanwa" ku mwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 kandi ko  mu vy’ukuri imyitwarire yiwe yagize ingaruka mbi kandi  zitazopfa zibagiwe kuri uwo mwana w'umukobwa. Mu gihe ubu ari mu karuhuko k'iza bukuru inyuma y'imyaka 18 ari musenyeri wa Bordeaux, uwo mu cardinali w'imyaka 78 yavuze ko yamusavye ikigongwe kandi asaba n'imbabazi ku bantu bose yababaje. M﻿usenyeri ahari ubu, Jean Paul James, yavuze ko yifatanije umubabaro n'abakorewe icaha, aca asubira gutera akamo uwo ari we wese yoba yarahohotewe muri iyo diyoseze kubivuga. Umukuru w'imana y'abepisikopi yavuze ko kiretse uwo mu Cardinali na Michel Santier, abasenyeri batandatu bagirijwe n'ubutungane canke ishengero kandi ko  umwe aza yaramaze gupfa. Yongeyeko ati:"A﻿bandi bahoze ari abasenyeri bariko baragirwako amatohoza n'ubutungane mu gihe uwundi wa gatatu amaze kwitaba abashikirizamanza." Mu cegeranyo cayo co mu kwezi kwa 10 mu 2021 , akanama kigenga kashizweho na Ekleziya Katolika yo mu Bufaransa kasanze abana ibihumbi 216 barahohotewe kuva mu myaka ya 1950, benshi muri bo bakaba bari abana b’ababahungu bari gahati y’imyaka 10 na 13. Umukuru w'ako kanama yavuze ko hari ivyemezo ko hari abakoze ihoterwa bashika 3.200 kandi ko ivyo vyemezo vyarahawe  abashikirizamanza mu mice 22 aho ingingo zo gukurikiranwa kuri ivyo vyaha zishobora gufatwa. U﻿bufaransa ni kimwe mu bihugu aho ibivugwa ko habaye ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina vyateye vyanyiganyije ishengero ya Ekleziya Katolika. Mu mwaka uheze, Papa Francis yarahinduye amategeko agenga ishengero Katolika kugira ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina, kwiyegereza abana ugamije kubashurashuza, gutunga ama film y’abana bariko barahuza ibitsina hamwe no gukingiranira ikibaba ku caha c'ihohoterwa, ko ari icaha gihanwa n'amategeko ya Vatikano. Mu butumwa yatanze imbere y'uko hatangura iyo nama y'abepisikopi i Lourde, Papa yavuze ko ishengero ryo mu Bufaransa ryaguye mu gahundwe kubera ihohoterwa ryakozwe na bamwe mu bungere baryo. I﻿yo nama yari ifise intumbero yo guteza imbere uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru no gukorera mu muco ku mabi y'ihohoterwa ishengero rifisemwo uruhara.

column2: Astro azwi mu ndirimbo nka Kingston Town, Red Red Wine ari muri UB40 yashengeye
column3: Umunyamuziki w'umwongereza akongera akaba n'umwe mu batanguje umurwi UB40 Terence Wilson, azwi cane kw'izina rya Astro, yapfuye ku myaka 64. Astro umuririmvyi yaririmbanye n'uyu murwi wo mu mudiho wa reggae mu kiringo c'imyaka irenga 30 yahitanywe n'indwara y'igihe gito, nk'uko vyemezwa n'umurwi yari asanzwe aririmbamwo. Itangazo ryacishijwe ku rubuga n'umurwi Ali Campbell and Astro rivuga riti:  "Turababaye cane. Isi yose irabuze intwari". Astro yasezeye mu murwi UB40 mu 2013 akaba yagiye kubandanya n'umurwi wiyonkoye UB40 featuring Ali Campbell and Astro, ukaba wari umaze kuremesha ibiteramo bitari bike muri uno mwaka. Wari witeze kuzunguruka ugenda uremesha ibiteramo mu mwaka uza wa 2022. Umurwi wiwe wa mbere watangujwe mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1980 n'umudiho wa reggae wisangije kamere, ukaba waramenyekanye cane mu miziki itari mike harimwo nka Red Red Wine na Can't Help Falling In Love. Uyu murwi wa Birmingham wagurishije ama casettes arenga imiriyoni 70 kandi imiziki yawo iraba iya mbere mu Bwongereza ku ncuro zitatu zose. Itangazo ry'abagize umurwi UB40 wa kino gihe wanditse kuri twitter uti: "Wiruhukire mu mahoro Astro. "Muri iri joro twumvise inkuru y'umubabaro ko uwahoze mu murwi UB40, Terence Wilson, azwi kw'izina rya  Astro, yasandavye inyuma y'indwaya y'igihe gito. Turahojeje umuryango wiwe". Muri rusangi, UB40 yasohoye indirimbo 39 muri 40 za mbere mu Bwongereza, yongera isohora album 28 muri 40 za mbere mu gihugu, na Astro akaba ari we yari umuririmvyi mukuru mu ndirimbo Rat In Mi Kitchen yabaye iya 12 mu 1987. Uyu murwi kandi waramenyekanye cane kw'isi yose, harimwo no muri Amerika, aho indirimbo Red Red Wine yabaye iya mbere, nk'uko vyagenze no ku yindi yitwa, Can't Help Falling in Love with You, yamaze amayinga indwi yose ari yo yiganje mu 1993. Aba mbere mu bagize uyu murwi baramaze imyaka 30 yose baririmbira hamwe imbere y'uko Ali Campbell  awusezera mu 2008. Mu kiganiro Astro yagiranye na The Guardian mu kwa gatanu, yavuze ko uyu murwi umaze gushingwa mu 1978 wahindutse ijwi ry'abanyagihugu batishimiye ibijanye na poritike hamwe n'ibibazo bihanze isi. Yabwiye iki kinyamakuru ko nawe yabonye "amabwa nk'ayo abandi birabure bose bahuye nayo mu mpera z'imyaka ya 1970", aha akaba yashaka kuvuga itegeko ryaha uburenganzira igipolisi guhagarika no gusaka abantu bafatwa ko bateye amakenga - ivyo Astro avuga ko vyama biba buri ndwi. Ati: "Twabonye vyari bigoye kwandika indirimbo z'urukundo gusumba indirimbo z'abarwanira agateka kabo, kubera vyari vyoroshe cane kwandika ku bintu wewe nyene wiboneye canke wasomye ahantu. Yari kamere yacu". Mu 2016, uyu munyamuziki yabwiye urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'Ubwongereza UK Music Reviews ko iri ritazirano yarironse akiri umwana kubera yambara ibirato vya Dr Martens vyari bizwi nka "Astronaut". Yongeyeko ati: "Ku gihamana ciza, nta muntu yigeze anyita astronaut kuko ari ijambo rirerire, ari naco gituma baciye barigabanya bafata Astro, kandi kuva ubwo ryaciye ringumako". Abajijwe ingene yiyumva iyo ariko arazunguruka aremesha ibiteramo, Astro yavuze ati: "Nta kazi kuri iyi si koguha umunezero nk'uwo ndonka. Jewe ndiho kugira ngo ndirime". Mu kw'umunani, uwundi mugenzi bakoranye muri UB40 batangranye uyu murwi Brian Travers yarapfuye ahitanywe na kanseri ku myaka 62.

column2: Abantu bakomakomeye Africa yabuze mu mwaka urangiye: abaperezida, abahoze ari abaperezira n'abandi
column3: Mu gihe umwaka waraye urangiye uwundi nawo ukaba utanguye, turabire hamwe bamwe mu bantu bakomeye bapfuye kuri uno mugabane wa Afrika. Turabe cumi muri aba bantu tutakiri kumwe. Mamma Sarah, nk'uko bamutazira, yagiye kumenyekana cane kw'isi igihe umwuzukuru wiwe Barack Obama abaye umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2009, ariko imbere y'aho, yari azwi cane mu karere yamukamwo mu burengero bwa Kenya aho yari yarongowe n'umugabo yari akuze cane nawe akiri umuyabaga - nk'uko imico n'imigenzo yabitegeka. Mu myaka mirongo, yari arongoye ikigo co gufasha kwigisha impfuvyi n'abakobwa, ikintu yiyumvamwo cane kubera we nyene ubwiwe atari azi gusoma. Mu 2014, ONU yaramuhaye agashimwe ku gikorwa ciwe. Barack Obama  yavuze ko kwitangira indero vyatanguriye ku bana biwe, ati: "N'ubwo atari nyina wiwe w'amaraso, Nyokuru yarareze dawe nk'umwana wiwe, kandi urukundo rwiwe ruri mu vyatumye dawe ashobora guhangana n'ingorane aritwara neza mw'ishure gushika aho aronka uburenganzira bwo kuja kwiga kw'ishure kaminuza ryo muri Amerika". Barack Obama yavuze ko mu buzima bwiwe, Sarah Obama yagiye abona impinduka zitari nke uko ibihe vyagenda "ariko ubutwari bwiwe  - kugira umutima rugabo, yiyemera, akunda ibikorwa, adatwarwa n'ibihuhusi hamwe n'ubugwaneza vyiwe - ntibwigeze buhungabana". Sarah Obama yapfuye ku wa  29 z'ukwa gatatu 2021 Urupfu rw'uyu yari umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania rwatangajwe mu kwa gatatu inyuma y'indwi zirenga zibiri zari ziheze ataboneka. Reta yatangaje ko yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima, ariko rero abakeba biwe bamwe bamwe ba poritike bavuze ko yari yanduye Covid-19. John Magufuli, uwakuriye mu muryango w'abarimyi, yagiye kuba umukuru w'igihugu mu 2015 akaba yari mu bategetsi bari bubashwe muri Afrika. Kw'izina ry'iritazirano nka Tingatinga (The Bulldozer), abamurwanya bamwagiriza ko yari umutegetsi yatwaza umukazo yarwanije ibinyamakuru, agatera ubwoba abatavuga rumwe nawe, yongera atuma abantu benshi bahitanwa na ca kiza ca coronavirus kubera yafashe minenerwe imigambi yo kukirwanya. Muri iki gisata, twatakaje kandi : Umukuru w'igihugu wa Tchad Idriss Déby, yiciwe ku rugamba, hamwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Côte d'Ivoire Hamed Bakayoko, yahitanywe na kanseri. Abahoze ari abakuru b'ibihugu vya Algeria - Abdelaziz Bouteflika, Madagascar - Didier Ratsiraka, Somalia - Ali Mahdi Mohamed na Chad - Hissène Habré, nabo nyene barapfuye. Icegera c'umukuru w'izinga rya Zanzibar Seif Sharif Hamad, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Zimbabwe Sibusiso Moyo hamwe n'umushikiranganji yari ajejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu Joel Biggie Matiza nabo bose barapfuye bahitanywe na  Covid-19. UMUNYAMUZIKI Alemayehu Eshete, 80 Uyu azwi nka Elvsi wa Ethiopia, Alemayehu yabaye rurangiranwa muri Ethiopia mu muziki wo mu mudiho wa jazz kuva mu myaka ya 1960 akaba yabandanije aryohera abantu gushika umwaka wanyuma w'ubuzima bwiwe. Kuva akiri muto, yari azwi cane mu gusubiramwo indirimbo za Elvis Presley, ariko mu 2008 yabwiye ikinyamakuru Guardian ko James Brown ari we yahavuye aba icitegererezo kuri we. Ati: "Nambara nk'umunyamerika, ndatereka imishatsi yanje, nkama ndirimba Jailhouse Rock na Teddy Bear - rimwe na rimwe twararirimba Strangers in the Night. Ariko kuva igihe ntanguriye kuririmba indirimbo z'iki amharic, abantu barankunze bimwe bidasanzwe". Alemayehu Eshete yapfuye ku wa 02 z'ukw'icenda, abanya Ethiopia bakimukunda cane. Muri iki gisata c'abanyatugenegene, twaratakaje kandi : umunyamuziki wa Afrika y'Epfo Sibongile Khumalo, yaririmvye kuva ku midiho ya jazz gushika ku midiho kama; umucuraranzi w'itarumbeta wa Afrika y'Epfo Jonas Gwangwa;  umuririmvyi w'indirimbo zihayagiza Imana n'umudiho wa jazz  Wambali Mkandawire; umwe mu banyamuziki ba Senegal bakomeye cane Thione Seck; umunyamuziki wa Cameroun  Wes Madiko; umunyamuziki w'umunyarwanda wo mu mudiho wa rap Jay Polly, yari yapfunzwe yagirizwa gutunga ibiyayuramutwe; umunya Namibia yaririmba mu mudiho wa hip-hop Kanibal hamwe n'umwe mu baririmvyi ba Algeria  bakunzwe cane Rabah Deriassa UMUHINGA mu kuremura ibihimba vy'umubiri Matolase Mtonga, 34 Nk'umwe mu bahinga ba Zambia mu vyo kubaga mu kuremura ibihimba vy'umubiri vyonionekaye  (chirurgie plastique/plastix surgery),  Mtonga yagiye kubona umuhamagaro wiwe igihe yariko aravura abarwayi bahiye, ico gihe akaba yari umunyeshure yiga ivy'ubuganga. Ishirahamwe ReSurge ryanditse riti: "Ni ukuri yari icitegererezo c'umugore w'akarorero, kandi yari mu nzira yo kuba umugore wa mbere muri Zambia yose w'umuhinga mu bijanye no kuremura ibihimb vy'umubiri vyononekaye. Uru ni uruhombo rukomeye cane, atari gusa kuri twebwe twari tumuzi, ariko kandi no kuri kazoza muri iki gisata, haba mu gihugu ciwe eka mbere no kw'isi yose". Mtonga yapfuye mu kwa cumi na kabiri haciye igihe gito avuye mu nama ya chirurgie plastique yari yabereye muri Amerika. Rwabaye urupfu rubabaje cane. Ubutumwa bwacishijwe kuri Facebook ni ubwo umugabo umwe yavuriye umugore wiwe mu myaka mike iheze, aho yanditse ati: "Dr Mtonga yageze kure akoresha amafaranga yiwe kugira agure ivyari bikenewe kugira ngo ashobore kuvuga umugore wanje, aho hose yashaka ko umugore wanje akira ukuboko kwiwe kw'iburyo n'intoke". Twatakaje kandi: Umwigisha wa kaminmuza wa Nigeria akongera akaba n'umuhinga mu bijanye n'imigera David Olufemi Olaleye hamwe na John Baptist Mukasa, umwe mu bahinga bake ba Uganda mu bijanye n'ukubaga imitsi, yari yiyemeje kwigisha abandi baganga ku nyungu za kazoza. Uyu munya Afrika y'Epfo yahanganye n'ubutegetsi bw'ivanguramoko bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yinjiye mw'ishengero rya Anglican  aratera imbere gushika aho aba umwirabure wa mbere abaye Musenyeri mukuru  wa Cape Town mu 1986  - haciye imyaka ibiri ahawe ka gashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel ku ruhara rwiwe mu kurwanya intwaro y'inkehwa z'abazungu. Kw'izina ry'iritazinaro rya The Arch, yahavuye agenwa kurongora umurwi wo kumenya ukuri n'ukurekuriranira inyuma y'aho Nelson Mandela atsindiye amatora ya mbere y'inyuma ya apartheid mu 1994. Nk'umuntu yafatwa nk'umuhanuzi muri Afrika y'Epfo, Tutu ntiyatinya kunegura bikomeye ubutegetsi bw'inyuma ya apartheid muri ico gihugu yataziriye The Rainbow Nation.  Tutu yapfuye mu kwezi guheze kwa cumi na kabiri, iyi ndwi yose ikaba iheze bariko baramwunamira, bikaba bitegekanijwe ko ashingurwa kuri uyu wa gatandatu. Twatagkaje kandi : FW de Klerk, umukuru w'igihugu wa nyuma w'ubutegetsi bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yasangiye agashimwe ka Nobel na Mandela mu 1993 kubera yafashije mu biganiro vyarangije ubutegetsi bwa apartheid. TB Joshua yapfuye ku wa 05 z'ukwa gatandatu. Ubutumwa bwacishijwe ku rubuga  rwa Facebook rw'uyu muvugabutumwa wa Nigeria  bwavuga buti: "Imana yisubije Umukozi wayo". Bwatumye imiriyoni n'imiriyoni y'abanywanyi b'ihsengero ryiwe kw'isi yose Synagogue Church of All Nation baja mu kigandaro. Uyu muvugabutumwa yari asanzwe afise abanyaporitike bo hejuru mu banywanyi biwe, yagiye kuba rurangiranwa kubera "ibitangaro" vyiwe, mbere akaba yatangaje ko yari afise ububasha bwo gukiza indwara z'ubwoko bwose, harimwo n'umugera wa SIDA. Muri iki gisatan yene twaratakaj: Umukardinali wa Cameroun Cardinal Christian Tumi, aho urupfu rwiwe rwashize hamwe mu mubabaro iki gihugu kirangwamwo indyane,  Alexandre José Maria dos Santos, umupatiri wa mbere w'umwirabure wa Mozambike yagiye kuba mu nyuma umu kardinali wa mbere w'ico gihugu, umutegetsi wo mw'idini rya Islam muri Tunisia  Hichem Djait hamwe n'umusenyeri mukuru wa Katorika muri Sudani y'Epfo Paulino Lukudu Loro. Abanonotsi ba Kenya baracitse intege bamaze kwumva ko mugenzi wabo yaciye umuhigo kw'isi yacumiswe imbugita gushika yitabe Imana mu kw'icumi. Umugabo wiwe, Ibrahim Rotich, avuga y'uko ata ruhara afise muri ubu bwicanyi. Tirop yaboneka ko yari agiye kuba umwirutsi rurangiranwa inyuma yo guca umuhigo ku birometero 10 ku ruhande rw'abagore mu kw'icenda, mbere akaba yaraserutse mu nkino za Olempike i Tokyo. Twatakaje kandi: Umunyonzi w'ikinga wa Eritrea Desiet Kidane, yapfuye agonzwe n'imodoka igihe yari mu myimenyerezo, umunya Senegal yahoze arongoye ishirahamwe ry'abanonotsi kw'isi (IAAF) Lamine Diack, umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wa Afrika y'Epfo Ryder Mofokeng yabaye kizigenza w'umurwi Kaizer Chiefs mu kiringo c'imyaka 11, hamwe n'umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Nigeria Yisa Sofoluwe, yari azwi mu murwi nserukiragihugu nka "Defence Minister" (umushikiranganji w'ukwivuna abansi). Uyu mwami w'Abazulu muri Afrika y'Epfo, yari umuntu akomeye cane yaharanira akaranga n'imico kama mu myaka 50 yose yari amaze ku butegetsi. Yari uwo mu muryango w'Umwami Cetshwayo, yayoboye Abazulu muri ya ntambara yabahuza n'igisirikare c'Ubwongereza mu 1879. N'aho uyu mugabo, se w'abana 28 yavyaye ku bagore batandatu, ata butegetsi bwa poritike bwite yari afise, yaserukira abafise ivyiyumviro vy'uko Afrika y'Epfo itiyigeze yibagira akahise kayo, n'aho yahindutse ikaba igihugu ca none. Umwe mu bagore biwe, umwamikazi Queen Mantfombi Dlamini-Zulu, yaramusubiriye mu kwa gatatu, ariko yaciye apfa haciye ukwezi kumwe gusa. Twatakaje kandi: Sulutani Sultan El-Hadj Ibrahim Mbombo Njoya w'umunya Cameroun, umwami w'abanyagihugu bo mu bwoko bw'aba Pedi muri Afrika y'Epfo, Victor Thulare III na Kefa Sagbadjou Glele, umwami w'aba Abomey muri Benin. Uyu mukinyi w'amareresi wo mu Misiri yamaze imyaka 50 akina amareresi. Yarakinye amareresi ateye ubwoba ariko kumbure yari azwi cane kandi akundirwa ubuhinga bwiwe bwo gutwenza. Kuri bamwe, izina rya El-Bably ryibutsa imyaka ya 1950 na 1960 igihe sinema yabica bigacika. Mu nyuma yahavuye amenyekana cane kuri televiziyo akina udukino mu mareresi yakunzwe cane mu buzima bwa buri muryango igihe cose ca Ramadani. Soheir El-Bably yapfuye k uwa 21 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe. Twatakaje kandi : Umunyarwenya w'umusomalia Ibrahim Ismail, azwi cane ku ritazirano rya  Soran, hamwe na Abdi Muridi Dhere uwundi munyarwenya w'umunyasomalia nyene. Uwundi umwe mu banyarwenya ba Nigeria rurangiranwa Baba Suwe na we nyene yarapfuye. Uyu yarwaniye ukwikukira kwa Zambia yapfuye mu kwa gatandatu, yari umwe mu bategetsi ba nyuma ba Afrika barwanije intwaro za gikoloni. Yavuga ko icipfuzo ciwe ari ukubona buri munya Zambia afise igi ku meza mu mfungurwa ziwe zo mu gitondo, agacupa k'amata - kandi buri munya Zambia akambara ibirato. Kw'izina ry'iritazirano rya KK, yarakunda kuvuza igitari, akaba yari umwigisha imbere y'uko yinjira mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ukwikukira, mbere akaba yari mu bantu bari bafashe mu mugongo utwigoro two kurandurana n'imizi ubutegetsi bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yongera afata mu mugongo imihari yo kwibohora muri Mozambike no muri Zimbabwe.

column2: Igisirikare ca Myanmar cagirije Suu Kyi kwakira $600.000 n'inzahabu
column3: Abategetsi ba gisirikare muri Myanmar bagirije uwo batembagaje Aung San Suu Kyi kuba yarakiriye mu buryo bunyruranye n'amategeko ibihumbi 600 vy'ama dorari hamwe n'inzahabu. Nivyo bintu bikomeye cane yagirijwe n'abasirikare kuva batembagaje uwo mugore n'uburungozi bwa demokrasi itariki ya mbere ukwezi kwa kabiri. Brigadier general Zaw Min Tun yanagirije ibiturire prezida Win Myint na benshi mu bashikiranganji. Umugambwe wa Madame Suu Kyi, National League for Democracy, batsinze ku bwinshi amatora yabaye mu mwaka uheze, ariko igisirikare kivuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma. Abigenga mpuzamakungu bakurikiranye ayo amatora ntibemera ibivugwa n'ico gusirikare, bavuga ko ata mahinyu babonye muri ayo matora. Madame Suu Kyi haheze indwi zitany apfungiwe mu kibanza kitamenyeshwa akaba yagirizwa ivyaha vyinshi birimwo gutera ''ubwoba no gutera umutima uhagaze", gutunga ama radio mu buryo buteye kubiri n'amategeko, no kurenga ingingo zijanye na Covid. Ico kirego co kwakira amafaranga aciye mu nzira zitemewe n'amategeko cashikirijwe ku wa kane nico gihambaye cane gushika ubu. Agaciro k'izo nzahabu igisirikare kivuga ko yahawe mu buryo bunyuranye n'amategeko zifise agaciro koba gashika mu bihumbi 600 vy'ama dolari. Myanmar cyugarijwe n'imyiyerekano mu mabarabara kuva igisirikare gifashe ubutegetsi kikanapfunga Suu Kyi. Ivyo bikaba vyatumye amenyekana gusumba. Abandi bantu nibura indwi bishwe n'inzego zijejwe umutekano kuri uyu wa kane , abamaze kwicwa bakaba baciye bashika ku 60. Ababibonye bavuga ko hari abari mu myiyerekano barashwe mu mutwe. ONU, Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi bariyamirije ubwo bwicanyi bw'abanyagihugu basanzwe muri uko guhasha abitaba imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi, basaba abategetsi kwigumya. Igisirikare nticemera ivyo kinegurwa, ahubwo cegeka kuri madame Suu Kyi  intureka iriko iraba.

column2: Igikombe ca Afrika Misiri 2019 - Imigwi, inkino n'uko batsindana
column3: Uru ni urutonde rw'imigwi y'amakipe ari mu gikombe ca Afrika Misiri 2019, ugashobora kubona amakipe aza guhura, uko batsindanye hamwe n'ukuntu bahagaze mu manota. Ushobora gukurikirana ngaha umunsi ku munsi ukuntu izi nkino ziriko ziragenda

column2: Amahasa yavutse afatanye imitwe yatandukanijwe vy'imbonekarimwe muri Israel
column3: Ayo mahasa (impanga)  y'abakobwa bari bavutse bafatanye ku gakomokomo babonanye ubwa mbere inyuma yo gutandukanywa mu gikorwa co kubagwa  muri Israel. Ico gikorwa camaze amasaha 12 mu kigo c'ubuvuzi  ca Soroka mu gisagara ca Beersheba camaze amezi gitegurwa, kandi harimwo no gushira icomeke ku mitwe yabo bompi. Abahinga mirongo bo muri Israel n'ahandi babigizemwo uruhara. Abo bakobwa, batavuzwe amazina, bivugwa ko bariko barakira neza. Eldad Silberstein, umuvugizi w'igisata co kubaga  aho mu kigo ca  Soroka yabwiye ikinyamakuru Channel 12 co muri Israel ko "Bahema kandi barya bo nyene ubwabo". Ni ubwa mbere bene ico gikorwa, kimaze kuba incuro 20 gusa kw'isi yose, kibera muri Israel. Impanga zifatanye ziri 'kugira inshuti ku ishuri' Papa yabatije impanga zari zifatanye bakazitandukanya Bashobora kuzobaho batandukanye? Amezi imbere y'uko babagwa,  mu mitwe yabo hashizwemwo udufuko twa silicone twongerezwamwo impwemu (nk'igipurizo) hanyuma tukaja turagurwa kugira dukwege canke tugarure urukoba. Urwo rukoba nirwo rwakoreshejwe mu kwugara imitwe yabo imaze gutandukanywa. Umwiteguro wagiyemwo kandi kubanza gukora igicapo ca 3D c'ikigirerenayo c'ayo mahasa, nk'uko bivugwa na Mickey Gideon, umuhinga wo kubaga ibijanye n'udutsi nsozabwenge (neuro-chirurgien). Yavuze ati : "Twanezerewe n'uko ibintu vyose vyagenze uko twari twavyifuje". Abo bakobwa bari bavutse mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020, bitezwe kuzobaho ubuzima busanzwe ata ngorane n'imwe.

column2: Coronavirus: Papa asaba ko urucanco n'imiti bishikira bose kw'isi
column3: Papa Francis yateye akamo abategetsi bo kw'isi ngo bafashe kugira abantu bose bashobore kuronka urucanco rwa coronavirus ata nzitizi. Mw'ijambo rya Noheli yashikirije ku rubuga rwa internet ubwa mbere, Papa yagabishije kudashiraho "uruhome" kubakeneye imiti. Ico kiza catumye ubutumwa bwa Urbi na Orbi budatangirwa ku rubaraza rwa Bazelike St Pierre ku bantu benshi, nk'uko vyari bimenyerewe. Ahubwo Papa yatanze ubwo butumwa ari mu cumba i Vatikano. Uko kugabisha kwa papa kuje inyuma y'amakenga y'ingene ibihugu bitunze  bigura incanco zitagira uko zingana gusumba ibihugu bikenye. Yavuze ati:"Ese umwana w'Imana yogarukana mu bategetsi ba politike n'amareta agatima ko gufashanya n'amakungu, bahereye ku magara y'abantu, kugira ngo bose boshobore gushikirwa n'urucanco hamwe n'imiti. "Imbere y'iki kibazo kitagira imbibe, ntidushobora kwiyubakirako uruhome. Twese hamwe turi mu bwato bumwe." Papa yavuze ko ingaruka y'iki kibazo c'amagara y'abantu zerekanye ko ubumwe bw'amakungu bukomeye cane. "Muri iki gihe c'akahise, tugeramiwe n'ibibazo vy'ibidukikije hamwe n'ubusumbasumbane mu butunzi no mu mibano vyagiye kunyurwa n'ikiza coronavirus, birakenewe cane ko twemerana nka benewacu na bashiki bacu." Papa yateye akamo ngo habe umutima wo gufasha no gushigikira abakozweko n'ico kiza, adoma urutoke cane cane ku bapfasoni bahohotewe muri iki gihe abantu bugaranywe. Avuga ku zindi ngorane ziri kw'isi, yahamagariye abantu gukomeza ubumwe no gusubiza hamwe muri Syria, Yemen, Libya, Nagorno-Karabakh, Sudan y'epfo , Nigeria, Cameroun na Irak. Vyitezwe ko azogira urugendo muri Irak mu kwezi kwa gatatu, urugendo rushobora kuba rubaye urwa mbere rwa Papa mu gihugu cazahajwe n'intambara.

column2: Iran: Fifa isabwa kuvana ico gihugu mu gikombe c'isi kubera uburenganzira bw'abagore
column3: Ishirahamwe riharanira uburenganzira  ryasavye Fifa kuvana Iran mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi mu mupira  bw’amaguru inyuma yo kwankira abagore kurorera inkino mu gihugu cabo. Iryo shirahamwe, Open Stadiums, ryabajije igituma igihugu cemererwa kuja mu mahiganwa mu gihe  abategetsi “n’ubu batarekurira abagore b’abanya-Iran kuraba urwo rukino rwiza.” Ako kamo gatewe haheze amayinga abagore bemerewe kuraba urukino rwo mu gihugu ubwa mbere kuva mu 1979. Ariko iryo shirahamwe ntiryaheze amakenga ko ibibuga vy’umupira bizoguma vyuguruwe ku bagore. Open Stadiums ryanditse mw’ikete yarungukiye umukuru wa Fifa  Gianni Infantino riti: “Abagore bo muri Iran ntibizeye baba abategetsi ba reta baba n’abategetsi b’ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru  ko ikibuga ca Azadi kizoguma cuguruye  ku bagore   igikombe c’isi ca Fifa 2022  ni camara kurangira itariki 18 Kigarama (12)". Rivuga kandi ko n’abazoja Qatar kuraba inkino bashobora kugira ingorane ku bategetsi ba Iran kuko bashobora kuguma bakurirana uwo wese azoba yagiye kuziraba. Kubuza abagore kwitaba inkino biteye kubiri  n’amategeko mpuzamakungu y’umupira w’amaguru, nk’uko iryo kete ribivuga, rigashimika rivuga ko rero Fifa ikwiye guca ivana Iran mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe 2022 muri Qatar. Imbuga z’amakuru muri Iran zanditse ibivugwa ko abagore bemerewe kuraba urukino mu kwezi kw’umunani inyuma y’aho Fifa irungikiye ikete abategetsi ibasaba kwemerera abagore kwinjira mu bibuga vy’umupira. Fifa yari imaze kubwira BBC ko itazoraba hirya kuri ico kibazo. Nta tegeko rihari ribuza abagore kuja kuraba inkino  muri Iran, ariko ni imbonekarimwe kuko kenshi batemererwa kwinjira. Imbere y’aho abagore ntibemererwa kuraba inkino zo mu gihugu aho abagabo baba bariko barakina kuko abajejwe kwigisha ijambo ry’imana batavyemera kw’izina rya Islam y’aba Shia. Abagore baramaze kurorera inkino mpuzamakungu nkeya harimwo rumwe mu kwezi kwa gatatu uyu mwaka, nk’uko bivugwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru, Reuters. Iryo shirahamwe riharanira uburenganzira rivuga kandi ko umugwi w’abakinyi uzoja muri Qatar mu mpera z’uyu mwaka wihanijwe kutagira ico uvuze ko myiyerakano iriko irwagwamwo abantu muri iyi minsi muri Iran. Yatewe n’urupfu rwa Mahsa Amini, umugore yapfuye ari mu minwe y’abaporisi inyuma yo gufatwa n’igiporisi kijejwe kwifata uko bibereye. Iryo kete rivuga ko aho yapfiriye ari co kigo nyene “abafana b’abagore bakunze kujanwa bakaborezwa igufa iyo bubahutse bakaja kuraba urukino rw’umupira w’amaguru”.

column2: Kenya hatowe ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera utera Covid-19
column3: Ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus bwatowe muri Kenya, nk'uko bigaragazwa n'ivyambere vyavuye mu bushakashatsi buriko burakorwa n'ikigo c'ubushakashatsi mu buvuzi gikorana na reta, Kenya Medical Research Institute,Kemri. Ubwo bwoko Kenya yisangije, bwari bwatowe mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bw'igihugu ku cigwa cakozwe hagati y'ukwezi kwa gatandatu n'ukwezi kw'icumi, nk'uko vyavuzwe na Kemri. Hari hagikenewe gukorwa ubundi bushakashatsi  kugira hamenyekane ingaruka z'ubwo bwoko bushasha, nk'uko kibandanya kibivuga. Kenya gushika ubu haharurwa hafi abantu 100.000 bamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19 n'abarenga 1.700 iyo ndwara imaze kwica. Hagati aho bwa bwoko bunyaruka kwandukira cane bwatowe muri Africa y'epfo bumaze gutorwa mu bindi bihugu bitatu vyo muri Africa-Botswana bihana urubibe,Zambia na Gambia muri Africa y'Uburengero, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi, OMS. Ubu Africa imaze kurengana igitigiri c'umuliyoni w'abantu bamaze kwandura uwo mugera, abandura ku munsi akaba ari benshi gusumba umurindi wa mbere, nk'uko OMS ibandanya ivuga. Muri rusangi abantu bashika 25.223 nibo bavugwa ko bandura ku munsi hagati y'itariki 28 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na kabiri mu 2020 n'itariki 10 z'ukwa mbere uyu mwaka  muri Africa, igitigiri kiri kuri 39% hejuru y'icashitse kw'isonga mu ndwi zibiri zo mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2020, aho abandura bashika 18.104 ku munsi, nk'uko bivugwa na OMS.

column2: Rwanda: FLN irahakana gukora ibitero iva ku butaka bw'u Burundi
column3: Umuhari CNRD-UBWIYUNGE wemeza ko usanzwe uri ku butaka bw'Urwanda kandi ko mu bitero wakoze kw'itariki 23 z'uku kwezi, wishe abasirikare b'Urwanda 21 ubatwara n'ibikoresho vyinshi vya gisirikare. Umuvugizi w'uwo muhari, S-Lt Irambona Steven Tamboula, yanditse mw'itangazo rigenewe abamenyeshamakuru ko bateye mu karere ka Nyaruguru mu murenge wa Nyabimata hamwe no mu Karere ka Rusizi mu murenge wa Bweyeye, hamwe bahica abasirikare 6 b'Urwanda ahandi 15. Avuga ati: "Ingabo za FLN, kw'itariki 23 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 2021 zagavye ibitero bibiri bikomeye ku ngabo za RDF. "Igitero ca mbere cabereye mu karere ka Nyaruguru mu murenge wa Nyabimata, mu kagari ka Ruhinga  mu misozi ya Nyanzare, RDF ihatakariza abasirikare 6 abandi benshi barakomereka. Ariko FLN nta kibazo na kimwe yagize. Imigwano yatanguye [kw'isaha ya] 11h40 iheza 12h10. "Igitero ca kabiri cabereye mu karere ka Rusizi mu murenge wa Bweyeye mu kagari ka Nyamuzi, RDF ihatakariza abasirikare 15 n'ibikoresho vyinshi vya gisirikare. "Imigwano ikomeye cane yatanguye i saa tatu zijoro (21h00) iheza i saa yine z'ijoro". Abagwanyi ba FLN barahakana bivuye inyuma gukora ivyo bitero bavuye ku butaka bw'Uburundi, bakavuga ko basanzwe bafise ibirindiro vyabo mu Rwanda kuva mu 2018. Bavuga kandi ko batambara impuzu z'igisirikare c'Uburundi, ahubwo bakavuga ko ingabo za RDF zerekana impuzu z'abasirikare b'Uburundi bahunze bamaze kunanirwa gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu 2015, ubu ngo bakaba babarizwa mu muhari RED-TABARA ugwanya reta ya Gitega ukoresheje ibigwanisho. Uwo muhari urangiza itangazo ryawo usaba akanama ka ONU kajejwe umutekano kw'isi, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU hamwe n'ubumwe bwa Afrika kugondoza reta y'Urwanda ngo yemere ibiganiro n'abo batavuga rumwe, ngo bitabaye ivyo FLN izobandanya ibitero ku bo yise "reta y'agatsiko n'igisirikare c'ubwoko bumwe". Kuri uyu wa mbere, igisirikare c'Urwanda cari casohoye itangazo aho cagiriza umuhari wa FLN kugira igitero mu karere ka Rusizi mu murenge wa Bweyeye baje bava mu Burundi. Igisirikare c'Uburundi casohoye itangazo ciyamiriza ivyo bivugwa n'Urwanda.

column2: Dar es Salaam: Kwinonora imitsi birabujijwe ku misi yo gusenga
column3: Umukuru w'igipolisi mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam muri Tanzania, Lazaro Mambosasa avuga ko kuva ubu, kizira ko abantu bagira imyiyerekano canke kwinonora imitsi ku misi hategekanijwe amasengesho, ko igipolisi kitazotanga impusha kuri iyo misi. Mambosasa avuga ko kugira imyiyerekano ku misi yo gusenga bituma abasenga bacererwa gushika ahabera amasengesho. "Ku misi yo gusenga, ntituzemera abaca muri izo nzira mu kubima uruhusha, nta mugwi n'umwe urekuriwe guca muri ivyo bibanza, abaja gusenga i Dar Es Salaam bagenda n'imodoka, rero urekuriye abagira imyimeneyerezo mu mabarabara canke abagira imyiyerekano iyo ari yo yose, bituma amabarabara yugarwa, kandi amasengesho ajana n'umwanya." Yongeyeko ko imisi yo gusenga ari ku wa gatanu, ku wa gatandatu no ku wa mungu. Muri iyi myaka ya vuba, abantu benshi basigaye binonora imitsi mu mabarabara mu gisagara ca Dar Es Salaam. Ukwinonora imitsi bitegurwa n'amashirahamwe atandukanye ariko rimwe na rimwe bafise ihangiro ryo gufasha abantu bafise ingorane bari mu turere dutandukanye. Uko kwinonora imitsi kenshi kuba mu mpera z'iyinga kugira haboneke abantu benshi bavyitaba kuko baba bari mu karuhuko.

column2: Umupfakazi wa TB Joshua mu rugamba rwo kurongora ishengero yasize muri Nigeria
column3: Evelyn Joshua yabaye umurongozi w'imwe mu mashengero akomeye y'abarokore muri Afrika, ariko uwo mupfasoni w'imyaka 52 ahanganye n'ikibazo co kubungabunga iragi ry'umugabo wiwe. Urupfu rwa Joshua rwabaye giturumbuka mu kwezi kwa gatandatu afise imyaka 57 rwatumye hatangura intambara yo kumusubirira yamaze amezi n'amezi kugira ironke inyishu. Ariko imiryango y'iryo shengero ryiwe rya Synagogue Church of All Nations (SCOAN), iri mu gisagara kinini cane muri Nigeria, yasubiriye kwugurugwa kugira yakire abayoboke baryo ubwa mbere mu mezi atanu. Yari rurangiranwa kubera imburi ziwe n'inyigisho, vyatumye ahurumbirwa n'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abayoboke bavuye hirya no hino kw'isi baja Lagos, harimwo n'abanyepolitike bakomeye bo muri Afrika na Amerika y'epfo. Ni gake haba ibiganiro vy'isubirizwa mu mashengero y'abarokore muri Nigeria mbere kenshi uburongozi buca buhabwa umupfakazi w'uwuba yarashinze ishengero. Ariko muri SCOAN, umupfasoni wa Joshua, yari umupasitori yatiwe, ahanganye n'abandi kubera atari mu rwego rukuru rurongoye iryo shengero. Ibi bifatwa n'abo bahanganye ko ari ikimenyetso c'uko umugabo wiwe atigeze amufata nk'uwushobora kumusubirira. Bitandukanye n'abandi bagore b'abapasitori  bo muri Nigeria, ntiyiyerekana cane mu myaka irenga mirongo itatu bari bamaze bubakanye. TB Joshua afatwa n'abayoboke ba SCOAN nk'"intumwa", yakorana n'umugwi  umwegereye cane yita "inararibonye" - umwe muri bo bikaba vyari vyitezwe ko ari we azomusubirira. Ariko inyuma y'urupfu rwiwe, abari begereye umupfasoni wa Joshua barahawe uburenganzira na sentare bwo kumugira umwe mu bagize urwego nshingwantwaro, bica vyorosha kugera ku ntambwe yo gushika kuri ayo mabanga. Iryo shengero ryaciye rimenyesha ko umupfasoni wa Joshua  abaye umurongozi mushasha "Arongowe n'Imana", ivyababaje ayandi mashami ari muri iryo shengero ku kungene bitabaye mu muco. Cane cane umugwi uzwi kw'izina rya Global Congress of SCOAN Members (GCSM), vyitwa ko ushigikiwe n'abayoboke bo mu rwego rwo hejuru, warerekanye amakenga kuri iyo ngingo. Ariko nta madidane yabaye ku mukuru yari kurongora amasengesho ubwa mbere ya SCOAN itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe kuva umugabo wiwe apfuye. Bivugwa ko atahemye kugira yerekane ubutegetsi bwiwe muri iryo shengero, mu gukoresha amezi make ya nyuma mu gusukura iryo shengero. Hari ama Video yagiye ahabona y'abayoboke, benshi b'abanyamahanga, bamaze imyaka baba  muri urwo rupangu runini, bariko baravayo bariko barabazomera. Umwe mu bayoboke yakoresheje imvugo ngereranyo ko "cari icigwa". Abakuwe muri ico kibanza vyavuzwe ko bari abadashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'umupfasoni wa Joshua. Patrick Iwelunmor, yahoze ajejwe kumenyeshamakuru ku muhisi Joshua, yabwiye BBC ati:"Inyuma y'urupfu rw'intumwa, bamwe mu bamugendanira ntibavugisha Evelyn mu rupfasoni." Hari n'inkuru kandi yerekeye igiturire, mbere igisata ca Nigeria kijejwe kugwanya igiturire, EFCC, cemereye BBC ko kiriko kiragira amatohoza ku bivuga ko habaye ubusuma muri iryo shengero. Ntibiramenyekana nimba ibi ari vyo biriko biragirwako amatohoza, kuko ikinyamakuru co muri Nigeria The Punch cari canditse ko iki ari co gituma bamwe mu bayoboke b'iryo shingiro boba banyegeye. Ubu ikigiye kugora cane umupfasoni Joshua n'ugukora ku buryo abayoboke ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bakunda umugabo wiwe biyumvamwo ukwemera kwiwe. Baje kubera igihagararo ciwe n'ubwitonzi hakaba ata co biteze ku mutegetsi mushasha. Gbenga Osinaike, arongoye uruganda rw'abamenyeshamakuru mu kinyamakuru Church Times Nigeria, aremeza ko igenwa ryiwe ryaje giturumbuka. Yabwiye BBC ati:"Yahora asengesha rimwe na rimwe arik TB ntiyigeze amuha icizere." Ariko nk'umuntu atigeze yitabwaho  na benshi, "harimwo n'umugabo wiwe", umupfasoni Joshua yarerekanye " inguvu n'ubushobozi afise mu gutwara iryo shengero." Yaranse ko ahabwa icubahiro c'umugabo wiwe ca " uwujejwe gucungera vyose", avuga ko ari we akibarongoye, ko gusa "atanguriye urugendo aho data yashikanye inkino". Kandi TB Joshua aracafise ikibanza gikomeye muri iryo shengero, amafoto yiwe amanitse hose mu nzu, inyigisho ziwe na zo ziguma zica ku mbuga hwaniro ziwe. Bisa kandi n'uko umupfasoni Joshua yasigaranye iragi ry'ingene umugabo wiwe yigisha - aho yaguma acishamwo indirimbo zo guhimbaza Imana - aho n'umudiho usa n'uwo umugabo wiwe aho yariko arahereza inkuka ari wenyene. Ko ari babiri bahuye ubwa mbere mu 1990 aho yamutangaza mu kumubwira ivyerekeye ubuzima bwiwe, yandika n'izina ryiwe ku rupapuro ata jambo na rimwe amubwiye. Bamaranye iminota 45 incuro ya mbere babonana, aho inyuma y'aho yaciye amusaba ko bokwubakana. 'Impano yo kunywanisha' Ni ihasa akaba n'imfura mu muryango w'abana indwi, yakuriye i Okala Okpuno mu ntara ya Delta mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. N'aho atatanguye ari umupasitori, yaramenyerejwe hanyuma arabuhabwa n'umugabo wiwe. Mu 2009, yavuze ko ari umuntu afise impano zidasanzwe mu kunywanisha - "imigenderanire y'abavyeyi n'abana, abubakanye n'ibindi bintu nk'ivyo." Abasitori bakuru muri Nigeria kenshi bavuga ko baronse umuhamagaro uva muri bibiriya - nk'abahanuzi Samuel na Paul - kugira bakorere Imana. Nk'uko bivugwa na Joshua, umuhamagaro wiwe waje igiye yerekwa mu kiringo c'imisi itatu aho yumva ijwi rigira riti:"Ndi Imana yawe. Ndaguhaye ubutumwa bweranda bwo kugenda gukora igikorwa ceranda c'Imana." Umupfasoni Joshua ntaravuga ko yaronse umuhamagaro nk'uwo, ariko kuri bamwe, kuba bakorana n'umugabo wiwe birakwiye. Iwelunmo agira ati:"TB Joshua yari intumwa kuva avuka, ariko umugore wiwe yamubaye kubera we. Umugabo n'umugore babaye umwe, kubera ubwo bumwe yaciye na we asigwa amavuta." N'aho bamwe mu bapfakazi b'abakuru b'amashengero muri Nigeria, nka Janet Onaolapo wa Abundant Life Gospel Mission na Margaret Idahosa wa Church of God Mission International , barongoye neza amashengero yabo, s'ibintu bisanzwe. Amashengero y'abapantekoti muri Nigeria yubakiye ku gihagararo c'abayashinze, akaba asambuka bamaze gupfa. Osinaike avuga ko ivyo bishobora gushikira na SCOAN. Avuga ati:"Iyo hageze ku bibazo vy'ishengero, abantu baza kurondera inyishu, kurondera ibitangaro, kuraba uwoba yareretswe ibiberekeye. "Icuka gitegerezwa kuzosubira hasi."

column2: Antonio Guterres wa ONU yemeye gushigikira igisirikare ca DR Congo
column3: Umunyamabanga mukuru w'ishirahamwe ONU yemeye ko iryo shirahamwe rizobandanya gufasha igisirikare ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo mu ntambara yo kurwanya imirwi irwanya ubutegetsi. Mu rugendo rwiwe  ejo ku wa Mungu mu gisagara ca Beni kiri mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu, Antonio Guterres yamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko ibitero vy'ukurwanya imirwi irwanya ubutegetsi bibandanya. Inteko mpuzamakungu zigera ku 16,000 ziri muri ico gihugu (MONUSCO), kikaba ari gitigiri kinini c'ingabo za ONU kw'isi. Amafaranga zikoresha ku mwaka arenga n'umuliyaridi w'amadolari. Bwana Guterres yemeye ko ingabo za ONU zizokorana n'igisirikare be n'igipolisi vya Congo. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC akorera muri ico gihugu avuga ko abanyagihugu bo mu karere k'ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu bidoga bavuga izo ngabo ataco zimaze. Izo ngabo zimaze imyaka irenga 20 muri ico gihugu, ariko ubukozi bw'ikibi burabandanya. Asubirwamwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP, bwana Guterres avuga ati: "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo duhagarike uruhagarara". Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU yarashitse no mu karere ka Mangina aho ikiza ca Ebola catanguriye, haciye umwaka. Umutekano muke muri ako karere watumye igikorwa c'uguhangana n'umugera wa Ebola kibangamirwa, mu gihe ukutamenya kw'abanyagihugu ku vyerekeye uwo mugera kwatumye utwigoro tw'ukurwanya ikwiragira ryawo ataho dushika. Abashika 2000 baramaze guhitanwa n'iyo ndwara. Bwana Guterres yaragendeye ikigo kivura abafashwe n'iyo ndwara, aho yabahimirije ko abafashwe bokwihutira kwa muganga aho kwinyegeza.

column2: Burundi: BRB yugaye amashirahamwe agurisha amafaranga
column3: Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yaraye ifashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro yari asanzwe yemewe. Mwitangazo ryasohowe n'umukuru w'iyo banki, Ciza Jean, avuga ko iyo ngingo izotangura kuja mu ngiro mu ndwi iza, igenekerezo rya 15 z'uku kwa kabiri. Yagiriza ayo mashirahamwe ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyo ngo bikaba vyaragize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu. Mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Muri iryo tangazo, Bwana Ciza ategeka abafise amazu yo kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga y'agaciro gukuraho vuba na bwango ivyapa n'ibindi bimenyetso biyaranga. Amenyesha ko kuva ubu, amazu yemerewe kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga mvamakungu ari ayegukira amabanki. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe ku wa 15 z'ukw'icenda umwaka uheze wa 2019, buri shirahamwe ryategerezwa kuvunja amafaranga ryisunze igiciro cashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu "ritarengeje inyungu y'ibice 15%". Iyo ngingo isa n'iyagoranye gushira mu ngiro, ari co catumye mu kwezi kwa 11 umwaka uheze, BRB isohora itangazo, aho yagabisha ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: South Africa yemeje ikoreshwa ry'umuringa ukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA
column3: Afrika y'Epfo yemeje uburyo bushasha bwo kwirinda umugera wa SIDA mu ntumbero yo gukingira abagore kugira ntibandure. Ni umuringa ukozwe muri silicone winjizwa mu gitsina c'umugore maze ukarekura umuti witwa dapivirine urwanya umugera. Iyi ni intambwe ikomeye muri ico gihugu aho bibiri vya bitatu vy'abandura ari abagore. Uwu muringa - wemejwe mu mwaka uheze muri Zimbabwe ukaba ukigeragezwa mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika - werekana ko ufise ubushobozi bwo gukingira ku rugero rwa 50%. Ni bwo buryo bwa mbere bukoreshwa igihe kirekire mu gukinga umugera wa SIDA cane cane bugenewe abagore. Uwu muringa ni ubundi buryo buje busubirira ibinini vya PrEP bifatwa buri musi ugategerezwa gusubirizwa buri kwezi. Igisata ca Afrika y'Epfo kijejwe amagara y'abantu cemeje uwu muringa ku bagore bafise imyaka kuva kuri 18 kuduga. Uwu muringa wahinguwe n'ikigo International Partnership for Microbicides (IPM). Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO rirashigikiye iyi ngingo. Hagati aho, ibikorwa vyo gutanguza ubu buryo bizotegerezwa kubangira kubera iki gisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu kiciga urugero rwo gukora neza rw'uwu muringa n'igiciro cawo. ONU ivuga ko Afrika y'Epfo ari yo ifise ibitigiri binini vy'abagendana umugera wa SIDA  kw'isi yose.

column2: Ntahokatarondererwa: Ornella Uwimana yize ivyo kuvura kuri kaminuza ariko akora intebe mu mapine
column3: Umwigeme Ornella Uwimana yahejeje ivyigwa vy'amagara y'abantu muri kaminuza mu 2020 ubu akaba akora akazi ko gukora intebe mu mapine. Intebe za mbere yazikoze mu 2016 akiri ku ntebe y'ishure, umuvyeyi wiwe aca arazimugurira kugira amutere intege. Agira ati:"Naguze amapine umunani ku bihumbi mirongo ine, hanyuma nca ndayakoramwo intebe. "Mu kuntera intege, umuvyeyi wanje arazishima aca arazingurira azishira kw'ibaraza" Ornella avuga ko akunda kwiyigisha gukora ibintu bitandukanye kuri YouTube. Ahejeje kaminuza mu gisata c'ivy'amagara y'abantu "Sante Publique" mu 2020, ivyo gukora intebe mu mapine yaciye abigira umwuga. Avuga ko abona ko amaze gutera imbere ugereranije n'aho yatanguriye. Agira ati: "Natanguye nkorera muhira ariko ubu narakotesheje ikibanza nkoreramwo ndiha ku kwezi. "Nkoresha abakozi batatu baza buri musi, n'abandi bane baza igihe mba ndabakeneye." Gushika ubu avuga ko yoba ageze ku mutahe wa miliyoni zine z'amarundi. Ornella Uwimana ahanura urwaruka kwubahuka gukora ico ari co cose rubona gishobora kuruteza imbere. Avuga ko hari benshi bagaya akazi canke ntibashiruke umwete wo kugakora. Ati: "Hari abambona ndiko ndahiga amapine bagatangara. Bakanayanyima nkarinda guca ku bafundi b'imodoka "Hari n'abantwenga bambonye ndiko ndatobora amapine kandi baheruka nari nagiye gusigisha inzara. "Ubu ariko batanguye gutahura kuko babona ntanguye gutera imbere. Uburundi buherutse gushinga umugambi wa PAEEJ (Programme d'Autonomisation Economique et d'Emploi des Jeunes Diplômés), werekeye urwaruka ruhejeje amashure kugira rwishingire imigambi yo gukora. Uwo mugambi reta yawuhaye imiriyaridi 48 z'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ariko n'ubu hari abacibaza uruhara nyarwo rwa PAEEJ, mu gihe abandi bafise amakenga ko bashobora gufasha koko urwaruka kwigenga mu butunzi rukareka kuzera inze.

column2: Coronavirus: Putin avuga ko urucanco rwemejwe ko rushobora gukoreshwa
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burusiya, Vladimir Putin, avuga ko urucanco rwakorewe muri ico gihugu rwo gukinga Covid-19 rwamaze kwemezwa ko ari nyarwo inyuma y'amezi adashika abiri ruriko rurageragerezwa ku bantu. Perezida Putin avuga ko urwo rucanco rwakorewe umwihwezo wose utegerezwa, yongerako y'uko n'umukobwa wiwe yamaze kuruhabwa. Abategetsi bavuga ko bafise integuro yo gucandaga abanyagihugu mu kivunga kuva mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abahinga berekanye amakenga ku kuntu urwo rukingo rwihutishijwe n'Uburusiya, bakabona ko abashakashatsi bashaka gufata inzira ya hafi. Mu gihe hari ubwoba ku ngaruka zarwo, umuryango witaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, mu ndwi iheze wasavye Uburusiya gukurikiza amategeko mpuzamakungu ku bijanye no gukora urucanco rwa Covid-19. Urwo rucanco rw'Uburusiya ntiruri ku rutonde rw'incanco zitandatu za OMS zemewe kugeragezwa ku rugero rwa gatatu, harimwo no kuzigeragereza ku bantu. Mu gihe avuga ko ari urwa mbere kw'isi, Perezida Putin amenyesha ko uru rucanco rwakozwe n'ikigo Gamaleya c'i Moscou, ari "urukingo nyarwo" rwo kurwanya coronavirus. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Mikhail Murashko, avuga ko uru rucanco "rwerekanye ko rukora neza kandi ko ata ngaruka rufise", akavuga ko ari intambwe ikomeye mu nzira yo gutsinda Covid-19. Urwo rucanco rwiswe Sputnik V,  izina rifatiye ku kigendajuru ca mbere c'igihingurano cabaye kw'isi, rigafatwa n'Uburusiya nk'intsinzi kuko kibaye igihugu ca mbere kwemeza urucanco, nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu bategetsi b'iki gihugu asubirwamwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Kirill Dmitriev arongoye ikigega c'Uburusiya, RDIF,  avuga ko iki gihugu kimaze kuronka ibihugu birenga 20 vyamaze gusaba urwo rucanco ku rugero runganga n'umuliyaridi. Mu ndwi iheze, leta y'Uburusiya yatangaje ko yariko irategura gutangura gucandaga abanyagihugu mu kivunga inyuma y'aho imenyeshereje ko yakoze igerageza ry'urwo rucanco. Kw'isi hari incanco zirenga 100 ziriko zirakorwa, zimwe muri zo zikaba ziriko zirageragerezwa ku bantu. N'aho urwo rucanco rwihuse, abahinga nka bose babona ko ata rucanco ruriko ruraboneka kw'isi yose imbere ya 2021 hagati. Kw'igenekerezo rya kane rya kuno kwezi kw'umunani, umuvugizi wa OMS, Christian Lindmeier, yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Rimwe na rimwe abashakashatsi ku giti cabo baravuga ko babonye ikintu, ni vyo ko ico kiba ari ikintu gikomeye". "Ariko ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukuronka urucanco rukora, kandi bibanje guca mu nzira zose zikenewe".

column2: Tanzania: Perezida Samia Suluhu Hassan ariyama abamunegura ku madeni yo hanze
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan ariyamiriza akarwi k'abategetsi bo hejuru b'ico gihugu banegura reta yiwe ku madeni yasavye mu mashirahamwe yo hanze mu ntumbero yo kurangura imigambi y'iterambere. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ari mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu rigacishwa ku mboneshakure, Perezida Samia Hassan arasigura akamaro k'amadeni mu kurangura imigambi y'iterambere ya reta. Yariko arakira icegeranyo kivuye mu bushikiranganji butandukanye c'ukungene amafaranga agenewe kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19 igihugu cahawe n'abatanga imfashanyo y'iterambere ariko arakoreshwa. Perezida Samia avuga ko mu gihe ibindi bihugu bikoresha ayo mafaranga mu kugura ibikoresho vyo kwikingira nk'udupfukantoke n'udupfukamunwa, Tanzania yoyo yakoresheje mu bwitonzi ayo mafaranga mu gukomeza igisata c'amagara y'abantu no mu kwubaka amavuriro mashasha. Aya mafaranga yafashije kandi kwubaka amasomero mashasha y'amashure n'ibigo vy'ukwigiramwo mu turere dutandukanye tw'igihugu. Avuga ko yumva ko yahemukiwe n'abanegura reta yiwe kubona yakiriye aya madeni mvamahanga. Ati: "Birababaje kubona umuntu wari wizigiye afise amabanga nk'ayo akomeye muri reta agukorera ivyo". Ashikirije aya majambo inyuma y'umusi umwe umukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Job Ndugai, asavye imbabazi ku mugaragaro ku majambo yari aherutse gushikiriza, yafashwe ko yayabwiye reta ya Samia Hassan ku bijanye n'amadeni yo hanze. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza iri jambo, Perezida Samia Hassan yavuze ko amwe mu majambo yo kumunegura afitaniye isano n'amatora yo mu 2025, abatari bake bakaba babona ko azorondera kwitoreza ikindi kiringo. Samia Hassan yashitse ku butegetsi mu ntango z'umwaka uheze inyuma y'urupfu rwa Perezida John Pombe Magufuli yari atanguye ikiringo ciwe kigira kabiri kikaba n'ica nyuma gitegekanywa n'ibwirizwashingiro.

column2: Kurandura malaria burundu – intumbero ya hafi ya OMS
column3: Icegeranyo c'ishirahamwe OMS kivuga ko hari icizere ko isi ishobora kwiganzura malaria - imwe mu ndwara zimaze igihe kirekire kandi ziha inkumbi -  mu kiringo kitari kure. Buri mwaka, abarenga imiliyoni 200 barandura malaria, indwara yica cane cane abana bakiri bato. Ihitana abantu barenga 435.000 ku mwaka, abenshi bakaba ari abana. Mu Burundi igisata ca ONU kijejwe ubutabazi, OCHA, kivuga ko abantu imiliyoni zitanu n'ibihumbi amajana indwi banduye malariya muri uno mwaka, igitigiri kingana hafi igice c'abanyagihugu bose muri ico gihugu. Muri abo bantu bose, abangana 1801 barahitanywe n'iyo ndwara iterwa n'umubu kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere gushika ku wa 21 z'ukw'indwi. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko kurandurana n'imizi malaria itakiri indoto ya kure, n'aho gukuraho umugera uyitera bishobora gusaba imiliyaridi zishika zibiri ziyongera ku mafaranga akoreshwa ku mwaka. Abahinga bavuga ko kurandurana n'imizi malaria ari yo "ntumbero nyamukuru". Isi iramaze gutera intambwe itari nto mu kurwanya iyo ndwara. Kuva mu 2000: Ibi vyatumwe n'uko uburyo bw'ukwikingira imibu bwakwiragiye, nk'akarorero gukoresha imisegetera irimwo umuti, hamwe n'imiti ikomeye y'ukuvura abafashwe n'iyo ndwara. Hagati aho, Dr Winnie Mpanju-Shumbusho, umwe mu bakoze ico cegeranyo akomoka muri Tanzania, avuga ati: "N'aho hari intambwe ishimishije, malaria ibandanya kuba intambamyi kw'iterambere". "Ivyo biribonekeza cane muri Afurika, aho ibihugu bitanu gusa vyikoreye hafi igice c'abarwaye malaria kw'isi". Ari nka hamwe malaria yoshobora kurwanywa burundu kw'isi, yoba ari intambwe y'akataraboneka. Ico cegeranyo casabwe n'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, mu myaka itatu iheze kugira ngo bihweze ingene vyogenda n'uburyo bukenewe. Abahinga karuhariwe mu biraba malaria n'abo mu butunzi, bashitse ku cegeranyo ko ivyo bishoboka gushika mu mwaka wa 2050. Ico cegeranyo casohotse mu kinyamakuru c'ubushakashatsi mu vy'amagara y'abantu ca Lancet, kivugwa ko ari co ca mbere kibayeho muri urwo rwego. Sir Richard Feachem, umwe muri abo bashakashatsi, avuga ati: "Kuva kera, kurwanya malaria burundu yamye ari indoto ya kure, ariko ubu turafise ivyemezo ko ishobora kandi itegerezwa kuba yaranduranywe n'imizi gushika mu 2050". Hagati aho, aragabisha ko ivyo bizosaba "ingingo zikomeye" kugira ngo iyo ntumbero ishikweko. Muri ico cegeranyo, niho abahinga bavuga ko baravye ingene ibintu bimeze ubu, "igice kinini ku isi kizoba cariganzuye malaria" imbere ya 2050. Hagari aho, hazokwibonekeza akarere malaria izobandanya yigira ndanse muri Afrika, kava muri Senegali mu buraruko bushira uburengerazuba, gushika muri Mozambike mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Afrika. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko kugira ngo malaria izobe yaranduranywe n'imizi gushika mu 2050, bizosaba ko ubuhinga busanzwe buriho ubu bukoreshwa neza gusumba, kandi hagatorwa n'ubundi buryo bushasha. Ubwo buhinga buriko bwiyumvirwako ni ubuzotuma imibu idashobora kurondoka bigatuma igabanuka mu bwinshi, canke bugatuma  itagira ubushobozi bwo gukwiragiza iyo migera. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko gushika ubu, amafaranga akoreshwa kuri malaria arenga gato imiliyaridi 4.3 z'amadolari buri mwaka. Hazokenerwa izindi miliyaridi zibiri z'amadolari buri mwaka kugira ngo isi ishobore kwiganzura malaria gushika mu 2050. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko kuronka ayo mahera yiyongerako ari "ikintu kitoroshe".  Hagati aho kivuga ko kwiganzura malaria bizogira ingaruka nziza ku mibereho n'ubutunzi bw'ibihugu "gusumba kure n'iyo ayo mahera akenewe". Umukuru wa OMS, Dr Tedros Ghebreyesus, ati: "Kurwanya malaria ni imwe mu ntumbero y'inzego zijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi mu kiringo c'ikinjana cose, ariko biboneka ko kikiri mu bibazo ngorabahizi gushika ubu". Aremera ko malaria idashobora kurwanywa ngo ihere hagikoreshwa uburyo busanzwe buhari, na rirya avuga ko nka bwose ari ubwatanguye gukoreshwa mu kinjana giheze canke imbere y'aho.

column2: Aliko Dangote na Mohammed Dewji bari mu batunzi ba mbere muri Afrika mu 2021
column3: Nk'uko biri mu kinyamakuru ca Forbes co mu 29021, ubutunzi bw'abagwizatunga 18 bo kuri uyu mugabane bwiyongereye imiriyaridi 4.1 z'amadolari, n'ukuvuga ku bice 12 kw'ijana gusumba mu mwaka uheze. Mu myaka cumi yikurikiranya, Aliko Dangote wo mur Nigeria ni we muntu atunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika, akaba afise ubutunzi buharurwa ku miriyaridi 12.1 z'amadolari. Ubwo butunzi bwiyongereyeko amadolari imiriyaridi 2, ugereranije no mu mwaka uheze bivuye kw'iduga gushika ku bice 30 kw'ijana vy'igiciro c'isima ya Dangote nk'uko vyandikwa na Forbes. Umuntu agira kabiri mu butunzi muri Afrika ni Nassef Sawiris wo mu Misri, ubutunzi bwiwe  bwinshi ni ibice bitandatu kw'ijana y'umutahe afise muri Addidas. Mu kibanza ca gatatu haza Nicky Oppeheimer wo mu gihugu ca Afrika y'epfo, yarazwe umutahe wo muri kompanyi  ya Debeers, akaba yari anahagarariye iyo kompanyi gushika mu mwaka wa 2012 aho yaca agurisha ibice 40 kw'ijana vy'umutahe w'umuryango wiwe kuri kompanyi yimba ubutare ya AngloAmerican ku miriyaridi 5.1 z'amadolari. Uwundi yatunze cane muri uyu mwaka ni umudandaza wundi w'isima, Abdulsamad Rabiu. Imitahe yiwe muri kompanyi ikora isima ya BUA PLC, yashizwe ku rutonde kw'isoko ry'abagurisha imitahe muri Nigeria mu kwezi kwa mbere, yaduze igiciro biteye ubwoba mu kiringo c'uyu mwaka uheze. Vyatumye ubutunzi bwa Rabiu bwongerekana ku bice 77 kw'ijana, gushika ku miriyaridi 5.5 vy'amadolari. Ikintu gikomeye cane n'uko Rabiu n'umwana wiwe bafise ibice 97 kw'ijana vy'iyo kompanyi bagaca batuma imenyekana cane. Umuvugizi w'isoko ry'imitahe muri Nigeria yabwiye Forbes ko ikompanyi y'isima ya BUA  ishitse ku ntambwe ya kabiri - ko Forbes igabanya agaciro k'imitahe mu gihe iyo mitahe yagurishijwe ku banyagihugu ifise agaciro kari muri y'ibice 5 kw'ijana. Umugwizatunga wenyene ava mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika ari kuri urwo rutonde rwa Forbes ni umudandaza wo muri Tanzania, Mohammed Dewji, aza mu kibanza ca 13. Dewji afise ubutunzi bufise agaciro k'imiriyaridi 1.6 z'amadolari, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ico kinyamakuru c'ubutunzi ca Forbes. Urutonde rw'abantu batunze cane kw'isi mu mwaka wa 2021: 1. Aliko Dangote     afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 12.1 $ 2. Nassef Sawiris     afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 8.5  $ 3.  Nicky Openheimer  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 8  $ 4. Johann Rupert  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 7.2  $ 5. Mike Adenuga   afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 6.7  $ 6. Abdulsamad Rabiu  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 5.5  $ 7. Issad Rebrad afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 4.8  $ 8. Naguib Sawiris   afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 3.2  $ 9. Patrice afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 3  $ 10. Koos Bekker afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 2.8  $ Mu gihe bamwe bongereje ubutunzi bwabo ku miriyaridi n'imiriyaridi, ubutunzi bw'abagwizatunga babiri bari ku rutonde rwo mu mwaka wa 2020, bwaragabanutse gushika baje musi y'umuriyaridi umwe. Abapfasoni babiri bonyene ni bo bari ku rutonde rw'abatunzi bakomeye mu mwaka wa 2020, ubu bakorotse ntibakiri kuri urwo rutonde. Nk'uko bivugwa na Forbes, ubutunzi bwa Folonrusho Alakija wo muri Nigeria, afise ikompanyi yo kwimba igitoro bwaramanutse musi y'umuriyaridi umwe kubera igiciro c'ibitoro camanutse. Isabel dos Santos, kuva mu 2013 yari umupfasoni atunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika, ubutunzi bwiwe bwaragabanutse kubera ingingo nyinshi zitandukanye zitumbereye ivyo atunze muri Angola na Portugal. Abo bagwizatunga batunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika bava mu bihugu indwi bitandukanye. Afrika y'Epfo na Misri bifise abagwizatunga batanu, bigakurikirwa na Nigeria ifise batatu hamwe na Maroc ifise babiri.

column2: Kenya: Evariste Ndayishimiye asaba abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe mu Burundi
column3: Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye atera akamo abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe yabo mu Burundi  kuko ngo mu myaka ibiri canke itatu iri imbere bashobora kuzoba bacerewe. Agishika muri Kenya, yaciye aca mu burengero bw'ico gihugu mu gisagara ca Kisumu, aho prezida n'abagize reta ya Kenya bari, bitegurira guhimbaza umusi mukuru wa Madaraka Day kuri uyu wa kabiri. Mu kiganiro bahaye abamenyeshamakuru, abakuru b'ibihugu Uhuru Kenyatta na Evariste Ndayishimiye bashimagije umubano mwiza, gufashanya muri politike, ubutunzi, gutsimbataza amahoro n'ishaka bafise ryo kubitsimbataza. Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko amaze kuza muri Kenya kenshi, ariko ko ari ubwa mbere ashitse mu gisagara ca Kisumu. Yagize ati:"...Ntangajwe n'ubwiza hamwe n'iterambere nsanze muri kino gisagara." Yavuze ko Uburundi bumaze gutera intambwe mu mahoro n'umutekano, ko butakiri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bitarangwamwo amahoro muri Onu, ashimira prezida Kenyatta ko "we ubwiwe yabigizemwo uruhara." Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ubu, Uburundi buriko burashira inguvu cane mu guteza imbere ubutunzi, aranashima ko uguhanahana ibidandazwa hagati ya Kenya n'Uburundi bigenda vyiyongera. Yvuze ati:"Ndateye akamo abagwizatunga bo muri Kenya kuza mu Burundi kukoni co gihe ciza, kurindira imyaka ibiri canke itatu, mushobora gusanga mwacerewe." Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi kandi yatumiye mugenzi we wa Kneya Uhuru Kenyatta kugendera Uburundi.

column2: Kerala: Menya uyu muhindikazi atereka ubwanwa
column3: Ku mbuga hwaniro, uyu mugore wo mu Buhindi atereka ubwana bwiwe arashimirwa ariko kandi akanegurwa n’abantu. Ariko wewe avuga ko adahungabanywa n’ibivugwa vyose ku bwanwa bwiwe. "Ndakunda ubwanwa bwanje," Shyja w’imyaka 35 niko yanditse kuri WhatsApp, musi y’ifoto yiwe. Yama abazwa – n’abantu babona amafoto yiwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook canke bahura nawe amaso mu yandi – igituma atereka ubwanwa. Avuga ati: “Ikintu conyene novuga ni uko gusa ndabukunda. Cane”. Shyja, izina ryonyene akoresha, aba mu karere ka Kannur  mu ntara yo Kerala iri mu bumanuko bw’Ubuhindi. Nk’uko bimeze ku bagore batari bake, yaramaze imyaka itari mike atsiba ubwana bwiwe bwo hejuru. Mu gihe yama amwa ingohe ziwe, Shyja avuga ko atigeze yumva ko akeneye kumwa ubwanwa bwiwe bwo hejuru. Mu myaka itanu iheze, bwatanguye kuba bwinshi buboneka neza kandi Shyja arabureka abinezererewe cane. Ati: "Ubu si mbona ko noshobora kubaho ntabufise. Igihe ikiza ca Covid gitangura, naranka kwambara agapfukamunwa igihe cose kubera kanzibira isura”. Abantu benshi bamubona bamusaba ko yokwikurako ubu bwanwa bwo hejuru ariko Shyja ntavyumva. "Sinigeze numva ko ndi mubi kubera ndabufise canke ko ari ikintu ntategerezwa kuba mfise”. Abagore bama babwirwa ko imishatsi yo kw’isura atari myiza kuri bo, ko rero botanga amafaranga kugira ngo bayibakure – canke bakayigabanya – igihe cose. Amahinguriro akora imiti yo kubuza imishatsi kumera aregeranya amamiriyaridi n’amamiriyaridi y’amadorari mu gukora amavuta, inzembe n’ibindi bishobora kurandurana n’imizi imishatsi, bigurwa n’abagore bashoboye kubigura. Ariko muri ino myaka ya vuba, abagore benshi bahisemwo kwemera mbere no kwishimira ubu bwanwa. Mu 2016, Harnaam Kaur aharanira ukwiyemera kw’umuntu uko aba ameze kwose (Body positive body positivity) yabaye umugore wa mbere akiri muto kw’isi yose yameze ubwanwa ku munwa wose no kw’itama nk’umugabo, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo Guinness World Records. Mu biganiro yagiye atanga, yamye avuga ukungene ukwemera ubwanwa bwiwe kwabaye igihe gikomeye co kwiyemera imbere y’abamuzomera. Ku bwa Shyja, gutereka ubwanwa si ikintu umuntu afatira, ni kimwe mu bigize ubuzima bwiwe. Ati: "Jewe nkora ico nshatse. Iyaba nari mfise ubuzima bubiri, kumbure bumwe nari kububamwo uko abandi bashaka”. Kimwe mu vyatumye afata iyi ngendo ni ibibazo vy’amagara yahanganye navyo mu myaka itari mike. Shyja baramubaze  incuro zitandatu mu myaka cumi – rimwe kwari ukugira bamukure ikivyimba mw’ibere, irindi naryo kwari ukumukura utuvyimba mu gasaho k’imbuto. Aho aherukira kubagwa, kwari ukumukuramwo igitereko, haraciye imyaka itanu. Ati: "Igihe cose baheza kumbaga, naguma nizeye ko ntari gusubira muri ico cumba c’ibagiro”. Kubona yashoboye kurengana ibi bibazo vyose vy’amagara vyakomeje ivyiyumviro vya Shyja  ko ari ngombwa ko abaho mu buzima bwiwe bumuha umunezero. Shyja avuga ko akiri umwana yari afise isoni. Ni gake abagore mu kigwati ciwe bashobora kuboneka hanze inyuma y’isaha cumi na zibiri z’umugoroba. N’aho Kerala ari imwe mu ntara z’Ubuhindi zigenda zibaho ubuzima bwa none, kandi zifise ibimenyetso bikomeye vy’iterambere, mu turere twinshi umugabo ni we afise ijambo rya nyuma, kandi abagore bama babuzwa gufata ingendo canke kwibana. Igihe arongorwa akimukira mu ntara ya Tamil Nadu ihana urubibe n’iyo yavukiyemwo, Shyja avuga ko yaryohewe no kubona ubundi bwisanzure bushasha. Avuga ati: "Umugabo wanje yarashobora kuja ku kazi akagaruka atevye. Rero narashobora kwicara hanze ku mugoroba, rimwe na rimwe nkaja no kw’iduka ndi umwe mw’ijoro iyo hari ico nkeneye. Nta n’umwe yavyitaho. Igihe niga gukora ibintu jenyene, vyankomereje ukwiyemera”. Avuga kandi ko ariko aragerageza kuvyigisha umukobwa wiwe w’umuyabaga. Umuryango wa Shyja n’incuti ziwe bamye bamushigikira kuri buno bwanwa bwiwe. Umukobwa wiwe amubwira ko bumubereye. Ariko Shyja avuga ko yabwiwe amajambo y’ubwoko bwose avugwa n’abantu iyo bamubonye kw’ibarabara. Ati: "Abantu barantwenga bavuga ngo ‘abagabo bonyene nibo bamera ubwanwa, kubera iki umugore yobumera’?” Mu myaka itari mike, ni kenshi yagiye avugwa mu binyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Mu misi iheze, nk’uko abivuga, yarabonye amajambo y’agahemo yanditswe ku nkuru yamuvuga yari yacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook n’ikinyamakuru co muri ico gihugu. Umuntu umwe yabajije igituma atari gufata urwembwe akamwa ubwanwa bwiwe bimaze kuboneka ko ingohe ziwe yari yazimoye. Ati:"Ariko si ikibazo kijanye n’ivyo nshaka – none ngumye iki hanyuma nikureko iki?” Abagenzi ba Shyja akenshi bishurana agashavu kuri ano majambo yandikwa kuri Facebook, ariko avuga ko ivyo ataco bimubwiye na gato. "Mu bisanzwe, kenshi ndabaraba nkabatwenga”.

column2: Tanzania uko ndayibona: Ivyo Prezida Samia amaze gushikako mu mwaka umwe
column3: Mu makete y'abamenyeshamakuru b'abanya-Afrika, Sammy Awami arasubiza amaso inyuma ku kugene Tanzania yahindutse mu mwaka umwe kuva Samia Suluhu Hassan abaye umugore wa mbere abaye ategetse ico gihugu inyuma y'urupfu rwa prezida John Pombe Magufuli. Iyo igipimo c'umunezezo canke ukwishima gifatwa mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, cari kwerekana ko aba-Tanzania bari mu bantu ba mbere banezerewe kw'isi, nk'uko bivugwa n'aba-Tanzania bamwe bamwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Mu mayinga make aheze, prezida Samia Suluhu Hassan, azwi cane gusa nka Mama Samia, yarabonanye na babiri mu ndongozi z'umugambwe uza imbere mu yitavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, Chadema, Tundu Lissu na  Freeman Mbowe, ibintu atawari gushobora gucisha mu mutwe haraheze umwaka. Lissu aba mu buhungiro inyuma yo kuraswa amasasu 16 mu 2007 mu kugerageza kumwica vyafashwe ko vyari bifise imvo ya poritike. Mbowe aherutse kuva mu munyororo, aho yari apfungiwe kuva afashwe yagirizwa ivyaha vy'iterabwoba mu kwezi kw'indwi igihe yari yiteguriye kugirisha ikoraniro ryo gusaba ko hagira ibihindurwa mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro. Umunyamategeko akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira cane Fatma Karume yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "NDAKWISHIMIYE, SSH [Samia Suluhu Hassan]. Lissu nawe nyene arakwishimiye." Haraheze umwaka, Tanzania cari ikindi gihugu. Ico gihe prezida John Pombe Magufuli yabona ko abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ari ibikoresho vy'inyungu z'abanyamahanga. Ururimi rwiwe ku batavuga rumwe na reta zari inguvu, kandi yari yihaye ihangiro ryo kuzimanganya poritike ishingiye ku migambwe myinshi. Kuba ibintu vyarahindutse nta n'umwe atavyemera mu mice yose ya poritike. Lissu avuga ati: "Si ndi umuntu agenda arakoma amashi, [ariko] hari ibintu Mama Samia yatanguye gukora neza. Kandi kubera yatanguye gukora ibintu neza, tuzomushigikira abikore neza gusumba." Ikidahurizwako n'ukumenya niba prezida Samia ivyo ariko arahindura akwiye kubishimirwa vyose. Tanzania yabaye igihugu gitwazwa igitugu ku mugambwe n'ubu ariwo utwara, Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM), ubu arongoye. Yari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu muri reta yakoze uko ishobora ngo izimanganye ukutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi no guta abantu mu munyororo ku mpamvu zo kuyinegura gusa. Kunyuruza abantu, kubura abandi irengero, ku mvo bivugwa ko ari iza poritike, vyarakozwe kuri reta yazamwo ubwa kabiri mu butegetsi bwayo. Hari n'ikibazo co kumenya niba ashaka gushira mu mategeko impinduka ziriko ziraba. Nyinshi zisa n'izishingiye ku gushaka kw'umukuru w'igihugu ubwiwe gusa. Nk'akarorero, mu gihe kubonana n'abanyaporitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ari intambwe nziza mu kwubaka icizere, amategeko agenga imigambwe adahurizwako ntarahinduka. Ivyo biha urwego rujejwe imigambwe ububasha bwagutse kandi budatomoye neza bwo gufuta umugambwe no guha igihano co gupfungwa gushika ku mwaka uwo ariwe wese yihaye igikorwa co kwigisha ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu, nko gushishikariza abanyagihugu kwiyandikisha kugira bazokwitabe amatora. Ni nk'uko, n'ubwo ibihano ku binyamakuru vyinshi vyavanyweho, itegeko ryo 2016 rigenga ibimenyeshamakuru, iryo mu 2018 rigenga ibinyamakuru vyo ku mbuga hwaniro n'iryo mu 2015 rigenga ivyaha biciye mu kwinjira mu mashini (Cybercrimes), ayo yose ntarahinduka mu gihe ariyo yakomeje ukubuza ibinyamakuru gukorera mu bwigenge akanabikwegera ibihano nko guhagarikwa canke kwugarwa. Ico prezida Samia yakoze ubu n'uguhagarika umuhindimuko wo gushika ku ntwaro y'igitugu idateye amazi. Yasubije igihugu mu gihe c'imbere ya 2015, ariko nta kinini arakora kugira ahindure amategeko yatumye uwo yasubiriye akandamiza abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi. Ariko ivyo amaze gukora mu nzira ya poritike yihanganira abandi vyerekana ko umukuru w'igihugu ashaka kugira ivyo ahindura. Ariko vyerekana kandi ko ari mu mayirabiri hagati yo kubandanya impinduka no kugumiza umugambwe arongoye ku butegetsi.  Nk'akarorero, abanyaporitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutetegetsi babonanye n'ubu ntibarekuriwe gukoresha amakoraniro. Ariko birasa n'uko ibiriko birahinduka bizorama. Ico cizere kiva mu kwibaza ko prezida Samia ubu yamaze gufata mu minwe umugambwe uri ku butegetsi. Mu mezi ya mbere Magufuli agipfa, yategerezwa kwama ariko aributsa abamwumva ko n'umukuru w'umugore ategerezwa kwubahwa no kwizerwa. Ico gihe abashikiranganji basa n'abashaka kwubaha ivyo bishakiye mu mategeko yabaha. Kimwe mu bishobora kugagaza kuba ubutegetsi bwiwe buguma bukomera n'ifungurwa rya Mbowe - inyuma y'urubanza rwiwe rwamaze amezi umunani kandi ata vyagiriji, abantu nabo badasiba gusaba ko urubanza rwiwe rwofutwa. Vyibazwa ko rwahebwe kuko yihagazeko imbere y'abasigaye bakiri ku ngendo ya Magufuli baterekwa impinduka ziwe. Bamwe bagereranya ibiriko birahinduka nko ku gihe ca prezida Jakaya Kikwete, umwe mu bo Samia yafatirako akaba ari nawe  yatwaye imbere ya Magufuli. Uburyo bwiwe bwo gutwara bwari ubwo gushira abantu hamwe,  amatati ya poritike n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi akenshi yakemurirwa mu biganiro ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu bariko barasangira icayi n'utwuzango. Ivyo vyatuma reta isa n'iyidakoresha amategeko acinyiza. Aho umuntu afatira icizere n'uko hanagarutse poritike z'ubutunzi ziha ikibanza abikorera ku giti cabo. Abanyamitahe b'abanyamahanga bariko barareshwa cane, ibihugu vya Buraya bisigaye birabwa nk'ivyo gufashanya mw'iterambere aho kuba ibishaka kwiganza canke kuba "mabeberu," ni ukuvuga amasuguru (impfizi) y'impene - ijambo ry'akagaye ryakoreshwa na Magufuli. Hamwe na kahise ke ko guharanira agateka ka zina muntu binyuze mu gukorera hamwe, n'amamuko yiwe yo muri Zanzibar aharangwa umuco wo kwicisha bugufi no kwakira abandi, nta gitangaje ko agira ingendo itandukanye mu gutwara. Ariko ashobora guhura n'abatavyuma kumwe na we bakomeye cane muri CCM, hamwe, nk'akarorero, yokwemera ko haba amatora kamarampaka ku mpinduka mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro, ikintu abatavuga rumwe na reta n'abashigikiye demokrasi baguma basaba, kuko vyogabanya ububasha bw'umugambwe wiwe ku butegetsi. Prezida Samia yashitse ku butegetsi mu bihe  vy'igitangaza, mu gihugu n'ingendo ya poritike vyiganziwe n'ijwi ry'abagabo  vyatejwe imbere cane n'uwo yasubiriye. Umunsi umwe mw'ijambo imbere y'abanyagihugu, uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu umuhisi Magufuli yavuze atebura ingene abagore bihagararako bakubitwa, mu rindi naho akekeza mu buryo bujanye n'igitsina umugore w'umushingamateka kubera inzobe y'urukoba rwiwe. Aho hompi yarakomewe amashi cane. Inyuma y'umwaka umwe, prezida Samia yashoboye kuvyura icizere c'intango nshasha. Ariko igipimo kizogaragaza ko ishaka ryiwe ryo gukora impinduka zirama kiri ku muvuduko n'aho azogarukira mu guhindura amategeko ari nayo  yoshimangira iragi ryiwe ariko kandi akanakingira ukwishira n'ukwizana kw'abanya-Tanzania, akanabera inkinzo igihugu ku bategetsi b'igitugu bozokwinjira ingoro y'umukuru w'igihugu muri kazoza.

column2: Ukraine: 'ntihagire ikindi mugurira muri Russia kiretse umwavu n’ingano' - niko US igabisha Africa
column3: Uwuserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mw’ishirahamwe ONU  yaragendeye ibihugu vya Afrika, kimwe mu vya mugenza, kwari ukugabisha ko bitohirahira ngo bigurire ikintu kindi mu Burusiya kiretse intete n’umwavu, anagabisha ko bishobora gufatirwa ibihano. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru i Kampala muri Uganda, Linda Thomas-Greenfield yavuze ati:  “Uburusiya bwama buvuga ngo ibihano bwafatiwe ku mfungurwa no ku bindi bifitaniye isano n’uburimyi vyatumye ibiciro biduga mu bihugu bitari bike. [...] Nagomba kumenyesha ko ata bihano twafatiwe ibintu ivyo ari vyo vyose vy’uburimyi biva mu Burusiya. “Uburusiya burashobora gushora hanze ibidandazwa vyabwo vyo mu gisata c’uburimyi, harimwo umwavu n’ingano, kandi n’ibindi bihugu birashobora kubigura”. “Nayo ku bihano vyafatiwe Uburusiya”, niko Linda Thomas-Greenfield abandanya avuga, “nk’akarorero ku bitoro, mu gihe igihugu cofata ingingo yo gukorana n’Uburusiya mu bisata bwafatiwemwo ibihano, aho coba gihonyanze ibi bihano[…].  Aha rero tugabisha ibihugu ko bitohirahira ngo birenge kuri ibi bihano”. Ibihugu hafi vyose vya Afrika bishima kutegamira kuri Ukraine muri ino ntambara yayo n’Uburusiya. Ibi mu bisanzwe bisigurwa n’ukutagirira icizere Uburengero, imyaka vyamaze mu bukoloni, be n’impuhwe z’incabwenge mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika zize mu Burusiya. Aho nyene, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika ni abakiriya bakomeye b’intete za Ukraine, bakaba bahanzwe n’ikibazo c’ubukene bw’imfungurwa kigenda ciyongera. Ni mu gihe ku rubuga, intambara zibandanya ziha inkumbi muri Ukraine. Mu turere tw’intara ya Donetsk tugenzurwa na Ukraine, abasivire batanu baraye bishwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya, nk’uko bivugwa n’umukuru wa gisirikare muri Donetsk Pavel Kirilenko. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Telegram ati: "Kw’igenekerezo rya 5 Myandagaro (5), Abarusiya bishe abasivire batanu ba Donbass. Abandi 14 barakomeretse”. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko hari igice kigira kabiri c’imfashanyo Amerika iha Ukraine gifise agaciro k’umuriyaridi umwe cimirije gutangwa. Isoko ryabwiye Reuters ko ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu wa Amerika mu ndwi iza - ari nko ku wa mbere – bizotangaza iyindi mfashanyo ingana n’umuriyaridi w’amadorari y’abanyamerika izorungikirwa Ukraine. Muri ino mfashanyo harimwo ibisasu vya za muzinga zitera ibisasu vyinshi, zizwi nka HIMARS, ibirwanisho vyo gukorora indege vyo mu bwoko bwa NASAMS, hamwe n’ibimodoka ntamenwa vyo m ugisata c’ubuvuzi, bizwi nka 50 M113. Perezida Joe Biden ntaratera igikumu kuri uru rupapuro, bikaba bishoboka ko ibigize iyi mfashanyo, ibi navyo bikaba ari ibitigiri hamwe n’ubwoko bw’ibirwanisho, bishobora guhinduka. Mu gihe Biden yoterako igikumu, iyi yoba ari yo mfashanyo nini cane itangiwe icarimwe ihabwa Ukraine kuva intambara itanguye. Amerika imaze kurungikira Ukraine imfashanyo y’agaciro k’imiriyaridi 8.8 igizwe n’ibirwanisho n’ibindi vya nkenerwa. Maison Blanche/White House yanse kugira ico ishikirije ku vyerekeye iyi mfashanyo yimirije.

column2: Afghanistan: Inkuru y'uwakorotse ku ndege ya Amerika ahunga aba-Taliban
column3: Benshi baribuka mu mwaka uheze igihe Kabul, umurwa mukuru wa Afghanistan, yahungwa na benshi imaze gufatwa n'aba-Taliban. Inkuru y'abantu bakorotse bava ku ndege y'igisirikare ca Amerika iratanguye kumenyekana...

column2: France: Umuriro wadutse mw’isengero nkuru rya Nantes
column3: Isengero rikuru Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul  ryo mu gisagara ca Nantes mu Bufaransa ryatewe n'umuriro w'icaduka. Abajejwe kuzimya imiriro y'ivyaduka barenga 60 nibo bashitse kuri iryo sengero kugira bagerageze kuwuzimya nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiyamakuru vyaho. Nta wuzi icateye uwu muriro. Amasanamu ava aho ivyo biriko biba yerekana umuriro n'umwotsi biva muri iyo nyukabwa. Uyu muriro wadutse haciye umwaka umwe gusa uwundi muriro ukoze ibara kw'isengero rikuru Notre-Dame mu gisagara ca Paris, rimwe mu mitungo ya kahise k'u Bufaransa. Televiziyo BFM TV, itangaza ko abapolisi muri ico gisagara ca Nantes kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'u Bufaransa batumweko hafi isaha imwe n'iminota 44 mu gatondo. Umwe mu babibonye avuga ko yashobora kubona uwo mucanwa ari muhira, hafi y'iryo sengero. Avuga ko yakanguwe n'urwamo rudasanzwe rw'inkengeri. Ati: "Ku vyo mbona, ni uko umwotsi utera wongerekana". Iryo sengero sibwo bwa mbere riterwa n'umucanwa. Mu 1972, umuriro warasambuye igisenge caryo, bituma ryugarwa mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu ririko rirasubirwamwo.

column2: Covid-19: Hydroxychloroquine ifise kuba isongera isibe hagukiza, ubushakashatsi
column3: Umuti Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika avuga ko ariko arafata mu kurwanya Covid-19  ushobora kuba ahubwo usongera isibe, nk'uko ivyigwa bivyerekana. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe buvuga ko ata karusho bizana mu kuvura coronavirus hakoreshejwe uwo muti uvura malaria witwa hydroxychloroquine. Bwana Trump avuga ko yariko arafata uwo muti n'aho abajejwe amagara y'abantu bagabishije ko ushobora gutera ingorane z'umutima. Uyo mu perezida abandanya ahimiriza ikoreshwa ry'uwo muti, mu gihe abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavyamirira kure. Hydroxychloroquine ni nziza mu kuvura malaria, na zimwe nka za lupus na arthrite, ariko gushika ubu ntibiremezwa nimba Hydroxychloroquine ishobora kuvura coronavirus. Ico cigwa cakozwe n'ikigo Lancet gikoresheje abarwayi 96000, muri bo hafi 15.000 bakaba bahawe Hydroxychloroquine - canke umuti wo mu bwoko bwa chloroquine. Tugereranije n'abandi barwayi, ubwo bushakashatsi bwasanze ko abo bahawe Hydroxychloroquine bari bafise igihamana kibi co gupfira mu bitaro canke bakagira ibibazo vy'itera ry'umutima. Turavye ingene abarwayi bagiye bapfa, ni uko ibice 18% vy'abahawe Hydroxychloroquine ari bo bapfuye, abahawe Chloroquine isanzwe bakaba bapfuye ku rugero rwa 16.4%, nayo abandi bobo batahawe iyo miti bapfuye ku rugero rwa 9%. Abashakashatsi bakoze ico cigwa bagabisha ko Hydroxychloroquine itokoreshwa mu gihe atari mu magerageza y'imiti. Bwana Trump wewe yivugira ko gushika ubu atarigera yandura Covid-19, kandi ko abandanya afata uwo muti kuko yizera ko "ufise akarusho". Hari ibikorwa vyo kugerageza uwo muti usanzwe uvura malaria nimba ushobora gukoreshwa mu kuvura Covid-19. Abakozi bo mu gisata c'ubuvuzi barenga ibihumbi 40 ku migabane ya Bulaya, Afrika, Aziya, Amerika y'Epfo basanzwe bariko bavura abanduye Covid-19, bari mu bazohabwa uwo muti mu gikorwa co kuwugerageza. Dr Marcos Espinal, arongoye ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Amerika y'Epfo (Organisation panaméricaine de la santé) risanzwe rikorana n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS, ashimangira ko ata vyigwa na bimwe vy'ubuvuzi birigera vyemeza ko hydroxychloroquine yokoreshwa mu kuvura coronavirus.

column2: Umuntu wa kane agendana umugera wa SIDA biboneka ko yawukize
column3: Umugabo asanzwe agendana umugera wa VIH utera SIDA kuva mu myaka ya 1980 aboneka ko yakize, akaba abaye uwa kane gusa, nk’uko bivugwa n’abaganga. Yatewe umusokoro wo mw’igufa ariko aravurwa indwara ya kanseri yo mu maraso yo mu bwoko bwa leukaemia, awuhawe n’umugiraneza asanzwe adafatwa n’umugera. Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 66 atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yarahagaritse gufata imiti yari amaze imyaka irenga 30 afata, yo gupfupfahaza VIH. Avuga ko afise “umunezero utagira urugero” kubona ata mugera agifise mu mubiri. Uyu mugabo azwi nk’umurwayi w’“Igisagara c’Umwizero” (City of Hope) inyuma y’ibitaro yariko aravurirwamwo vya Duarte mu ntara ya California. Abenshi mu bagenzi biwe bahitanywe na SIDA  imbere y’uko imiti yo gupfupfahaza itangura guhabwa abarwayi mu ntumbero yo kubafasha kubandanya babaho ubuzuma busanzwe. Umugera HIV/VIH (Virus de l'Immunodéficience Humaine), wica abasoda b’umubiri bigatuma umuntu arwara indwara ya SIDA kuko umubiri ntuba ugishoboye kurwanya umugera. Mw’itangazo, uyu mugabo avuga ati: "Igihe bantora umugera mu 1988, co kimwe n’abandi, nibajije ko nciriwe urwo gupfa. "Sinigeze nibaza ko noshoboye kubandanya mbaho gushika aho mbona umusi ntazoba ngifise umugera”. Ariko, ntiyakize ngo ni uko yavuwe umugera wa VIH, ahubwo vyarahuriranye kuko yariko aravurwa kanseri yo mu maraso yo mu bwoko bwa leukaemia yari yanduye afise imyaka 63. Abaganga bamukurikirana ico gihe bafashe ingingo ko yoterwa umusokoro mu ntumbero yo gusubiriza uturemangingo tw’amaraso twari dufise kanseri. Rero yagize amahirwe asanga umugiraneza yemeye kumuha utu turemangingo ari mu murwi wa ba bantu batandura umugera wa VIH. Umugera winjirira mu turemangingo twera (globules blancs/ white blood cells) tw’amaraso uciye mu muhora utaboneka n’amaso, indemamubiri (proteine) izwi nka CCR5. Hagati aho, hariho abantu, harimwo n’uyu mugiraneza yamuhaye utu turemangingo, bafise iyi CCR5 igenda ihindagurika ikazibira uwu muhora, bigatuma umugera udashobora kwinjira. Uyu murwayi 'w’Igisagara c’Umwizero' yarakurikiraniwe hagufi inyuma yo guterwa utu turemangino, haragera igihe umugera utakiboneka mu mubiri. Amaze amezi arenga 17 ata mugera umurimwo. Dr Jana Dickter, umuganga avura indwara ziterwa n’imigera kw’ico Gisagara c’Umwizero, avuga ati: "Wari umunezero kuri twebwe kumubwira ko umugera wa SIDA utakiri muri we kandi ko bitari bikenewe ko abandanya afata imiti yo gupfupfahaza yari amaze imyaka irenga 30 afata”. Ikintu nk’iki cabaye ubwa mbere mu 2011 igihe Timothy Ray Brown – azwi nk’umurwayi w’i Berlin – aba umuntu wa mbere kw’isi yakize umugera wa SIDA. Mu myaka itatu iheze, hamaze kuba abandi bantu batatu bakira muri ubu buryo. Uyu murwayi w’Igisagara c’Umwizero ni we muntu wa mbere afise imyaka myinshi avuwe muri ubu buryo akongera akaba n’uwa mbere amaze igihe kirekire agendana VIH ashoboye gukira. Hagati aho, guterwa imisokoro ntibisigura ko bigiye guhindura ibintu mu kuvura imiriyoni 38 z’abantu bagendana SIDA muri kino gihe. Dr Dickter avuga ati: "Ni uburyo bugoye cane kandi bushobora kugira ingaruka mbi zikomeye. Rero si inzira nyayo yo kuvura abantu bose bagendana SIDA”. Hagati aho, abashakashatsi bariko bararondera ingene bokwibanda kuri uwu muhora w’indemamubiri CCR5 mu gutera uturemangino nk’imwe mu nzira yo kuvura umugera. Ubu buryo bwarashikirijwe mu nama yerekeye SIDA yabaye mu 2022 i Montreal muri Canada. Avuga ku vyavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi Prof Sharon Lewin aherutse gutorwa ngo arongore ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryishinze kurwanya umugera wa SIDA, International Aids Society, avuga ati: "Umuti uracari kananirabahinga mu bushakashatsi kuri SIDA”. Avuga ko “imbere y’aha habaye abantu bake bakize” bagatanga “icizere kibandanya ku bantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA,  ndetse inaha umwizero abahinga”.

column2: Lil Uzi Vert: Umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika yihomye mu gahanga diyama ya miliyoni 24 $
column3: Umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika Lil Uzi Vert yavuzweko vyinshi ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi inyuma yo gukoresha amadolari imiliyoni 24 mu kugura ubutare bupima kara 11 yahomye kuruhanga rwiwe. Inkuru zitangwa na BBC igisata ca Pidgin, zivuga ko yaguze ubwo butare mu nzu y'ubudandarizo ya Elliot Eliante ku madolari imiliyoni 24. Lil Uzi Vert yatumye haba amajambo menshi y'abakunzi biwe kw'isi yose igihe yerekana video y'ingene ubu asa, agaca anandika ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi ya Instagram ngo " Ubwiza burababaza" (Beauty is Pain). Izina nyaryo rya Lil Uzi Vert ni Symere Bysil Woods, umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika w'umudiho wa Rap, akaba n'umwanditsi w'indirimbo.
