Yavutse itariki 31 mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 1994 mu buraruko bwa Philadelphia i Francisville muri Amerika. Ikintu gituma uwo muririmvyi atandukana n'abandi, n'ibicapo afise ku mubiri (Tatoo), n'ingene yagiye aritobora mu maso, ingene agenda ahindura uko yisokoza n'inyambaro ya kera. Lil Uzi yamenyekanye cane inyuma yo gushira ahabona ururirimbo rwiwe rwa Luv is Rage mu mwaka wa 2015. Izindi ndirimbo zatumye aba rurangiranwa ni nk'ururirimbo rwiwe  Money Longer yaririmvye mu 2016, You was Right, Gucci Mane, Bad na Bouje iza mu kibanza ca 100 kuri Billboard muri Amerika hamwe na Tour Life rwatumye ahabwa agashimwe ka MTV k'ururirimbo rwa mbere mu gihe c'ubushuhe. Bivugwa ko uwo muririmvyi yoba afise ubutunzi bushika ku miliyoni 16 z'amadolari, ariko ko hagati y'umwaka wa 2017 na 2018 yoba yararonse imiliyoni 20 avuye mu ndirimbo aririmbira ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi hamwe n'ibiteramo vyiwe.

column2: Coronavirus - Africa: Hari icizere ko ibitigiri vy'abandura biriko biragabanuka
column3: Ikigo kijejwe kurwanya no gukinga indwara muri Afrika (CDC) kimenyesha ko mu ndwi iheze ibitigiri vy'abanduye coronavirus ku munsi ku munsi vyagabanutse. Ku mugabane wose, urugero rw'abanduye ku munsi ku munsi rwageze ku bantu 10.300 mu ndwi iheze, ibiharuro biri munsi ugereranije n'ivy'abari banduye mu ndwi y'imbere yayo vyari 11.000. Dr John Nkengasong arongoye ikigo CDC avuga ko ibi "bitanga umwizero". Gushika ubu, umugabane wose wa Afrika umaze kugira abantu bashika 1,147,369 banduye coronavirus, abarenga igice c'abo bakaba ari abo muri Afrika y'Epfo, hamwe n'abashika hafi 26.000 bapfuye. Dr Nkengasong avuga ko afise icizere "ko dutanguye gutera intambwe buhoro buhoro", ariko yongerako y'uko "hakiri kare cane, cane koko - duhanganye n'umugera uteye ubwoba cane kandi ukwiragira ku muvuduko munini". Ati: "Aya makuru dutegerezwa kuyakira twiyubara cane ", agasibura ko adashaka ko abantu bijajara ugasanga bariyibagije ingingo zo kuzibira ikwirakwira ryawo. ""Ntidushaka na gato ko abanyagihugu bacu berekana ko barushe, maze ugasanga natwe turatezuye mu rugamba rwo kurwanya uwu mugera". Asaba abanyagihugu kubandanya n'utwigoro two guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'umugera. Ashimikira cane cane ko abanyagihugu bobandanya bambara udupfukamunwa, bakabandanya bakurikira ingingo yo gutandukana, kandi ibikorwa vyo gupima bikabandanya. Dr Nkengasong avuga kandi ko ku mugabane wose abarenga imiliyoni 10 bashoboye gupimwa, Afrika y'Epfo ikaba ari kimwe mu bihugu vyapimye abantu benshi. Ibitigiri vy'abanduye n'abamaze gupfa biri hasi ugereranije n'ahandi kw'isi nka Bulaya, Amerika y'Epfo na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho yonyene gusa ifise abarenga imiliyoni zitanu n'igice z'abanduye. Hagati aho, abahinga bamwe bamwe baragabisha ko muri Afrika ibitigiri vy'abanduye bishobora kuba bisumba ibitangazwa kubera ubushobozi buke bwo gupima. Mu ntango, vyasa n'uko umurindi w'ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera wari ku rugero ruto, ariko rukaba rwagiye ruriyongera bukebuke, cane cane muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ishure kaminuza yo muri Amerika Johns Hopkins ikurikiranira hafi uwu mugera rivuga ko Afrika y'Epfo ifise abantu 596.060 bawanduye, igitigiri kirenga igice c'abanduye ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, ikagira gatanu kw'isi. Abandura bagiye baragabanuka, ivyo bituma ibitigiri ku mugabane wose navyo bigabanuka. Igitigiri co kw'isonga cageze ku barenga 12,000 bandura ku munsi, iki kikaba caragabanutse cane gushika ku rugero rwa 5,000. Igihugu ca Afrika gikurikira ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bifise abanduye benshi ni Misiri, ikaba iza mu kibanza ca 31 kw'isi n'abandu 96,914 banduye.

column2: Covid-Kenya: Umugore yanse gutsindwa n'uwo mugera
column3: Aho hadukiye ikiza ca coronavirus, Josephine Muchiliwa yari umunyagikoni, ariko co kimwe n'abandi benshi muri Kenya n'ahandi kw'isi, akazi kiwe karahagaze. Muri uyu mwaka uheze, umunyamakuru w'ikiganiro ca BBC Business Daily Ed Butler yarakurikiranye ingene uwo mugore yavyifashemwo. "Nta kazi ngira, nta buzima ngira, ntaco mfise ngaburira abana". Uko kuri kweruye kuri mu buryo Josephine avuga ingene abayeho biturutse ku  ngaruka z'ingingo zo kwirinda coronavirus guhanze abatari bake. Mu gihe haheze imisi reta ifashe ingingo zikomeye zo kugabanya uruja n'uruza kugira ihagarike ikwirakwira rya Covid-19, uwo mugore areze abana wenyene, wo muri quartier ya Kibera ibamwo abantu benshi cane, arigana amagume yaguye kuri benshi bukwi na bukwi. Akazi kiwe k'umushahara muto cane mu gikoni c'ishuri karangiye aho abanyeshure babwiriwe kwigira i muhira. Yasigaye aribaza aho azokura ivyo agaburira abana biwe bane. Uwo mugore w'imyaka 31 yabwiye Business Daily ati: "Ubu nitura Imana gusa. Sinzi ico ndi bukore". Ariko bamaze kwumva amarushwa y'uwo mugore, hari abantu b'umutima mwiza baciye bamuha imfashanyo. Ntiyari amafaranga menshi - hafi ama dolari 150 (arenga 300.0000 vy'amarundi)  - ariko yari akwiye kugira afashe Josephine gutangura urudandazwa rw'imboga n'ivyamwa. Yaciye aja kurangura kw'isoko hagati ku murwa mukuru wa Kenya, agura ibiro 25 vy'ibitunguru, itomati n'ibindi, abizana i Kibera aho yaciye akotesha kiosk ntoya y'ibiti. Josephine yaciye aja ararungika amajwi y'ubuzima bwiwe bwa minsi yose yafata ari mu kazu kiwe k'icumba kimwe kubatse mu vyondo, avuga ingene agerageza ngo urudabndazwa rwiwe rukunde. Aho Kibera, quartier nini cane yubatswe mu buryo budakurikije amategeko ku murwa mukuru Nairobi , benshi mu bahaba barahura n'ibibazo nk'ivya Josephine. Mu gihe abenshi mu baba Kibera  bakora ubuzi bwo mu ngo (ikiboyi canke ikiyaya) ,  barakozweko  kurusha abandi n'ingaruka z'ikiza ca coronavirus ku butunzi, kuko abakoresha babo bifise gusumba baciye bababuza kubandanya baza kubakorera ku bwoba bw'uko bohava babanduza umugera. Ariko , mu ntango , nabi nabi, urudandazwa rwa Josephine rwasa n'urugenda neza. Yararonka abakiriya umunani canke 10 ku munsi. Umunsi umwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu guheze yambariye ati: ''Nibura uyu munsi naronse inyungu y'ama shilingi 170. Abana bamerewe neza, baranezerewe, kuko nibura bararya." Ariko n'ubundi ivyago ntaho vyaja. Josephine nta rudandazwa yari asanzwe amenyereye, quartier yabo na yo yarimwo umukwabu,  abapolisi bama bariko bariruka kuri uwo wese afashwe inyuma y'amasaha yo gutembera. Kurenga imbibe z'igisagara navyo vyari bibujijwe. Aho hose abana biwe bane yategerezwa kumenya aho bari buri gihe kuko hari ububisha bwinshi n'ubwoba ko bashobora kugirirwa ubukozi bw'ikibi bufatiye gu gitsina. Yavuze ati : ''Ibitigiri vy'abantu basambanywa ku  nguvu biguma biduga. Nsize abana bonyene, uwariwe wese ashobora kuza akabagirira nabi." Kandi nta bantu benshi bari  bafise amafaranga yo kuza kugura ivyo acuruza. Ababanyi na bo bari batakaje akazi, batunzwe n'utwo boba bari baraziganije. Bati amagorwa ntasiga ayandi. Josephine yafashwe na malaria, biba ngombwa ko agurana amafaranga yo kwivuza, ayaka umwe mu basanzwe batanga ideni mu kibano. Gusaba ideni n'ibintu bikorwa cane mu ma quartier  nka Kibera. Umwe mu batanga ideni, azwi nka Rodgers, yabwiye BBC ko hageze aho atakironka amafaranga yo gutangako ideni kuko yaronderwa na benshi cane. Kandi yavuze ko abenshi batashobora kuririha, aho rero yaca agurisha ibikoresho vyo mu nzu baba batanzeko ingwati. Josephine we, nta n'ico kugwatiriza yari afise. Kiosk irabomowe Gushika no kuri uyu musi, aracafise ubwoba ko ideni atarariha, ry'ama dolari 30 (arenga 60.000 mu marundi), rishobora kumutera ingorane zikomeye. Icizigire c'uko ashobora kuriha iryo deni cayoyotse mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu mwaka uheze igihe tingatinga za reta zaharura  igice ca Kibera carimwo kiosk yiwe. Bavuga ko bariko barategura ahazoca inzira nshasha ya gariyamoshi. Reta yavuga ko abahaba bahawe umwanya ukwiye wo kubimenyeshwa ngo hahave. Ariko Josephine, nk'umupangayi, avuga ko atigeze abimenya. Aho bibabarije n'uko yari amaze iminsi yaranguye ibintu vyinshi, vyose hamwe n'iyo kiosk y'imbaho, bisenyurwa na tingatinga. Aca asubira kwifumbereza, indoto yo kuba umucuruzi iba igarukiye aho. "Uwo munsi narakomye induru, mara iminsi itatu ndira. Mbabaye cane. Sinashobora no kurya. Kuva ico gihe ubuzima bwaciye bungora cane. " Bishoboka ko ikiza ca coronavírus kimaze gukora ku banya Kenya baharurwa muri za miriyoni, nk'uko kwa Josephine. Gushika ubu ibiharuro vy'icese vyerekana ko muri Kenya hamaze gupfa abantu berenga 2100 bahitwanywe na Covid, n'ubwo abahinga bavuga ko ibitigiri bishobora kuba birenga ngaho kure. Ariko ababa muri Kibera, babona ko bo bakozweko kurusha abandi n'ingingo za reta zo kurwanya ico kiza kandi ko igipolisi gihohotera abantu mu bikorwa vyo kwuzubahiriza. Kennedy Odeke, uwavukiye muri Kibera aharanira ineza y'iyo quartier,  yashinze ishirahamwe ry'ubugiraneza, Shining Charity, avuga ati: ''Abo bantu babayeho ku ma dolari adashika abiri ku munsi, barazi ko urwaye uca upfa. "Dushaka ko reta yitaho ama quartiers y'abakene nka Kibera, turonke amabarabara, ubuvuzi, n'amazi meza." Ariko reta ntiyimirije kuvanaho ingingo zigabanya uruja n'uruza rw'abantu. Mu kwezi guheze, amasaha yo kudatembera mw'ijoro yarongerejwe kuko ibiharuro vy'abandura vyaduze cane. Umwaka umwe kuva ico kiza cadutse mu gihugu, Josephine n'ubu aracagwana. N'ubu nta hantu hafashe akura uburyo bwo kubaho, abana biwe batunzwe n'igikombe kimwe c'ubuyi ku munsi. Umwana wiwe w'umukobwa mukuru w'imyaka 11 Shamim yambwiye ati: "Hari aho nibaza ko umunsi umwe nzoba umuganga. "Ariko uyu munsi nibajije ivyo kurya." Josephine hari aho aronka akazi ka rimwe rimwe ko gukora isuku, ariko yambariye ko hari umugore umwe, ataramuhemba ibikorwa vy'iminsi itatu. Ariko kubera ishirahamwe Shining Hope, afise icizere ko hagiye kugira igihinduka mu buzima bwiwe. Ubu ariko ariga gushona, akazi abamaze kukamenyera bavuga ko kinjiza amafaranga atari make ku munsi. N'ubwo ivyigwa muri aya mezi 12 aheze vyari bigoye cane, Josephine apfanye icizere ko we n'abana biwe bazova muri izo ngorane neza baravye ivyo bamaze gucamwo.

column2: DR Congo: Umukuru w'umugwi ujejwe amatora atanguye akazi mu mpari
column3: Umukuru w'umugwi ujejwe amatora muri Repuburika y'Intwaro ya Demokrasi ya Congo (RDC) yarahiriye amabanga mu mpari nyinshi kw'igenwa ryiwe. Denis Kadima, agiye kuyobora umugwi ujejwe amatora CENI,  afise igikorwa gikomeye co gutunganya amatora yimirije kuba mu 2023. Igenwa ryiwe ntiryahurijweko na bose, imigwi y'amadini - ariyo yitwa ko igena abagize CENI - ntiyumvikanye. Itandatu muri iyo migwi umunani  yaratoye Kadima - ariko ishengero katorika hamwe n'ishengero ry'abaporoti rinini rya ECC (Église du Christ au Congo), aravyanka avuga ko igenrwa ridaciye mu nzira yo. Ibihugu bifashanya na RD Congo birimwo ahanini ibigize ishirahamwe rya Buraya, n'iryo shirahamwe nyene hamwe kandi na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubuyapani, Ubwongereza na Korea y'Epfo, birababazwa no kubona igenwa ry'abagize CENI ritumvikanyweko n'abo biraba kandi ari ''ikintu gikomeye mu gutanga icizere ku matora yimirije". Ivyo ayo mashengero avuga bishigikiwe n'abashingamateka batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi nabo batemeje Kadima mu nama nshingamateka. Inama nshingamateka ya RDC yemeje igenwa rya Kadima ku wa 16 ukwezi kw'icumi n'ubwo imigwi y'amadini itari yamwumvikanyeko. Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, prezida Félix Tshisekedi yaciye yemeza igenwa rya Kadima n'abandi bantu 12 bagize uwo mugwi n'ubwo hakiri izo mpari. Batatu bategerezwa guserukira uruhande rutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ntibaragenwa ariko umukuru w'igihugu Tshisekedi yavuze ko yizeye ko bazosanga abandi. Abagize umugwi CENI bategerezwa kuva mu migambwe iri mu nama nshingamateka, nk'uko amategeko abitegekanya. Mw'itangazo vyasohoreye hamwe, Amerika, ibihugu vyinshi bigize ishirahamwe rya Buraya, Ishirahamwe rya Buraya nyene, Ubuyapani, Korea y'Epfo n'Ubwongereza, bisaba abategetsi babijejwe kurondera ko urwo rwego rw'amatora rwitabwa n'abo biraba bose cane cane imigambwe ya poritike n'amashirahamwe adaharanira inyungu za poritike (société civile) no gukomeza ko barugirira icizere. Ivyo bihugu vyibutsa ko biha agaciro cane ugukorera  mu muco, ubwigenge, ukudakumira, ukudahengama n'ugutanga icizere ku matora yimirije. Amatora aheruka muri Congo yabaye mu 2018. Ay'umukuru w'igihugu yatsinzwe na Félix Tshisekedi mu mpari zatumye uwatangajwe ko yatsinzwe, Martin Fayulu, atemera ivyayavuyemwo.

column2: Dolly Parton: ‘Nivyo, ubuzima bw’abirabure ni kirumara”
column3: Umunyamuziki rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa country music, Dolly Parton, nawe yifatanije n'abandi mu gushigikira isekeza Black Lives Matter (ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), mu gihe yariko ashikiriza aho ahagaze ku bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu, ibidakunze kuba. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru c'utugenegene Billboard ati: "Mbega burya wibaza ko aba bazungu bacu ari bo bonyene bafise akamaro? Oya". Uyu muririmvyi aasanzwe afise  abakunzi mu mpande zose, asanzwe adakunda kugira ivyo avuga ku bijanye na politike. Aya majambo yiwe aje mu gihe igihugu cose kiri mu bihe bidasanzwe mu bijanye n'umubaho hagati y'abadasangiye ubwoko vyagize ingaruka mu bice vyose vy'ubuzima muri Amerika, harimwo na country music. N'aho umupfasoni Parton atashoboye kuja mu myiyerekano muri rya sekeza rya Blakc Lives Matter, avuga ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'abiyamiriza ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Yabwiye ico kinyamakuru ati: "Ndatahura neza ko ari uburenganzira bw'abantu guserura akari ku mutima no kwumvirizwa". Urupfu rwa wa mwirabure George Floyd hamwe n'imyiyerekano yaciye ikurikira vyaragize ingaruka mbi mu bisata bitandukanye, haba mu nkino canke no mu muziki, ivyatumye abanyamuziki bamwe baja muri iyo myiyerekano, abandi nabo biba ngombwa ko basubiramwo bakihweza ibijanye n'imigenderanire yabo n'abandi badasangiye urukoba. Perezida Donald Trump wewe abona ukundi iyo myiyerekano, aho afata abari muri yo nk'abagumutsi, mbere yiyamiriza bikomeye abari bafashe ingingo yo gupfukama igihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko ruraririmbwa mu kwerekana akababaro kabo. Umupfasoni Parton yashikirije ayo majambo mu gihe imyiyamamazo mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu yimirije yashushe, ingendo itandukanye n'iyo yari afise mu myaka ine iheze aho  yirinda cane kunegura Bwana Trump igihe yahiganwa na Hillary Clinton. Eka no mu 2017 yashimye kutagira ico avuze mu gihe we na bagenziwe Emmys, Lily Tomlin na Jane Fonda bari mu giteramo, aho aba bandi bobo bafashe akanya ko kwiyamiriza Perezida Trump. Ubu bwa vuba naho ati: "None nimba wanka urunuka umukuru w'igihugu, kubera iki tutomusengera?" Sibwo bwa mbere uyu muririmvyi w'imyaka 74 - aboneka nk'umwe mu bashigikiye abagore bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vy'ukwigenga (feministes) akaba kandi anashigikiye abahuza ibitsina babisangiye - ashigikira abipfuza ko ibintu bihinduka. Mu 2014, yarashigikiye abubakana badahuje ibitsina, umwaka umwe imbere y'uko itegeko ribirekura mu gihugu cose. Hagati aho, ariyubara cane muvyo ashikiriza mu ntumbero yo kwirinda uko bishoboka kugira uwo ababaje, akenshi akama ahanura abantu "kwirinda gucira abandi imanza kugira ngo nabo ntibahave bacirwa izindi".

column2: USA: Ibiciro vy’igitoro vyakorotse ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka yaho
column3: Igiciro c'ibitoro muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika cakorotse cane ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka y'ico gihugu. Ivyo bituma abahingura ico gitoro biba ngombwa ko babanza kuriha abakirangura kugira ngo bakibakureko, ku gutinya ko mu kwa gatanu bashobora kubura n'aho bagishira. Abagura igitoro baragabanutse rwose mu gihe ingingo zo kuguma  murugo ahatandukanye kw'isi yose zatumye abantu baguma biyugaranye. Vyatumye amahinguriro y'igitoro akodesha amatanki kugira ngo bashobore kubika ibitoro vy'umurengera, ibiciro mu gihugu cose bikoroka. Igiciro c'akagunguru muri West Texas Intermediate (WTI), ishingiro ry'igitoro ca Amerika, caramanutse kija musi y'amadorari 37.63 ku kagunguru. Stewart Glickman, umushakashatsi wo mu kigo ca Amerika Center for Financial Research and Analysis (CEFRA) kijejwe kwihweza ibijanye n'amafaranga avuga ati: "Ibiriko biraba birarengeye ubwenge. Igabanuka ry'abakiriya ryararengeye ivyo abantu bashobora kuba bari biteze". Avuga ko mu gihe izi ngingo za Guma murugo zobandanya uko ziri bishobora gutuma ibiciro vy'igitoro no mu kwa gatandatu bibandanya bikoroka. Ati: "Ni ukuri nta cizere mfise ko ibintu bishobora kworoha ku makompanyi adandaza igitoro canke ku biciro vyaco". Igisata c'igitoro kiri mu ngorane z'uko abagishaka bagabanutse kubera coronavirus hamwe n'ukutumvikana hagati y'ibihugu bisanzwe bicimbura. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, ishirahamwe OPEP/ OPEC rihuza ibihugu vyimbura igitoro hamwe n'ibihugu bicuditse vyarahavuye birashika ku masezerano yo kugabanya urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa gushika hafi 10%. Muri ayo masezerano bumvikanye ko urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa rugabanywa ku buryo butari bwigere bubaho. Hagati aho, abahinga babona ko iryo gabanywa ata kintu kinini rizohindura. Stephen Innes ajejwe ubudandaji mu kigo Axicorp avuga ati: "Ntivyafashe umwanya muremure kugira ngo abadandaza igitoro babone ko amasezerano yashitsweko na OPEP/ OPEC - uravye ingene ameze ubu - atazoshobora gutuma  isoko y'igitoro isubira ku murongo". Ku bashoferi ba Amerika, ikoroka ry'ibiciro vy'igitoro - vyamanutse hafi ku bice 2/3  kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka - ryaragize ingaruka ku giciro co kw'ipompo, n'aho ejo ku wa mbere  bitakorotse uko vyari vyitezwe. Glickman ati: "Ikiriho ni uko, n'aho woba ukeneye kuja mw'ibarabara kubera imvo iyi canke iriya, ukenera igitoro gike cane gusumba uko vyari bimeze mu mezi ane aheze". "Ingorane nyamukuru kuri benshi muri twebwe ni uko n'aho wocuzuza, uzoja he?". Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika avuga ko leta ishobora kugura igitoro gihingurwa muri ico gihugu. Ariko amakenga ahari ni uko ububiko bwaco bushobora kurengerwa, mu gihe ububiko bw'ikompanyi Cushing, ikompanyi nkuru itanga igitoro muri Amerika, bwarengewe gushika ku bice 50% kuva mu kwa gatatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibanki ANZ.

column2: Icegeranyo kivuga ko Diego Maradona yapfuye kubera ugusamara kw'abaganga
column3: Umurwi w'abahinga mu vyo buvuzi wemeje ko uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Argentine mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona "atitaweho kandi habaye urwangara" imbere 'yuko asandaba. Abashikirizamanza muri Argentina bari basavye uyo murwi gukora amatohoza ku bari bajejwe gukurikirana amagara ya Maradona inyuma y'aho apfiriye mu kw'icumi na rimwe umwaka uheze. Maradona yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima muhira iwe i Buenos Aires afise imyaka 60. Mu ntango z'ukwa cumi na rimwe yari yabazwe mu bwonko ikivyimba cari cavuye kw'ivura ry'amaraso, akaba yagomba abandanye avurwa ingaruka z'inzoga. Nk'umwe mu bakinyi babaye rurangiranwa mu bihe vyose, Maradona yahavuye agira ubuzima bubi bwaranzwe no kunywa ibiyayuramutwe n'inzoga nyinshi. Urupfu rwa Maradona yabaye kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina igihe iki gihugu gitahukana igikombe c'isi yose mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'umupira w'amaguru  mu 1986, rwababaje abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, bakaba bibajije vyinshi ku bijanye n'abari bajejwe kumuvura. Haciye imisi mike apfuye, abashikirizamanza baciye batangura amatohoza ku baganga n'abaforoma bari bajejwe kumuvura. Mu kwa gatatu, abo bashikirizamanza batumyeko abahinga 20 muvyo ubuvuzi  kugira ngo bihweze icatumye Maradona apfa bongere bihweze nimba harabaye urwangara. Ivyavuye mu matohoza y'abo bahinga vyatangajwe n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri Argentina ku wa gatanu. Mu cegeranyo c'impapuro 70, uyo murwi werekana ko Maradona yasinzikaye cane hafi amasaha 12 imbere y'uko apfa. Muri iki gihe, "ntiyakurikiranywe bikwiye", nk'uko iki cegeranyo kibivuga. Gisubiramwo ibiri muri ico cegeranyo, ikinyamakuru Clarin co muri Argentina kivuga ko uyo murwi wagiriza abaganga bari bajejwe kuvura Maradona "bamutanye wenyene" Abo bahinga bavuga ko Maradona yari gushobora kuronka amahirwe yo gukira iyo ajanwa kuvurirwa kw'ivuriro hakumugumiza muhira, nk'uko ico kinyamakuru kibivuga. Uyo murwi uvuga ko abari bajejwe kuvura Maradona batamuvuye neza kandi baranzwe n'urwangara, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters naryo ryaronse ico cegeranyo. Umuganga bwite wa Maradona Leopoldo Luque w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'uwari ajejwe gukurikirana ubuzima bwiwe bwo mu mutwe, bari mu baganga bariko barakorwako amatohoza n'aho bashikirizamanza. Umurwi w'abahinga washikirije icegeranyo cawo, hasigaye ko abashikirizamanza bafata ingingo ku bijanye no kurengutsa abagirizwa. Ikinyamakuru Clarin kivuga ko bimwe muvyo bashobora kwagirizwa harimwo ubwicanyi. Uru rupfu rwakozweko amatohoza inyuma y'uko babiri mu bakobwa ba Maradona bitwaye. Bavuze ko bagize amakenga ku kungene se wabo yakurikiranywe amaze kubagwa mu bwonko. Muganga Luque wewe nta caha camwagiriye. Arahakana ko ataruhara yabigizemwo. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abanyamakuru akorora amosozi mu kwa cumi na rimwe, Muganga Luque yararize, avuga ko yakoze uko ashoboye kugira arokore ubuzima bw'umugenzi wiwe. Uyu muganga yavuze ko yakoze "ivyo yari ashoboye vyose gushika aho ananirwa".

column2: Ubufaransa bwemeje amakori ataguye neza Amerika
column3: Inama nshingamateka y'Ubufaransa yemeje integuro y'itegeko rigena amakori acibwa ibigo bikomakomeye nka Google, Facebook na Apple. Guca 3% nk'ikori ku bikorwa vy'ibigo bikoresha itumatumanako bigera ku 30 birwiriyemwo ivyo muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bishobora kuzanira leta y'Ubufaransa miliyoni 400 z'ama euros muri uyu mwaka wonyene. Abashingamateka birengagije akamo ka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zavuga ko ari akarenganyo, kandi ko zigiye kwihora mu kuzoshiraho amakori nk'ayo. Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca Leta w'Ubufaransa Bruno Le Maire yiyamirije impungenge za Amerika, avuga ko ibintu nk'ibi bikwiye gutoregwa umuti mu biganiro. Ubufaransa buvuga ko bikwiye ko ibigo vyifashisha itumatumanako, bitanga amakori aho bikorera aho kuyatanga aho bifise icicaro gikuru, ivyinshi bikaba bibarizwa muri Amerika. Ubufaransa bwananiwe kwumvisha ibindi bihugu gufatira hamwe iyo ngingo mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, bari kwita 'GAFAs' mu majambo avunaguye, n'ukuvuga Google, Apple, Facebook na Amazon. Ubu rero bwahisemwo gutangura bwo nyene guca ayo makori, ariko bukizera ko iyi ngingo yabwo izoba iy'igihe gito. Hari ibiganiro hagati y'ibihugu bitunze kuruta ibindi bigize umugwi G7 hamwe n'ikigo kijejwe kuraba  imigenderanire mu butunzi n'iterambere mu kugabangana amakori avanwa mw'ikoreshwa ry'itumatumanako muri kino gihe rifise ikibanza gikomeye. Gutyo rero hakaboneka umwumvikano uvuye mu nama ugasubirira ingingo nka bene iyi y'Ubufaransa. Ubwongereza bwatangaje umugambi wo gushiraho amakori asa n'aya y'Ubufaransa, ico cemezo kikazoshobora kuja mu bikorwa mu mwaka uza. Espagne yo yakoze umushinge w'itegeko muri uyu mwaka. Umunyamakuru Dave Lee akorera muri Amerika ya ruguru ati 'Ubufaransa burikumiriye'. Ubutegetsi bwa Washington bwamaze kuvuga ko bugiye kwugurura ingingo yitwa 'Section 301', mu nzira yo gutohoza nimba hari aho burenganywa. Ni ingingo yakoreshejwe mbere, nk'inzira yo gushiraho ibiciro bishasha ku bihugu ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwibaza ko biriko biburiramwo mbege. Nimba Ubufaransa bugiye gukura miliyoni amajana z'ama euros mu mifuko y'ibi bihangange vyo muri Amerika, Amerika nayo ishobora kuvuga iti :'kuki tweho tutokura amafranga mu vyo Ubufaransa bukorera iwacu?' Uko niko vyagenze ku Bushinwa,  bigahamba Amerika mu ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora no gukomera muri kazoza. Amakori ku bikorwa vy'itumatumanako, ni ikibazo giteye impungenge ku Bufaransa, kuko bwikumiriye. Ibiganiro vyigeze gutangura hagati y'ibihugu kuri ayo makori vyahavuye biburizwamwo kuko bamwe muri bo batari bashigikiye ayo makori. Aha umuntu yovuga nka Irland yavyungukiyemwo mu guhamagara abashoramitahe bashaka isoko ku mugabane wa Bulaya. Ibindi bihugu nk'Ubwongereza, Espagne na Autriche biracagonanwa gufata iyo nzira. Ico impande zompi zihuriyeko n'uko igihe carenze co kwiyumvira ingene ibigo vyungukira mw'itumatumanako bitozwa amakori. Ubufaransa bushobora kwitega ibintu bibiri. N'uko ibihugu bitera ikirenge mu cabwo bishiraho amategeko yavyo, bigatuma Ubufaransa butaba nyamwigendako. Ikindi n'uko iyo ntambwe Ubufaransa bwateye ishobora gutuma n'ibindi bihugu bibona ko hageze kwumvikana uko bitoza ayo makori biri hamwe. Ivyo vyotuma amafranga ivyo bigo vyahora vyikwegerako ataha mu bigega vy'ibihugu.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Kante, Ziyech, De Vrij, Ronaldo, Min-jae, Berge, Smalling
column3: Barcelona irashobora guheraheza amasezerano yo kugura umufaransa akina hagati  N'Golo Kante, mu kwa mbere, ariko bikazovana n'ingene imvune yiwe yo mw'itako izoba imeze, amasezerano afitaniye na  Chelsea akaba azorangira mu ci riza. (Sport) AC Milan ishobora guhagarika urugamba rwayo rwo kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Chelsea, Hakim Ziyech w'imyaka  29, kubera ivyo uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Maroc asaba, ariko uyu murwi w'Ubutaliyano ukaba ucipfuza umusatirizi wa Albania Armando Broja w'imyaka 21 na we nyene akina muri aba ba Blues. (Gazzetta Dello Sport, via Football Italia) Tottenham ishobora kuraba ingene yogura umukinyi w'inyuma, umunya-Hollande  Stefan de Vrij w'imyaka 30 akina muri Inter Milan mu kwa mbere.  Atletico Madrid nayo nyene iripfuza uyu mukinyi azoba yirebanga mu ci riza. (Football Insider) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United  Erik ten Hag yari yashatse guha uruhusha umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo akigira mu kwa munani guheze ariko imirwi itari mike yaranse ayo mahirwe yo kugura uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 37 ubu yasezeye muri uyo murwi wa Old Trafford, ku mushahara wa 80.000 vy'amapawundi ku ndwi. (Athletic) Manchester United yasubiye kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Naples/Napoli Kim Min-jae ariko rero iriko imurwanira na Real Madrid, amasezerano y'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26 akomoka muri Korea y'Epfo akaba arimwo ingingo ivuga ko umurwi umushaka utegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 38 z'amapawundi. (Sunday Mirror) Tottenham, Juventus, Inter Milan na  Atletico Madrid yose iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati akina muri  Brighton, umunya-Argentina Alexis Mac Allister w'imyaka 23. (Fichajes) Arsenal na Chelsea yompi yari yipfuje kugura mu mwaka uheze umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire  Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 30 asanzwe akinira  Crystal Palace. (Teamtalk) Newcastle ni wo murwi ufise amahirwe menshi yo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma akina muri Inter Milan, umunya Slovakia  Milan Skriniar w'imyaka 27. (Calciomercato) Chelsea na Liverpool yompi iripfuza umukinyi w'umunya-Norvège  akina hagati, Sander Berge, 24, akina muri  Sheffield United wo mu cicaro ca kabiri. (Jeunesfooteux). Juventus yahambije Inter Milan mu gukurikiranira hagufi  umwongereza akina inyuma  Chris Smalling w'imyaka 33, akaba ashobora kwirebanga mu ci riza mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na Roma azoba arangiye, mu gihe yokwanka amasezerano mashasha canke akanka kwongereza ayo afitaniye n'uyu murwi w'Ubutaliyano.  (Sky Sports Italia ) Umunya-Portugal akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu Raphael Guerreiro w'imyaka 28, asa n'uwushobora kuva muri  Borussia Dortmund mu ci riza. (Ruhr Nachrichten) Sevilla iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Angers  Azzedine Ounahi w'imyaka 22 ariko yitwara neza mu murwi nserukira gihugu wa Maroc muri rino higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose 2022. (Fichajes ) Borussia Dortmund ntishaka kugurisha umubirigi akina ku ruhande rw'i buryo inyuma, Thomas Meunier, mu kwa mbere, ni mu gihe Barcelona yipfuza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31. (Sport ) Umukuru wa Bayer Leverkusen  Simon Rolfes avuga ko uyu murwi "ata bwoba na buke ufise" ku bijanye na kazoza k'umukinyi wayo w'inyuma, umunya-Hollande  Jeremie Frimpong w'imyaka 22,  asanzwe yipfuzwa na  Manchester United, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu 2025. (Sky Deutschland iciye kuri Manchester Evening News)

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Lukaku, Bernardo, Pogba, Coutinho, Messi, Kounde
column3: Inter Milan yiteze ko Chelsea isubira kurondera umusatirizi w'umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28 yongereje amahera ishaka gutanga, igapfuma ishikana imiriyoni zababa 153 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, inyuma y'aho yankiye imiriyoni 118 z'amadorari kwongerako ukuminyi w'inyuma wa Espagne Marcos Alonso w'imyaka 30. (Mail) Mu gihe Jack Grealish yitezwe cane muri Manchester City, bishobora gutuma Bernardo Silva agenda, mu gihe Barcelona na Atletico Madrid yipfuza uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Portugal w'imyaka 26.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Aston Villa yitezwe kubandanya irondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Norwich, umwongereza Todd Cantwell w'imyaka 23 mu gihe Grealish yoramuka yimukiye muri Manchester City ku miriyoni 139 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sky Sports) Atalanta yiteze kugiriranira ibiganiro na Chelsea mu mpera z'iyi ndwi kugira bumvikane ku musatirizi w'umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23. (Gianluca di Marzo) Paul Pogba azotangura umwaka w'inkino wimirije mu murwi Manchester United ariko akaba yiteze gufata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe imbere y'uko ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi kirangira, mu gihe PSG ikirondera uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa w'imyaka 28. (Telegraph - subscription required) Tottenham irashaka kugura umukinyi wo hagati muri rino ci, aho umwongereza Noni Madueke w'imyaka 21 akina muri PSV Eindhoven hamwe n'umunya Danemark akina ku ruhande Mikkel Damsgaard w'imyaka 21 akina muri Sampdoria, bari ku rutonde rw'abaronderwa. (Standard) Umusatirizi wa Barcelona, umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 28, ari mu bakinyi baronderwa na Tottenham mu gihe yoramuka igurishije umusatirizi wayo Harry Kane w'imyaka 28. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Lionel Messi yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha na Barcelona mu mpera z'iyi ndwi. Amasezerano yari afitaniye n'uwu murwi yarangiye mu kwezi guheze, ariko uyu musatirizi wa Argentina w'imyaka 34 asa n'uwemeye ayandi masezerano mashasha y'imyaka itanu, ariko umushakara wiwe ukagabanuka gushika ku bice 50%.  (Sky Sports) Leicester City yanse amafaranga atangwa na Arsenal ikongerako n'umukinyi mu rugamba rwo kurondera umwongereza akina hagati James Maddison w'imyaka 24. Aba Foxes bavugwa ko badashaka abakinyi batangwa n'abo ba Gunners mu kubaguranya n'uyu mukinyi.  (Football Insider) Urugamba rwa Chelsea rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Sevilla Jules Kounde rwakwamye kubera mugenziwe w'umufaransa Kurt Zouma w'imyaka 26 bari biteze kugurisha kugira ngo ahe ikibanza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22, yanse kwimukira muri West Ham. (Guardian) Newcastle ivuga ko yipfuza kwakira umwongereza akina hagati Oliver Skipp w'imyaka 20 avuye muri Tottenham nk'intizo.  (Mail) Sheffield United iriteze ko Liverpool ishobora kuyitiza umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Ben Davies w'imyaka 25, mu gihe atarigera akinira uyu murwi kuva aguzwe avuye muri Preston mu kwa mbere.  (Goal) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Liverpool, umuswisi Xherdan Shaqiri w'imyaka 29 araronderwa n'umurwi wo muri Serie A,  Lazio, inyuma y'aho abwiriye abarongoye Anfield ko yipfuza gusezera uwo murwi wo muri Premier League. (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Umumenyereza wa Crystal Palace Patrick Vieira avuga ko yagiriraniye "ikiganiro ciza" n'umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 28, kandi ko yizeye ko azobandanya akinira aba ba Eagles. (Sky Sports) Palace iriko irarondera ko Arsenal yoyitiza umusatirizi Reiss Nelson w'imyaka 21, kandi bikaboneka ko aba ba Gunners bashobora kumutanga kubera bigaragara ko ashobora gukinishwa gake cane mu mwaka w'inkino wimirije. (Sky Sports) Abaserukizi b'umukinyi wo hagati wa Atletico Madrid Saul Niguez bariko baragerageza kurondera ko yokwimukira muri Liverpool, ariko Anfield ntibona ko uyu mukinyi wa Espagne w'imyaka 26 yoba ashaka kwimukira muri uyu murwi.  (CaughtOffside) Southampton iri hafi yo kugura umusatirizi w'umwongereza Adam Armstrong w'imyaka 24 asanzwe akina muri Blackburn Rovers inyuma y'aho uwo murwi ugurishirije umusatirizi w'umwongereza Danny Ings w'imyaka 29 muri Aston Villa. (Football League World) Umukinyi wo hagati, umudagi Joshua Kimmich w'imyaka 26 yemeye amasezerano mashasha y'imyaka itanu n'umurwi  wiwe wa Bayern Munich watahukanye ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi Bundesliga.(Bild, via 90 Min)

column2: Burundi: CNDD-FDD yemejwe burundu ko yatsinze amatora yo ku wa 20/05/2020
column3: Kuri uyu wa kane igenekerezo rya 04/06/2020, sentare ijejwe kwibahiriza ibwirizwashingiro mu Burundi ihejeje kwemeza ko umugambwe uri ku butegetsi mu Burundi CNDD-FDD ari wo watahukanye intsinzi mu matora yabaye ku wa 20 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu guheze. Iyo sentare yari ifise iminsi itarenga icenda kugira ngo yemeze ivyavuye muri ayo matora nk'uko yabishikirijwe n'umurwi ujejwe gutegura amatora muri ico gihugu. Iyo sentare yatangaje ko ibirego vyatanzwe n'umukuru w'umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Agathon Rwasa ari nawe yari yawuserukiye mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu bidafise ishingiro. Uyo mugambwe wariyamirije ibiharuro vyatangajwe na CENI ukaba waritwaye uvuga ko ivyo biharuro, kuva ku rwego rwa komine gushika ku rwego rw'igihugu, ari ivy'ubusuma, ukavuga ko ari wo watsinze amatora yose. Ibiheje gutangazwa n'iyo sentare rero bihejeje kwemeza icese ko Evariste Ndayishimiye, yitoje ku giti c'umukuru w'igihugu kw'izina rya CNDD-FDD ari we agiye kurongora igihugu mu myaka indwi iri imbere. Uyu mukuru w'igihugu ahejeje kwemezwa akaba agiye kurongora igihugu yisunze bwirizwashingiro rishasha ryemejwe mu 2018, ritandukanye n'iryo mu 2005 ryakomotse ku masezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yo mu 2000, ryategekanya ikiringo c'imyaka itanu. Ku munsi wa mbere w'indwi iheze, umurwi CENI umaze gutangaza ibiharuro vy'imfatakibanza vyerekana ko uwo mugambwe uza ubwa kabiri, umushingamateka Agathon Rwasa yabwiye BBC ko mu gihe iyo sentare itotunganiriza umugambwe wiwe ko bazoca bitura sentare y'umuryango wa Afrika y'Ubuseruko. BBC yashatse kumubaza igihe azokwiturira iyo sentare ariko ntiyashoboye kumuronka.

column2: Khadar Ahmed: Ingene uwabuze aho yiga gukora film ubu ariko aratahukana udushimwe no gukundwa na benshi
column3: Film 'The Gravedigger's Wife' (umugore w'umwimvyi w'imva), yatahanye agashimwe, wogira ngo yatunganijwe n'umuntu abifisemwo uburambe, ariko niyo film ya mbere ya Khadar Ahmed. Ingene igenda, umwanya imara n'ubwiza bwayo vyerekana ukwiyemera gufiswe n'uwo mugabo w'imyaka 40 atagira uburambe muri uwo mwuga. Yahunze n'umuryango wiwe  intambara yo muri Somalia amaherezo baruhukira muri Finlande afise imyaka 16 - kandi ntiyigeze ahonyoza ikirenge mw'ishure ryo kwiga gukora no gutunganya film (cinema). Yabwiye BBC ati: "Imana yonyene niyo izi kangahe nasavye ishure ryo kwiga film ariko nkaba ntigeze ndarironka." Ariko guteza imbere film ziri mu rurimi rw'igi-Somali yabigize ihangiro - kugira yerekane akaranga n'amamuko vyiwe abicishije muri film. Ku bwa Ahmed, kubona yatahanye agashimwe ka mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Afrika ry'ama film Fespaco mu kwezi guheze, vyerekana ko inkuru mu rurimi rwiwe zishobora  gukundwa n'ahandi. Bitandukanye na Bollywood The Gravedigger's Wife ni inkuru y'urukundo irimwo hamwe hamwe hababaje ariko mu buryo butwenza y'aho umuntu ashobora gushika kugira arokore ubuzima bw'uwo akunda. Uwo mwimvyi w'imva - Guled, akinwa na Omar Abdi - yicaye imbere y'ibitaro ari kumwe na bagenziwe,  afise igipawa, arindiriye ko hagira umurwayi apfa. Aho bibabarije, n'uko kugira  Nasra,  umugore wiwe arwaye, abandanye kubaho,  Ahmed ategerezwa kuronka  amafaranga, ayo nayo akaboneka ari uko hagize abapfa. Uwo mugore akinwa na Yasmin Warsame, ari ku mpfiro kubera amafyigo yiwe atagikora. Kubera amafaranga menshi akenewe kugira   abaganga bamwiteho abandanye kubaho, bisaba Guled gufata ingingo zikomeye cane. Iyo nkuru ata  bintu vyinshi vyo kuyiryohora birimwo, yakorewe amasanamu arimwo ibice vyinshi ata  majambo wumva n'ibirere vyagutse cane, ntaho ihuriye n'inkuru Ahmed yakuriyemwo. Yibutsa film za Bollywood ziba zirimwo umuziki, ugutamba n'ukurangira mu kanyamuneza.   Ahmed avuga ati: "Ntaco nari nzi kuri izo film, nta film nari mfise kugira ndabireko mu gukora iyi. "Gutyo rero nayikoze uko jewe nyene binjemwo n'uko ndabibona". Mu vy'ukuri, ntaho yibuka yoba yarabonye film y'igi-Somali ikozwe hakurikijwe ubuhinga nyabwo bw'umwuga. Nyina wiwe yagumye  akorora amasozi  mu mwanya wose bamaze bariko bararaba The Gravedigger's Wife ubwa  mbere mw'ihiganwa rya sinema rya Cannes mu kwezi kw'indwi.  Ahmed avuga ati nyina "yararengewe. Hari benshi batigeze baronka urweze n'amahirwe yo kwibona muri film. N'ivyo nashaka gushikako." 'Kwumva wishimye' The Gravedigger's Wife ibera, kandi amasanamu yayo yafatiwe ku rubuga, muri Djibouti, bihana urubibe na Somalia, ariko ntirerekanwa muri ivyo bihugu. Avatar yongeye kuba film yinjiza cyane ku isi Abantu benshi b'aba-Somali, n'abandi bafise amamuko yo muri Somalia, barabonye iyo film mu kwezi kw'icenda mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'ama film i Toronto muri Canada. Ahmed avuga ko "bose bumvise bishimye. Vyari biryoshe kubaraba ingene baryohewe no kuyiraba hanyuma bagaca banzako". Uwo atunganya ama fiml avuga ko inzira yaciyemwo mu gukora iyo film ishobora gutanga icitegererezo. Ntiyigeze aja mw'ishure ryigisha ivya film, nta n'aho yigeze aronka uwumwigisha ivyo gutunganya ama film, nta na film y'uwundi muntu yari bwigere akorako. Yatanguye urugendo rwiwe rwo gutunganya iyo film mu myaka 10 iheze igihe yandika integuro yayo. Yari afise ishaka ryo kuba ariwe ubwiwe yoyitunganiriza mu gi-Somali ku buryo yabanje kubika  iyo nteguro  kugira yige ingene bikorwa mu kurabira ku ma film yakunda. Amaze kuraba Bollywood, yaciye azunguruka amazu y'ama cinema kw'isi, harimwo muri Korea y'Epfo na Iran. Ariko izamutereye ivyiyumviro cane ni fim zakorewe muri Afrika. Arakunda cane cane igikorwa c'umunya-Mauritania Abderrahmane Sissako, yari umukuru w'umugwi w'abatanga udushimwe twa Fespaco uyu mwaka. Umunya-Chad  Mahamat-Saleh Haroun nawe ari mu bo Ahmed yafatiyeko, akaba yibuka ingene yatangariye ubwiza bwa film yiwe yo mu 2010, A Screaming Man. Amaze  kwiga izo film akagerageza kwuva ubuhinga bw'ingene zikorwa, yaciye atunganya film zibiri ngufi mu  hanyuma yandika mu ki-Finlande imbere y'uko akora  The Gravedigger's Wife. Ubu rero aribaza niba iyo aba yaragiye kw'ishure ryo kwiga ingene film zikorwa  hari ico kuba  vyahinduye mu nzira mbi canke nziza. "Nshaka gutera intege abanya-Afrika bakiri bato bakora film, abadasanganywe amahirwe menshi, gufata camera hanyuma bakore film zabo, bandike inkuru zabo, bafate amasanamu yabo kandi bavyikorere bo nyene, kuko si bose baronka basanganywe ubushobozi bwinshi." We nyene avuga ko afise ishaka ryo kubandanya akora ama film muri Afrika: "Namuka muri Afrika kandi nemera ko kazoza k'ama film ari muri Afrika. Hari inkuru nyinshi zidashobora gukinirwa mu bihugu vya Buraya."

column2: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II na Africa: Ibihe bikomeye vy'ingoma yiwe
column3: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II yagendeye ibihugu birenga 20 vyo muri Afrika ku ngoma yiwe, igihe ingoma y'Ubwongereza yariko irarangira, ukwikukira nakwo kuriko kurashwara Afrika. Ubucuti budasanzwe bwarabandanije biciye mw'ishirahamwe rya Commonwealth, umwamikazi yari arongoye. Yari imigenderanire ikomeye - rimwe na rimwe igoye - imigenderanire iri hagati y'ingoma y'Ubwongereza  hamwe n'igihe c'ubukoloni. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth yavugiye ijambo imbere y'inzu ya reta i Cape Town, muri Afrika y'Epfo igihe yashikana imyaka 21, yiyemeza ko ubuzima bwiwe bwose azokorera ishirahamwe rya Commonwealth. "Ahantu hose nagiye muri iki gihugu ciza ca Afrika y'Epfo.... abavyeyi banje, mwenewacu nanje nyene twarakunzwe cane n'abanyagihugu baco, gushika aho twiyumva nk'abantu bari muhira ngaha, nk'uko umenga twabanye na bo ubuzima bwabo bwose. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth agaragara ngaha mw'ihoteli Treetops muri Kenya ari kumwe n'umugabo wiwe, Duke wa Edinburgh. Mu nyuma akiri muri urwo rugendo, yumvise amakuru ko se wiwe, Umwami George VI yatanze kandi ko ategerezwa kuba umwamikazi. Uru ni rumwe mu ngendo zibiri umwamikazi Elizabeth yagize muri Nigeria. Yafashwe ifoto ngaha ari kumwe n'umutegetsi Oba Adenji-Adele II i Lagos. Yaragendeye kandi Calabar, Enugu, Jos, Kaduna, Kano na Port Harcourt. Umwamikazi Elizabeth ariko aratambana na Kwame Nkrumah, prezida wa mbere wa Ghana inyuma yo kwikukira, yaza n'imbere mu muhari w'abashaka kwikukira. Yatamvye umuziki wateguriwe urwo rugendo wiswe Welcome Your Majesty. Umwamikazi Elizabeth n'umuganwa Philip bafashwe ifoto bari kumwe n'igikomangoma Haile Selassie wa Ethiopia i Addis Abeba, mu rugendo rw'akazi. Ico gikomangoma carahungiye mu Bwongereza hagati ya 1936 na 1941 inyuma y'aho Ubutaliyano bwigaruriye igihugu ciwe aza kugaruka ku ngoma mu 1941 igihe Ubwongereza na Commonwealth batsinda Ubutaliyano. Umwamikazi Elizabeth na prezida El Tigani El-Mahi bariko barava ku kibuga c'indege ca Khartoum mu modoka. Urugendo rwiwe muri Sudani harimwo n'umuhingamo w'isiganwa ku ngamiya hamwe n'urugendo rwo kuraba ibikorwa vyo kwubaka urugomero rw'umuyagankuba rwa Roseires kuri Nil Bleu, rwarangiye mu mwaka ukurikira. Umwamikazi ari kumwe na prezida Julius Nyerere atanguye urugendo rw'akazi rw'imisi itatu. Imyaka 18 imbere y'aho, Dr Nyerere yari yashikanye Tanganyika yahoze ikoronijwe n'Ubwongereza ku ntahe yo kwikukira, aca aba uwa mbere akibereye umushikiranganji wa mbere hanyuma aba prezida w'ico gihugu wa mbere. Uko imyaka yagenda, yagiye yanka cane Ubwongereza n'Uburaya. Ariko, reta y'Ubwongereza yamubona nk'umuntu afise inguvu zo guhoyahoya mu karere karimwo ibihuhusi vyinshi. Prezida wa Zimbabwe yarahawe ikidari n'umwamikazi mu 1994. Ariko igihe imishamirano yongerekana hagati ya Zimbabwe na reta y'Ubwongereza ku mugambi w'isubirwamwo ry'itangwa ry'amatongo, Zimbabwe yarikuye muri Commonwealth mu 2003 - hanyuma Mugabe aca yakwa ico kidari mu 2008. Umwamikazi Elizabeth yafashwe ifoto ashitse ku kibuga c'indege ca Durban. Yari mu rugendo rw'akazi rw'imisi itandatu muri Afrika y'Epfo, hakaba habaye igihe c'imvura ciza mu myaka 10, aho yaciye atazirwa Motlalepula canke "umwamikazi w'imvura". Umwamikazi ari kumwe n'umukuru w'igihugu wa mbere wa Afrika y'Epfo w'umwirabure, Nelson Mandela, bivugwa ko bakundana cane. Umwamikazi yarandikiye amakete prezida Mandela aho yakoresha "Umugenzi wawe  nyawe, Elizabeth R" kandi bisa n'uko yamuhamagara "Nelson", mu gihe bivugwa ko na we yamuhamagara bisanzwe "Elizabeth" aciye ku ruhande amategeko agenga ubwami. Umwamikazi yaragendeye Nigeria ubugira kabiri mu 2003. Ico gihugu cari carahagaritswe muri Commonwealth kubera kutubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu ku butegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Sani Abacha mu 1995, gisubira kwemererwa kugaruka mu 1999, hagarutse ubutegetsi bwa gisivile. Umwamikazi na prezida Obasanjo bagaragara ngaha mu birori vyo kwugurura inama y'abakuru b'ibihugu bihurikiye mw'ishirahamwe Commonwealth i Abuja. Mu rugendo rwa nyuma ku mugabane wa Afrika, uwo mwamikazi amaze umwanya muremure ku butegetsi yarahuye n'umwe mu baprezida bamaze imyaka myinshi ku butegetsi, Yoweri Museveni, na we ari ku butegetsi kuva mu 1986. Yari yarigeze kugendera Uganda imbere y'aho - mu rugendo rwa mbere rw'akazi muri Afrika nk'umwamikazi mu 1954.

column2: Amacakubiri y'akataraboneka mu rukino Ubwongereza bwatsinze Bulgaria 6-0
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Bulgaria, Borislav Mihailov, aratanze imihoho kubera ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ryaraye rikorewe abakinyi b'Ubwongereza. Uno munsi, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Bulgaria yari yamusavye gutanga imihoho kubera iryo abongereza baraye bakorewe mu rukino rwa nijoro ku mugwa  Sofia. Boyko Borissov "ariyamiriza bikomeye" iyo nyifato, yari igizwe n'indamutso y'aba Nazi n'indirimbo z'inguge. Urwo rukino wahagaritswe incuro zibiri zose kubera inyifato y'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yerekanywe n'abafana ba Bulgaria. Bwana Borisso avuga ati: "Nsavye ko Borislav Mihaylov atanga imihoho mu maguru masha nk'umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Bulgaria. Yari yasavye umushikiranganji w'inkino guhagarika imigenderanire yose n'ishirahamwe, Bulgarian Football Union (BFU), harimwo "n'ayerekeye imfashanyo y'amahera " gushika Borislav Mihaylov atanze imihoho. Muri urwo rukino rw'ukurondera uburenganzira bwo gukinira igikimbe c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu i Bulaya, Ubwongereza bwatsinze Bulgaria 6-0. Umushikiranganji w'inkino wa Bulgaria Krasen Kralev yavuze ati: "Umushikiranganji wa mbere yampamagaye mu kanya gaheze". "Mu myaka ine iheze, Leta yarakoze ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo umupira w'amaguru muri Bulgaria utere imbere". "Ariko kubera ibiherutse gushika, bafatiye ku kungene umupira w'amaguru wifashe n'ivyaraye bibaye nijoro. "Umushikiranganji wa mbere yantegetse ko kuva uno munsi mpagarika amasezerano yose na BFU, harimwo n'ayerekeye amafaranga, gushika Borislav Mihaylov atanze imihoho". Imbere y'uko urwo rukino rutangura, Mihaylov umukuru wa BFU yahoze ari umunyegori wa Reading, yaritwaye mw'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, UEFA. Yituye iryo shirahamwe avuga ko ivyariko bivugwa kuri urwo rukino vyari gutuma abantu babona ivy'ikumira ry'abakinyi b'abongereza gusumba urukino nyarwo. Iryo tyozwa ry'ejo ku wa mbere, ryari rigizwe n'indamutso z'aba Nazi n'indirimbo zityoza abirabure ko ari inguge, ryakorewe abakinyi b'Abongereza, bituma urukino ruhagarikwa incuro zibiri mu gice ca mbere. Rwatanguye guhagarikwa ku munota wa 28, umuhagarikizi abanza kuvugana n'umumenyereza w'Ubwongereza Gareth Southgate. Haciye nk'iminota itanu urukino rwahagaze, rwarasubiye rurabandanya gushika ku munota wa 43 aho rwongeye guhagarikwa. Ikibuga ca Vasil Levski gisa n'icari cugawe mu gihe c'urwo rukino inyuma y'aho Bulgaria ifatiwe ibihano kubera inyifato y'ivangura  rishingiye ku rukoba mu nkino zayihuje na Kosovo hamwe na  République tchèque

column2: Izinga rya Man ryahaye u Burundi imiriyoni £1.3 nk'imfashayo yo kurwanya ihindagukira ry'ibihe
column3: Reta y'izinga rya Man yahaye ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza imfashanyo  ingana n' imiriyoni 1.3 z'amapawundi ( yababa imiriyaridi 3 .5 mu mafaranga y'amarundi) mu ntumbero yo gufasha kurwanya "ingaruka z'ihindagurika ry'ibihe". Iri shirahamwe International Development Partnership (IDP) ryacishije iyi mfashanyo mu rindi shirahamwe Send a Cow risanzwe rirangurira imigambi mu Burundi. Richard Granville ajejwe ibijanye n'imfashanyo muri iryo shirahamwe, avuga ko aya mafaranga yatanzwe agiye gufasha "umugambi w'imyaka ibiri" mu "ntara ya Mwaro". Reta y'iryo zinga ryo ku mugabane w'Uburayi isanzwe yarategekanijwe amafaranga y'ama pawundi agera ku miriyoni 2.5 y'imfashanyo mpuzamakungu. Igisata c'ihindagurika ry'ibirere ni kimwe mu bisata bibiri iri shirahamwe  IDP ryahisemwo gufasha mu kiringo ca 2021-2023. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Howard Quayle avuga ati: "Ikiza karanda ca coronavirus carerekanye ingene twese dukeneraniye kw'isi yose kandi ndanezerewe kubona iri zinga rya Man rishobora gufasha muri iki gikorwa kidasanzwe". Granville avuga ko Uburundi bwama "buhura n'ingaruka zikomeye z'ihindagurika ry'ikirere" mu gihe ibice 94% vy'abanyagihugu "babeshejweho n'uburimyi bwo ku rugero ruto kandi bushingiye ku mvura". Domothile Niyonzima w'imyaka 43 asanzwe aba i Mwaro, avuga ati: "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni uko ata mfungurwa zikwiye turonka, kubera tudafise intabire yo gutabira isi yacu". Unicef ivuga ko abantu barenga 114.000 mu Burundi bataye izabo kubera ibiza bishingiye kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe Send a Cow mu Burundi Gloria Nimpundu avuga ko iri shirahamwe rifasha abarimyi mu  "kubaha amazi n'isi ndimwa nziza" kandi ko "akarusho kariko karibonekeza". Avuga ko "ikibazo c'imvura igwa nabi nabi kandi itizewe kigenda ciyongera" gituma bigorana "kwitegurira irima n'iyimbura". "Muri iyi myaka iheze, izuba ryaratikije ibiterwa mu nyuma naho imyuzure iratikiza imirima". Yongerako y'uko uwu mugambi uriko urarangurirwa i Mwaro uzofasha imiryango ishika 5250 "kwikenura mu buryo bw'amafaranga mu guhangana n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere, biciye mu kurima n'ukworora kijambere".

column2: Basketball - Kenya: Umukinyi avuga ko ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina rimaze imyaka myinshi
column3: Umugore yahora ari umukinyi wa besketball muri Kenya avuga ko ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina ryamunze urwo rukino mu gisata c'abagore  "kuva kera cane " yamara ko icuka c'ubwoba gituma abarikorerwa batubahuka kubivuga ku mugaragaro. Uwo mugore, ubu afise imyaka 30, avuga ko yahohotewe mu buryo bw'igitsina n'umwe mu bamenyereza biwe igihe yatangura urwo rukino. Ivyo yavuze vyahuriranye n'uko  ku ndwi iheze hasohotse icegeranyo cerekana ido n'ido ry'ingene muri basketball y'abagore "ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina ryabaye nk'iryemewe muri urwo rukino" mu myaka mirongo muri Mali. Uwo vyashikiye muri Kenya twise Rachel kugira dukingire umwidondoro wiwe, yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Hose muri Kenya, abakinyi ba basket barazi ivyo bintu ariko ntawuvuga. "Abakobwa benshi barakoreshejwe ariko ntibashaka kugira na kimwe bavuze. "Hari abakobwa benshi n'ubu mbona, no mu migwi ikomeye ngaha, ariko ntibakura ururimi mu kanwa. Nibaza ko abantu batinya. Aha muri Kenya, abantu barakoreshejwe." Rachel, atashatse ko umwidondoro wiwe umenyekana, yavuze ko ihohoterwa akenshi ryajana no kwemererwa  gutezwa imbere mu rukino ku bakinyi bakiri bato, benshi baba ari abayabaga (abafise munsi y'imyaka 18) ico gihe. Rachel yabivuze atazi ko hari amatohoza ariko arakorwa na Human Rights Watch (HRW) ku bivugwa ko haba ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina mu rukino rwa baskeball muri Uganda. Iryo shirahamwe mpuzamakungu riharanira agateka ka zina muntu ryaragize uruhara rukomeye mu gufasha bamwe mu bahuye n'ibibazo nk'ivyo muri Mali kugira ijwi ryabo ryumvikane,  bene iryo hohoterwa muri Mali rikaba ryari rimaze imyaka myinshi nk'uko bigaragara mu cegeranyo cakoreshejwe n'urwego rwa basketaball kw'isi Fiba. Ubu rero HMR yahindukiriye Kenya. Minky Worden, umuyobozi muri HRW yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Human Rights Watch iriko irabitohoza kandi iratewe impungenge n'ibivugwa kw'ihohotera ry'abakinyi b'abagore bakiri bato mw'ishirahamwe rya basketball muri Kenya (KBF)." "Abategetsi mw'ishirahamwe  rya basket ry'ibihugu bategerezwa gukingira abakinyi bakiri bato. Fiba, ishirahamwe rya basketball ku rwego rw'isi rifise ukwihangana kungana n'ubusa kw'ihohoterwa mu nkino. "Ni inshingano za Fiba n'amashirahamwe yo mu bihugu  gukingira abakinyi b'imiyabaga, kwirukana mu nkino abakora ihohotera, no gutuma abakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina baronka ubutungane." 'Nkeneye kwikiza ubwanje' Itangazo rya HRW rije inyuma y'ukwezi kumwe hari umwe mu bagize komite nshingwabikorwa ya KBF  akuweko iceyi mu matohoza yagirizweko kugerageza guhohotera umukinyi w'imyaka 22 ku murwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi. Mu kwezi kw'indwi,  Philip Onyango - afatwa nk'umwe mu bamenyereza beza cane kandi yigeze kumenyereza umugwi wa Kenya w'abakiri bato mu rwego rw'abagore- yaratanze imihoho (yareguye)  ku gushaka kwiwe mu mabanga yari ajejwe yose igihe igipolisi cariko kiramukorako amatohoza ku vyavugwa n'uwo mugore. Umunsi ukurikira KBF yaciye "yirukana [Onyango] mu mabanga n'ibikorwa vyose vya basket" buno nyene ikurikije amatohoza y'ibanze yo nyene yari yakoze. Onyango asanzwe ari n'umumenyeshamakuru akurikirana urukino rwa basket arahakana ivyo aregwa. Mu nyuma igiporisi cahavuye kivuga ko ata kimwagira "bitumwe n'uko ata vyemezo bikwiye" vyabonetse. BBC imurondeye,  uwo mugore  w'imyaka 22 yavuze ko ababajwe cane n'ivyo igiporiri cashitseko mu matahoza yaco. Amatohoza yari yakozwe inyuma y'aho umugenzi w'uwo mugore amufatiye, atabizi, amajwi ariko aramuyagira ingene vyamugendeye. Ayo majwi ntiyarungikiwe KBF gusa, yarahawe kandi benshi mu bahurira ku rukino rwa basket. Rachel avuga ko yatewe intege zo kuvuga yumvise ivyo vyashitse, vyamwibukije ivyo na we yaciyemwo. Avuga ati: "Ni ibintu bizobohora urukino rwa basketball muri Kenya, nta wubizi. "Nkeneye gukingira abandi, kandi nanje nkeneye kwikingira. Ndiko ndakora ikintu kinjana mu nzira yo gukira". Avuga ko atari yigeze abivuga igihe vyamushikira kuko yibaza ko ata n'umwe yovyemera, kandi yemeza ko hari n'abandi benshi batabikoze kuko batinya gutakaza ikibanza cabo mu migwi yabo. BBC  yaravuganye n'abandi bagore batatu bahora ari abakinyi na bo bavuga ko bakorewe ihohoterwa canke bahatswe kurigirirwa igihe bari bakiri abayabaga. Umwe yavuze ati : "Twari tukiri bato cane ku buryo tutashobora kwisigura - ico gihe nta n'umwe yari kukwumviriza. Bari kwibaza ko ubesha." 'Hagarika iburabuzwa rishingiye ku gutsina' Igihe igiporisi cariko kirakora amatohoza, ku mbuga hwaniro muri Kenya haciye hasohoka urwandiko rwiswe "Hagarika ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina" rwatunga agatoki KBF ubwayo ko yaravye hirya ku bivugwa. Urwo rwandiko rwateweko umukono n'abantu barenga 2.000 igihe rwasohoka. Mu kwezi kw'indwi, ubushikiranganji bujejwe inkino muri Kenya bwaciye bushiraho umugwi ku bibazo vy'igitsina wo gushigikira abakinyi b'abagore iyo bikenewe mu migwi y'igihugu. Ubwo bushikiranganji bwasavye abakinyi b'abagore bashikiwe n'icari co cose kubishikiriza uwo mugwi, ariko ntaco urashira ku mugaragaro. Agatima ko gushigikirana Kizigenza w'umugwi wa Kenya w'abagore bakuze muri basketball yavuze ko ashigikiye izo ngingo nshasha. Rose Ouma,  we  avuga ko ata ngorane aragira, yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "N'ikibazo kigoye cane, ariko harageze ko kija ahabona". Ku wa gatatu, umugwi wa Kenya warasezeye ihiganwa rya basketball y'abagore muri Africa ririko rirabera muri Cameroun. Muri Mali, abantu indwi bo mw'ishirahamwe rya basketball barahagaritswe mu mabanga n'ishirahamwe ku rwego rw'isi Fiba kubera icegeranyo casohotse ku ndwi iheze. Amatohoza yasanze ishirahamwe rya Mali ryarapfukiriye ihohoterwa ryakozwe n'abakozi baryo bwite, Amadou Bemba yahora amenyereza umugwi w'abakiri bato mu rwego rw'abagore akaba apfunzwe arindiriye urubanza ku vyaha ahakana. Gishingiye ku vyavuzwe n'abantu 31 n'abandi 22 banse kuvuga, ico cegeranyo carakuye iceyi ku mukuru wa Fiba Hamane Niang c'uko yafashe minenerwe iryo hohoterwa igihe yatwara ishirahawe rya Mali hagati ya 1999 na 2007.

column2: Idrissa Gueye yanse gukina yambaye impuzu ya PSG ishigikira aba LGBTQ+
column3: Umukinyi wa Paris St-Germain Idrissa Gueye yanse gukina mu kwanka kwambara impuzu iriko ikimenyetso c'umunywamazi mu ntumbero yo gushigikira uburengenzira bw'aba LGBTQ+ nk'uko BBC yashoboye kubimenya. Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 32 yahoze akina hagati muri Aston Villa na Everton ntiyari mu rukino rwo ku wagatandatu batsinzemwo Montpellier ibitego 4-0. Umumenyereza wa PSG Mauricio Pochettino yavuze gusa ko Gueye atakinye ku "mpamvu ziwe bwite". Bivugwa ko ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bufaransa (FFF) ryandikiye Gueye kugira asigure impamvu atakinye. BBC Sport yegereye abahagarariye inyungu za Gueye kuri ico kibazo. Umukinyi wa Crystal Palace Cheikhou Kouyate n'uwa Watford, Ismaila Sarr barungitse ubutumwa ku mbuga hwaniro mu cabonetse nko gushigikira mugenzi wabo. Kouyate yashize ifoto kuri Instagram ari kumwe na Gueye, yanditseko ngo "umugabo nyawe".  Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Watford yashizeko ifoto yiwe na Gueye ayikurikiza ibimenyetso vy'imitima aca yandikako ngo "100%". Mu kwishura ku butumwa bwa Sarr, Watford yashimangiye ku bunganangane no ku budasa, yongerako iti "ibi bikaba birimwo n'ubushake bwo kwigisha no guhanura uwo ari we wese mu bakozi babo". Kugiriranira imigenderanire ishingiye ku gitsina n'abo mugisangiye ntibirekuwe muri Senegal, kandi birahanishwa igipfungo co gushika ku myaka itanu. Ku mwaka ugira kabiri yikurikiranya, imigwi yo mu Bufaransa yarahamagariwe guhimbaza itariki ya 17 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu wahariwe kugwanya ikumira ry'abafitaniye ubucuti bufatiye ku gitsina kandi bagisangiye, mu kwambara impuzu ziriko inomero zanditse mu mabara y'umunywamazi mu mugongo. Uretse kudakina urukino rwo ku wa gatandatu batsinzemwo Montpellier, Gueye, yashitse muri PSG mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2019 aguzwe imiliyoni 30 z'ama Euro, yaranasivye urukino nk'urwo mu mwaka uheze avuga ko agwaye mu nda, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca Le Parisien, ryavuze ubwa mbere icatumye adakina. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya AFP rivuga ko ku musi wa gatatu ryabonye ikete rivuye mu kanama kajejwe kugenzura inyifato mw'ishirahamwe FFF risaba Gueye kwisigura impamvu atakinye mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu. Iryo kete, nk'uko AFP ivuga, rimuhamagarira "gusaba ikigongwe ku mugaragaro", canke avuge ko ivyo  bivugwa ku mpamvu yanse gukina ko "ata shingiro bifise". Bivugwa ko iryo kete ryongeyeko ko nimba yaranse gukina bishobora gufatwa " nk'inyifato y'ikumira". PSG yavuze ku musi wa gatatu ko "bishimira kwambara izo mpuzu". Yongeyeko:"Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru, ku musi wa gatandatu  bari ku kibuga baranerekana ishaka ryo kugwanya ikumirwa ry'abafitaniye ubucuti bushingiye ku gitsina bagisangiye hamwe n'irindi kumira iryo ari ryo ryose." Inyifato ya Gueye yarashigikiwe n'ibihangange muri politike mu gihugu ca Senegal. Prezida w'ico gihugu Macky Sall yanditse kuri Twitter ko ukwemera kwa Gueye nk'umu Islam gutegerezwa kwubahirizwa, mu gihe umushikiranganji wo kwinonora imitsi na we Matar Ba yanditse ko Gueye ashigikiwe n'abanye Senegal aho yashizeko ifoto y'uyo mukinyi wo hagati ari mu rugendo rweranda ima Maka.

column2: Nigeria: Uyu mupatiri yiyemeje gukingira ibigirwamana vy'aba Igbo biriko biraturirwa
column3: Mu gihe abavugabutumwa bo mw'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu buseruko bwa Nigeria bagenda baturira ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyo muri kahise babona ko ari ibigirwamana, umupatiri umwe w'umukatorika wewe abandanya avyegeranya. Ibi bibumbano bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu madini kama yo muri ako karere kabamwo abo mu bwoko bw'aba Igbo, basanzwe babifata nk'imana zabo kandi bemera ko bifise ubushobozi ndengakamere. Gusa abanywanyi b'aya madini kama bagenda bagabanuka kubera idini rya Gikristu - ahanini rigizwe n'amashengero ya Pentecote - rigenda ryigarurira abatari bake. Abanyamakuru ba BBC Igbo Chiagozie Nwonwu na Karina Igonikon barerekana utwigoro tw'uyu mupatiri two gukingira kahise kariko karatokombera kubera ibikorwa vy'abavugabutumwa bamwe bamwe. N'aho bamwita "umuriro waka", nta kintu giteye ubwoba kuri Patiri Paul Obayi arongoye inzu ndangamurage ishinguwemwo ibigirwamana mu gisagara ca Nnsuka kiri mu buseruko bwa Nigeria. Iyi nzu ndangamurage y'ivyumba bitatu iherereye mu kigo c'Isengero nkuru ya Katorika yitiriwe umweranda Tereza (Saint Theresa), irimwo amajana n'amajana y'ibigirwamana bitandukanye, ikibumbano c'intambwe hamwe n'ibishusho vy'imana z'aba Igbo. Iyo hagize abava inyuma y'izi mana kama, cane cane kubera inyigisho z'amashengero ya Pentecôte bamwe mu bavugabutumwa baca baturira ibi bibumbano, bavuga ko biteye kubiri n'ukwemera gushingiye ku Mana imwe, kandi ko ari "impwemu mbi zitera imikoshi". Rimwe na rimwe, hari n'abemera izo mana kama bo nyene ubwabo bavyituririra bishimikije umugani wo mu migenzo y'aba Igbo uvuga ngo: "Iyo imana ibangamye cane, icika urukwi rwo guturira". Ariko Patiri Obayi wewe yafashe iyindi nzira mu gukingira izo mana n'imanakazi, akavuga ko akoresha ububasha ahabwa n'Imana kugira ngo azake izo nguvu ndengakamere. Ibi vyamutumye bamutazira Okunerere - "umuriro uturira ibigirwamana muri mutima". Ari kuri iyo nzu ndangamurage, yavuze ati: "Naramaze gusambura izi mpwemu". "Iki ubona hano ni ikibarara. Nta kintu na kimwe kirimwo". Patiri Obayi avuga ko ahanini yigiye ku mazu ndangamurage yo mu bihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi biriko biraterwa igitsure kugira ngo bigarukane ibibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni, aho atanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Benin Bronzes/Bronzes du Bénin (ibibumbano vy'ivyuma birenga igihumbi vyari bishashije ingoro y'umwami w'icitwa Ubwami bwa Benin, ari yo Nigeria ya kino gihe). "Naragendeye amazu ndangamurage yo mu burengero nca nsangayo ibi bibumbano, harimwo mbere n'ivyavuye muri Benin, ariho naca nigira inama yo kubibungabunga". Uwurongoye iyi sengero nkuru, Patiri Eugene Odo, arashigikiye aka kigoro kiwe, aho agereranya iyi nzu ndangamurage n'iyindi yegukira Katorika mu Butaliyano. Ati: "I Roma nk'akarorero, hari inzu ndangamurage ibitsemwo ibintu vyahinguwe mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gipagani bw'Abaromani, kandi ingenzi zama zigendera iyo nzu mu ntumbero yo kwiga ingene umuntu yagiye atera imbere". N'aho iyi nzu ndangamurage ibitse ibi bigirwamana yakira ingenzi ziva kure mbere n'i Lagos, irakeneye kugarukirwa. Ibibumbano, bimwe mbere bimaze ibinjana, bisanzaye irya n'ino hasi muri iyo nzu, vyuzuye inkungugu. Hari mbere n'ivyamaze kuribwa n'umuswa. Ibi vyose ni ivyo yegeranije mu "butumwa amaze akora mu kiringo kirenga imyaka 20 aho agenda yigisha mu bisagara no mu mitumba itandukanye mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. Ati: "Abantu barandikira isengero ryanje bansaba ko ngenda kubakuriraho ibi bigirwamana bibabujije amahoro". Ni itunga rikomeye ryerekana imana z'aba Igbo z'ubwoko bwinshi. Ariko iyikomeye muri izi zose ni Adaada leja, ikigirwamana cambitswe inkofero y'injishano yasengwa n'abarondera kuvyara. Patiri Obayi avuga ko iyi imaze imyaka hafi 200. Odinani, idini kama ry'aba Igbo, ryariho imbere y'umuzo y'idini rya Gikristu n'ubukoloni.  Ni uburyo bwo guterekera aho abantu basenga umuzimu userukiwe n'igishusho kizwi kw'izina rya chi, kugira ngo ubasabire kuri Rugira Vyose, bita Chukwu. Izindi mana basenga harimwo: Si benshi bagisenga izi mana kama, kandi abenshi barahamwa cane n'abakirisu basanzwe ari na bo benshi. Imisi mikuru yabo irasuzuguritse, kandi n'imigirwa imwe imwe isa no kubandwa ibonwa nabi mbere birashika n'utuzu tw'indaro tugaterwa mu bikorwa bijanye n'ubukristu. Muri kino gihe, abenshi mu bakigendera muri aya madini kama ni abatama, n'aho ubu hari bamwe mu rwaruka bagenda bagarariza ubukristu bagashira imbere imigirwa barazwe n'abakurambere. Chinasa Nwosu, umusenyeri w'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu rusengero rwa Royal Church ruri mu gisagara Port Harcourt kiri mu buseruko, ararwanya bikomeye uku kwemera kama. Musenyeri Nwosu yatanguye kumenyekana mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1990 igihe yasambura utuzu tw'indaro, aturira ivyitwa ibigirwamana, anarandura ibiti avuga ko vyari "ibiti vya shetani/satani". Ibi biti, bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivya kera cane, bizungurutswe hasi n'ibitambaro vy'amabara atukura canke yera, bigafatwa nk'ivyeranda ku bayoboke bavyo babisenga bakanabitambira. Hari bimwe usanga biri ku mihana y'abantu ariko vyinshi biri mu mashamba. Ati: "Imana ntishaka ko dusenga ibigirwamana. Idini kama rya Afrika akenshi rishingiye ku gusenga ibigirwamana". Asubiramwo amajambo yo muri Bibiriya, yongerako ati: "Imihezagiro uyironka mu gihe utaye ivyo bintu vyavumwe". Avuga ko ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni mu burengero bwa Nigeria ubu bikaba bibarizwa mu mazu ngandamurage yo mu bihugu vy'uburengero, bitirirwa Imana iyo ari yo yose, akaba ashigikiye ko bigarukanwa mu gihugu. Hagati aho, aragabisha reta ya Nigera ko mu gihe yogarukana ibibumbano bishobora kuba vyaragizwe ibigirwamana, agatanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Ikenga biri mu nzu ndangamurage y'Ubwongereza, ko bikwiye guturirwa. Ibi vyiyumviro birarwanywa bikomeye na Patiri Obayi yiyemeje gukingira ibi bibumbano mu nzu yiwe ndangamurabe. Ati: "Ibi ni ibibumbano abana bacu bazokwigirako kugira ngo batahure neza ingene abakurambere babo bari babayeho".

column2: Ethiopia: Antony Blinken wa reta ya US baganiriye na Abiy Ahmed ku kibazo ca Tigray
column3: Umunyamabanga wa  reta ajejwe imigenderanire wa Reta zunze ubumwe za Amerika yaganiriye n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia ku kibazo ca Tigray. Antony Blinken yerekanye amakenga ku kungene ibintu vyifashe mu karere ka Tigray mu biganiro bagiranye na Abiy Ahmed. Blinken yahamagariye Abiy kureka imfashanyo zigashika muri ako karere mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ko abantu baguma bapfa. Yanavuze ko Amerika ishigikiye ibikwiye guhinduka muri Ethiopia hamwe n'amatora. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia yashimiye umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika "kuba bashigikiye ibiriko birahinduka muri Ethiopia kandi bakaba babibandanya ata kudebukirwa". Ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Abiy yagize ati: "Icipfuzo co gutsimbataza demokrasi no kwubaka igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro n'iterambere kuri bose, bishoboka biciye mu gutsimbataza ubucuti hagati ya Ethiopia na Amerika." Abasirikare bo mu karere ka Tigray batanye mu mitwe n'aba reta ya Ethiopia mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barahunze iyo ntara hanyuma amashirahamwe na yo atanga imfashanyo ntarashobora gushika muri ako karere.

column2: Burundi na Covid-19:Abarenga 70 batowe umugera mu ntara ya Makamba
column3: Abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu ntara ya Makamba yo mu bumanuko bw'Uburundi ku rubibe bihana na Tanzania bamenyesha ko gushika uyu munsi abantu 79 bamaze gutorwa umugera wa Covid-19. Komine zitatu z'iyo ntara-Mabanda, Nyanzalac na Vugizo nizo zivugwamwo abo bantu. Mu batowe uwo mugera harimwo abanyeshure n'abigisha. Abo bantu bose ubu bariko barakurinwa kwa mu ganga mu bitaro vya komine za Mabanda, Nyanzalac na Makamba nyene. Haraheze indwi irenga iyo ndwara itanguye kuvugwa muri iyo ntara. Kuva ico gihe haciye hatangura isekeza ryo gupima abokoranyeko n'aba mbere batoweko  uwo mugera. Gushika ubu iyo ndwara iterwa n'umugera corona yahora ivugwa cane na mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Abantu  nibura 140 baratowe uwo mugera um bipimo vyakozwe hagati y'itariki 4 na 10 ukwezi kwa mbere. Ariko muri iyi minsi iravugwa no mu gihugu hagati. Gushika kuri uyu wa kane, mu ntara ya Ngozi iri mu buraruko bw'Uburundi havugwa abantu 22 batowe iyo ndwara, hakurikijwe ibiharo bitangwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu n'intwaro. ''Abo ni abari mu ma centres de sante no mu  bitaro, hari abafatira imiti muhira'' nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu  baba mu gisagara ca Ngozi. N'umukuru w'intara ya Mwaro amajahagati y'Uburundi ku wa kane yavuze ko hari umuntu yatowe umugera wa Covid-19 muri muri iyo ntara Mu ntara ya Kayanza naho barenga 30 ku bipimo vyakozwe kuva itari 8 z'uku kwezi. Uwo murindi ugira kabiri w'ikwirakwira ry'iyo ndwara ryatumye hafatwa ingingo zindi zirakazwa mu ntumbero yo kwirinda ko ico kiza kibandanya kirandagata. Kuva kuri uyu kuri uyu wa kane mu miduga yo kwiyunguruza rusangi abantu bategerezwa kwambara udufukamunwa. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Uburundi Alain Guillaume Bonyoni yanavuze ko ahantu hose hahurira abanbtu benshi bategerezwa kujayo bambaye udufukamunwa. Yabivuze kuri uyu wa kane ariko aragendera ibigo bipima uwo mugera. Coronavirus yatanguye kuvugwa mu Burundi mu kwezi kwa kane mu mwaka uheze.  Abantu barenga igihumbi baramaze kwandura uwo mugera, babiri nabo uramaze kubahitana, hakurikijwe ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu.

column2: Covid: Hari ibihugu bifise amakenga ko bitazoronka incanco z'iki iza karanda
column3: Amasanamu y'abantu ba mbere bariko baraterwa incanco za Covid-19 si ukuvuga ko zanezereje bose mu mpande z'isi. Hari ibihugu bimwe bibona ko urugamba rwo kuzoronka izi ncanco ruzoba rurerure kandi rutazokworoha. Igihe Lois Chingandu  wo muri Zimbabwe yabona ingene Ubwongereza butanguza uru rucanco, ntaco vyamubwiye - ahubwo yagize agahinda. Co kimwe n'abatari bake muri twebwe, aripfuza cane gucandagwa kugira no ubuzima busubire ku murongo, ariko ntabona neza ingene ivyo bizoshoboka. Ntabona neza ingene igihugu ciwe, zimbabwe, kizohava kironka uru rucanco. Avuga ati:  "Ubu nguma nibaza nimba tuzohava tururonka nkiri muzima". "Ndi mu bwoba ko nzohava nandura Covid kandi ikanampitana kubera aho mbaye". Kumbure abantu bohava babona ko ariko arashikuza, ariko avuga ibi afatiye kuvyo yabonye muri kahise bisa n'ibi. Umupfasoni Chingandu akora mu gisata kijejwe kurwanya ikiza SIDA, akaba yibuka ingene mu mpera z'imyaka 1990 i Harare, umugwa mukuru wa Zimbabwe, abantu bagandagurika buri musi bahitanywe na SIDA. Imiti yo gupfupfahaza yari isanzwe iriho, ariko yahabwa abari bifise. Ati: "Haciye igihe abifise bakiyumvira ko hageze gutabara ba nyarucari, aho niho tuzoronka urucanco". Umupfasoni Chingandu ari mw'ishirahamwe ryiswe People's Vaccine Alliance, ishirahamwe rinegura cane ibihugu bitunze - , cane cane Amerika, Ubwongereza, ibihugu vy'umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'Uburayi, hamwe na Canada - ko biriko birigungirako incanco. Nk'uko bivugwa n'abashakashatsi bo kuri kaminuza ya Duke muri Amerika basanzwe bakurikirana ingene amareta ahana amasezerano n'amahinguriro akora izi ncanco, ibihugu biri ku rushi vyarigaruriye izi ncanco mbere bigura izirengeye izo abanyagihugu vyavyo bakeneye. Canada yo nyene ubwayo, yaramaze kugura incanco ku buryo ishobora gucandaga abanyagihugu bayo incuro zitanu zose. Ibi bihugu vyaremeye bigura izi ncanco zitaranaheza guhingurwa, maze bica biraterera amafaranga menshi kugira ngo zitungane n'ingoga. Umupfasoni Chingandu n'abo bari kumwe mw'isekeza People's Vaccine babona ko ibi ari akarenganyo. Bavuga ko izi ncanco zirengako zari zikwiye guhabwa ibihugu bizikeneye. Gushika ubu, ibihugu 189 biramaze kwiyandikisha muri wa mugambi Covax ufashwe mu mugongo n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO hamwe n'ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu aharanira ko incanco zotangwa ata bugunge. Umu mugambi Covax ufise intumbero yo kwegeranya ibihugu bikaja hamwe, gutyo bikagira inguvu mu gihe bizoba biri mu biganiro n'amakompanyi ahingura imiti. Muri ivyo bihugu, 92 - vyose bikenye canke bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere - vyiteze kugura izi ncanco vyifashishije ikigega gifashwe mu mugongo ku mfashanyo itangwa n'abagiraneza. Ubwongereza buraramaze gutanga igice c'umuriyaridi w'amadorari muri iki kigega. Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'Uburusiya biri mu bihugu bike bidatanga imfashanyo muri iki kigega. Ibihugu bisigaye bizoronka izi ncanco biciye muri uwu mugambi wa Covax. Gushika ubu, Covax iramaze kuronka umuhango w'incanco zitatu. Ariko ubu, uwu mugambi uzofasha ibice 20% vyonyene vy'abanyagihugu bose mu gihugu. Lois Chingandu n'abo bari kumwe mw'isekeza People's Vaccine babona ko hakwiye gukorwa ikintu gifadika atari mu majambo gusa, canke mbere kirengeye na Covax. Bashaka ko amakompanyi ahingura izi ncanco ahereza abandi ubu bumenyi (propriété intellectuelle), kugira ngo hashobore guhingurwa izindi zisa n'izimaze guhingurwa. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ry'ubudandaji OMC/WTD ntirirafata ingingo ku bijanye n'uko ryokuraho amategeko ajanye n'ugutanga ubumenyi ku ncanco za Covid. Iki ciyumviro kirashigikiwe n'ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyo mw'ishirahamwe OMC, ariko ibihugu vyinshi vyo mu burengero bw'isi ntibicerekwa. Rero mu bihugu vyinshi, kuronka urucanco rwa Covid biracari kure nk'ukwezi. Umupfasoni Chingandu ati: "Abantu bagiye kubandanya bagandagurika kubera na Covid, mu gihe abandi bo mu bindi bihugu bazoba bibereyeho ataco binona".

column2: OMS/WHO ivuga ko intambara yo kurwanya malaria itava aho iri
column3: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS riragabisha ko ata ntambwe iraterwa mu ntambara yo kurwanya malaria. Mu cegeranyo c'umwaka kuri iyo ndwara, iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko ibitigiri vy'abayirwaye n'abamaze gupfa atacahindutse muri iyi myaka ibiri iheze, bikaba bitandukanye n'ingene vyari vyakorotse bitangaje twinjira muri iki kinjana. Malaria yica abantu 400.000 buri mwaka, benshi muri bo bakaba ari abo musi y'ubugaragwa bwa Sahara muri Afrika. Hari ubwoba ko imfashanyo mu migambi yo kurwanya malaria zizogabanuka kubera amarorerwa ikiza ca coronavirus kiriko kirakora. Utwigoro two kurwanya iyo ndwara iterwa n'imibu kandi tugenda tuburizwamwo  n'ingene iyo ndwara itakivurwa n'imiti imwe imwe. Icegeranyo c'igisata ca ONU kijejwe ubutabazi, OCHA co mu 2019, kivuga ko abantu imiliyoni zitanu n'ibice indwi banduye malariya muri uwo mwaka mu Burundi, igitigiri kingana hafi igice c'abanyagihugu bose bo muri ico gihugu. Muri abo bantu bose, abangana 1801 barahitanywe n'iyo ndwara iterwa n'umubu kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere gushika ku wa 21 ukwezi kw'indwi mu 2019.

column2: Ni nde yanditse Bibiliya ?
column3: Na Edison Veiga BBC News Brazil Kuba Katolika, Bibiliya igizwe n’ibitabo 73. Ku baporoti hari 66, nayo aba-orthodoxe bavuga ko hari 78. Ni mu gihe Abayahudi bemera ibitabo 39 gusa, ibi bikaba ari ivyo abakirisu bavuga ko ari ivyo mw’isezerano rya kera. Aha turiko tuvuga igitabo kigurishwa cane gusumba ibindi vyose muri kahise k’isi, Bibiliya Nyeranda, ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo vyahinduwe mu ndimi zababa 3.000 – aho ibirenga imiriyaridi 3.9 bimaze kugurishwa kw’isi yose, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuryango wa Bibliya wa Brezili (Société biblique du Brésil). Ariko none, ni bande banditse ibi bitabo? Dufashe ko ari ibitabo vya kera cane, imbere y’uko abanditsi ba none batangura kwandika uko bandika, biragoye kuronkera iki kibazo inyishu nyayo. Intango y’iki kiyago ni ukubanza kumenya nimba ari ukugifatira ku bijanye n’idini gusa, canke nimba gikwiye gufatira ku buhinga n’ubumenyi. Umuhinga mu vya kahise no mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana Gerson Leite de Moraes asanzwe yigisha kuri kaminuza Mackenzie Presbyterian University avuga ati: "Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kubera hari imbono zibiri. Imbono ya mbere ishingiye ku kwemera Imana gushingiye ku masengero, aha tukaba dufise abiga ibijanye no kwemera Imana kubera bashaka kuba abapasitori/abapatiri mu muryango kanaka, imbono kama ». Kubw’iwe, inyigisho z’amasabamana ziganisha ku busaseredoti/ubupasitori, zitegerezwa « kugendera ku nyigisho z’uko ivyanditswe vyavugishijwe, ni ukuvuga ko ari ivyavuzwe n’Imana yo nyene ubwayo, iciye kuri Mutima Mweranda/Mpwemu Yera ». Avuga ati : "Ku rundi ruhande, inyigisho ku bijanye no kwemera Imana zishingiye ku buhinga ntizirajwe ishinga n’iyo mbono, ahubwo zozo zirondera kwihweza uko izi nyandiko zaje ufatiye ku bihe vya kahise ». Muri iyi nzira, turashobora gutahura ibitabo vya mbere vya Bibiliya, ibigize vya bitabo bitanu vya mbere bizwi nka Pentateuque (canke nka Torah y’Abayahudi), ko ari icegeranyo c’inyandiko zanditswe ubwa mbere imyaka hafi 1.000 imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Ibi ni Amamuko/Itanguriro, Ihunga, Abalewi, Guharura/Kubara  hamwe na Gutegeka kwa Kabiri  (Deuteronome)  - ibitabo bivuga ivyerekeye kuva kw’irema ry’isi gushika ku rupfu rwa Musa. Kubera ari ivya kera, abahinga bavuga ko bigoye kumenya neza na neza abavyanditse. Kubw’amayagwa y’idini, ibi bitabo bitanu vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe, Musa. José Luiz Goldfarb, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Katorika y’i São Paulo akaba arongoye n’igisata c’imico y’ikiyahudi mu murwi A Hebraica, avuga ati : "Nsomye nkongera nkavugana n’umusiguzi akongera akaba n’umukinyi w’ivyese, Haroldo de Campos (1929-2003), nahakuye icigwa ko hari inzira zibiri zishoboka. Iyo yo mw’isinagoga ivuga ko Musa ari we yanditse Torah. Tubifata nk’uko twama ‘twumviriza’ Musa buri ndwi [ibisomwa], kandi ibi bifise agaciro mu mico y’abantu ». Ihengama ry’abahinga ntiryemera ibivugwa ko ibi bitabo vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe. Ati : "Ku bijanye n’inyigisho za Bibiliya, tuvuga ibitabo vyanditswe mu myaka irenga 600 ». "Uku niko umwihwezo wa Harold urangira hampande y’ubushakashatsi yagize kuri Bibiliya, kubisigarira vy’ivya kera (archeoloie), ku bisigarira no ku nzandiko zo guhayagiza ». Avuga ko umwihwezo wimbitse w’izi nzandiko ufasha kubitadukanya ufatiye ku nyubako, amajambo azigize, n’ibirimwo ufatiye ku banditsi mu bihe bitandukanye vyo muri kahise. Ni iciyumviro cemerwa neza. Uri Lam wo mu muryango Templo Beth-El w’abanya-Israel muri São Paulo asigura ati: "Biragoye cane kuvuga ivy’ibihe canke abanditsi kuko umuntu atakara. Amatohoza y’abahinga yemeza ko izi nyandiko zifise imyaka iri hagati ya 2.700 na 3.000 canke gusumba aho kubera vyahererekanwa ku munwa ». Kubw’iwe, izo nyandiko zaratagatifujwe – ni ukuvuga ko zegeranijwe hanyuma zifatwa ko ari izigize Bibiliya y’Abahebreyi– amaja mu kinjana ca IV imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Lam yemera ati : "Ariko n’aho nyene, hari impari nyinshi, kandi ntidushobora kurangiza iki kibazo ». Goldfarb abona akarusho muri ibi vyo gufatira hamwe izi nyandiko hamwe no kuzifatira mu mice itandukanye. Yibaza ati : "Nimba ari inyandiko zamaze imyaka 600, ibi ni vyiza ku bantu bakunda ibikorwa. Ni bangahe bashoboye gusohora inyandiko mu karere kamwe canke akandi ? ». Muri ico gihe nyene ivy’abanditsi bitandukanye n’ivy’ubu, ingorane nk’izi nyene zo kumenya koko uwanditse zirabandanya mu bindi bitabo biri muri Bibiliya y’Abayahudi – ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo bigize isezerano rya kera muri bibliya ya gikirisu. Goldfarb ati: "Nk’akarorero, zaburi za Dawudi. Ni agatabo gato abantu bakoresha cane mu bisabisho n’indirimbo vya misi yose kegeranya indirimbo Dawudi yakunda kuririmba mw’isinagoga. "Tuvuga ko yari umuririmvyi kandi ko ibi bisabisho vyaririmbwa. Ni nde abizi ? Ni ikibazo ciza:  ku vyo nize ngasoma, jewe ntavyo nokwemeza… ». Moraes nawe ati: "Ikiri ukuri ni uko habaye benshi banditse ibiri muri Bibiliya ». "Igishoboka cane ni uko inkuru ziri mu vyanditswe muri bibiliya muri kino gihe imbere y’aha vyahanahanwa ku munwa igisekuru ku kindi. Kandi iri ryagumye ari itunga karanga ry’idini ry’aba bantu ». Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza ati: "Ni ukumenya kandi ko ivyo abitirirwa inyandiko mu gihe ca kera bitandukanye n’ivyo dufise ubu. Ico gihe, vyari bikunze kuba ko inyandiko kanaka yitirirwa umutware mukuru, umutegetsi akundwa, umuntu akomeye ». Aha niho rero, abanywanyi b’inyigisho zimwe zimwe, iyo bahinduye ivyo bazi bakabishira mu nyandiko, bakunda kuzitunganya nk’uko umengo ni ikintu canditswe na ba shebuja. Moraes  yongerako ati : "Kubiraba Torah, ushaka kuvuga ko izi nzandiko zanditswe na Musa? Bishobora kuba atari vyo. Kumbure afise kuba yarabigizemwo uruhara. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ata ruhara na rutoya yagize. "Ariko ni inyandiko zitirirwa Musa." Kubw’iwe, igikenewe ni uko izi nyandiko nyeranda birangira zitiriwe amadini. Moraes yibaza ko ari ibintu vyumvikana ko ibitabo vyeranda vyanditswe, nk’akarero, inyuma y’ishingwa ry’igihugu ca Israel gusumba ibihe bivugwamwo, nk’ibijanye n’ihunga ry’Abayahudi bava mu Misiri, barongowe na Musa. Ati: "Iyumvire igico c’abantu bayerera mu bugaragwa. Ivyo kwicara ngo bandike si vyo bibaraza ishinga. Ikiraje ishinga uwuriko arayerera mu bugaragwa ni ukurondera ingene abaho. Mu myaka itari mike, vyabaye ngombwa ko bategura intambara kugira ngo baronke ubutaka…nta n’umwe yari anezwe ivyo kwandika ibitabo." Uyu mushakashatsi ati: "Ikintu kinini gishoboka, ni uko ibi vyagiye kuba hashinzwe umuryango wiyubatse neza." Ariko zari inkuru zidakomeye cane, z’ubwoko butandukanye, vyarangiye zegeranijwe zigashirwa  hamwe n’umwanditsi umwe canke benshi. Umuhinga mu nyandiko nyeranda, Thiago Maerki akaba n’umushakashatsi kw’ishure kaminuza rya São Paulo (Unifesp), akaba kandi ari mw’ishirahamwe Hagiography Society, muri Amerika, arashima cane iciyumviro co gukoresha ubumenyi bwa none mu vy’indimi mu kugerageza gushira hamwe canke gutandukanya inyandiko zigize Bibiliya. Kubw’iwe, abanditsi nk’umwigisha wa kaminuza Robert Alter, umunyamerika yigisha kw’ishure kaminuza ya California, "babivuga neza ", nk’igihe avuga ko ari vyiza "gukoresha uburyo bumwe bumwe bukoreshwa mu kwiga ibijanye n’ivya kahise k’indimi n’inyandiko mu kwiga inyandiko za Bibiliya". Maerki ati: "Arihweza ubuhinga bw’inyandiko, impinyanyuro z’amajambo yakoreshejwe, ubudasa mu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro, imyumvikano ikurikizwa mu bwoko bumwe bumwe bw’inyandiko ya Bibiliya, na buri mwanditsi. "Igihe cose kugira ngo ntihabe kuzana ivyataye igihe." Indinganizo y’amayagwa nayo nyene ishobora kwisungwa mu mwihwezo w’ibitabo bine vy’injili, ibitabo bivuga ubuzima bwa Yezu, bikaba vyitirirwa Matayo, Mariko, Luka na Yohani. Umushakashatsi kuri kahise k’idini rya Gikristu kw’ishure kaminuza Université pontificale grégorienne i Rome akongera akaba n’umuhinga ku bijanye na Vaticano Mirticeli Medeiros, arabishingira intahe ko, ata gukekeranya, abanditse ibi bitabo bine ari abo bagabo bane. Asigura ati : "Ku vy’Injili, nta mpari zihari [kuba zitirirwa], n’imiburiburi ufatiye ku bushakashatsi bwa vuba. Aha ni ukwibuka ko babiri mu banditsi bazo, Matayo na Yohani, bari abatumwa ba Yezu/Yesu. Aba bandi babiri, Mariko na Luka, ku ruhande rwabo, bateguye inyandiko zabo bisunze ivyo abatumwa bashingiye intahe." Maerki arasangamwo ubudasa mu mpinyanyuro z’amajambo muri ibi bitabo bine. Asigura ati : "Matayo afatwa nk’umwanditsi adakoresha impinyanyuro itaziguye, akoresha impinyanyuro isanzwe. Yohani akoresha ururimi rugoye, rwuzuye imizunguruko, imvugo ngereranyo. Luka akoresha imvugo inonosoye, ihanitse."
