Nimba mw’isezerano rya kera hari ibibazo vyinshi gusumba ibizwi ku bijanye n’abitirirwa ibitabo, inyandiko zo mw’isezerano rishasha, n’aho ari iza vuba kandi n’abazitirirwa bavugwa hafi muri zose, naho nyene harimwo ibibazo. Birazwi ko bimwe muri vyo vyatanguye kwandikwa imyaka 30 canke 40 inyuma y’urupfu rwa Yezu. Moraes avuga ko "bishoboka cane ko aya mazina yose [y’aba banditsi b’Injili bane] yaje biciye mu mico n’imigenzo." Ashimangira ati : "Nta zina ry’umuntu yitirirwa ibi bitabo vya kera cane." Igisa n’uko ata mpari gitera ni uko iya mbere muri izi njili ari iya Mariko. Ati: "Mu gihe hari igisekuru, igisekuru cakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Yezu gushika apfe, ni ngombwa ko kigumana inyandiko ku vyabaye. Rero nico gitangura ubwoko bushasha bw’impinyanyuro y’amajambo, ari yo Njili." Mu gushira hamwe imico n’imigenzo hamwe n’ivyahanahanwa ku munwa, uyu mwanditsi w’injili arandika neza ivy’ubuzima bwa Yezu. Ariko ahagarara cane ku gice yashaka guhagararako ico gihe: aha ni ukuvuga ko ata kigoro agira ko kuvuga ku vyerekeye ivuka canke ubwana bwa Yezu, ahagarara cane cane ku gikorwa ciwe, ku rupfu rwiwe, ku butumwa bwiwe bwa Pasika. None uyu Mariko yari umuntu ki ? Umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana (théologien) arerekana ko yari umwigishwa w’intumwa Petero. Ati: "Ariko abandi bazokubwira ko yari umwigishwa wa Paulo. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ico tuzi ni uko atari umwigishwa wa Yezu." Injili ya Yohani nayo nyene irimwo amakenga. Ahari amakenga ni aho avuga  «umwigishwa yakundwa cane», aha amayagwa akerekana ko yari Yohani. Moraes ati : "Ariko hariho abahinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana babona ahubwo ko yashobora kuba ari Lazaro, kuko mu njili harimwo umurongo [mu gice kivuga urupfu rwa Lazaro] uvuga ko Yezu yarize,  ‘hanyuma raba ingene yamukunda." Mu kinjana ca 20 ni ho abakristu batanguye kmwemeza ko Yohani ari we yanditse iyi Njili. "Amayagwa yabigize uko nyene, tubandanya tumwita Yohani. Ariko ntivyoroshe kumenya uwayanditse, ishobora mbere kuba yanditswe n’umurwi wa benshi." Kubw’uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana, ni vyiza ko tugumana iciyumviro c’uko ari « Injili zanditswe na» ugaca ushirako izina rimwe rimwe muri ayo, hakubafata nk’abanditsi b’ibitabo nk’uko bafatwa mu gihe ca none. Ariko nimba ikibazo ari Isezerano rishasha, ni ukwerekana uruhaha rwa Paulo, intumwa yandikiye amabaruwa menshi imiryango ya mbere ya gikristu. Medeiros avuga ati : "Amabaruwa ya Paulo, nk’uko iri zina ribivuga, [yanditswe] na Paulo hamwe n’abigishwa biwe. Nk’akarorero, ibaruwa ryandikiwe Timoteyo, rishobora kuba ryanditswe na Paulo, rero abahinga bamwe baryita Deutéro-Paulin". "Hagati aho, hari impari ku vyerekeye amabaruwa yitirirwa Petero, kandi ashobora kuba atanditswe na we nyene ubwiwe. Co kimwe kandi n’irya Paulo yandikiye abahebreyi, rishobora cane kuba ryagiye kurangizwa n’umwe mu bigishwa biwe ». Paulo yumvikana ko ari we yatanguye kwandika kuri Yezu, kuva mu mwaka wa 57 canke 58. Moraes  avuga ati : "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba yari azi ko yariko yandika inyandiko nyeranda. Ashobora kuba atari abizi." "Hari uburyo yakoresha mu kuvugana n’amasengero hanyuma agasiga amakete. Amwe muri yo yaratakaye, amwe muyo twita ko ari amabaruwa yiwe yanditswe kumbure n’abigishwa biwe, ariko ashirwa mu murwi w’ayanditswe na Paulo." Uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana avuga ati: "Iyo tuvuga amabaruwa ya Petero, kumbure yanditswe n’abamwegereye, kuko Petero ntiyari azi kwandika, kandi arabitomora mw’ibaruwa ryiwe [rya mbere].  Yakoresha umwanditsi mu kwandika. Kumbure afise kuba yabwira icegera ciwe, yitwa Silvano, ivyo yandika."

column2: Burundi: Abarongoye Islam bavuga ko ata ngorane ihari hagari ya Islam na reta
column3: Abakuru b'idini rya Islam bavuga ko biyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe na Ndikumana Rashid, umusilamu aherutse kwifatira mu gahanga umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, iterambere rusangi n'umutekano. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ihuriro ry'imisigiti riri kumwe n'ihuriro ry'aba-Imam mu Burundi, bamenyesha ko ivyo Ndikumana yavuze yabivuze ku gatwe kiwe bitega aya mahuriro canke "umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi". Ndikumana arapfunzwe inyuma y'uko yumvikanye ahamagarira umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano, Ndirakobuca Gervais, gusaba ikigongwe, hari mu musigiti wa Madina uri muri zone Buterere mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umwe mu bakuru b'idini rya Islam mu Burundi yabwiye BBC ko gushika ubu nta kibabuza gusenga uko bamye basenga na mbere. Abakuriye Islam mu Burundi mw'itangazo ryabo, bamenyesha abanywanyi babo ko "ata matati ari hagati y'umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi" na reta y'igihugu. Zuberi Mohamed, Umukuru w'inama ya bose mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi, yabwiye BBC ko bakira nk'abandi bose ivyashikirijwe na Ndirakobuca, kuko "vyaraba bose ntivyaraba aba Islam gusa". Avuga ko ivyo yavuze bitababuza gusenga uko bahora basenga. Ati: "Nta tegeko na rimwe rirasohoka ritubuza gusenga canke ritubuza guhamagarira abantu kuja gusenga. "Twebwe dufata y'uko yariko ashikiriza amakenga yoba afise canke uko abona ibintu". Zuberi avuga ko iyo habaye ingorane hagati ya reta no mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi "hariho inzira bicamwo kugira ngo tuvugane, nk'uko biri mu yandi madini". Abajijwe niba ivyasabwe n'umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano, Rashidi abona ko ata ngorane bishobora gutera. Ati: "Abatovyi mu mpande zose ntibabuze, ariko twebwe turazi ko aba Islam bahagaze neza, kandi ko ata ngorane zihava ziva muri ivyo gushika kuri uno munota nta kibazo kihari hagati ya reta n'aba Islam mu Burundi".

column2: Urukingo rwa coronavirus: Ibipimo ku nkende bitanga icizere
column3: Urukingo rwa coronavirus bisa nk'uko rwakingiye indwara ya Covid-19 inkende zitandatu zo mu bwoko bwa "rhesus macaque". Ibi vyatanze icizere kuri urwo rukingo, kuri ubu rukaba ruriko rurageragezwa ku bantu. Ariko naho biri uko, nta cemeza ko ivyashitsweko ku nkende ari vyo bizoshikwako ku bantu. Ibikoko vyahawe urwo rukingo, hanyuma bikanduzwa umugera wa SARS-Cov-2, basanze bifise umugera muke cane mu mahaha no mu mahemero. Aho bagereranije n'umugwi w'izindi nkende zozo zitahawe urwo rukingo. Ukwo kugerageza kwakorewe muri Amerika, kujamwo abashakashatsi b'ikigo ca leta ya Amerika, National Institutes of Health (NIH) hamwe n'abo kuri Kaminuza ya Oxford mu Bwongereza. Urwo rukingo vyagaragaye ko rukingira ibikoko ntibifatwe n'umusonga. Inkende z'ukwo "rhesus macaques" zifise uburyo bw'umubiri bwo kwikingira indwara bushusha nk'ubw'umuntu. Ku buryo bwokwizigirwa, ntizafashwe n'indwara zituruka ku kwirwanako kw'abasoda b'umubiri - bishika igihe urukingo rwakiriwe nabi n'umubiri ku rugero rubi cane. Ivyo vyarashitse mu magerageza ya mbere ku bikoko aho vyaterwa urukingo rwa SARS - ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus - bica biba inkingi ikomeye mu gutunganya urukingo rw'iyo ndwara. Iki cigwa ntikirihwezwa n'abashakashatsi hanyuma ngo gishirwe ahabona mu binyamakuru, ariko Prof Stephen Evans wo kw'ishure rya London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, yavuze ko ari ivyo "ku rwego rwo hejuru" kandi "bitera intege cane". Hagati aho mu Bwongereza abakorerabushake bashika 1000 bariko barageragerezwako urukingo kuri Kaminuza ya Oxford. Kuri ubu hari inkingo zirenga 100 za coronavirus ziriko zirageragezwa.

column2: Sudan: Reta ivuga ko yaburijemwo itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi
column3: Ikinyamakuru cegamiye reta ya Sudani gitangaza ko muri kano gatondo ko ku wa kabiri hari abashatse kugerageza gutembagaza ubutegetsi bw'ico gihugu bagateshwa, ariko nticatangaje abo ari bo. Iki kinyamakuru kiti: "Habayeho kugerageza gutembagaza ubutegetsi, abanyagihugu bategerezwa guhaguruka bakabirwanya". Umuvugizi wa reta Mohamed Al Faki Suleiman avuga ko abikekwa muri iki gikorwa bategerezwa kubazwa. Amakuru ava muri Sudani avuga ko abashatse gutembagaza ubu butegetsi bagerageje kwifatira ibibanza bikuru bikuru, harimwo iradiyo, ariko bagateshwa. Amareresi yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro avugwa ko ari ayo ku mugwa mukuru Khartoum yerekana abasirikare bari mu biduga vya burende mu mabarabara, bamwe bereka imiduga inzira itegerezwa gufata. Umutegetsi wo mu nama nkuru irongoye igihugu yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko bamaze gufata ibintu mu minwe. Hari imigumuko muri Khartoum, bikaba vyari vyitezwe ko kuri uyu wa kabiri haba imyiyerekano, igisirikare kikaba cahashitse kugira gikomeze umutekano. Sudani ubu isanzwe irongowe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere Abdalla Hamdok ahagarariye reta mfatakibanza yashinzwe inyuma y'aho ubutegetsi bwa Omar al-Bashir butembagarijwe mu kwa kane 2019. Bashir yabogojwe inyuma y'imyiyerekano yari imaze amezi atari make yo kumwiyamiriza, ubu akaba akiri imbere ya sentare ku ruhara rwiwe muri coup d'Etat yamushikanye ku butegetsi mu 1989. Iyi myiyerekano yatanguye hiyamirizwa iduzwa ry'ibiciro vy'umukate n'igitoro, ikaba yagiye kuvamwo iyo kwiyamiriza uyu mukuru w'igihugu, abagore n'urwaruka bakaba barayigizemwo uruhara  rudasanzwe.

column2: Burundi: Fabien Banciryanino yagirijwe amajambo mabi cane kuri Nkurunziza
column3: Uwahoze ari umushingamateka Fabien Banciryanino yarengukishijwe imbere y'umushikirizamanza mukuru i Bujumbura, yagirizwa amajambo mabi cane 'kuri perezida Nkurunziza',  imbere yo kujanwa mw'ibohero rya Mpimba nk'uko umushingwamanza abivuga. Banciryanino yari mu nama nshingamateka yahejeje ikiringo, azwi cane ko atarya umunwa mu kunegura ubutegetsi bw'Uburundi mu vyiyumviro yashikiriza muri iyo nama. Umushingwamanza wiwe, Christophe Nkeringanji, yabwiye BBC ko yagirijwe ivyaha bitatu birimwo amajambo yashikirije mu nama nshingamateka "y'uko abategetsi bishe abantu ku ntwaro y'umuhisi prezida Pierre Nkurunziza". Uruhande rwa reta nta co ruravuga kw'ipfungwa n'ivyaha uyu yahoze ari umushingamateka yagirizwa. Banciryanino yahagaritswe ku wa gatanu w'indwi iheze afatiwe ku muhana iwe muri zone Ngagara mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, aho yari agiye kugirana ikiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru. Gushika kuri uyu wa kane yari akiri mu gasho arindiriye ko amatohoza arangira. Inyuma yo kwumvirizwa n'umushikirizamanza, umushingwamanza wiwe Christophe Nkeringanji yabwiye BBC ati: "Bamaze kumuhagarika, baramupfunze vy'agateganyo, ubu bamujanye ku Musaga [mw'ibohero rya Mpimba]." Bwana Nkeringanji avuga kandi ko bamwagirije ivyaha bitatu ari vyo; "Rébellion (ikirobere), gushaka guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu, n'amajambo mabi cane ahungabanya uwundi." Ati: "Mu bisanzwe ntiyashobora gukurikiranwa ku bintu yavuze ari mu mirimo yo guserukira abanyagihugu kuko amategeko ategekanya ko ata mushingamateka ashobora gukurikiranwa ku kintu yavugiye mu nama nshingamateka kuko aba ariko avugira abantu bamutoye." Igihe inama nshingamateka yariko iriga integuro igenera uturusho n'icubahiro umuhisi prezida Pierre Nkurunziza mu mpera z'ubutegetsi bwiwe, Banciryanino yavuze ko Nkurunziza adakwiriye ivyo vyubahiro, ko ahubwo "akwiriye gushikirizwa ubutungane" akabazwa amabi yabaye ku ntwaro yiwe. Mu gihe yari akiri mu mabanga y'ubushingamateka, Fabien Banciryanino kandi yaranditse amakete amenyesha reta urutonde rw'abantu banyurujwe n'abandi bishwe, asaba ko hokorwa amatohoza ata ho ahengamiye. Uwumuburanira avuga ko imbere y'umushikirizamanza, Banciryanino yabajijwe ibintu bitandukanye birimwo ikiganiro yari agiye kugirana n'abanyamakuru kigahagarikwa n'umukuru wa zone ya Ngagara. Nkeringanji avuga ko Banciryanino yari yandikiye inzego zose zibijejwe asaba uburenganzira bwo gutanga ico kiganiro anamenyesha aho cari kubera, ariko ko batamwankiye kandi batamwemereye. Uyu amwunganira avuga ko ubu hazoca n'imiburiburi iminsi 14 kugira ngo "ashikirizwe abacamanza bemeze niba azoguma aburana yidegemvya canke azoburana apfunzwe."

column2: Ubuhindi bwategetse Google kuriha irindi hadabu ry’imiliyoni $113
column3: Ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko caciye Google ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 113 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera ibikorwa biteye kubiri n’amategeko ajanye n’ihiganwa mu gisata c’itumatumanako, igihano kigira kabiri mu kiringo kiri munsi y’indwi imwe. Ico kigo cagiriza Google gukoresha ubwiganze ifise mu bubiko bwayo bw’ama Apps (applications)  mu guhatira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje app yayo. Iki kigo gisaba iyi kompanyi rutura y’ubuhinga kutazibira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje ubundi buryo canke baciye mu zindi nzira. Google yavuzeko iriko irihweza ivyo birego. Umuvugizi wa Google avuga ati: “Mu kugumiza ku giciro gito,  vyatumye ubuhinga bwa digital (numérique) bukomera mbere bwugururira imiryango amamiriyoni amajana n’amajana y’Abahindi”. Uyo muvugizi yagize ati: “Tubandanya kwitaho abakoresha n’abahingura ama Apps, tukaba turiko turihweza iyi ngingo kugira ngo turabe intambwe zikurikira”. Muri iki cemezo canditse ku mpapuro 199 casohowe ku wa kabiri, ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko, (Competition Commission of India, CCI) kivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amategeko amwe amwe mu bubiko bwayo bwa Play Store ategeka abahingura ama Apps “gukoresha gusa” ubuhinga bwayo mu gutanga canke kugurisha ama Apps. Ikinyamakuru Reuters kivugako ico kigo kijejwe ubugenzuzi gisaba Google gufata ingingo umunani zikosora ibi bintu mu mezi atatu, harimwo kutazibira abahingura ama Apps gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kuriha, haba mu kugura ikibanza muri Apps zisanzwe zirimwo canke kugura ama Apps. CCI  ivuga kandi iti: “Google itegerezwa gukorera mu muco iyo ivugana n’abahingura ama Apps kandi igatanga insiguro ku mafaranga basabwa”. Iyi ni ingingo y’incamugongo ya vuba kuri Google isanzwe ihanzwe n’ibirego bituma itakaza icizere mu Buhindi. Mu ndwi iheze iyi kompanyi yatangishijwe ihadabu ry’imiliyoni 161 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera yakoresheje urubuga rwa Android kugira yiganzire isoko. CCI  ivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amasezerano y’agahato ku bakoresha ububiko bwayo kugira ngo imbuga zayo – nka Google Chrome, YouTube, Google Maps  n’izindi – zikoreshwe. Itohoza rijanye na Android ryaratangujwe mu 2019, inyuma y’imyidogo y’abakoresha Telefone zo mu buhinga bwa Android.

column2: Kidum nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus
column3: Umuririmvyi Jean Pierre Nimbona, Kidum, nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus. Abajijwe igituma yasohoye  iyi ndirimbo Kidum yagize: "Ni kubera ari ikiza kuri ubu kibangamiye isi yose kandi caduteye umutima uhagaze twese". Umviriza iyo ndirimbo aho hejuru.

column2: Ingabo za ONU zavuye Butembo - Buramatari
column3: Ingabo za ONU/UN muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo (MONUSCO) zavuye mu gisagara kiri mu buseruko, Butembo, inyuma y'imyiyerekano yahitanye abantu mu kwezi guheze binubira ko bananiwe guhagarika ubwicanyi bw'imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho, nk'uko vyavuzwe n'umutegetsi w'ico gihugu. Umukuru w'intara ya Nord Kivu, Gen Constant Kongba Ndima yagize ati:"Monusco yamaze kugenda. Kubera hari ibikoresho vyabo bisigaye mu gisagara, tugiye guhurira i Goma n'abajejwe igikorwa barimwo kugira turabe ingene twobirungika, co kimwe n'abakozi bake basigaye i Butembo." Yavuze ko ingendo z'abakozi ba Monusco hamwe n'ibikoresho vyabo bishobora gucungerwa n'inzego zijejwe umutekano za Congo. Umuvugizi wa Monusco, Ndeye Khady Lo yavuze ko "urwo rwego rwatanguye igikorwa co gukwiragiza abakozi barwo vy'imfatakibanza mu turere two mu micungararo ya Butembo ... inyuma y'ibiganiro vyabahuje n'abategetsi b'ako karere n'abo ku rwego rw'igihugu". Imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza Monusco yarabereye muri Nord Kivu mu mpera z'ukwezi kw'indwi. Abari muri  yo basaba ko izo ngabo zokura meza muri ico gihugu. Reta ya Congo yavuze ko abantu 36 ari bo bishwe abandi 170 barakomerekera muri iyo myiyerekano.

column2: DR Congo: M23 yasubije igisagara ca Kibumba
column3: Umukuru w’ingabo z’akarere  ka Afrika y’Ubuseruko ziri muri Congo yahamagariye abanyagihugu gusubira mu ngo zabo mu karere ka Kibumba avuga ko ubu gatekanye. General Major Jeff Nyagah, wo mu ngabo za Kenya ziri muri ubwo butumwa, yabivuze ubwo umugwi witwaje ibigwanisho wa M23 wari usubije ico gisagara ca Kibumba kiri ku 20km uvuye ku murwa mukuru w’intara ya Nord Kivu, Goma. Ako karere kari kw’ibarabara rikomeye rija Goma. Nk'uko biri mw'itangazo w’itangazo M23 yaraye isohoye rikaba ryagiye ahabona kuri uno wa gatanu, ni ingingo yo gusubiza Kibumba  yafashwe inyuma y’imibonano hagati ya M23  n’abaserukira ingabo z’akarere ka Afrika y’Ubuseruko (EACRF) be n’abaserukira umurwi w’ingabo zishinzwe kugenzura imipaka (Mécanisme Ad hoc de Vérification) washinzwe n’inama mpuzamakungu ku karere k’ibiyaga binini, CIRGL/ICGLR, ku magenekerezo ya 12 na 22 Kigarama (12) uno mwaka. Iri tangazo rivuga riti: “N’aho ibirindiro vyacu biguma biterwa, be n’ubwicanyi bukorerwa abantu bacu, bugakorwa n’urunani rwa reta, M23 irashigikiye utwigoro tw’akarere, ikaba yemeye kurekura ibirindiro vyayo vya Kibumba bikaja mu minwe ya EACRF”. General Major Nyagah yavuze ko mu gihe igikorwa co muri  ako karere ka Congo kitoroshe, ingabo z’akarere zizobandanya kukirangura n’ubwira n’ukwubahiriza amategeko mpuzamakugu y’abantu bari mu kaga. Amashirahamwe afasha avuga ko  intambara hagati ya M23 na reta ya Congo  yatumye nibura abantu beranga inusu y’umuriyoni bata izabo kuva mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Ku wa kane , icegeranyo ca ONU cashoboye kumenyekana kitarasohoka icese  cavuze ko reta y’Urwanda  iha imfashanyo abagwanyi ba M23. Uretse ONU, Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubufaransa n'Ububirigi navyo biragiriza Urwanda gushigikira M23, ivyo reta y'ico gihugu yagumye ihakana. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kandi ko ingabo za Congo zunze urunani n’iyindi migwi yitwaje ibigwanisho  mu kurwanya M23. Ico cegeranyo gishikiriza kandi amakenga ko bitero bishingiye ku moko bitota abavuga ikinyarwanda bo mu buseruko bwa Congo bakekwa kuba bashigikiye M23. Kibumba ni kamwe mu turere twari dusanzwe tugenzurwa na M23 mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Inyuma yo kwigarurira igisagara ca Bunagana ku rubibe na Uganda muri Ruheshi(6) iturutse mu birindiro vya Tchanzu na Runyoni hafi y'ikirunga ca Sabyinyo, ahazwi nk'ivyahoze ari ibirindiro vyayo bikuru vya kera, M23 yagiye yigarurira uturere tutari duke mu ntambara yakurikiye hagati y’abarwanyi bayo n’ingabo za Congo. Ubu, igenzura igice kinini ca teritwari ya Rutshuru n’ibice vy’iya Masisi mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Mu ntango z’uku kwezi, umuvugizi wayo yasohoye itangazo ryamenyesha ko wari witeguye “guhagarika ibikorwa no gusubira inyuma” nk’uko bisabwa n’aba bakuru b’ibihigu vy’akarere.Mu gihe itangaje ko igiye kuva i Kibumba. M23 ntivuga igihe utu tundi turere yigaruriye tuzosubizwa.

column2: Minembwe: FARDC ivuga ko ata mutwe n'umwe uzotunga ibirwanisho
column3: Tumaze iminsi tubabwira ku ngaruka z'ibitero vyagabwe ku mihana itandukanye yo muri territoire ya Minembwe muri Kivu y'epfo. Muri ako karere k'ubuseruko bwa Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo, imigwi ya Mai Mai Twirwaneho na Mai Mai Biloze Bishambuke isanzwe ishamiranye. Umuvugizi wa gisirikare muri ako gace, Major Dieudonne Kasereka, avuga ko abanyagihugu barenga 3000 bataye ingo zabo, ubu begeranirijwe mw'ikambi mfatakibanza iri ahitwa Baraka, aho barindiririye imfashanyo. Major Dieudonne Kasereka yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera wa BBC Gahuzamiryango, abanza kumubwira uko umutekano wifashe muri ako gace (umviriza ico kiganiro aho hejuru).

column2: Hungary v England: FIFA yatanguye kwiga ibihano bibereye kw'ivanguramoko ryakorewe abakinyi
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, FIFA, ryatanguye kwiga ibihano bibereye ku nyifato y'ivanguramoko ryakorewe abakinyi b'abongereza mu rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru rwo ku wa kane batsinze Hongrie 4-0 i Budapest mu nkino zo kurondera itike yo kuja mu gikombe c'isi. Raheem Sterling na Jude Bellingham ni bo batyogejwe. Abakinyi bw'Ubwongereza kandi baratewe ibintu mu gice ca kabiri c'urukino, abafana batera n'ikintu caka kirekura n'umwotsi mu kibuga ca Puskas Arena. Ubwongereza buriyamiriza iri tyozwa bukavuga ko ari "ikintu kidashobora kwihanganirwa". Umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Dortmund Bellingham, 18, yanditse kru Twitter ejo ku wa gatanu ati: "Bimaze kuba ibigize urukino kandi bizokwama biri uko gushika ababifitiye ububasha bafashe ibihano nyavyo. Ntidushobora kureka ngo urwanko rwiganze". Umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea, Mason Mount., na we ati: "Birateye isoni kubona ibi bintu bibandanya". "Iyo ibintu nk'ibi bibaye, bitegerezwa kugira inkurikizi, ni ngombwa ko FA ivugana na FIFA kuri iki kibazo kandi nizere ko bazokwama baronka ibi bibazo, impera n'imperuka bagafata ibihano". "Ariko ni ngombwa ko bihagarara kandi dutegerezwa kurandurana n'imizi ibi bintu mu rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru". Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson asaba FIFA "gufata ingingo ruhasha kuri abo bantu babikoze kandi ikore ibishoboka vyose kugira iyi ngeso iteye isoni iranduranwe n'imizi burundu muri uru rukino". Ku mugoroba w'ejo ku wa gatanu, iri shirahamwe rijejwe inkino kw'isi ryavuze ko ririko ririhweza ibihano bibereye  "inyuma y'umwihwezo wakozwe kuri urwo rukino". Ryongerako riti: "FIFA irasubiriye kumenyesha ko yiyamiriza yivuye inyuma kandi mu buryo ntasubirwamwo ivangura n'ihohoterwa ivyo ari ryo ryose co kimwe n'ikumira canke itoteza iryo ari ryo ryose. "Ntidushobora kwihanganira na gato ingeso nk'izo ziteye isoni mu mumpira w'amaguru". Mu gihe ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru ku mugabane wa Bulaya, UEFA, ryari ryategetse Hongrie gukina inkino zitatu ata barorerezi inyuma y'inyifato ishingiye kw'ivanguraruhu ryerekanywe n'abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru, abafana baremerewe kwinjira mu kibuga ku wa kane kubera rwari urukino rwa FIFA. Iyi ngingo ya UEFA  yari yerekeye ivanguraruhu n'iyindi nyifato ishingiyehe kw'ikumira yerekanywe mw'ihiganwa rya Euro 2020 mu kwa gatandatu. N'aho UEFA ari yo ijejwe inkino zo kurondera itike y'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose kubera zirimwo imirwi yo ku mugabane wa Bulaya, FIFA irashobora gufata ingingo kubera ari inkino z'ihiganwa ryayo. Fifa na  Uefa ziranegurwa kubera zaretse abafana bakinjira Amashirahamwe arwanya ikumira Kick It Out, Show Racism the Red Card hamwe na Fare aranegura Fifa na Uefa kubera ingene bafashe iminenerwe itegeko ryari risanzwe rihari ryo gukumira abafana. Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wa Kick It Out Tony Burnett avuga ati: "Ikibazo dufise ni ukumenya igituma FIFA itafashe ingingo kugira ibi ntibibe, n'igituma abajejwe inkino batakoranye kugira ngo babizibire". Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Fare, Piara Powar, avuga ko kureka abarorerezi bakinjira mu kibuga i Budapest ari akarorero k'ukungene  "ibintu biriko birayangara" mu gihe Uefa na Fifa bagerageza guhangana n'ivanguraruhu. Powar avuga ko The Fare Network - ishirahamwe ririko riragerageza kurwanya ubusumbane mu mupira w'amaguru  - rizoha abategetsi icegeranyo caryo kuri urwo rukino, harimwo na videwo. Ged Grebby, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Show Racism the Red Card, yabwiye BBC Radio 5 Live ko umumenyereza w'Ubwongereza Gareth Southgate ari mu kuri mu kuvuga ko Ubwongereza bwobanza kwitunganya imbere y'ukunegura abandi ku nyifato yabo, inyuma y'ibihe bitari bike vyaranzwe n'ivanguraruhu muri uru rukino. Grebby yongerako ko hakenewe "integuro ndende yo kwigisha abanyagihugu" mu ntumbero yo gufasha kurwanya ivanguramoko mu rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru muri Hongrie. Abakinyi b'Ubwongereza barazomerewe igihe bapfukama imbere 'yuko urukino rutangura mu ntumbero yo kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko, umunyamakuru wa BBC Radio 5 Live Juliette Ferrington nawe akavuga ko ivyakozwe n'abarorerezi ari nk'"uruhome rw'induru". Avuga ko indirimbo z'ivanguramoko zumvikanye muri urwo rukino kandi ko Sterling na Bellingham ari bo bariko baratyozwa. Mu gice ca kabiri, Sterling yaratewe ibikombe n'amacupa vyo mu bikarato igihe yari yinjije igitsindo ca mbere c'Ubwongereza. Mu nyuma hatewe mu kibuga ikintu kirekura umuriro n'umwotsi inyuma y'aho Harry Maguire yinjirije ica gatatu. Ishirahamwe rijejwe umupira w'amaguru muri Hongrie (MLSZ) rivuga ko abo batovye urwo rukino "bategerezwa kuronderwa kandi bagahanwa bikomeye", ariko nta kintu na kimwe ryavuze ku bijanye n'uko ivyakozwe vyari bishingiye kw'ivanguramoko. Eka n'umumenyereza w'Ubwongereza Gareth Southgate yaratewe ibarafu n'abafana mu gihe yariko atanga ikiganiro na BBC Radio 5 Live. Ati: "Bose barazi ico duhagarariye nk'umurwi, kandi ibi ntibishobora kwihanganirwa. Uwujejwe umutekano wacu yavuganye n'abakinyi baramubwira ivyari vyo. Tuzobitorera umuti biciye mu nzira nyazo". Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Hongrie wewe, Peter Szijjarto, ntatahura imyidogo y'Abongereza ku bijanye n'izomerwa ryabereye i Budapest, akaba yabicishije ku rubuga rwa Facebook ruriko amashusho y'abafana b'abongereza i Wembley bashinyagurira abataliyano mu gihe bariko baririmba ururirimbo rw'igihugu imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma wa Euro 2020.

column2: Mu mafoto: Umwami Charles ku musi wa mbere atanguye amabanga
column3: Ku wa gatanu mu gatondo, niho Umwami mushasha w'Ubwongereza Charles III yava i Balmoral akaja i Londres /London, inyuma y'urupfu rwa nyina wiwe, Umwamikazi. Muri urwo rugendo ari kumwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe, Camilla Umwami yafashe indege yamuvanye i Aberdeen imujana ku kibuga c'indege ca RAF Northolt imbere y'uko aja gushikiriza ijambo igihugu aciye ku mboneshakure. Ashitse ku kirimba ca Buckingham, yasanganiwe n'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bamwipfuriza kuroranirwa muri  bino bihe bishasha. Ejo ku wa gatanu nyene, abahungu biwe, Abaganwa William na Harry, niho bava i Balmoral. Umwami Charles III yururutse imodoka ku kirimba ca  Buckingham nk'Umwami ku ncuro ya mbere

column2: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Coronavirus: Mbe bashize icuma aho bateye urukingo, kimatako?
column3: Muganga Leonard Nduwayo akorera mu Bufaransa abandanya gusubiza ku bibazo vyanyu ku kiza ca Coronavirus. Aha ahera ku kibazo cabajijwe na Ncutikuneza Baransegese Chris abaza ati: None ni vyo koko ushize icuma aho baguteye urucanco gica gifatako?

column2: South Africa yashinguranye iteka Musenyeri Desmond Tutu
column3: Abanya Afrika y'Epfo biriwe mu birori vyo gushingura wa musenyeri Desmond Tutu  yarwanije intwaro y'ivanguramoko ya Afrika y'Epfo, ibirori vyabereye mw'isengero nkuru ya Anglican  i Cape Town. Tutu, yagize uruhara rukomeye mu kurangiza intwaro y'ivanguramoko muri Afrika y'Epfo akanahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel, yapfuye ku wa Mungu afise imyaka 90. Perezida  Ramaphosa wa Afrika y'Epfo ni we yashikirije ijambo rikuru muri ibi birori vyo gushingura uyu musenyeri kuri uyu wa gatandatu, ibirori vyari vyitabiriwe n'abantu 100 gusa kubera amategeko yo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Ramaphosa  yavuze ko Tutu  ari "umuvyeyi w'imitima w'igihugu cacu gishasha". Kuva yitavye Imana ku wa Mungu uheze, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baragiye kumwunamira kw'isengero  St George's Cathedral,  aho ikiziga ciwe cari. Tutu ni umwe mu bantu bakomeye barwanije cane intwaro y'amacakubiri n'ivanguramoko yashizweho n'inkehwa z'abazungu mw'ikubagurwa bakoreye nyarwinshi b'abirabure, kuva mu 1948 gushika mu 1991. Perezida Ramaphosa yavuze ko Tutu yari "umurwanyi mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ubwigenge, ubutungane, amahoro n'uburenganzira kuri bose. Atari muri Afrika y'Epfo honyene...ariko kandi no kw'isi yose". Ati: "Niba dushaka kumenya akarorero k'umuntu w'igihagararo kidasanzwe, w'imico idasanzwe kandi yitaho abantu, nta nkeka ko ari uyu mugabo turiko turashingura uyu musi". Mu bitabiriye ibi birori kw'ishengero rikuru rya Cape Town harimwo abagenzi, umuryango, abarongoye ishengero n'abanyaporitike. Tutu yari yasavye ashimitse ko mu kumushingura hatoba "ugusesagura canke gukoresha uburyo buhanitse", kandi bagakoresha "isandugu izimbutse ishoboka". Yasavye kandi ko amashurwe yonyene yoba ari mw'isengero yoba "urugori rw'amashure rw'umuryango wiwe", nk'uko bivugwa n'ibigo  Archbishop Tutu IP Trust hamwe na Desmond and Leah Tutu Legacy Foundation. Vyitezwe ko ibisigarira vyiwe bihambwa inyuma ya arutari mw'isengero nkuru St George's Cathedral - isengero nkuru yamaze imyaka 35 arongoye. Mu butumwa yatanze mu buryo bwa videwo, Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasiguye ingene Tutu "yamurikiye isi yose". Avuga ko icubahiro yahaye Tutu ari nk ' "imbeba yunamira inzovu". Umukobwa wa Tutu Mpho yavuze ko urukundo berekanye kuri se wiwe "rwatsimbataje imitima yabo". Ati: "Kubera twamusangiye n'isi, namwe muradusangije igice c'urukundo mwari mumufitiye". Igihe ikiziga ciwe cashirwa ahagaragara muri Cape Town, abantu benshi baraje kumusezera ubwa nyuma. Umugabo umwe, Wally Mdluli, yagenze ibirometero birengo 1000 kuva Bloemfontein gushika Cape Town agenda arasaba ko bamwunguruza kuri gusa (lift)  - aca mu ncuti n'abagenzi asaba ko bomufasha kugira ashobore gukora urugendo rwiwe, mbere akaryama muri station y'igitoro igihe yari ku rugendo. Yabwiye umunyamakuru wa BBC i Cape Tow ati: "Numva nuzuye umunezero inyuma y'aho mboneye isandugu y'ikiziga. Ni nk'uko umengo umutima wiwe uri muri jewe". Tutu yarakoresheje igihagararo ciwe mu kwiyamiriza agahotoro kakorerwa abirabure mu gihugu ciwe, akama avuga ko yabikora kubw'ukwemera atari ku mvo za poritike.

column2: Greece: Umupatiri i Athens yafashwe inyuma y'uko ateye aside abasenyeri
column3: Umupatiri yahagaritswe ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubugiriki Athens/Athènes inyuma yo gutera aside abasenyeri indwi bo mw'idini ry'aba Orthodox, nk'uko bivugwa n'igiporisi. Ibi vyabaye igihe uyu mupatiri w'imyaka 36 yariko yumvirizwa n'urwego rujejwe indero inyuma y'umutaga w'ejo ku wa gatatu, nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa n'igiporisi. Abasenyeri batatu bariko baravurirwa mu bitaro kubera ubushe batewe n'iyi aside, bakaba bahiye mu maso. Umuporisi yirutse aja gutabara abo basenyeri, na we nyene ari mu bitaro. Uwagirizwa gukora aka kabi - umupatiri ashobora kwirukanwa muri iryo dini - yagirizwa ko afise uruhara mu rudandaza rw'ibiyayuramutwe, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ANA. Nk'uko ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu bibitangaza, abo basenyeri bari bakoranye kugira ngo baganire ingene bomwirukana - bakamwambura ubupatiri - inyuma y'aho bivugiwe ko mu kwa gatandatu mu 2018 yafatanywe amagarama 1,8 y'urumogi. Ikinyamakuru Ta Nea kivuga ko uyo mupatiri yinjiye mu kigo c'ababihebeye Imana ca Petraki kiri i Athènes agiye kwumvirizwa, akaba yinjiranye "icupa rinini ririmwo iyo aside". Umuzamu yashoboye gufata uyo mupatiri ageze kw'irembo ry'ico kigo, na we nyene yaraturiwe n'iyo aside, akaba yaciye asimbanwa kwa muganga. Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubugiriki Katerina Sakellaropoulou ariyamiriza iki gitero, nayo umushikiranganji wa mbere Kyriakos Mitsotakis akaba yavuganye n'uwurongoye iryo dini mu Bugiriki, Musenyeri mukuru wa Athènes, Ieronymos II. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mitsotakis avuga ko ababajwe cane n'iki gitero, akaba yijeje uyu musenyeri ko "reta izokora uko ishoboye mu kuvura abakomeretse kugira bashobore gukira ningoga".

column2: MINUSCA: ONU iriyamiriza iyicwa ry’umusirikare w’Umurundi muri
column3: Umusirikare w'Umurundi yari mu ngabo zagiye kubungabunga amahoro muri Centrafrique yarishwe ku munsi wa gatanu mu gitero cakozwe n'inyeshamba mu karere ka Grimari, k'intara ya Ouaka, nk'uko itangazo ry'Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ribivuga. Iri tangazo rivuga ko inyeshamba ziyita Coalition des Patriotes pour le Changement(CPC) zakoze igitero ku ngabo za MINUSCA zari mu bikorwa vyo gucungera umutekano muri ako karere, zikica uyo musirikare zinakomeretsa n'abandi babiri. Abaye umusirikare agize kane w'Umurundi yishwe muri ico gihugu mu kiringo kidashika ukwezi, inyuma y'abandi batatu bishwe ku wa 25 z'ukwezi guheze. Uburundi bwararungitse ingabo zababa 760 muri Centrafrique mu rwego rwa MINUSCA (Mission multidimensionnelle Intégrée des Nations Unies pour la Stabilisation en République Centrafricaine) mu ntumbero yo kugarukana amahoro muri ico gihugu kiri mu ntambara kuva imyaka itari mike. Iryo tangazo ryasohowe n'umuvugizi w'umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU, Stéphane Dujarric, rivuga ko mu gatondo ko ku munsi wa gatanu, ingabo za MINUSCA zikomoka mu Burundi no muri Bangladesh zariko zirakizura mu micungararo ya Grimari, zigwa mu mitego ibiri ikurikirana y'izo nyeshamba. Riti: "Uyu musirikare w'Uburundi yishwe mu mutego ugira kabiri. Abasirikare babiri bava muri Bangladesh barakomeretse muri ivyo bitero". Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU asaba abategetsi ba Centrafrique gukora uko bashoboye kwose bakamenya abakoze ibi bitero kugira ngo babashire imbere y'ubutungane. Yibutsa ko ibitero ku ngabo za ONU zagiye kugarukana amahoro n'umutekano bishobora kuba ivyaha vyo mu ntambara kandi ko "bitegerezwa guhanwa". Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU aratewe impungenge n'umutekano ubandanya uhungabana muri ico gihugu, agasaba impande zompi guhagarika intambara bagatorera inyishu y'ibibatandukanya mu mahoro. Uyu musirikare w'Umurundi yishwe inyuma y'iminsi ibiri hishwe umusirikare w'u Rwanda muri ico gihugu nyene. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, Inama Nkuru y'umutekano mw'ishirahamwe ONU yasohoye itangazo aho yiyamiriza  igandagurwa ry'aba basirikare, uw'u Rwanda ku wa 13 z'uku hafi y'umugwa mukuru  Bangui , nayo ubo Uburundi ku wa 15 . Rivuga ko abagize inama nkuru y'umutekano "biyamiriza bivuye inyuma ibitero vyose, agasotoro no gukokeza ibitero vy'imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho n'abandi bagizi ba nabi ku ngabo za MINUSCA". Rivuga kandi ko abagize inama nkuru y'umutekano bashimangira ko bari inyuma ya MINUSCA, kandi ko bashimira cane ibihugu vyarungitse abasirikare n'abaporisi bavyo muri ico gikorwa co kugarukana amahoro muri ico gihugu. Abagize iyi nama nkuru y'umutekano basaba ko ari nkenerwa y'uko MINUSCA  ihabwa ibikoresho nkenerwa kugira ngo bashobore kurangura amabanga yayo yongere ikingire n'umutekano w'ingabo za ONU.

column2: Burundi: Umuririmvyi Délégué Général arafunzwe kubera indirimbo yiwe "idahuje n'umuco"
column3: Umuririmvyi Olegue Baraka azwi kw'izina rya Délégué Général afunzwe kuva ku wa mungu, ejo ku wa kane yerekanywe n'igipolisi c'Uburundi. Yagirizwa ivyaha vyo "gukwegera abantu mu buhumbu no guhungabanya imico y'ikirundi". Ibi bifatiye ku masanamu y'ururirimbo gw'iwe yise "Delegue General" bavuga ko rurimo ibiterasoni. Igipolisi kivuga ko kizokurikirana n'abandi bose bakinye muri iyo sanamu nk'abanyeshure nk'uko bivugwa n'ibimenyeshamakuru mu Burundi. Amakuru y'uko uyu muririmvyi afunzwe yavuzwe bwa mbere ku wa mbere w'iyi ndwi ku mbuga hwaniro. Ururirimbo rwiwe rurimwo urwaruka ruboneka nk'abanyeshure bakinira mu cumba c'ishure bambaye impuzu z'ishure. Uru ruririmbo rwasohotse mu kwezi gushize k'umunani, ubu kuri Youtube, aho rukigaragara kugeza mu gitondo uyu munsi, rumaze kurabwa inshuro zirenga 25,000. Ubwo yerekanwa n'igipolisi, uyu muririmvyi yumvikanye avuga ko asaba ikigongwe kuko yakoze iyi ndirimbo abakuru bakamubwira ko ari amakosa. Mu gihe we ayikora ngo yumva ko ibiyirimwo ari ibintu bibaho. Ku mbuga hwaniro, abantu bamwe bavuga ko uru ruririmbo nta kidasanzwe kirimwo kitabonetse mbere cotuma Olegue Baraka n'abagenzi biwe bafunzwe ubu. Abandi bavuga ko akwiriye guhanwa kuko ayo masanamu ahushanye n'imico y'ikirundi.

column2: Uganda: Amadini n’abayoboke abangamye kandi abangamiwe
column3: “Hari n’abica ku bwa Christ (Kristu)”, ni bimwe biri muri iri tohoza rya BBC Africa Eye. Peter MacJob agaragaza uturorero muri Uganda, aho n’abakiri bato bakoreshwa n’aba ‘pastors’ (abapasitori) bo mu madini atandukanye, n’abantu bakahasiga ubuzima.

column2: India: Ingene umwambaro wa hijab wambarwa n'abagore bo muri Islam uteje ibibazo
column3: Intara yo mu Buhindi yugaye amashure yisumbuye na kaminuza biturutse ku kibazo c'umwambaro wa hijab kiriko gikurikiranirwa hagufi n'amakungu inyuma y'aho uwuharanira agateka ka muntu Malala Yousafzai yatsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel avyinjiriyemwo. Reta y'intara ya Karnataka iri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi yafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho abanyeshure bihereye amabarabara mu myiyerekano ishingiye ku bakobwa bambara uwu mwambaro wo mw'idini rya Islam, imyiyerekano yandurutsemwo imigumuko. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, sentare nkuru y'iyo ntara itegekanya kwiga ku rwandiko ruvugira abagore b'aba Islam. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho abanyeshure batandatu b'urwaruka bagiriye imyiyerekano imbere y'ishure ryegukira reta ku kibazo co kwambara hijab, imyiyerekano yaciye ikwiragira ku yandi mashure. Abanyeshure batari bake b'aba Hindu nabo baciye biha amabarabara bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ibara ry'ikimenyetso c'idini rya Hindu - mu kwiyamiriza abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab. Ejo ku wa kabiri, umupfasoni Malala - umugore yarokotse igitero c'aba Taliban muri Pakistan afise imyaka 15 ahorwa ko yariko avugira abakobwa ko boronswa uburenganzira bwo kwiga  - yateye akamo abategetsi b'Ubuhindi ko bogira ico bakoze kugira "bahagarike inenwa abagore b'aba Islam bakorerwa". Uyu mupfasoni w'imyaka 24 yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Kubuza abakobwa kuja kw'ishure bambaye hijab zabo ni ibintu bibabaje. Ivyo gufata nabi abagore birabandanya - kubera uko bambaye". Mu Buhindi, uru ruhagarara rwongereje ubwoba n'ishavu mu nkehwa z'aba Islam bavuga ko ibwirizwashingiro ribaha uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ivyo bambara. Ejo ku wa kabiri, amareresi yakwiragiye cane yerekana umukobwa w'umu Islam ariko azomerwa n'ikirwi c'abagabo bakiri bato  bamuvugiriza induru, n'impari zikomeye hagati y'abanyeshure bambaye hijab n'abandi bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu bintu bidakunze kuba, umucamanza ariko arakurikirana uru rubanza yateye akamo abanyeshure hamwe n'abandi "kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano". Ikibazo catanguye kuja hejuru igihe abanyeshure batandatu biga kw'ishure ryisumbuye ryo mu karere ka Udupi mu ntara ya Karnataka batangura imyiyerekano kubera bari babujijwe kuja mw'ishure bambaye hijab. Udupi ni kamwe mu turere dutatu tugize intara ya Karnataka iri ku nkengera - ari naho higanje umugambwe Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) w'umushikiranganji wa mbere Narendra Modi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafata ko iyo ntara ari icicaro gitegurirwamwo poritike y'aba Hindu ari na bo benshi mu gihugu. Umugambwe BJP kandi ni wo urongoye iyi ntara ya Karnataka. Iri shure rivuga ko ryemereye abanyeshure kwambara hijab mu gihe bari mu kigo, ariko bagasabwa gusa kuzikura iyo bari mu masomero. Ariko abari mu myiyerekano  - bose bakaba bari mu mwambaro w'ishure - bavuga ko ari ngombwa ko bemererwa gupfuka imishatsi yabo mu masomero. Umwe muri aba banyeshure Almas AH, yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Turafise abigisha bakeya b'abagabo. Rero ni ngombwa ko dupfuka imishatsi yacu imbere y'abagao. Ni co gituma twambara hijab". Aba banyeshure barahakana ivyo bagirizwa ko bazambara babitegetswe n'umurwi Campus Front of India - ishami ry'umurwi w'abanyeshure ugendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya Islam, Popular Front of India - ari na wo ubavugira. Si kenshi abagore bakunze kuboneka bambaye hijab na burka (umwitwikiro w'umubiri wose mw'idini rya Islam) mu Buhindi, aho kwerekana ibimenyetso vy'idini ku mugaragaro ari ibintu bisanzwe. Ariko umukuru w'iri shure avuga ko ari ngombwa ku mwigisha kubona abanyeshure mu maso, kandi ko umwambaro w'ishure utuma ata vangura riba mu banyeshure. Inama z'urutavanako hagati y'abanyeshure, abarongoye ishure hamwe n'abaserukira reta ntaco zashitseko. Ikibazo c'abanyeshure b'abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab carakwiye mu yandi mashure makuru makeya y'i Karnataka, ariko cagiye kurenga inkombe igihe amasanamu y'aba bakobwa bari mu myiyerekano i Udupi akwirakwirijwe. Ubwo nyene, abanyeshure b'aba Hindu mu yandi mashure amwe amwe baciye batangura kuza mu masomero bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ivyatumye abarongoye ishure bategeka ko iyi myambaro yompi itemewe mu bigo. Mu ndwi iheze, ireresi yafatiwe kw'ishure rikuru rya Kundapur mu karere ka Udupi yerekana abanyeshure bambaye hijab bankiwe kurengana bariyeri, yatumye ibintu biyangara. Imirwi y'abanyeshure b'aba Hindu  - abahungu n'abakobwa - nabo baciye batangura imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza bagenzi babo bigana bambaye hijab. Gusa nta mishamirano yari bwabe gushika ejo ku wa kabiri - hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo sentare itangure kwiga urwo rwandiko - aho baciye batangura guterana amabuye mbere baranaturira mu bisagara bimwe bimwe. Abategetsi b'abakere baciye bashira mu ngiro ingingo ya 144 (Section 144) - itegeko ryo mu gihe c'ubukoloni ryabuza abantu barenga bane gukoranira hamwe - mu ntumbero yo guhagarika iyi migumuko. Mu karere ka Shivamogga, umurwi w'abanyeshure b'abahungu bafashwe amashusho baduza ibendera ry'umutugutu kw'ishure ryabo, reta ica itangaza ko hagiye gukorwa amatohoza. Mu karere ka Mandya, ireresi yazungurutse cane yerekana umukobwa yambaye burka asugerezwa n'umurwi w'abagabo bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu gihe babandanya bamuzomera bavuga ngo Jai Shri Ram (twogereranya na 'Mana nziza'), nawe yarihagarayeko, ashira ijwi hejuru ati "Allah Akbar" (Imana ni yo nkuru) mu gihe abarongoye ishure bamuherekeza bamuvanaho. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Mu nyuma, uyo mugore azwi kw'izina rya Muskan yavuze ko umukuru w'iryo shure yamwemereye ko azomushigikira. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru The Indian Express ati: "Hari abandi bakobwa b'aba Islam na bo nyene bazomerewe nk'uku. Abarongoye ishure be n'umukuru waryo ubwiwe ntibigeze batubuza kwambara burka, none ni kubera iki nokwumviriza abo hanze?" Umutegetsi mukuru mu gipolisi yabwiye BBC Hindi ko ibi ari "ikibazo gito" kandi ko bafise ibintu mu minwe. Reta y'intara ivuga iki? Umushikiranganji w'indero w'intara ya Karnataka Nagesh ashigikiye abategetsi b'ishure bavuga ko, vyaba ibitambara n'ibisikafu vy'umutugutu, vyaba ibitambara vy'imyitwikiro, vyose ntivyemewe mu bigo vy'amashure. Avuga kandi ko aba banyeshure bagumuwe "n'inkozi z'ikibi". Afatiye ku kungene ishami rya poritike ry'umurwi Popular Front of India ririko rigerageza gushinga imizi mu karere ko ku nkengera, Nagesh yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Vyose bishingiye kuri poritike. Ibi vyose biriko biba kubera amatora yimirije mu mwaka uza". Sentare ivuga iki gushika ubu? Sentare yahawe inzandiko zibiri zivugira abari muri iyi myiyerekano. Rumwe ruvuga ko ibwirizwashingoro ry'Ubuhindi ritanga uburenganzira kuri buri muntu guhitamwo ivyo yambara. Urundi narwo rukarwanya itegeko riherutse gushingwa na reta y'intara ritegeka inyambaro yemewe mu mashure, ribuza ibitambara vyo mu mutwe n'ama hijab. Imbere y'uko urubanza rutangura kwigwa, igihe umushingwamanza yari asavye ko rwunguruzwa, umucamanza Krishna Dixit yaranse. Ati: "Ibishobisho vyose bigume hanze. Ibwirizwashingiro ni Bhagavad Gita (igitabo ceranda c'aba Hindu). Jewe nzokorera ku ndahiro nagize igihe ntangura akazi. Si vyiza ko abanyeshure baguma hanze". Uyu mushingwamanza aburanira abari mu myiyerekano avuga ko itegeko rya reta ribuza hijab riteye kubiri n'amategeko kandi ko rihonyanga ibwirizwashingiro - agasaba kandi ko sentare ifata ingingo mfatakibanza yokwemerera abanyeshure kubandanya biga imbere y'uko ibibazo bitangura.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru ku wa gatanu 05.07.2019: Maguire, Fernandes, Niguez, Marcelo, Lukaku, Gomez
column3: Umukinyi Bruno Fernandes arashashaye cane kwimukira muri Manchester United. Bitegekanijwe ko uyo mukinyi wo hagati w'imyaka 24 asanzwe akina muri Sporting Lisbon no mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal afata urugendo rumushikana Old Trafford gupimwa kwa muganga. (Sport Witness) Man U irarondera kandi umunyegori wa Atletico Madrid Saul Niguez w'imyaka 24 kugira asubirire Paul Pogba mu gihe uyu mukinyi w'umufaransa w'imyaka 26 yoramuka avuye i Old Trafford. (Express) Manchester City ntiyiteguye kuriha amahera asabwa na Leicester ku mukinyi Harry Maguire  w'imyaka 26, akaba ari amahirwe kuri Manchester United yo gushobora kugura uyo mukinyi mpuzamakungu w'umwongereza. (90Min) Arsenal nta mahirwe bagize y'ukuronka umunyegori w'umudagi w'imyaka 21, Markus Schubert, yafashe ingingo yo kuja gukinira Schalke avuye muri Dynamo Dresden. (Sport1) Arsenal bariko bakora hasi hejuru kugira bagure Marcelo inyuma y'aho uyo mukinyi w'umunya Brezili asavye ko yova muri Real Madrid. (Sport - via Metro) Arsenal yatanguye kuvugana n'umurwi Gremio kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Argentine, Walter Kannemann w'imyaka 28. (Globo Esporte - via Metro) Inter Milan biriko birayigora kugura umusatirizi wa Manchester United akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ububirigi, Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 26. (Sun) Uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Tottenham, Ossie Ardiles, avuga ko kugerageza kubuza Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27 kugenda ari "uguta umwanya". (Talksport - via Goal) West Ham United iriko irarwanira na Valencia umusatirizi wa  Celta Vigo Maxi Gomez w'imyaka 22 akinira kandi n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Uruguay . (Sky Italia - via Inside Futbol) Leicester umutima wayo wose uri ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Burnley, James Tarkowski, ari nka hamwe Harry Maguire yokwimukira muri Man United. Hagati aho, Leicester izomurwanira na Wolves nayo nyene yipfuza uyo mukinyi. (Birmingham City) Man United iriteguriye kugiriranira amasezerano mashasha n'umunyegori David de Gea akaba yohembwa imiliyoni 85 z'amapawundi milioni 85, aho yoronka umushahara w'ibihumbi 350  ku ndwi. (Star) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Croatia, Dejan Lovren ashobora kuva muri Liverpool akaja muri AC Milan yipfuza cane uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 30, ikaba yoba iriko irategura amahera ngo imushikane i San Siro. (Mirror) Manchester City na Barcelona iriko irarwanira umukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus,  Joao Cancelo w'imyaka 25, akaba kandi akinira n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal. (Sport English - via Mirror) Frank Lampard yifotoreje mu kibuga ca Stamford Bridge aho yakirwa nk'umumenyereza mushasha wa Chelsea. (Mail) Arsenal yugururiwe inzira y'ukugura umusatirizi w'umunyabrezili akinira Barcelona, Malcom w'imyaka 22, ariko ico irondera ahanini  kukaba ari ukugura umusatirizi wa Cote d'Ivoire Wilfred Zaha  w'imyaka 26 akina muri Crystal Palace. (Mirror) Aba Gunners bariko bategura imiliyoni 70 bashaka gutanga kuri Zaha, n'aho Palaceyoyo ivuga ko uyo mukinyi afise agaciro kangana n'imiliyoni 80 z'amapawundi. (Sky Sports) Tottenham yahagaritse ibiganiro vyayihuza na Real Betis ku mukinyi wo hagati akomoka muri Argentina, Giovani Lo Celso w'imyaka 24 inyuma y'aho iyo mirwi inaniranye kwumvikana ku mahera. (Sky Sports)

column2: Afghanistan: Uwahoze atwara igihugu Ashraf Ghani yasavye imbabazi z'uko yahuze
column3: Uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Afghanistan Ashraf Ghani yasavye imbabazi abanya-Afghanistan inyuma yo kuva mu gihugu akaja mu buhungiro muri Emirats Arabes Unis (United Arab Emirates). Yavuze ari : "Kuva muri Kabul niyo yabaye ngingo ya mbere  igoye cane mu buzima bwanje," aca yongerako ko asavye imbabazi kuko "ntabona ukundi ryari kurangira". Uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu Ghani yahunze Afghanistan ubutarariye igihe aba-Taliban bari basugereje umurwa mukuru Kabul ku wa 15 ukwezi kw'umunani. Avuga ko atifuza guheba abanyagihugu ariko ko "yari yo nzira yonyene". Mw'itangazo yashize no kuri  Twitter ku wa gatatu, Ghani yavuze ko ata kundi yari afise yari kugira atari ukuva mu gihugu kugira ntihabe intureka mu gihugu cose. "Nahavuye ndabisabwe n'bajejwe umutekano ku kirimba, bangiriye inama ko kugumaho vyotuma haba intambara yo mu mabarabara nk'uko vyagenze mu gisagara igihe c'intambara yo hagati mu gihugu mu myaka ya 1990", abandanya avuga ko yabikoze kugira "akize   Kabul n'abantu imiriyoni 6 bayibamwo". Yavuze ko yari amaze imyaka 20 yitanga kugira Afghanistan kibe igihugu kirangwa na "demokrasi, kiroraniwe kandi cigenga". Uyo yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu yongeye guhakana "ibitagira aho bishingiye" bivugwa ko yahunganye amafaranga angana na miriyoni 169  z'ama dorari (hafi miriyaridi 338 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 72, yaneguwe cane n'abandi banyaporitike bo muri Afghanistan kubera guta igihugu, yavuze ko azosigura "ingene ibintu vyagenze gushika aho ata akagenda"  mu minsi mike iri imbere. Mw'ijambo ry'ikibiriraho kuri Facebook ku wa 18 ukwezi kw'umunani, Ghani yavuze ko "yahatiwe" kuva muri Afghanistan n'abamucungerera umutekano kuko "hari ivyago vyinshi ko nashobora gufatwa nkicwa". Yavuze ko igihe aba-Taliban binjira ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu i Kabul, "batanguye kundondera icumba ku kindi". Ahakana ibivugwa ko yagiye atwaye amafaranga menshi mu guhunga igihugu, Ghani yavuze ko "atemerewe no gukura isandari ngo yambare ibirato". Muri iyi ndwi, aba-Taliban bamaze indwi zitatu bafashe  igihugu,  baratangaje abagize reta ata mugore n'umwe arimwo. Ku wa gatatu, abagore baharurwa mu mirongo muri Kabul no mu ntara ya Badakhshan yo mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Afghanistan baragize imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyo reta nshasha bavuga ko batazokwemera reta itagiramwo   abashikiranganji b'abagore.

column2: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi ku mugabane wa buraya 29.07.2022
column3: Everton iriko iravugana na Paris St-Germain kugira igure umukinyi wo hagati wo muri Senegal Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 32, bikaba vyitezwe ko ivyo biganiro bibandanya mu misi mike iri imbere.  (Fabrizio Romano) Nuno Tavares w'imyaka 22 arakorerwa ibipimo kuri uyu wa gatanu n'umugwi wa Marseille inyuma y'aho uwo mugwi wo mu Bufaransa ushitse ku masezerano yo kumutizwa na Arsenal.  (Fabrizio Romano). Marseille kandi yaratanguye ibiganiro vyo kuzana muri uwo mugwi umunye Chili Alexis Sanchez w'imyaka 33 ava muri Inter Milan. (L'Equipe) West Ham irabandanya ibiganiro na Eintracht Frankfurt ku mukinyi wabo w'umunye Serbia Filip Kostic, 29, ashobora gukina inyuma mu bubamfu. (90 min) Tottenham iriko iragerageza gutwara umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubutaliyano Nicolo Zaniolo, 23 akinira umugwi wa Roma,  yaronderwa kandi na Juventus. (Tuttosport) Barcelone ifise umugambi wo kugura umukinyi Sergio Reguilon, 25 wo mu mugwi wa Tottenham  mu gihe batoshobora kugura umukinyi w'inyuma mu bubamfu wo muri Espagne Marcos Alonso, 31, ari muri Chelsea. (AS) AC Milan yagiriraniye amasezerano na Charles de Ketelaereyahora ari mu mugwi wa Club Bruges, mu gihe uwo mukinyi w'umubiligi w'imyaka 21 yahora aronderwa kandi n'imigwi ya Leeds na Leicester. (90min) Umugwi wa Palmeiras uramaze kwankira incuro zibiri zose umugwi wa Ajax kugura umukinyi w'umunye Brezil Giovani w'imyaka 18. Uwo mugwi wo muri Hollande ukaba umugwanira na Newcastle hamwe Bayern Leverkusen. (ESPN) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Newcastle United n'Ubwongereza Kieran Trippier, 31, avuga ko yari kwimukira mu mugwi wa Manchester United mw'ici riheze, imbere yo gufata ingingo yo kuva muri Atletico Madrid akerekeza muri muri Newcastle mu kwezi kwa mbere. (Mirror) Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta ntibagiye mu rukino rw'imbere y'uko ihiganwa nyezina ritangura rwabahuje na Brentford abikinyi Bernd Leno,30 wo mu Budagi ahamwe n'abanye  Espagne Pablo Mari,28 na Hector Bellerin, 27. Aho ni mu gihe vyitezwe ko abo batatu bimukira mu yindi migwi muri iri ci. (The Mirror) Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp yamiriye kure ibivugwa ko umukinyi w'imbere wa Brezil Roberto Firmino ashobora kuva muri uwo mugwi muri rino ci inyuma y'aho binuganugiwe ko uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 30 ashobora kuja mu migwi ya Juventus na Newcastle. Tottenham iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi Giovani lo Celso igihe hotangwa imiliyoni 17 z'amapawundi muri iri ci. Aho ni mu gihe imigwiVillarreal na Fiorentina iriko irerekana ko ikeneye uwo munye Argentine w'imyaka 26. (Athletic - subscription required). Manchester City yahaye uburenganzira umukinyi w'umwongereza w'imyaka 19, James McAtee bwo kwimukira mu wundi mugwi kw'ideni mu gihe imigwi ya Leeds United na Nottingham bivugwa ko imurondera. Kubera kubura amahera, Leicester yatsinzwe na Naples mu rugamba rwo kugura  umukinyi wa Korea y'Epfo Kim Min-jae w'imyaka 25 yahora akinira umugwi Fenerbahce.  (Football Insider) Umugwi wa Burnley uriko urarondera umukinyi wo hagati w'umunye Scotland Jack Hendry w'imyaka 27 akinira Club Bruges yo mu Bubiligi.

column2: Covid-19: Ubwoko bwayo bwo mu Buhinde bwashitse muri Uganda
column3: Uganda yatangaje ko yagaragayemwo ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 bwo mu gihugu c'Ubuhinde, uwuyirwaye akaba ariko aravurwa. Ibipimo vyafashwe kuri uwo muntu itariki 26 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu, akaba ariko aravurirwa mu bitaro vya Mulago National Referral Hospital. Uganda iramaze kugaragaramwo kandi ubwoko bushasha bw'ico kiza bwo muri Nigeria, Ubwongereza na Afrika y'epfo. Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa w'ikigo co muri Uganda kijejwe indwara zandukira, Dr. Pontiano Kaleebu, yavuze yuko gushika ubu Uganda imaze kubonekamwo umuntu umwe gusa afise ubwo bwoko bushasha  bwa Covid-19 bwo mu Buhinde. Ubu bwoko bushasha vyemejwe ko bwatowe muri Uganda mu gihe igihugu c'Ubuhinde co muri Aziya bukomakomwo  gihanganye n'umupfunda wa Covid-19 ugira kabiri, umaze gusasika inganda mu miji minini minini. Vyateje ikibazo gikomeye c'amagara mu gihe ibitaro vyaherewe n'ibibanza vyo kwakira abarwayi, gufuba abahasize ubuzima navyo ubu bikaba bibera mu bibanza vy'ahasanzwe hasigwa imiduga (parking). Kaleebu yavuze yuko ubu bagiye kwibanda ku gukumira hamwe no gupima cane  ku mbibe za Uganda. Iki gihugu caratanguje umuce wambere wo gukingira abanyagihugu  Covid-19 mu kwezi kwa gatatu, nyuma yo kuronswa inkingo 864.000 za AstraZeneca zivuye mu mugambi wa Covax, hamwe n'izindi 100.000 zavuye mu Buhinde. Abahereweko gukingirwa mu muce wambere ni abakora akazi gatuma bagira ivyago vyinshi vyo  kwandura barimwo abakora mu vy'amagara y'abantu, abasirikare, abapolisi hamwe n'abigisha. Harimwo kandi n'abafise indwara zituma abasoda b'umubiri bagabanuka, kuva ku myaka 18 kurenga co kimwe n'abakuze cane. Ariko abemera kwikingiza ni bakeyi cane. Abashika 304.000 gusa nibo bamaze kwiteza urukingo rwa mbere gushika ubu. Uganda yatanguye kworosha amategeko ya guma-muhira mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu mwaka uheze, ariko ingingo zo kwikingira nko kwambara agapfuka-munwa hamwe no kutegerana cane, zubahirizwa gake cane.

column2: Ibihugu vya Afrika vyumvikanye gukorera hamwe mu guhangana na coronavirus
column3: Mu gihe abahitanwa n'umugera wa coronavirus bagenda biyongera kw'isi, abashikiranganji bari bateranije i Addis-Abeba ku cicaro c'umuryango wa ibihugu vya Afrika bavuyeho bumvikanye  gukorera hamwe mu guhanahana amakuru be no gucungera uruja n'uruza. Gushika ubu, umuntu umwe gusa akomoka muri Misiri niwe amaze kumenyekana ko yanduye coronavirus ku mugabane wa Afrika, ariko na we nyene ubu yarakize. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, yaribukije abari bakoraniye i Addis-Abeba ati: "Ikituraje ishinga ni uko coronavirus itoshika mu bihugu atako vyifashe mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu". Ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe gukinga indwara kimenyesha ko ubu umugabane wa Afrika witeguye neza guhangana n'uwo mugera gusumba uko vyari bimeze haciye ukwezi. Muganga Tedros yanatangarije abari muri iyo nama ko John Nkengasong, arongoye ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara muri Afrika, hamwe na Samba Sow, arongoye ikigo kijejwe gukora imiti y'urukingo muri Mali, bagenywe nk'intumwa zidasanzwe mu kurwanya umugera coronavirus. Gushika ubu mu bihugu birenga 25 vya Afrika, hari abaganga barenga ibihumbi cumi bamaze kuronswa inyigisho, haratangwa n'ibikoresho vyo gupima, nayo ugucungera uruja n'uruza bikaba vyarakomejwe. Harashinzwe kandi n'umurwi w'abahinga karuhariwe muvyo ubuvuzi ujejwe gutabara mu buryo bwihuse cane mu gihe hogira umuntu amenyekana ko yanduye uwo mugera. Muganga Tedros yavue ko ishirahamwe OMS rifishe ishaka ryinshi ryo gukorana n'ibihugu vyose vya Afrika kugira ngo ibishoboka vyose bikorwe mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwo mugera ruhonyabantu.

column2: Papa asaba ko haboneka inyishu "ruhasha" ku bihe mu butumwa kuri BBC yonyene
column3: Mu butumwa bw'ijwi yahaye BBC yonyene, Papa François asaba abategetsi b'isi bazohurira  ku ndwi iza mu nama ya ONU  ku bihe i Glasgow (muri Ecosse), gutanga "inyishu ziri n'ico zishikako" ku vyihutirwa ku bidukikije no guha "icizere gifadika" abariko bararuka. Muri ubwo butumwa bwafatiwe amajwi i Vaticano  bugahabwa ikiganiro Thought for the Day ca Radio 4 ya BBC, Papa yagarutse ku bihanze isi birimwo ikiza ca Covid -19, ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, aca asaba abarongoye isi kubitorera inyishu mu buryo bw'icerekezo n'ingingo ruhasha , kugira "amahirwe" atangwa n'ivyo bihanze isi "ntatakare". Umwungere wa Ekereziya Katorika yavuze ati: "Duhangana n'ivyo vyugarije isi mu nzira za  nyamwigendako, kwigumizako ivyacu no gukoresha ivy'abandi, canke tukabibonamwo amahirwe nyayo y'impinduka". Yagarutse ku kuba hakenewe "ugusubira kwumva uruhara dusangiye rwo kwitaho isi yacu", yongerako ati "umwe wese muri twebwe - uwo ari we wese n'aho ari hose - ashobora kugira  ico aterereye mu guhindura inyishu ya twese ku ngeramizi zitari bwigere ziboneka  kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe n'itituka ry'inzu dusangiye." Papa mu mwanya uza aja kubonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden. Imigambi ya Biden ku bijanye n'ibihe mu gihugu iwe iracari mu mayira abiri inyuma y'aho umugambwe wiwe wigirije inyuma gutora itegeko rigenda  integuro z'amafaranga yo gukoresha. Ubwo butumwa n'ubwibutsa ingene Papa François yashize imbere ibijanye no gukingira ibidukikije mu burongozi bwiwe bwa Ekereziya. Mu majambo ashikiriza, aramaze kugaruka kenshi ku kaga k'ibihe, mu 2015 akaba yasohoye ikete rya  Papa (enciclyque), ryitwa  Laudato Si' rishimikiye kuri ico kibazo. Muri iyo nyandiko inyito yayo yahinduwe mu zindi ndimi nka "Ku kwitaho inzu dusangiye" , yiyamirije ugusambura ibidukikije, yerekana ko hakenewe ingingo zofasha  kugabanya iryo hindagurika, aca yemeza ata guca hirya no hino ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ahanini riterwa n'ibikorwa vy'umuntu. Iryo kete ryasohotse imbere y'uko haba inama ya ONU y'i Paris mu 2015, COP21, rikaba ryabonywe nk'iryagize ico rifashije mu gutuma abategetsi bashika ku masezerano. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, abategetsi b'isi bariko baritegurira gukoranira i Glasgow mu nama y'uyu mwaka, COP26. Mu gihe biguma bigaragara ko ivyiyemejwe i Paris bitariko birashikwako kugira  ukwiyongera kw'ubushuhe bw'isi ntikurenge 1.5C, ugereranije n'urugero rw'imbere y'uko hatagura amahinguriro,  Papa François yasubiye gushimika kuri ico kibazo  yizigiye ko ijambo ryiwe rizosubira kugira ico rifashije nka mbere.

column2: Papa Francis yemeye ko yananiwe kwihangana akubita urushi umukenyezi yariko amukwega
column3: Papa Francis yasavye imbabazi  inyuma y'aho akubitiye urushi ku kuboko umwe mu bakirisu bari mu rugendo rweranda bakoraniye ku kibanza citiriwe umweranda Petero i Roma. Papa yariko aramutsa abana n'abandi bari bakoraniye muri ico kibanza hanyuma agize ngo aragiye, umukenyezi umwe muri bo amukwega ukuboko n'inguvu nyinshi gushika n'aho ahakwa kumugwisha hasi. Ivyo vyatumye Papa ahindukira agerageza kumwikura vyanka, aca amukubita urushi ku kuboko ashavuye abona kumurekura. Niho mu nyuma Papa yemera ko vyanse ko yihangana aremera ko nawe nyene acumura nk'ikiremwamuntu nk'abandi. Ati: "Kenshi biranka ko twihangana. Naje birashobora kunshikira. Nico gituma nsavye imbabazi ku vyashitse nijoro". Ivyo vyatangaje benshi kuko imbere y'aho, mu gihe yashikiriza ijambo ry'ukwipfuriza umwaka mushasha abakirisu, yariyamirije ihohotera rikorerwa abakenyezi.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Ronaldo, Messi, Kimpembe, Traore, Neymar, Lingard, De Ligt
column3: Paris St-Germain yavuganye n’umusatirizi wa Argentina Lionel Messi w’imyaka 35 mu ntumbero yo kurondera ko yozotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y’umwaka umwe maze akaguma muri uno murwi gushika mu 2024. (Marca) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United  umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37, yemerewe umushahara w’imiriyoni 300 z’ama euro kugira aje gukinira umurwi wo muri Arabia Saoudite mu kiringo c’imyaka ibiri y’inkino. (TVI na CNN Portuguesa ziciye kuri AS – muki espagnol) Ajax yemeye ko yatsinzwe mu rugamba rwo kurondera kuzibira Martinez ngo ntagende muri rino ci – ariko uno murwi wo muri Hollande umushakako imiriyoni 46 z’amapawundi. (Times) Chelsea iriko irarondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Presnel Kimpembe w’imyaka 26, inyuma yo kwemeranya na Napoli ku giciro c’umukinyi w’inyuma wa Senegal Kalidou Koulibaly w’imyaka 31. (Guardian) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umudagi Serge Gnabry araronderwa na Chelsea ariko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 27 ari hafi yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri Bayern Munich. (Kicker iciye kuri Mail) Everton  yabwiwe na Wolves ko ishobora kwemera imiriyoni cumi z’amapawundi ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande  Adama Traore w’imyaka 26, muri rino ci. (Football Insider) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa Hollande Matthijs de Ligt w’imyaka 22 ariteguye kwemera kugabanirizwa umushahara kugira yinjire muri Bayern Munich avuye muri Juventus. (Bild – mu kidagi) Barcelona iriteguye kwongereza amafaranga gushika ku miriyoni 50 z’ama euros ku musatirizi wa Bayern Munich umunya-Pologne Robert Lewandowski w’imyaka 33. (£42m). (Bild – mu kidagi) Manchester City iriko irakurikiranira hagufi ikibazo c’umufaransa Jules Kounde w’imyaka 23 akina inyuma muri Sevilla, mu gihe iriko irondera abashobora  gusubirira umunya-Hollande Nathan Ake w’imyaka 27, ashobora kwimukira muri  Chelsea. Barcelona nayo nyene iripfuza Kounde. (Mail) Leeds United iracarindiriye inyishu iva muri Club Brugge inyuma yo kuyisaba umusatirizi w’umubirigi Charles de Ketelaere. Ariko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 21 ashobora guhitamwo kuja muri AC Milan, na yo nyene ikaba isanzwe iri mu biganiro n’uyu murwi wo mu Bubirigi. (Fabrizio Romano - Twitter) AC Milan yemeye gutanga imiriyoni 30 z’ama euro kuri De Ketelaere, ariko Leeds yoyo yemeye kumutangako imiriyoni 37 z’ama euros. (Calciomercato) Leeds iripfuza kwakira umukinyi wo hagati wa Espagne Juan Mata w’imyaka 34, ubu yigenga inyuma yo kuva muri Manchester United mu mpera z’umwaka w’inkino urangiye. (AS – mu ki espagnol) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea umwongereza Mason Mount w’imyaka 23, arashaka ko ibiganiro bitangura ku masezerano mashasha y’igihe kirekire. (Athletic) Umusatirizi wa Brezili Neymar w’imyaka 30, ntiyipfuza kuva muri Paris St-Germain muri rino ci, n’aho hari amakuru avuga ko ashobora kuva muri uno murwi wo ku mugwa mukuru w’Ubufaransa. (Goal) Bitegekanijwe ko umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w’imyaka 25, atera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y’imyaka ibiri muri  Barcelona inyuma y’aho ayari ahasanzwe arangiriye. (Sport – mu ki espagnol) Arsenal iriko iradindiza ivyo kugenda kwa Lucas Torreira inyuma y’aho uyu munya-Uruguay w’imyaka 26 akina hagati yemereye kwimukira muri Valencia. (Sport 890 iciye kuri Mirror) Umurwi uherutse kwimukira mu cicaro ca mbere c’ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano Serie A, Monza, iripfuza kuzana umusatirizi wa Uruguay  Edinson Cavani  w’imyaka 35 inyuma yo kuva muri Manchester United amasezerano yiwe arangiye. (Sky Sport Italia via Mail) Manchester City yemeye kuzana umukinyi wo hagati Emilio Lawrence asanzwe ari muri Everton. Uyu munya-Ecosse w’imyaka 16 ariko kandi arakurikiranirwa hagufi na Manchester United hamwe na  Chelsea. (Football Insider)

column2: Umusunikano muri Israel: Ababibonye baravuga ingene abantu 'batererwa mu kirere'
column3: Abantu bari ahabereye umusunikano waguyemwo abantu benshi mu rugendo rw'idini baravuga ingene ''batwawe n'umukuba w'abantu, abandi nabo batererwa mu kirere". Nibura abantu 44 bapfuye abandi benshi barakomereka mu rugendo rwo guhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Lag B'Omer ku mucamo w'umusozi Meron. Igiporisi cabwiye ikinyamakuru Haaretz ko uwo musunikano wabaye kubera  bamwe mu bari muri urwo rugendo  banyereye ku ngazi, bituma abandi batemba. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari bitavye urwo rugendo rweranda. Umugabo yatanze izina ryiwe nka David yavuze ko yari yinjiye kuraba ingene batsa igicaniro/icoto bunonyene haza ''umupfunda uvuye hanze". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ynet ati: ''Batumijuye. Abantu banuzwe mu kirere - abandi  barahonyorwa'' ''Hari umwana yagumye yumiye ku kuguru kwanje, agwanira ubuzima. Twarindiriye gutabarwa iminota 15-20 muri uwo musunikano uteye ubwoba". Umwe mu barokotse yajanywe mu bitaro yabwiye television ya reta  Kan ati "Nta n'umwe yari azi ico ari bukore". "Intango n'ukubera abantu benshi cane. Hejuru yanje hari abantu benshi. Nanje nari ndamye hejuru y'uwundi atari agishobora guhema. Hari amaborogo, urudubi. Nabonye abana bari munsi yanje. Icanciye mu mutwe gusa kwari uko umwana wanje atoba impfuvyi". Uwundi yari ahari yavuze ko abantu bazungazunga iburyo n'ibubamfu. ''Inyuma y'iminota 20 nibaza ko abantu bari batanguye kutabasha guhumeka neza gutyo barondera gusohoka, ariko nta n'umwe yashoboye gusohoka. Munsi yanje hari abanrtu batari bagihema. Hari amaborogo menshi y'abavuga ngo "birasanse ko mpema". Uwundi yari ahari, Shlomo Katz,  yavuze ko yari arindiriye abagenzi biwe aca abona abaforoma biruka kandi bongera bagerageza  guhembura abana. Ati: "Ambulance zaguma zinjira zongera zisohoka". Dov Maisel, akora mu rwego rw'abatabara vyihuta rwa United Hatzalah Emergency Services yavuze ko abantu bari ''barundanyeko nk'ipaki y'ikarata''. Avuga ko abakora mu nzego zo gutabara nabo vyabaye ngombwa ko bahabwa inama zo kudahahamuka. Dov Maisel yagize ati: "Abantu benshi bakomeretse., abandi bapfuye ngaha. Abakorerabushake mubona ngaho bakoranijwe bakorerwa inama yo kubafasha kudahahamuka, - kuko babonye ibintu bigoye" Umwe mu bari bahari  yafashije abakomeretse yabwiye Haaretz ati: "Nari nicicaye ngira mfungure nca numva amaborogo. Twaciye twiruka gufasha hanyuma tubona imivyimba. Ubwa mbere bari nka 10, none ubu ni benshi".

column2: Rwanda: Abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi basaba leta guhagarika ingingo y'ugukata umushahara w'abakozi
column3: Amashyaka (imigambwe) abiri atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda, ariyamiriza ingingo ya leta y'ico gihugu yo gukata umushahara w'abakozi, ibice bingana na 0.5% buri kwezi aja mu kigega c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi muri ico gihugu kizwi nka RSSB. Victoire Ingabire, umukuru w'umugambwe DALFA-Umurinzi,  hamwe na Bernard  Ntaganda w'umugambwe PS-Imberakuri, bakorera mu Rwanda, bagiriza umugambwe FPR uri ku butegetsi mu Rwanda ko ugomba kunyaga abakozi ku nyungu zawo. Leta yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gushigikira umusanzu w'ubwisungane mu kwivuza, ikanavuga ko yafashwe habanje kuba ibiganiro bitandukanye. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC Gahuzamiryango, Victoire Ingabire avuga ko iyo ngingo ya leta yafashwe hahonyanzwe ibwirizwashingiro ry'ico gihugu hamwe n'itegeko rigenga akazi "kuko umushahara w'umuntu ni umutungo wiwe bwite, ni ntavogerwa, ntabwo umuntu apfa kuwufataho uko yishakiye". Yagiriza ikigega  RSSB c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi ko cabaye igikoresho c'umugambwe FPR/RPF uri ku butegetsi. Ati: "Kiriya kigo gishirwamwo amafaranga y'ubwishingizi n'ayo gutegekaniriza abakozi RSSB, ni ikigo cabaye nk'inka y'imvyeyi ririya shyaka rivomamo". Umupfasoni Ingabire avuga ko atarwanya uwo mugambi wa leta wo kwunganira umusanzu w'ukwivuza, akabona ko ahubwo leta  ikwiye kuronderera mu bindi bisata maze amafaranga agashobora kuboneka. Avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari ingene ayo mafaranga yegeranywa akoreshwa, akabona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: "Ntabwo ari ikibazo c'ibura ry'amafaranga, ikibazo ni uburyo amafaranga yo mu bwisungane bwo kwivuza acungwa. Imbere y'uko baja kurondera amafaranga ni babanze bacunge neza n'ayahari". "Iyaba ayahari bayacunga neza, ntabwo uyu munsi baba bariko baja gusonga abakozi bababwira ngo barabakata amafaranga". Leta y'u Rwanda yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe ku nyungu z'umunyagihugu muri rusangi. Gaspard Musonera,  umunyamabanga uhoraho (ntayegayezwa mu Kirundi) mu bushikiranganji bw'abakozi n'akazi mu Rwanda, avuga ko amafaranga asanzwe atangwa n'umukozi hamwe n'ayo umukoresha amutangira ari ayo kwivuza be n'umuryango wiwe gusa. Avuga ko hakenewe ubundi buryo kugira ngo abanyagihugu bandi nabo bashobore kuvurwa, ari co ayo mafaranga bazokatwa azokora. Ati: "Ayo 0.5 % ku mushahara wabo bwite batahana ku kwezi ni inkunga yabo ku kigega c'ubwishingizi mu kwivuza kuko ayo abaturage basanzwe batanga ni make cane ugereranije n'ayakenewe kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza mu buryo bukwiriye". "Rero ni ngombwa ko hashakwa izindi nzira zo kwunganira ico kikega kugira ngo abaturage bashobore guhabwa serivisi z'ubuzima zikwiriye, inzego z'ubuzima nazo zishobore kugira ubushobozi bwo kubafasha neza". Avuga ko ibivugwa n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi y'uko ikigo RSSB gikora gihomba kandi ko iyo ntererano isanzwe ikoreshwa nabi, bidafise ishingiro "kuko nta bindi bari kuvuga". Ati: "Ikigo c'ubwisungane RSSB nta kibazo gifise, aho ikibazo kiri, ni uko abaturage basabwa amafaranga makeya ugereranyije n'ayo bategerezwa gutanga kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza". Bwana Musonera avuga ko imbere y'uko iyo ngingo ifatwa habaye ibiganiro bitandukanye vyari bifise intumbero yo kurondera inzira zo kwegeranya ubwo buryo harimwo n'abakozi, akabonako ata mpamvu y'uko yojamwo impari. Ati: "Ivyo ari vyo vyose jewe ico numva abantu bashira imbere ni ukumva akamaro bifitiye buri Munyarwanda wese ndetse n'uyo mukozi". Ku wa 26 z'ukwezi guheze, ni ho umushikiranganji w'abakozi ba leta n'umurimo mu Rwanda yasohora itangazo risaba abakoresha bo mu nzego za leta n'abikorera utwabo gukata 0.5% ku mushahara wa buri kwezi ku bakozi babo  maze bakawushikiriza ikigo c'Ubwisungane mu Rwanda (RSSB). Ni ingingo ishingiye kw'itegeko ry'umushikiranganji wa mbere c'ico gihugu ryo ku wa 13 z'ukwa mbere uno mwaka nyene, ryerekeye ubwisungane mu kwivuza, rikanerekana inzira zitandukanye uburyo bushobora kuvamwo.

column2: Africa-Urudandazwa ku buryo bwa none: Abagore bahevye iduka bakaja kuri terefone zigezweho
column3: BBC yibanze ku bagore batatu b'abanya-Afrika - uwahora afise iduka, umwigisha n'umushoferi wa taxi - bongereje amafaranga binjiza kuva batanguye gukora urundadazwa ku buryo bwa terefone zigezweho (smartphones na digital platforms). Ikiza ca coronavirus catumye benshi basubira kwiyumvira ingene boronka ikibabeshaho. Ikigo cigenga gikora ubushakashatsi  Caribou Digital catoye ko abagore muri Kenya, Nigeria na Ghana bariko baravyaza umusaruro uburyo bwo gukora urudandazwa uciye ku buhinga bwa none bwo gutumatumanako (smartphones na digital platforms) kuko bwo bworoshe gushikira  no gukora ibitandukanye -gutyo bagashobora kwinjiza amafaranga kandi bakabandanya n'amabanga yo kwitaho abana babo. Madame Tarit  (mubona kw'ifoto aho hejuru) ntiyibaza ko yoshoboye  kugwiza na kabiri amafaranga yinjiza mu kiringo c'amezi icenda. Ikiza ca Covid cari catumye yugara iduka ryiwe ry'impuzu z'abana muri Eldoret mu burengero bwa Kenya, none gukotesha ibibanza aciye ku bigo bikorera kuri internet nka Airbnb bisa n'ibiriko birazibira igihengeri cari catewe no kwugara urudandazwa rwiwe. Ariko, Madame Tarit w'imyaka 29, ari mu bandi bagore benshi bariko baratera imbere mu gukoresha imbuga nka Facebook, Whatsapp, Instagram na apps z'ama taxi nka Uber na Bolt. Yatanguye urundadazwa rwiwe n'ikibanza kimwe haraheze amezi icenda none ubu afise indwi -ubu akaba akotesha ku gihe kirekire hanyuma nawe agapangisha aciye kuri Airbnb. "Ubu ninjiza amafaranga menshi kurusha ayo nakura mu rudandazwa imbere y'ikiza [ca Covid]," niko yabwiye BBC Daily. Abakoresha urwo rudandazwa ahanini n'abakerarugendo babikisha aho bazorara hamwe n'abagwizatunga bashima kurara muri  Airbnb aho kurara mw'ihoteri. "Mu gihe ca Covid benshi mu  bagenzi banje baratakaje ubuzi baca batangura gukorera ku materefone kugira binjize amafaranga. Ubu bagurisha ivyo kurya baciye kuri internet hanyuma bagakora nk'abashoferi bo kubishira abakiriya", nk'uko Madame  Tarit avuga. Umunsi usanzwe kuri Madame  Adzogble w'imyaka 32, utangurwa no gushira ubutumwa bwo kwamamaza ivyo acuruza kuri Whatsapp no kuri Facebook yibereye i muhira i Acra, umurwa mukuru wa Ghana. Ari mu bariko baravyaza umusaruro zimwe mu mpinduka zikomeye cane mu butunzi muri Afrika -ukwiyongera kw'ibibanza vyo gukoreramwo ubucuruzi kw'isoko ryo kuri internet. Agurisha amaterefone ngendanwa, ivyuma vyo kuzana akayaga mu nzu hamwe n'ama-television, ivyo vyose akavyamamaza aciye ku migwi yashinze kuri Whatsapp na Facebook, hamwe no mu yo asanzwemwo, nk'uwo ahuriramwo n'abo basenga hamwe. Madame Adzogble  yahevye akazi ko kwigisha igifaransa kugira aronke umwanya ukwiye wo gukora urudandazwa rwiwe kuri internet. "Bivamwo amafaranga menshi kurusha kwigisha. Ndashobora kugurisha ikintu kimwe nkinjiza ayaruta ayo mara ukwezi nkorera mu kwigisha. Mfise abana. Nkeneye guha abana banje indero nziza ishoboka,  akaba aribo bampa umwete wo kurondera kwigenga mu bijanye n'amafaranga", niko avuga. Ku bwa Madame Adzogble, kwubaka imigenderanire myiza n'abakiriya n'ikintu nyamukuru ushaka guca amafaranga uciye kuri internet. "Aho baraheza bakakugurira hanyuma bakakuvuga neza." Madame Lawal, w'imyaka 34, akorera  ibigo vy'amataxi uhamagara uciye ku buhinga bwa none Uber na Bolt mu gisagara ca mbere kinini muri Nigeria, Lagos. Ariko, ntibimworohera - uyo mugore areze abana bane wenyene avuga ko hari abagabo banka gutwarwa n'umugore. Lawa avuga ati: "Igihe natangura gutwara taxi muri Lagos, abagabo bose baca bafuta urugendo maze gushika kubajana." "Lagos haragoye , bisaba kuba ukomeye cane kugira ushobore  gutwara imodoka mu gisagara. Abagabo bibaza ko izo nguvu atazo mfise, mbanza kubajijura kugira bemere kwinjira mu modoka." Icigwa ca  Caribou Digital cerekana kandi ko abagore benshi barondera ikibabeshaho baciye ku buhinga bwa digital bafise impungene ku mutekano wabo. Umukuru w'abakoze ubwo bushakashatsi Grace Natabaalo yabwiye BBC ati: "Abagore benshi twavuganye bavuze ko baburagijwe bishingiye ku gitsina iyo bitavye ababa  bafatishije ingendo." Ati: "Mu gihe reta ihimiriza abagore bakiri bato gufata bene aka kazi bakeneye no kumenya urundi ruhande rwako - ko hari ingeramizi kandi zitegerezwa gufatwa nk'ikibazo gikomeye n'inzego z'igiporisi na reta." Ariko Lawal avuga ko ivyiza birimwo biruta cane ibibi. Ati: "Ni vyiza cane kuba ushobora kwironkera ikikubeshaho ariko kandi nshaka no kugira ico ntereye mu butunzi muri rusangi mu gutanga amakori (imisoro). Nsaka ko ubwanje ntera imbere, na Nigeria igatera imbere."

column2: Ubukritsu - Isilamu: hoba hari isano hagati ya Isilamu hamwe na Yezu/Yesu na Maria
column3: Mu bihugu birwiriyemwo Abakristu, muri kino gihe ikintu kivugwa ni Noweri/Noheli, mu ndimi mvamahanga naho ni Noel canke Christmas. Biragoye kwibaza ko hoba hari ibihugu uyu munsi mukuru utazwi na gato, bobo usanga ari umunsi usanzwe nk'iyindi. Igituma nyamukuru ni uko uyu munsi ari umunsi wo kwibuka ivuka rya Yezu, umunsi wubahwa cane rwose mu mashengero y'abakristu. Mu bihugu uyu munsi mukuru wa Noweri utazwi, canke udahimbazwa harimwo ibihugu bigendera kw'idini rya Isilamu, Nk'akarorero muri Turukiya, iri genekerezo rya 25 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri ni umunsi usanzwe ku kirangamisi cayo. Uyu munsi mukuru ntawuriho ku birangamisi ry'abayahudi, Abahindi canke vy''Abasilamu. Mu bihugu vy'Abasilamu, uyu munsi mukuru usa n'iminsi mikuru ya Eid, ariho Abasilamu baja hamwe, bagatumirara, bagateka, bakagenderanira, bagatanga ishikanwa, bakambara bakaberwa bakaja gusenga mu misigiti. Nimba ushaka gutahura itandukanirizo riri hagati y'aya madini, ntuze wigere wipfuriza Umusilamu Noweri nziza. Ariko rero, si ukuvuga ko Yezu/Yesu atazwi mw'idini rya Isilamu. Yezu/Yesu canke Jesus, uba uvuze Issa? Ibi rero biratangaza abantu benshi batabizi. Abasilamu ntibahimbaza ivuka rya Yezu, ariko barakurikiza inyigisho ziwe. Abasilamu barubaha cane uyu bita intumwa y'Imana kandi afise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu kwemera kwabo. Igitabo c'Ikorowani gifata Yezu nk'umwe mu ntumwa z'Imana zubahwa cane zaboneye izuba Intumwa Muhammad (S.A.W.- Sallā Allāhu ʿalayhi Wa-sallam). Yezu mu rurimi rw'icarabu ni ukuvuga Issa, kandi aravugwa incuro nyinshi cane mw'Ikorowani, mbere aravugwa cane gusumba na Muhammad muri iki gitabo ceranda. Si ivyo gusa, harimwo n'umugore umwe rudende izina ryiwe rivugwa mw'ico gitabu ceranda c'idini rya Isilamu. Maria canke Mariam, Ikorowani imusigura gute? Uyo mugore ni Bikira Maria, mu rurimi rw'icarabu akaba azwi kw'izina rya Mariam/Maryam. Mw'Ikorowani, hari igice cose kimuvuga, kigasigura ingene yavyaye umwana kandi yari asanzwe ari isugi. Gusa iyo iriko irasigura ivy'ivuka rya Yezu, Isilamu ntiyigera ivuga ivya Yozefu, canke ba ba majusi baza bavuye mu buseruko, canke ngo bavuge ingene yaryamitswe mu bwato bw'inka. Maria yibarutse ari wenyene mu bugaragwa, ari musi y'igiti c'umunazi cumye. Aho nyene haciye haba igitangaro, inazi zihiye neza zaciye zitangura gukoroka ziva kuri ico giti cumye maze ziba imfungurwa yiwe. Hanyuma kandi, mu maguru yiwe haciye havuka umugezi w'amazi meza cane maze aba inyobwa yiwe. Umukobwa atararongorwa iyo avyaye bitera ibibazo vyinshi cane ku bijanye n'indero yiwe. Ariko uyo mwana  - Yezu/Issa - amaze kuvuka, yaciye atangura kuvuga nk'intumwa y'imana. Iki gitangaro nico gikura iceyi nyina wiwe. Iyo Abasilamu bavuga Yezu, bategerezwa gushirako Alayhi Salaam- Imigisha y'Imana ibane na we, nk'uko babivuga ku Ntumwa Muhammad n'abandi bahanuzi. Hanyuma kandi, ni nde arindiriwe ku munsi w'iherezo ku munsi w'urubanza no kugarura amahoro kw'isi, kubw'idini rya Isilamu? Ni Yezu, aho azogarukira ubugira kabiri, kandi uku kuninahazwa kwiwe kuri no mu bindi bitabo vya Isilamu, si mw'Ikorowani gusa. Umuhinga w'Umusufi, Al-Ghazali, amusobanura "nk'Intumwa ityorora imitima y'abantu". Ibn Arabi aramwandikako aho avuga ko ari "ikimenyetso c'ubweranda". Mu gihugu vyose birimwo Abasilamu, hari abahungu bahabwa izina rya Issa (Yezu), abakobwa nabo bagahabwa amazina ya Maryam (Maria). Aha urashobora kwibaza nk'umuntu ava mu muryango w'abakristu yokwita umwana wiwe Muhammad ingene vyomugendera? Idini rya Isilamu rirazi neza Yezu, kubera igihe rivuka, mu kinjana c'indwi, idini ry'Ubukristu ryari rishinze imizi mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo Hagati. Muhammad nta hantu na hamwe avugwa muri Bibiriya. N'aho idini rya Isilamu riha icubahiro Yezu, si ukuvuga ko mu binjana vyakurikiye iri dini rya Gikristu naryo ryabasubirije mu ndumane. Ahubwo, mu gicapo kinini co mu kinjana ca 15 kiri mw'isengero nkuru ya San Petronio mu gisagara ca Bologne mu Butariyano, uyu muhanuzi mukuru wa Isilamu yerekanwa ari mu muriro udahera, ariko arababazwa n'amashetani. Harabaye ibishushanyo vyinhi vyerekana nabi cane Intumwa Muhammad. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umutariyano Giovani da Modena yarashingiye cane ku munyavyese azwi cane Dante Alighieri, yashize Muhammad ku muzingi w'icenda w'ikuzimu mu gitabo ciwe c'ivyese citwa Divine Comedy. Iki gitabo carakoreshejwe cane n'abanyatugenegene n'abahinyanyuzi benshi ba Bulaya gushika mu kinjana ca 18 mu gushushanya Intumwa Muhammad bamwerekana ariko arahanwa mu muriro udahera. Kimwe muri ivyo bishushanyo, ni ica William Blake, umunyatugenegene akomeye cane w'umwongereza mu masanamu n'inzandiko ziwe. Mw'isengero imwe yo mu Bubirigi, hari ibishushanyo vyo mu kinjana ca 17 vyerekana iyi ntumwa ya Isilamu aryamitswe hasi ariko ahonyangwa n'abamarayika. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka mu nyuma ku bijanye n'ingene idini rya Gikristu rifata Intumwa muhammad. Ariko gusa gushika muri kino gihe, haracari icuka kibi. Mu mwaka wa 2002, imirwi y'intagondwa ya Isilamu yaragirijwe ko yashatse kubomora ico gishushanyo co mw'isengero ya Bologne. Kuva ico gihe, harabaye ibitero vyinshi vyahitanye abantu, ibitero vyakozwe kw'izina ry'idini rya Isilamu mu bihugu bitari bike vya Buraya n'ibirwiriyemwo Abasilamu. Ibi bitero vyatumye icuka kibi hagati y'ama madini abiri kibandanya ciyongera. Hari ababona ko kumenya isano riri hagati ya Yezu n'idini rya Isilamu, hamwe n'ikibanza afise muri iri dini, bishobora gufasha Abakristu n'Abasilamu kunywana. Babona ko kwibanda ku vyo basangiye hakwibanda ku bibatandukanya bishobora gufasha gukuraho iki cuka kibi kihari.

column2: Kenya -Covid: Abasanze ubuzima bubaye bwiza aho bahungiye igisagara
column3: Iyo coronavirus idatera,  bishoboka cane ko Jack Onyango aba akiba wenyene, akora ku murwa mukuru wa Kenya hanyuma arungikira amafaranga umugore n'abana biwe iyo baba  kw'itongo kure cane. Nk'abandi banya-Kenya benshi, yagiye Nairobi akiri muto, azi ko ariho hari amahirwe menshi yo kuronka ikikubeshaho kurusha ahandi hose mu gihugu. Ariko ubuzima mu gisagara ntibwamworoheye. Onyango yashobora gufata urugendo rwo kuja kuraba umuryango mu ntara ya Kisumu mu burengero bw'igihugu rimwe ryonyene mu mwaka.
