Yagenda igihe ca  Noeli, urugendo rwa bisi akaruriha  2.000 vy'amashiringi ya Kenya (hafi 40.000 vy'amarundi)   - aho kandi bakitega ko agenda  agemuye vyinshi, birimwo nk'isukari. Aho coronavirus itereye mu 2020, abategetsi baciye bashiraho ingingo zikaze  zo kutava i muhira. Co kimwe n'abandi benshi, Onyango aca asanga ata kazi agifise. Mu gihe ama reta mu bindi bihugu yahemba igice c'imishasha abantu baba batakaje ubuzi kubera ikiza, muri Kenya iyo mfashanyo ntiyigeze ibaho. Avuga ati:  "Ntaho nashobora kuvana amafaranga yo kuriha inzu n'ayo gutunga umuryango." Amaze kubona ko atagishoboye kuba mu gisagara, yaciye afata ingingo yo gusubira ku gatumba iwabo mu kwezi kw'indwi uwo mwaka. Onyango avuga ati: "Nari mfise ubwoba ariko narahitishijemwo. "I muhira nta mafaranga yo kuriha inzu, nta matara n'amazi bariha, bitandukanye na Nairobi aho vyose bisaba amafaranga." Yaciye atangura kurima itomati hamwe n'imboga kw'itongo risumba gato inusu y'ihegitari (0,6ha) ryahora ari irya sekuru. Ivyo yejeje akabigurisha ku babanyi n'abacuruza, nabo bakaja kubidandaza kw'isoko. Yambwiye ko ivyashitse atari yavyiteguriye vyahavuye bimuviramwo vyiza. "Amafaranga nkura mu vyo ndiko ndakora aruta kure ayo naronka mu kazi nakora i Nairobi. "Umukobwa wanje mukuru afise imyaka 16. Nahora ndababona rimwe gusa mu mwaka. Ubiravye, corona kuri jewe yabaye umuhezagiro." Kw'itongo yabaye inzira yo kubaho. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rifasha mw'iterambere World Neighbours rivuga ko ivyo Onyango ariko aracamwo  biriko birashikira abandi benshi mu muhindo wo gusubira iyo bavuye bitewe n'ikiza ca  Covid. Chris Macoloo, umuyobozi w'iryo shirahamwe ku mugabane wa Afrika avuga ati: "Covid-19 twese yaduteye giturumbuka. "Abantu benshi baciye bakurwa mu kazi, kubera  baba babayeho ku munsi ku munsi, ntibashobora kuronka ivyo barya, ntibashobora kuriha inzu kandi ntibaronke amafaranga barungikira imiryango yabo. Bamwe muri bo rero baciye bava mu bisagara basubira ku gatumba (mu cyaro)  iyo bari baje bava." Avuga ko ku gatumba  kuri benshi haciye habaha inzira yo kubaho. "Muri Afrika tubaho dutambikije. Dufise ukuguru kumwe mu gisagara, ukundi nako ku gatumba. Ivyo vyarafashije kuko iyo twaba tutahafise , bari kuba bahuye n'ibibazo bikomeye." Hafi  ubuzi 750.000 bwarugawe muri Kenya mu 2020, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'urwego rw'igihugu rujejwe gutororokanya ibiharuro (National Bureau of Statistics). Icegerenyo ca vuba c'urwo rwego kivuga ko ibisata bitandukanye vy'ubutunzi vyashegeshwe cane n'ingingo za Covid zo kutava muhira, ku buryo akazi ka minsi yose,  uretse ako kurima no kworora ku rugero rubayabaye, kagabanutse ku rugero rwa 4,1%, ni ukuvuga ubuzi burenga miriyoni 17. Mu bihe vya   mbere vyo kutava i muhira, reta ya Kenya  yarabujije uruja n'uruza hagati y'ibisagara binini bimwe bimwe,  bica bitera impungenge zo kuronka ivyo kurya ku turere tutimbura vyinshi. Vyaciye bituma bamwe mu bari bavuye mu bisagara bagasubira ku gatumba nabo baca bijukira kurima imboga. Geoffrey Barasa n'uwundi munya-Kenya yahevye ubuzima bwo mu gisagara. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 40 yahora abeshejejweho n'ubuzi bubiri i Nairobi. Yakora ubuzi bw'ibiraka muri karitye y'amahinguriro yo muri ico gisagara, akongera agakora urudanzwa rutoya rw'inyama z'inkoko yarangura kw'isoko akaza kuzironderako inyungu mu ka butike gato kiwe. Yari yaje mu gisagara agiheza ishure   avuga ati "gukora mu gisagara ico gihe cari ikintu co kwishimira." Barasa yarashinze urugo akaba yaba Nairobi n'umugore n'abana bane. Ariko aho hatangirijwe abantu ba mbere bafashwe na corona muri Kenya, ibintu vyose vyaciye bigenda nabi. Nta kazi yasubiye kuronka, butike yiwe y'inkoko nayo aca arugara. Barasa avuga ati: Muri ico gihe, nta ruja n'uruza rw'abantu rwariho, nta bakiriya bakwiye naheza ngo ndonke. Nta kundi nari mfise nogira atari ukwugara iyo butike nkagaruka ku gatumba." "Ico gihe cari kigoye cane." Mu kwezi kw'icenda yafashe ingingo yo kujana umuryango wiwe kw'itongo iyo avuka mu ntara ya Busia, hafi y'ikiyaga Victoria. Yaciye atangura kurima imyungu, uburo, itomati n'amashu, ivyo yejeje agaca agurisha ku babanyi. Ubu asigaye yorora kandi ingurube n'inkoko. "Ubwa mbere nari mfise ubwoba bw'ingene nzoba mu buzima bwa ruguru, ariko ubu merewe neza. Mbayeho neza kuruta igihe nari Nairobi. Ndanezerewe cane no kuba naragarutse ku gatumba iwacu." Barasa avuga ko yohanura abandi basubiye ku gatumba muri iki gihe c'ikiza kugumayo burundu. "Sinobahanura gusubira mu gisagara." Nta kibura uruhande rwiza Ku bwa Macoloo, ikiza ca coronavirus gitumye buba ubwa kabiri muri iyi myaka ya vuba abanya-Kenya bafata akanya ko gusubira kwibaza neza ivyo "kwishiramwo ko ibintu vyera de mu gisagara". "Mu gihe c'intureka y'inyuma y'amatora mu 2007-08, abantu benshi barasubiye ruguru kugira barabe ko boronka ingene babaho. Avuga ati: "Ariko ibibazo vy'amatora vyaranyarutse gutorerwa inyishu gusumba kandi  imirimo y'ubutunzi ntiyahagaze co kimwe n'ubu." "Umutekano umaze kugaruka, ntibatevye gusubira kwivyukiranya." Yongerako ati : "Nta n'umwe yokwiteze ko hari ivyiza vyovuye ku kiza ca coronavirus." "Ntawari avyiteze, vyarashitse uko, kandi nibaza ko bitoducika. Bavuga ko burya igicu cose naho cirabura kitabuze aho gisa n'umwakaka. "

column2: Afghanistan: Igituma aba Taliban bariko barafata igihugu ku muvuduko udasanzwe
column3: Umuvuduko aba Taliban bariko mu kwifatira uturere muri Afghanistan uratangaza abantu batari bake - mu gihe imigwa mikuru y'intara igenda yigarurirwa nk'uwinjira mu nzu iwe. Abarwanyi baboneka ko bafise inguvu, mu gihe reta ya Afghanistan igerageza kwita ku rutare ngo igumane ubutegetsi. Muri ino ndwi. inkuru yavuye mu gisata kijejwe igendereza ca Amerika yerekana ko umugwa mukuru Kabul ushobora guterwa mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere, nayo reta yoyo igashobora gusenyuka mu misi itarenga 90. None ni ukubera iki ibintu binyarutse ukuraho? Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ibihugu bigenzi vyayo vyo mw'ishirahamwe OTAN/NATO - harimwo n'Ubwongereza - vyari bimaze imyaka 20 yose vyigisha ingabo za Afghanistan, vyongera biziha ibikoresho. Abajenerali batari bake b'abanyamerika n'abongereza bahora bivugira ko bashinze igisirikare ca Afghanistan gikomeye kandi gishoboye. Ibi bikaba muri kino gihe bisa n'uko yari amajambo gusa. Reta ya Afghanistan mu bisanzwe yategerezwa kuba ari yo ifise ibintu mu minwe uravye ibitigiri binini vy'ingabo ifise. Uravye ku mpapuro, inzego zijejwe umutekano za Afghanistan zigera ku  300.000. Aha harimwo igisirikare ca Afghanistan, ingabo zirwanira mu kirere hamwe n'igiporisi. Ariko mu vy'ukuri, igihugu camye gifise ingorane zo gushika ku ntego zaco mu bijanye no  kwinjiza abasirikare. Igisirikare ca Afghanistan  gifise kahise kabi karanzwe n'abapfa ku bwinshi, abahunga urugamba n'ibiturire - aho hari intwazangabo zimwe zimwe zidaterwa isoni no gusaba imishahara y'abasirikare batahari. - bazwi nka "soldats fantômes/ghost soldiers". Mu cegeranyo aherutse gushikiriza inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka ya Amerika, uwujejwe gukurikirana ibikorwa vyo gusanura Afghanistan (Special Inspector General for Afghanistan, SIGAR) yarerekanye "amakenga akomeye ku ngaruka mbi cane z'igiturire...hamwe n'igitigiri kidatomoye c'ingabo nyezina". Jack Watling wo mu kigo Royal United Services Institute (RUSI), avuga ko igisirikare ca Afghanistan kitigeze kimenya igitigiri nyezina c'abasirikare gifise. Hambavu y'ibi, avuga ko hamye hari ingorane yo kubungabunga ibikoresho na morale. Akenshi abasirikare bakunze kurungikwa mu turere basanzwe badakomokamwo batanafisemwo imiryango n'incuti. Iki kiboneka nka kimwe mu bishobora kuba bituma bihuta guta ibirindiro vyabo batanarwanye. Biranagoye no kumenya inguvu z'aba Taliban. Igisata ca Amerika kijejwe kurwanya iterabwoba, US Combating Terrorism Center, kiri kw'ishure rya gisirikare rya West Point, kivuga ko aba barwanyi boba bangana na 60.000. Hiyongereyeko n'iyindi mirwi y'abarwanyi n'ababashigikiye, iki gitigiri gishobora kuba kirenga 200.000. Ariko Dr Mike Martin yahoze ari intwazangabo y'umwongereza avuga ururimi rw'igi Pashto akaba yarakurikiranye intambara yo mu ntara ya Helmand akanavyandika no mu gitabo ciwe yise An Intimate War, aragabisha abafata aba Taliban nk'umurwi umwe rudende. Ahubwo avuga ko "aba Taliban ari nk'ihuriro ry'imirwi itandukanye yigenga - kandi igira ivyo ihurirako mu gihe kanaka". Avuga ko na reta ya Afghanistan nayo nyene ifise ingorane z'imirwi irondera inyungu zayo. Akahise kagenda gahindagurika karerekana ingene imiryango, imirwi y'amoko mbere n'abategetsi ba reta bagiye baba mahindagu - akenshi barondera ko boba baramaze na kabiri. Hanyuma kandi, reta ya Afghanistan yategerezwa kuba ifise akarusho gasumbirije mu bijanye n'amafaranga hamwe n'ibirwanisho. Yararonse amamiriyaridi n'amamiriyaridi y'amadorari yo kuriha imishahara y'abasirikare no kugura ibikoresho - ahanini bahabwa na Amerika. Mu cegeranyo cayo co mu kw'indwi 2021, SIGAR  ivuga ko imiriyaridi zirenga 88 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika zakoreshejwe mu bijanye n'umutekano wa Afghanistan. Ariko mu buryo buteye impungenge congera ko kiti: "Ivyo kumenya nimba ayo mafaranga yakoreshwa neza bizovana n'ingene bavyifashemwo ku rugamba". Igisirikare ca Afghanistan kirwanira mu kirere categerezwa kuvyifatamwo neza ku rugamba. Ariko camye mu ngorane zo kubungabunga no kugendesha izi ndege zingana na 211 (ikibazo kigenda gikomera mu gihe aba Taliban batera n'ibigirankana abadereva bazo). Nta n'ubwo gishobora no kuronsa ivyankenerwa intwazangabo ziri ku rubuga rw'intambara. Ari co gituma vyabaye ngombwa ko igisirikare ca Amerika kirwanira mu kirere kiza gufasha mu bisagara nka Lashkar Gah catewe n'abarwanyi b'aba Taliban. Aba  Taliban bakunze kuronka amahera bakura mu rucuruzwa rw'ibiyayuramutwe, ariko kandi bararonka n'izindi mfashanyo ziva hanze - ahanini muri Pakistan. Ubuheruka, aba Taliban barafashe ibirwanisho n'ibindi bikoresho bavyatse  ingabo za Afghanistan - bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivyatanzwe na Amerika - harimwo n'ibimodoka Humvees vya burende (blindés), ibikoresho bifasha kubona mw'ijoro, inkoho zikomakomeye hamwe na vya muzinga. Afghanistan yari isanzwe yuzuye ibirwanisho inyuma y'intambara yayihuje n'icahoze ari Repubulika Zunze Ubumwe y'aba Soviet (URSS), kandi aba Taliban barerekanye ko bashobora gutsinda igisirikare gikomeye cane n'aho boba bakoresha ibirwanisho bishaje. Iyumvire ingene inganda zatikiye mu ngabo za Amerika n'iz'Ubwongereza bakoresheje ya mabombe ategwa mu kuzimu ( Improvised Explosive Device, IED). Iki, gifatanye n'ingene bazi akarere, caratumye bavyifatamwo neza. N'aho aba Taliban bamye baboneka ko batari hamwe, biraboneka ko muri izi ntambara bafise integuro itomoye. Ben Barry yahoze ari intwazangabo mu gisirikare c'Ubwongereza avuga ko aba Taliban bashobora kuba bashika ku vyo bashikako giturumbuka, ariko akongerako ati: "Mu gihe wogira uti utegure ibijanye n'isekeza, vyogorana cane kuronka ikintu ciza kirenze kuri ibi". Yerekana ingene ibitero vy'aba Taliban vyibanze mu buraruko no mu burengero, hakwihutira intara zahoze ari ibirindiro vyabo vyo mu bumanuko, aho bagenda bigarurira imigwa mikuru y'intara imwe ku yindi. Aba Taliban barigaruriye imihora mikuru mikuru ijana mu bihugu vyo hanze, ibi bigatuma banyuruza amafaranga menshi ava mu makori yari kwegeranywa na reta isanzwe iri mu bukene bw'amafaranga. Barongereje akariro kandi mu kwica abategetsi bakuru bakuru, abaharanira agateka ka muntu n'abanyamakuru. Bukebuke bagenda bafuta bimwe mu vyashitsweko muri ino myaka 20 iheze. Nayo ku bijanye n'integuro ya reta - aha ntivyoroshe gusigura. Ivyo kwisubiza uturere twigaruriwe n'aba Taliban bigenda biba nk'umugani. Barry avuga ko bisa n'uko hari integuro yo gukingira ibisagara bikuru bikuru. Ariko kugeza ryari? Igitigiri c'ingabo zidasanzwe za Afghanistan ni gito cane, hafi 10.000 kandi zinyanyagijwe irya n'ino. Aba Taliban kandi baboneka ko bariko baratsinda intambara ya propagande n'iy'amajambo. Barry avuga ko inguvu zabo ku rugamba zatumye morale yabo iduga kandi bibatuma bumva ko bategerezwa gukorera hamwe. Ariko ku rundi ruhande ntibimeze uko, reta ya Afghanistan igenda isubira inyuma nk'ibirenge, baterana amajambo, birukana intwazangabo z'abajenerali. Ibintu bimeze nabi cane kuri reta ya Afghanistan. Ariko Jack Watling wa RUSI avuga ko n'aho atari heza na gato ku gisirikare ca Afghanistan, "poritike ishobora gusubiza ibintu mu buryo". Mu gihe reta yoshobora kwigarurira abarongoye amoko, abona ko reta ishobora kugira amahirwe yo kwihagararako. Ibi kandi niko Mike Martin abibona, akabona ko kubona uwahoze ari umukuru w'abarwanyi Abdul Rashid Dostum agaruka mu gisagara ca Mazar-i-Sharif kigira kane c'igihugu, ari ikintu gikomeye cane. Yanatanguye n'ibiganiro. Iyi ntambara yo mu ci mu misi irarangira mu gihe urushana ruzoba rutanguye muri Afghanistan - iki gihe kikaba kitorosha ibintu ku barwanyi. Biracashoboka ko Afghanistan ishika mu mpera z'umwaka icihagazeko, ikagumana Kabul n'ibisagara bikuru bikuru bimwe bimwe. Vyongeye, mu gihe aba Taliban boramuka bacanyemwo, ibintu bishobora kubahindukana bikaba nabi. Ariko ubu, bisa n'uko utwigoro twa Amerika na OTAN two kugarukana amahoro, umutekano n'ituze muri Afghanistan twabaye impfagusa, nk'uko vyagendeye aba Soviet imbere yabo.

column2: DRC: Van Damme atera akamo ba rurangiranwa gutemberera ico gihugu
column3: Umukinyi rurangiranwa wa filime w'Umubiligi Jean Claude va Damme, batazira 'Mitsi ya Bruxelles' avuga ko anejerejwe no kuba yahawe igitabo c'inzira ca Congo - avuga kandi ko afise intumbero yo guhamagarira abandi bantu bamenyekana cane gutemberera Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo. Ari i Kinshasa ku mugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu, igihe yariko arashikirizwa ico gitabo c'inzira n'akazi ko guserukira ico gihugu mu karanga, urwaruka n'ibidukikije, uwo mugabo w'imyaka 61 yagize ati: "Ngiye kugondoza abandi bantu rurangiranwa kw'isi nka Stallone, Schwarzenegger, Jacky Chan hamwe n'abandi benshi." "Hari kandi n'abaririmvyi nka Jennifer Lopez  hamwe n'abakinyi b'umupira nka Messi, Ronaldinho, Cristiano Ronaldo. Bategerezwa kuza muri iki gihugu kwerekana ko kigendwa, kwerekana ko Congo ishobora gukingira umutekano abantu bari muvyo kuremesha ibiro vyinjiza amahera (Showbiz). Igihugu ca RD Congo kimaze imyaka irenga 30 kiri mu ntambara, aho imigwi myinsi yitwaje ibigwanisho ibica bigacika mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu hagwiriye ubutare, aho yica, ifata ku nguvu ikanasahura. Uwo yigeze kuba rurangiranwa mu buhinga bwo kwivuna umwansi ata kigwanisho (arts martiaux), Van Damme yarakinye mu mafilime y'ingwano i Hollywood y'amafaranga menshi nka Cyborg, Kickboxer na Universal Soldier - ubu vuba na ho akaba aherutse gusubiramwo Master Croc mu mafilime ya Kung Fu Panda. Azwi nk'umuntu akaze cane. Yatangaje abantu mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru aho yavuga ko yavukiye muri RD Congo, avuga ko "avuka i Likasi", igisagara kiri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu. Aho hashobora hari mu mwaka ico gihugu ciganzura intwaro y'Ububiligi. Yanashimitse cane ku kamaro ko kuzana abashora imitahe mu gihugu ca RD Congo. "RD Congo ifise ubutare buciye imiriyaridi ibihumbi 36...akazi kanje n'ukurondera abazana imitahe, bazi neza ko ari ukubanza gutanga imbere yo kuronka, hanyuma no guha icizere prezida Felix Antoine Tshisekedi." Ariko benshi bibajije ikibazo kuri ico gitabo c'inzira gishasha c'uwo mukinyi wa Filime mu gihe ibwirizwa shingiro rya RD Congo  ribuza kugira ubwenegihugu bubiri.

column2: Trump yifatiye mu gahanga mugenziwe McConnell ko ari 'umunyaporitike atagira ubwenge'
column3: Donald Trump yahoze ari umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yatanguye urugamba rwo kurwanya mugenziwe w'umuRepubulika Mitch McConnell yahora arongoye nyarwinshi mu nama nkenguzamateka. Trump ati: "Mitch ni akaga muri poritike, w'umutima mubi kandi w'umujinya, kandi n'abakenguzamateka b'aba Repubulika bagumana nawe ntibazigera basubira kuronka itsinzi". Umukenguzamateka McConnell yamaze imyaka arongoye inama nkenguzamateka, yagiye ku ruhande rw'abeza Trump mu rubanza rwiwe rwo mu ndwi iheze. Ariko rero, mu nyuma yaciye amwihinduka mu kuvuga ko Trump ari we "nyanduruko" y'igitero co ku ngoro y'amakoraniro Capitol ya Amerika kubera "ibinyoma" vyiwe ko amatora yibwe. Mw'ijambo yigeze gushikiriza imbere y'inama nkenguzamateka, yavuze ko Trump yoshirwa imbere y'ubutungane "ku vyaha vyose yakoze igihe yari akiri ku butegetsi". Ejo ku wa kabiri, Trump yashikirije itangazo rirerire kuva avuye ku butegetsi haraciye ukwezi. Mw'iryo tangazo harimwo ngo "Umugambwe w'aba Repubulika nta cubahiro ushobora gusubira kuronka canke ngo ukomere mu gihe uzoba ukigendera ku 'bategetsi' bameze nk'umukenguzamateka Mitch McConnell ". Yavuze ko kuba Bwana McConnell "ata ntumbero ya poritike afise, ata bwenge, ubuhinga ndetse n'ubuntu afise" vyatumye aba Repubulika batakaza inama nkenguzamateka mu matora aheruka mu kw'icumi na rimwe. Trump avuga ko igihe uyu mutegetsi wo mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika yariko yitoreza ikibanza mu nama nkenguzamateka "yamutakambiye" ko yomushigikira, mbere akavuga ko iyo atamushigikira, McConnell atari gutorwa. Trump yifatiye mu gahanga McConnell inyuma y'aho yerekaniye ivyipfuzo vyiwe vyo kuzorwanya abantu bose bazorondera kwitoza bashigikiwe na Trump. Uyu yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu avuga ko azoshigikira abazoshaka kwitoza bafise intumbero isa na rwiwe yo "gusubira gukomeza Amerika na poritike yacu yo gushira Amerika imbere y'ibindi vyose". Trump ati: "McConnell ntazigera akora ibikenewe gukorwa, canke ngo ashire imbere ineza y'igihugu cacu". "Turazi ko poritike yacu ya 'Amerika imbere ya vyose' ari yo yatsinze, si poritike za McConnell na Biden zidusubiza inyuma". Mu kiringo cose c'ubutegetsi bwa Trump, aba bategetsi babiri bakomeye b'umugambwe w'aba Repubulika bari soma mbike. Ariko ibintu vyagiye guhinduka igihe Trump atsindiwe mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu. McConnell avuga ko atarigera avugisha Trump kuva hagati mu kw'icumi na kabiri. Ibintu vyagiye kwunyuka inyuma y'igitero ku ngoro ya Capitol ku wa 06 z'ukwa mbere, caguyemwo abantu batanu harimwo umuporisi. N'aho yari yaterewe icizere n'inama nshingamateka mu kwa mbere yagirizwa guteza iyi migumuko, Trump yarejejwe n'inama nkenguzamateka ku wa gatandatu uheze. Aba Repubulika indwi bonyene nibo bagiye ku ruhande rw'abo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira demokarasi (Democrats) kugira bakubite intahe mu gahanga Trump. McConnell hamwe n'abandi bakenguzamateka 42 batoye ko Trump yambikwa izera. Hari hakenewe bibiri vya bitatu kugira ngo uyu yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu akubitwe intahe mu gahanga. N'aho yagiye ku ruhande rw'abamwambika izera, yaramutyoje mu nama nkenguzamateka ayo matora aheze. Yavuze ati: "Nta gushidikanya na guto kuhari ko Perezida Trump ari we ntandaro y'ivyabaye kuri uwo musi". Ati: "Akarwi k'abagumutsi kateye Capitol kw'izina ryiwe. Izi nkozi z'ikibi zari zitwaje ivyapa vyiwe, bamanitse amabendera yiwe kandi baririmba ko ari we bagamburukira". Imigenderanire ntiyatosekaye hagati ya Trump na McConnell gusa mu kwezi guheze. Ejo ku wa kabbiri, umuhanuzi wa Trump yavuze ko Rudy Giuliani yahoze ari umukuru w'igisagara ca New york yahagaritse amabanga yiwe yo guserukira Trump imbere y'amategeko. Jason Miller yabwiye televiziyo CNN ati: "Giuliani ntagiserukira Perezida Trump imbere y'amategeko". Mu kwa mbere ibinyamakuru vya Amerika vyavuze ko Trump yagerageje guhagarika agashirukabute ka Giuliani mu kwerekana akababaro kiwe ko kubona yari asubiye kubogozwa ku ncuro ya kabiri. Ariko inyuma y'ico kiganiro na CNN, Miller yasobanuye kuri Twitter ko Giuliani aguma ari "incuti n'umugenzi". Avuga ko batagikorana ubu kubera "ata bibazo bikihari vyotuma Giuliani aserukira Perezida Trump".

column2: Ghana: Abashingamateka barwanye bapfa ikori ku mahera aca ku materefone ngendanwa
column3: Hadutse imishamirano mu nama nshingamateka ya Ghana mw'ijoro ryo kuwa mbere buca ari ku wa kabiri igihe abashingamateka bariko biga ikori ryotangwa ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa. Abashingamateka barateranye inkokora, barasunagurana, bahana amangumi, mu gihe abandi nabo bagerageza kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano yadutse igihe abashingamateka bo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi bahaguruka bakaja kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Joseph Osei Owusu ko ahaguruka ngo aje gutora, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Niwe yari arongoye ino nama yahavuye yunguruzwa kubera uru ruhagarara. Umugambwe National Democratic Congress (NDC) utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi uriyamiriza iri kori ringana na 1.75% ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa, harimwo no kuriha ibicuruzwa ukoresheje terefone ngendanwa. Uyu mugambwe uvuga ko iri kori rizohohotera abadafise amikoro manini hamwe n'abo bose bari hanze y'igisata c'amabanki. Ariko umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca reta Ken Ofori-Artta avuga ko ari ukwagura igisata c'abatangakori, agasigura ko mu mwaka uza igihugu gishobora kuhungukira imiriyaridi 6.9 z'amafaranga y'ama cedi akoreshwa muri Ghana (yababa hafi imiriyaridi 1.15 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika). Iri koraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ryatanguye ku wa mbere mu gatondo, rikaba ryagiye guhagarikwa inyuma y'isaha zitandatu z'ijoro (canke saa sita z'ijoro), nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Graphic co muri ico gihugu. Iki kinyamakuru cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter iyi reresi y'uru ruhagarara. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Abanya-Ghana batari bake bagaye iyi nyifato y'abashingamateka babo, bakavuga ko bategerezwa kubera akarorero keza abandi - hakwifata nk'abana. Ijwi ry'icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ryaboneka ko ari kirumara mu gihe inama nshingamateka yacanyemwo bikomeye kubera integuro y'iri kori. Ava mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi New Patriotic Party (NPP). Umugambwe NDC uvuga ko atategerezwa gutora kubera yari arongoye inama. Ikinyamakuru Graphic kivuga ko integuro y'tegeko rigenga iri kori yemejwe n'umurwi w'inama nshingamateka ujejwe ikigega, ku majwi 13 kuri 12, ariko ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'uyu murwi atangiye ijwi ryiwe ryabanguranije. Inama nshingamateka yasubiye gukorana kandi ejo ku wa kabiri, ariko abashingamateka ntibatoye iri tegeko inyuma y'aho bumvikaniye ko inama yungururizwa mu kwa mbere. Poritike ya Ghana irangwamwo ukutumvikana kuva mu mwaka uheze, inyuma y'amatora aho imigambwe NDC na NPP yaronse intebe 137 umwe umwe. Intebe imwe ni iy'uwigenga, yagiye ku ruhande rwa NPP, agatuma uwu mugambwe uronka akarusho. Mu kwa mbere, abasirikare barinjiye mu nama nshingamateka kugira bahagarike imishamirano hagati y'abashingamateka yadutse bagomba gutora umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Ico gihe, Alban Bagbin wa NDC niwe yatowe inyuma y'aho bamwe mu bashingamateka ba NPP bamuhereye amajwi bakayima uwo mu mugambwe wabo, Mike Oquaye. Bagbin ntiyari muri iyi nama yo kuwa mbere yadutsemwo uru ruhagarara, ari co gituma yaciye irongorwa na Owusu wo muri NPP.

column2: Papa Francis yashoboye gusoma imisa ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro inyuma yo kubagwa urura
column3: Papa Francis yashoboye kwiyereka abantu ubwa mbere kuva bamukoze kubera ingorane y'urura runini, haraciye indwi. Mu gihe yaboneka ko ameze neza, uyu mupapa w'imyaka 84 yasomye imisa yo muri ino ndwi ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro  Gemelli i Roma. Abantu baharurwa mu majana bakoraniye hanze y'ibi bitaro, bamwe bakoma akaruru ngo "Viva il Papa!" (Twogereranya na "Papa, ramba"). Vaticano ivuga ko igikorwa co kuvura Papa indwara y'urura runini izwi nka "symptomatic diverticular stenosis" cagenze neza. Papa yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ndanezerewe kubona nshoboye kurangura ibanga ryanje ryo ku wa Mungu n'aho ndi ng'aha". "Narumvise ko mwambaye hafi cane kandi ko mwansengeye. Ndabashimiye n'umutima wanje wose". Ashimira abakozi bo muri ivyo bitaro, yavuze ko "yiboneye ingene ubuvuzi bwiza ari nkenerwa, kandi bose bakaburonka, mu bindi bihugu nk'uko bimeze hano mu Butariyano". Yongerako ati: "Ntidutakaze aya mahirwe. Ni ngombwa ko tuyabungabunga". Bamwe mu bana barwariye muri ivyo bitaro babonetse bari kumwe na Papa ku rubaraza. Ntibiramenyekana ikiringo azomara muri ibi bitaro mu gihe azoba ariko ararwaruka. Indwara ya Diverticular ni indwara itera ibivyimba mu rura runini, bigashobora gutuma rwipfungānya, bigatuma umuntu yuzura inda akanababara mu nda. Francis, yavutse mu  1936 i Buenos Aires, yaratakaje igice c'ihaha ry'iburyo afise imyaka 21. Afise kandi ikibazo co mu matako kimutera ububabare buhera mu gice co hasi c'umugongo bukamanuka mu maguru. Mu 2014, yagiye ahagarika ibikorwa bimwe bimwe kubera ibibazo vyo mu mushishito.

column2: Tanzania: Perezida Magufuli yirukanye umukozi wa leta yatabuye Ikorowani
column3: Perezida John  Magufuli wa Tanzania amenyesha ko yirukanye burundu mu kazi umukozi wa leta yatabuye igitabo ceranda c'Ikorowani, maze akwiragiza isanamu ku mbuga hwaniro ariko arayitabura. Yatangaje iyo ngingo uno munsi mu gihe yari mu birori vyo kwugurura ibiro vy'akarere ka Kigamboni mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. Ati: "Nyakwubahwa Jafo, hirya y'ejo niho numva, ko hari umuntu hariya i Kilosa yatabuye igitabo ceranda". "Ndagushimiye cane kubona warafashe ingingo yo kuba uramuhagarika, ariko jeho ndamwirukanye burundu. Mwandikire ikete ko yirukanywe burundu". "Atsinda urubanza canke atsindwa, uyo ntakiri umukozi wa leta, ntidushobora kubandanya dukorana n'abakozi b'ibijuju nk'abo muri ino leta". Mu ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutegetsi bw'intara n'amakomine, Selemani Jafo, yategetse ko umukozi w'ibiro vy'akarere ka Kilosa mu ntara ya Morogoro, Daniel Elimringi, ahagarikwa, ku caha co gutabura igitabu c'idini rya Isilamu, Ikorowani. Jafo ati: "Ni ukuri, iki kintu cakozwe n'umukozi nk'uyu nta ciza kizanira igihugu cacu kubera abanyagihugu bacu mu madini yose basanzwe babanye mu mahoro kandi bubahana mu butandukane". Iyo ngingo ya Jafo yafashwe inyuma y'aho isanamu yerekana uyo mukozi wa leta mu gisata c'ubudandaji mu biro vy'akarere ka Kilosa ariko aratabagura ico gitabo, ikwiragijwe ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye. Ikinyamakuru Mtanzania co muri ico gihugu kimenyesha ko uyo mukozi yamaze kurengutswa muri sentare, kandi ko yankiwe kuburana yidegemvya. Ico kinyamakuru gitangaza ko urwo rubanza ruzosubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 20 z'uku kwa kabiri.

column2: Ukraine: Kyiv iriyamiriza ivyo yagirizwa na Russia ko igomba gutera ‘ibombe y’umwanda’
column3: Ukraine iriyamiriza ibivugwa n’Uburusiya ko Kyiv (umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine) ishobora gukoresha “ibombe y’umwanda”  - ibibombe bisanzwe bivangwa n’ubumara (matières radioactives). Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky avuga ko ibi vyerekana ko Uburusiya bwonyene bushobora kuba buriko butegura gukora igitero nk’iki. Incuti za Ukraine nazo nyene ziriyamiriza ibi bivugwa n’Uburusiya, mbere Amerika ikiyamiriza “icitwazo ico ari co cose cotuma ibintu biyangara”. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w’Uburusiya Sergei Shoigu yavuze ivy’amabombe y’umwanda mu gihe yavugana na mugenziwe w’Ubwongereza Ben Wallace kuri terefone. Yavuze ko afise “amakenga ku gishobora kuba agasotoro ka Kyiv karimwo ikoreshwa ry’ibombe y’umwanda”. Ku wa Mungu, Shoigu yagiranye kandi ibiganiro n’abashikiranganji bo kwivuna abansi ba Amerika, Ubufaransa na Turukiya, abashikiriza impungenge za Moscou. Nta vyemezo yatanze bishigikira ivyo yagiriza Ukraine. Mu kwishura kuri ibi, Perezida Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya ko ari bwo “ntandaro y’ibintu vyose vy’umwanda bishobora kuba muri ino ntambara”. Avuga ko Uburusiya buriko butera ubwoba isi bukoresheje “akaga k’inguvu z’ubumara” ku kigo ca nikleyeri ca Zaporizhzhia bwigaruriye. Anavuga kw’iterabwoba rya Moscou ryo kumena urugomero rukomeye rwo mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Kremlin (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya) iriyamiriza ibi birego. Umukuru wa Ukraine kandi arashimangira ko “amakungu yofata ingingo zose zikomeye zishoboka”. Hagati aho, Wallace avuga ko yamiriye kure ibivugwa na Shoigu ko "Ukraine iriko itegura imigambi ifashwe mu mugongo n’ibihugu vy’Uburengero, harimwo n’Ubwongereza, yo gutuma ibintu biyangara muri Ukraine”. Yagabishije kandi ko ibirego nk’ibi "bitoba icitwazo co gukora ikintu cotuma ibintu vyunyuka”. Amajambo nk’ayo kandi niyo yavuzwe n’umunyamabanga wa Amerika ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Lloyd Austin, igihe yavugana na Shoigu ejo ku wa Mungu, mu kiganiro kigira kabiri nawe kuri terefone mu misi mike cane. Mw’itangazo rusangi, abashikiranganji bajejwe imigenderanire b’ibihugu vy’Ubufaransa, Ubwongereza na Amerika bavuze ko ibihugu vyabo “vyiyamirije amajambo y’ikinyoma ceruye ko Ukraine iriko itegura gukoresha ibombe y’umwanda ku butaka bwayo”, banavuga ko bazobandanya bafata mu mugongo Ukraine "muri ino ntambara y’ubugome ya Perezida Putin". Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi mu gisirikare bavuga ko ivyo Uburusiya bwagiriza Ukraine bije inyuma y’aho bugize imisi butsindwa ahatari hake, be no mu gihe ingabo za Ukraine zibandanya ibitero vyo kwivuna mu buseruko no mu bumanuko bw’igihugu. Mu rukurikirane rw’ubutumwa cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, ikigo ca Amerika cigisha ivy’intambara, Institute for the Study of War (ISW), kivuga ko Shoigu "asa n’uwariko arondera guhagarika canke kugabanya umurindi w’imfashanyo za gisirikare Uburengero buha Ukraine, hamwe kandi kumbure no kurondera ingene aca intege urunani rwa OTAN/NATO  mu kurutera ubwoba”. Hagati aho, ISW yongerako iti: "Kremlin ntavyo irimwo vyo gutegura igitero ca vuba ca bombe y’umwanda. Ibivugwa na Shoigu bije gukomeza isekeza ry’akarimi Uburusiya bumazemwo igihe kirekire”. column2: Abahitanywe na Covid-19 bamaze kurenga imiriyoni zitatu kw'isi
column3: Abantu bamaze guhitanwa na ca kiza karanda ca Covid-19 kw'isi barenze imiriyoni zitatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins rikurikiranira hagufi iki kiza. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, agabisha ko isi "iriko yegereza igitigiri kitari bwabeho c'abandura" gushika ubu. Ubuhindi - igihugu gihanzwe n'ubwoko bugira kabiri bwa coronavirus - catangaje ko abantu barenga 230.000 ari bo banduye ku musi w'ejo wa gatandatu wonyene. Hafi abantu imiriyoni 140 nibo bamaze kwandura uwu mugera kuva wadutse. Ku wa gatanu, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus arongoye OMS yagabishije ko "ibitigiri vy'abandura n'abapfa bibandanya biduga ku rugero ruteye ubwoba". Yongerako y'uko "mu mezi abiri aheze, ibitigiri vy'abandura ku ndwi vyiyongereye hafi incuro zibiri kw'isi". Ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins rivuga ko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubuhindi na Brezil - ibihugu bifise abanduye benshi gusumba ibindi kw'isi - vyonyene biteranije ibitigiri vy'abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera barenga umuriyoni. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP rivuga ko mu ndwi iheze, abantu bashika 12.000 kw'isi yose bahitanye n'iki kiza. Hagati aho, ibitigiri bitangwa n'ibihugu vyinshi kw'isi bishobora kuba atari vyo. Amadoze arenga imiriyoni 800 y'incanco za coronavirus aramaze guhabwa abantu mu bihugu 165 kw'isi yose. Hagati aho, Dr Tedros yabwiye abategetsi ba ONU ku wa gatanu ati: "Ubusumbasumbane mu bijanye no kuronswa incanco nico kibazo nyamukuru muri kino gihe - kandi turiko turananirwa". Ibihugu bimwe biramaze kuronka no gucandaga abanyagihugu bavyo batari bake. Ivyo bihugu bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanyagihugu bavyo bamaze gucandagwa, aha harimwo nk'Ubwongereza na Israel, bifise agahengwe kuko ibitigiri vy'abandura vyagabanutse cane rwose. Abahinga bo kw'ishure kaminuza  Imperial College London bavuga ko isekeza ry'ugucandaga ririko riragabanya abandura, abapfa n'abinjizwa ibitaro. Muri iyi ndwi, umuganga akomeye w'umunya Israel yavuze  y'uko yemera ko Israel - aho abarenga igice c'abanyagihugu bose bamaze gucandagwa - iri mu gushika ku rugero rw'aho igihugu cose kizoba gikingiwe. Ibi rero biri uko mu gihe hari ibihugu vyinshi bikirindiriye kuronswa incanco za mbere. Ibi nivyo vyatumye OMS igabisha ko hari ubusumbasumbane mu kuronswa incanco, aho biboneka ko zitariko zitangwa ku rugero rumwe hagati y'ibihugu bitunze n'ibikenye. Dr Tedros avuga ko mu bihugu bitunze, ica kane (1/4) c'abanyagihugu bamaze gucandagwa, mu gihe mu bihugu bikenye ari umwe ku bantu amajana ane (1/400). OMS iriko ikorana n'umugambi mpuzamakungu covax, mu guhimiriza ko ibihugu bitunze vyosangiza incanco ibihugu bikenye. Gushika mu mpera z'unwo mwaka, covax itegekanya ko yoba imaze gutanga imiriyaridi zibiri z'amadoze kw'isi yose, gusa incanco zimwe zisaba ko umuntu aterwa doze zibiri. Abahinga kandi bafise impungenge ku kuntu izi ncanco ziriko ziratangwa ubu zidashobora kurwanya ubwoko bushasha bw'iyi ndwara bukwirakwira ku muvuduko udasanzwe. Hariko harakorwa ubushakashatsi kugira ngo incanco zisubirwemwo kugira zishobore kurwanya ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera. Prof. Adam Finn ari mu murwi w'Ubwongereza ujejwe incanco (JCVI), avuga ko yiteze ko incanco zigiye kugenda zita inguvu buke buke uko uwu mugera uzogenda uhinduka.

column2: Kardinari w'i Vatican Becciu mu rubanza rwo kunyonyeza miriyoni 412 z'ama dorari
column3: Umukardinari  w'ishengero Katorika yigeze kuba akorana hafi cane na Papa François agiye gucirirwa urubanza i Vaticano, yagirizwa gukoresha nabi amafaranga y'ishengero mu kamaramaza kahombesheje amafaranga menshi mu mugambi wo kugura inyubakwa i Londres/London. Kardinari Angelo Becciu, w'imyaka 73, niwe mwubahwa  akomeye cane mu barongoye Ekereziya Katorika  mu bihe vya none agiye imbere y'ubucamanza  kubera gukekwako ivyaha bijanye n'amafaranga. Yagirizwa gusohora amafaranga y'amanyaburaya, Euro, angana na miriyoni 350 (arenga miriyaridi 800 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) y'ishengero mu mugambi utagenze neza  wo kugura inyubakwa  muri Chelsea watumye hatakara amafaranga menshi cane. Arahakana kuba hari icaha yakoze. Abandi bantu icenda bakurukiranwa muri urwo rubanza nabo bagirizwa ivvyaha birimwo kuronka amafaranga ku nguvu canke kw'iterabwoba, kunyuruza no gukoresha nabi ububasha bw'akazi. Kardinari Becciu yirukanywe mu kazi na Papa François mu kwezi kw'icenda igihe amakuru y'ugukoresha nabi amafaranga yaja ahabona. Amatohoza yamaze imyaka ibiri yerekanye ingene Vaticano yatakaje miriyoni z'ama euro, arimwo amashikanwa, inyuma yo kugura inyubakwa  yahora ari ububiko bwa Harrods kuri Sloane Square  Avenue muri Chelsea, mu 2014. Uwo mukardinari yahora  araba amashikanwa mu biro bijejwe amafaranga ya  Vaticano. Ivyaha akurikiranwako birimwo kurungika amafaranga mu rudandazwa rwari rurongowe n'abavukanyi biwe mu ntara y'amavukiro yabo muri Sardaigne. Urwo rubanza rwitezwe kumara amezi menshi. Intahe zibiri zizosasa muri iyi ndwi - ku bibazo  vy'ubuhinga - zishobora kwungururizwa mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abandi icenda bagirizwa barimwo: Abagirizwa bose barahakana kuba barakoze icaha. Hamwe bokwagirwa n'ivyaha, bashobora guhanishwa umunyororo canke ihadabu, canke vyompi. Abashikirizamanza bavuga ko umuranzi  akorera Londres, Gianluigi Torzi,  yanyonyeje Vaticano mu gukoresha amafaranga yayo mu kugura imitahe yo muri iyo nyubakwa yo muri Chelsea yari guca isubirwawo ngo ivemwo amazu y'agaciro yo kubamwo. Torzi avuga ko ibivugwa bishingiye ku kwumva ibintu ukutariko. Ubutariyano buriko buragerageza ngo burabe ko  Ubwongereza bumubarungikira. Mu kwezi kwa kane Papa yafashe ingingo ko aba kardinari n'abepiskopi bagirijwe ivyaha bashobora gukurikiranwa n'abacamanza basanzwe - aho gucirirwa imanza n'aba kardinari nk'uko vyahora. Umukuru mushasha ajejwe amafaranga muri Vaticano, Juan Antonio Guerrero, avuga ko Vaticano iriko irashiramwo inguvu zitari bwigere ziboneka kugira ikorere ku mugaragaro mu bijanye n'amafaranga. Ku wa 24 ukwezi kw'indwi, ku ncuro ya mbere Vaticano yashize ahabona ido n'ido ry'imitahe yayo: amazu 4.051 mu Butariyano n'izishika 1.120 i Londres, Paris, Geneve  na Lausane. Furera Guerreo yagize ati: ''Twamenyereye gukorera mw'ibanga, ariko twamenye ko mu vyerekeye ubutunzi, gukorera ku mugaragaro bidukingira kurusha gukorera nw'ibanga."

column2: Ihiganwa rya mbere rya Basketball Africa League ryasibijwe muri Senegal kubera coronavirus
column3: Intango y'ihiganwa ku nshuro ya mbere rya Basketball Africa League (BAL) yasibijwe kubera ubwoba bw'ikiza ca coronavirus. Ihiganwa rya mbere rya BAL ryagomba gutangura ku murwa mukuru wa Senegal, Dakar, itariki 13 z'ukwa gatatu, kandi nta tariki nshasha yatanzwe. Iri higanwa rishasha ry'ababigize umwuga, ryavutse ku gufashanya hagati y'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rya basketball, International Basketball Federation, na NBA ryagomba kwitabirwa n'amakipe 12 yo muri Afrika. Umukuru wa BAL, Amadou Gallo Fall yagize ati: "Twisunze impanuro za leta ya Senegal mu bijanye n'umwitwarariko utewe n'ugukwiragira kw'ikiza ca coronavirus, inkino zitanguza ihiganwa BAL zigijwe inyuma. "Birambabaje kuba tudashoboye gutanguza iri higanwa ry'amateka nk'uko twari twabiteguye ariko turindiranye igishika ko BAL itangura ku tariki izoza hanyuma." Abateguye ihiganwa bavuga ko umutekano w'abafana, abakinyi, amakipe hamwe n'abakozi ari kirumara cane kandi ko bazovyihweza neza imbere y'uko batangaza iyindi tariki mu minsi iri imbere. Gushika isaha 08:00 ku masaha mpuzamakungu ya GMT, hari hamaze kwemezwa abantu babiri banduye coronavirus muri Senegal. Inkino hirya no hino kw'isi zarahuye n'ibibazo kubera coronavirus, ariko BAL ibaye ihiganwa rya mbere rikomeye muri Afrika ryigijwe inyuma kubera iki kiza. Ahandi, ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Tanzania, TFF, ryabujije abakinyi guhana amaboko imbere y'uko inkino zitangura. TFF ivuga ko iriko irakurikiza impanuro z'ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara zo kwirinda guhana amaboko mu ntumbero yo kubuza iki kiza gukwiragira mu gihugu. Kuwa kabiri, haragaragaye amafoto yerekana umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania John Magufuli akozanyako ibirenge mu kuramukanya n'uwundi munyepolisi hako bohanye ibiganza. Ntawanduye coronavirus araboneka muri Tanzania gushika ubu, mu gihe abakekwa bose basanze atayo bafise nyuma yo gupimwa.

column2: Qatar 2022 - Portugal: Ivya Cristiano Ronaldo  vyoba birangiriye aha?
column3: Na Chris Bevan BBC Sport ku kibuga Al Thumama Stadium, Doha Indoto za Cristiano Ronaldo zo gushobora gutsindira igikombe c’isi yose zirarangiye, kandi bisa n’uko ari ubutakigaruka – ariko none twovuga ko umwuga wiwe urangiye burundu? Aho ashiriwe ku rutonde rw’abasubirizi inyuma yo gushwana n’umumenyereza, urugendo rwa Ronaldo muri rino higanwa ntirwigeze ruboneka ko rwari guhava rurangira mu mahoro – ariko gusa amarira yagize inyuma y’’aho Portugal ikuriwe mw’ihiganwa yabaye incamake y’ingene ibintu bimeze ubu. Inyuma yo gutsindwa na Maroc bisigura ko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 37 gushika ubu ata mudari w’intsinzi y’igikombe c’isi yose agiye yambaye – agashimwe konyene agiye ataronse – mu gihe ubu ari ishusho kw’isi yose ariko idafise umurwi n’umwe yovuga iti ‘aha ni muhira’, inyuma y’aho aviriye muri Manchester United mu buryo atari bwiza, hari mu kwezi guheze. Ico gihe abantu bari basanzwe bariko bibaza nimba yari gusubira gukinira umurwi wiwe, ubu naho, mu gihe abantu muri Portugal bakimukunda cane, hakaba hagiye gukurikira ibibazo kuri kazoza kiwe mu gihugu. Ronaldo yavuye muri Man U hasigaye igihe gito ngo ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ritangure, ariko Qatar yatanguye neza kuri we. Igitsindo yinjije kuri penalty yateje impari mu rukino rwa mbere rwa Portugal mw’itsinda ryayo igihe ikina na Ghana cabaye ico “ubuhinga budasanzwe” ku bwa Fifa, kikaba camutumye yitwa umukinyi wa mbere yinjije mu mahiganwa atanu y’igikombe c’isi yose. Ariko kuva ico gihe ibintu vyaciye bitangura kugenda nabi, mbere akaba atashoboye no kwinjiza igitsindo na kimwe mu nkino zibiri zakurikiye atanguzwa mu kibuga, imbere y’uko acanamwo n’umumenyereza  Fernando Santos inyuma y’aho amusubirije mu rukino rwabahuje na Korea y’Epfo. Inyuma yo gushirwa ku ntebe y’abasubirizi mu rukino n’Ubuswisi mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma – bukaba bwari bwo bwa mbere adatangujwe mu kibuga mu nkino zikomeye nk’izi kuva mu 2008 - umusore yamusubiriye Goncalo Ramos yateye bitatu wenyene, ubwo nyene Ronaldo aca yitwa igihangange co ku ntebe y’abasubirizi. Ni nako yakinishijwe mu rukino rwa nijoro na Maroc, n’aho yahawe hafi igice ca kabiri cose, kuva ku munota wa 51, aho nyene igihugu ciwe camaze kurya kimwe ku busa. Kuboneka mu kibuga vyonyene vyasiguye ko yari aciye uwundi muhigo  - urukino mpuzamakungu rwiwe rwa 196, aca anganya n’umusatirizi wa Koweit  Bader Al-Mutawa ku ruhande rw’abagabo – ariko nta kintu kinini yakoze ugereranije n’ivyo yagiye arakora mu myaka iheze. Ronaldo yari asanzwe yaraciye umuhigo ku bitsindo vyinshi mu nkino mpuzamakungu ku ruhande rw’abagabo, aho afise 118, ariko ntiyigeze aboneka ko yari gushobora kwiyongera iteka imbere ya Maroc yaboneka ko yari yariye amavubi. Ronaldo yashoboye gukora ku mupira incuro cumi gusa kandi vyamusavye ko akina gushika ku munota wa 91 kugira ngo ashobore gutera mw’igori, ariko ukaba wari umupira utari ufise inguvu nyinshi zo gutera ubwoba umunyegori wa Maroc, Yassine Bounou, azwi cane nka Bono. Mu gihe Ronaldo yagumye yerekana ishaka, arindiriye ko aronka umupira mwiza kugira ngo akure mu kabaregwa igihugu ciwe, ntiwigeze ushika. Igihe umupira wari utewe na Rafael Leao ku munota wa 97 ukamuca hejuru imbere y’uguterwa n’umutwe na Pepe akawutera inyuma, Ronaldo, ari muri ka gace ka mukorumbone, yakubise amavi hasi n’umwiheburo, yiremeka amaboko, icerekana ko yasa n’uwari abonye ko ivyiwe birangiye. Ifirimbi ya nyuma imaze kuvuga, yararamukanije na bamwe mu bakeba biwe, hanyuma aca ava mu kibuga ubudakebuka, aherekejwe n’uwufata amashusho (cameraman). Mu kanya isase, umufana yagerageje guca mu ryahumye abajejwe umutekano arondera ingene yomusaba kwifotoza i selfie nawe, ariko biranka. Ronaldo amaze kuzimangana mu kibuga yerekanywe ariko atera aja mu cumba c’iyambariro n’amarira, amosozi azokwibutsa ingene avuye mw’ihiganwa, hampande y’ugucanamwo n’umumenyereza wiwe. Inyuma y’aho, Santos yafashe nk’ibisanzwe uku gucanamwo kwiwe na Ronaldo, mu kuvuga ati: "Si nibaza ko ivyashikiye Ronaldo hari ingaruka vyagize ku rukino, n’aho hari ababineguye. Twese turi hamwe. "Nimba twovuga ko hari abantu babiri bababaye cane, ni Ronaldo na jewe nyene. Iki kiri mu bigize akazi ku mumenyereza n’umukinyi”. Bafise kuba bunze ubumwe, ariko Portugal iratashe – inyuma y’ibibazo vyinshi, aho abantu bibaza nimba koko umurwi w’iki gihugu hari ico woshikako utari kumwe n’iyi nyenyeri yawo. Ibihe biha ibindi kandi ni ibisanzwe ko imirwi ikomeye itsindwa mu nkino zikomeye, ariko, n’aho Santos yogenda canke akaguma ari umumenyereza, Ronaldo si umuntu agiye kwibagirwa vuba. Aracafise iteka mu gihugu ciwe inyuma y’ivyo yagikoreye mu gutsindira igikombe ca Bulaya mu 2016 (Euro 2016), igikombe ca mbere gikomeye mu nkino nkuru nkuru. Igitigiri c’abafana ba Portugal bari bambaye imipira yanditseko 'Ronaldo 7' hanze y’ikibuga Al Thumama Stadium ejo ku wa gatandatu kirerekana neza ko batibagira ibihe vyiza vya kahise kiwe n’aho ibiherutse kuba mu ndwi nkeya ziheze atari vyiza. Mushiki wa Ronaldo, Katia Aveiro, yaravugiye abatari bake abicishije mu butumwa bwuzuye umubabaro ku rubuga rwa Instagram inyuma yo gutsindwa na Maroc. Yatanguye ati: "Igihe abuzukuru banje bazombaza ivyerekeye urugamba, iteka, icubahiro, akazi, ukwitanga, inzitizi, ububi bw’abantu buciye kw’ishari; ni bansaba kuvuga ivyerekeye ibikombe, ibitsindo, ubushimwe, inyandiko z’umurage utarigera uboneka, nzobabwira ivyerekeye musazanje, se wabo”. Arangiza avuga ati: "Nzobabwira ivyerekeye ubwami yubatse, nzobabwira inguvu ziwe, ivyo yemeye n’ivyo yakoze, nzobabwira amateka yiwe, nzobabwira ko atigeze acika intege n’igihe baba bamaze kumwimbira icobo. Nzobereka firime [film], firime nyayo y’ubuzima bwa se wabo”. Ntituzi ingene iyo firime izorangira, ariko mu gihe vyoshika agakina ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose rigira gatandatu, vyoba ari ibintu bitangaje cane. Ico gihe, ni ukuvuga mw’ihiganwa rindi ry’igikombe c’isi yose, azoba afise imyaka 41, ariko nimba yipfuza irindi teka, aracafise amahirwe mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe ca Bulaya kizoba mu 2024. Ikindi kibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya ni uyuhe murwi asobora kuzoba akinira. Hari imirwi itari mike yipfuza kugura Ronaldo muri ka kanya k’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere, harimwo Al-Nassr  wo muri Arabia Saoudite wamaze no kumwemerera agashahara gafadika mu ndwi iheze. Uburasirazuba bwo hagati si ahantu yaronderera na gato – ariko mu misi dushobora kuba ari yo tuzomubona.

column2: Ndayishimiye: ‘Karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?’
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko ibibazo Uburundi bwagiye buracamwo vyatumye igihugu gisigara inyuma mu bisata bitandukanye. Akebura  abakozi gukura amaboko mu mpuzu kugira bagwize umwimbu. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije Abarundi buca bahimbaza umusi mpuzamakungu wahariwe abakozi, Perezida Ndayishimiye ahamagarira Abarundi kwemanga ko basamaye hanyuma bafate ingingo yo gukura amaboko mu mpuzu. Mu gihe abakozi ba reta bari biteze ko umusi nk'uwu ari akaryo keza ko kwongerwa imishahara, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko batokwitega ko bahava bongerwa agashirukabute mu gihe "n'umwenda Reta yafashe mu myaka iheze kugira ihembe abakozi utararihwa". Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko gushika ubu hari abakozi bironderera kwongerezwa impembo mu gihe ataco bariko bafasha reta kugira ironke uburyo bukwiye, bakagomba ko reta isaba imfashanyo kugira ngo ibahembe. Ati: "Uno musi urasanga umukozi wa Reta ashaka agashirukabute gakirurutse ariko we nyene abona abanyonora ikigega ca reta akihorera canke akabakingira ikibaba. Mbere hari naho usanga ari we nyene ariko aranyonora agaca asaba impembo irengeye. "Hari abandi bareka ibidandazwa vyari gutanga amakori bigaca ku ruhande ariko ukwezi kwahera agasaba impembo. None yibaza ko iyo mpembo ica iva hehe, ko hari aho nyene?" Perezida Ndayishimiye ntiyumva ivyo gusaba imfashanyo, kuko kubw'iwe, abakeneye imfashanyo ni abatishoboye. Ahamagarira  abarundi gutahura ko ivyo bagiye baracamwo  vyatumye basamara. Ati: "None ko umuntu wo gufashwa ari uwutishoboye, koko karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?  Jewe si uko ndavyumva; sindanavyemera; ni co gituma bintera isoni gusega". Perezida Ndayishimiye abona ko uwutakoze atari akwiye guhembwa ukwezi guheze kuko ku bw'iwe, "ni we ngumba y'ukuri kuko imana yamuhaye ubwenge n'inkomezi hanyuma abipfisha ubusa". Avuga ko muri kino gihe igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro, agasaba Abarundi guhaguruka bakiyishura ivyo bataye, bakarangura imigambi yo kwiteza imbere. Ati: "Twarabuze vyinshi, twarataye umwanya mwinshi kubera ububegito bwa benshi muri twebwe bwatumye tubura amahoro. "Muri uwo mwanya twataye, ibikorwa bitakozwe ni vyinshi kandi biraturindiriye. "Kurima, tukworora kijambere ntavyo twitaho; twarira ikija mu nda gusa, umusesekara ntiwotubajije, tukitwaza imyibutsa yataye igihe ngo ivy'ejo biraba ab'ejo. "Guhingura itunga kama uwo wari umugani kuko biteba kwimbuka ... gutunganya aho abamukerarugendo ... vyari umugani." "Ivyo vyose vyari akazi koduha itunga dukeneye kandi n'ubu karacaturindiriye".Atera akamo abarundi ko bova hasi bagakora kugira ngo bahamvye ibindi bihugu kuko vyovyo vyamaze kugera kure. Ati: "Abandi barakamaze. Barubatse amabarabara, barubaka amashure, barubaka ingomero z'umuyagankuba, barubaka ivyo ba mukerarugendo bakenera, barubaka ibikoresho vy'ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, barubatse amahinguriro, ubu ntaco basigaje. "Twebwe, ivyo vyose biracaturindiriye, dukure amaboko mu mpuzu dukore".

column2: Burundi: Inyuma y'indwi imwe ibitungwa bizosubira kubagwa
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu n'umutekano bumenyesha ko ibitungwa bigiye gusubira kubagwa kuva ku musi wa gatatu w'indwi iza. Ivyo vyashikirijwe n'umunyamabanga ntayegayezwa Martin Niteretse mu nama yagiranye n'abarongoye intara, abarongoye uturere mu gipolisi hamwe n'abajejwe uburimyi n'ubworozi mu ntara. Ingingo yo guhagarika kubaga ibitungwa yari yafashwe kubera iyaduka ry'ingwara y'inyonko yo mu kiyaya ca Rift (Fièvre de la vallée du Rift) Kugira ivyo bishoboke ngo ibitungwa vyo kubagwa bitegerezwa kwegeranirizwa hamwe. Agira ati:"Abayangayanga  bakeneye kuzobaga mubatunganirize aho begeraniriza ibitungwa bashaka kuzobaga mu ndwi iza. "Nta nka izobagwa itavuye aho muri ico kibanza. Kuko ntayizova mu muhana ica ija kubagwa ubwo nyene." Ivyo bitungwa kugira bije kubagwa, bitegerezwa kumara imisi indwi biri mu kibanza categekanijwe mu makomine yose, bigenzurwa ko bitagwaye. Martin Niteretse kandi avuga ko ata nyama izova mw'ikomine zija mu yindi. Nta n'inka zirekuriwe kuvanwa mu ntara zija mu yindi, kiretse ngo izijanywe kubagirwa mu gisagara c'ubutunzi ca Bujumbura. Ariko ngo nko mu ntara zitagira inka nyinshi, abayangayanga baho barashobora kuja kuzigura ahandi, ariko abategetsi b'aho baziguze bategerezwa kubaha urupapuro ruziherekeza. Kandi ico gihe zizoca ziherekezwa n'igipolisi kugira ntihagire izururukira mu nzira canke izuririra mu nzira  zitagenzuwe neza. Icipfuzo ngo n'uko mu ndwi iza hatangura kubagwa inka, hamwe n'impene n'intamaba 'bishobotse'. Abadandaza basabwe kandi kudaca bikika mu kiza ngo baduze ibiciro. Ku bijanye n'urucanco, Martin Niteretse yabasavye kuja gutegura abajejwe ako kazi kugira incanco zishitse bace baja ku kivi. Haraheze amezi arenga abiri hatanzwe itegeko ko kizira kikaziririza kubaga inka, impene n'intama, mu ntumbero yo gukumira inyono yo mu kiyaya ca Rift.

column2: Burundi: OLUCOME iriyamiriza ingingo yo kwugara ibiryo vy'abavunjayi (bureau de change)
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'itunga ry'igihugu, OLUCOME, aranegura ingingo y'Ibanki Nkuru y'u Burundi yo kwugara amazu adandaza amafaranga  mvamakungu. Mw'itangazo yasohoye kuri uyu wa kabiri, Gabriel Rufyiri arongoye Olucome avuga ko iyo ngingo itazotorera umuti ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafaranga mvamakungu cibonekeza mu gihugu. Ku wa 07 z'uku kwa kabiri, Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yarafashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga mvamakungu mu Burundi. Iyagiriza ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu, nk'uko BRB ibivuga. Mw'iryo tangazo, Bwana Rufyiri avuga ati: "Iyo ata mafaranga y'agaciro ahari, ingingo nk'iyo siyo iza gukemura ikibazo kuko ibiciro vy'amafaranga y'agaciro bivana n'ingene aboneka kw'isoko ryayo". Yibutsa ko iryo kena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro rituma ibidandazwa bimwe bimwe mu gihugu bikena kubera hakenerwa ayo mafaranga kugira ngo hagurwe ibikoresho nkenerwa mu guhingura ivyo bidandazwa. Atanga akarorero k'isima, amafanta, ibiyeri n'ibindi, avuga ko "iyo bibonetse usanga bigurishwa ku biciro vy'umurengera". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyarahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena. Leta y'u Burundi yagiye ifata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kugenzura ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga mvamakungu, ariko cagumye ari ikibazo ngorabahizi, arico catumyeIbanki Nkuru y'igihugu yugara amashirahamwe yose adandaza ayo mafaranga. Olucome isaba leta kuvyura imigenderanire n'ibihugu bitanga imfashanyo, kwongereza ibidandazwa bishorwa hanze, guhimiriza abarwizatunga b'banyamahanga kuzana imitahe yabo mu gihugu, kunagura igisata c'ingenzi, ivyo vyose kugira ngo amafaranga mvamakungu yinjire mu Burundi.

column2: Inama ya G7 yemeje integuro yo gusohora amafaranga kugira ihangane na China
column3: Abategetsi b'ibihugu bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bihurikiye mu citwa G7 bemeje integuro yo gufasha ibihugu bikenye n'ibiri mu nzira y'amajambere mu bikorwa vy'iterambere, ni mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'Ubushinwa. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko ashaka ko umugambi wo gufasha ibihugu bikenye ushigikiwe na Amerika, wiswe Build Back Better World (B3W), uba uwo ku rwego rwo hejuru ugasubirira umugambi nk'uwo w'Ubushinwa. Umugambi w'Ubushinwa uzwi nka Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), uramaze gufasha ibihugu bitari bike mu kubironsa amagari ya moshi, kwubaka amabarabara n'ibivuko. Ariko ni umugambi unegurwa cane, uvugwa ko winjije ibihugu mu madeni y'umurengera. Mw'itangazo basohoye inyuma y'inama yariko ibera mu karere ka Cornwall mu Bwongereza, abategetsi ba G7 bavuga ko bazoshira imbere ubucuti bushingiye ku "kwubahiriza indangagaciro, bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru hamwe no gukorera mu muco". Hagati aho, ntibatomora iyo amafaranga azova mu gushira mu ngiro uwu mugambi. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi Angela Merkel avuga ko batari bwagere ku gihe co gusohora amafaranga. Amerika iranegura cane Ubushinwa ku nteguro yabwo y'ugukomeza igifatwa nk'imigenderanire "ishingiye ku madeni". Abategetsi ba G7, umurwi w'ibihugu indwi bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bivuga ko bishira imbere intwaro rusangi, bavuga kandi ko biyemeje gushiraho iyindi nteguro y'ingingo zo kurwanya ibindi biza bishobora kwiyadukiza muri kazoza. Muri izi ngingo harimwo kugabanya ikiringo co gukora no kwemeza incanco n'imiti yo kurwanya Covid-19 kikaja musi y'imisi ijana. Kuri uyu wa Mungu niho bategekanya gutangaza iyi nteguro, hampande y'itangazo rirangiza iyi nama barimwo. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson niwe arongoye iyi nama y'imisi itatu iriko ibera mu karere ka Carbis Bay. Ni ibiki ibihugu vy'uburengero bw'isi vyoba bimaze gukorera Ubushinwa gushika ubu ? Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Amerika, Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Ubwongereza hamwe na Canada vyafatiye ibihano Ubushinwa. Ibi bihano vyafatiwe abategetsi bo hejuru mu ntara ya Xinjiang bagirizwa ihonyanga ry'agateka ka zina muntu bakorera aba Islam  bo mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur, muri vyo hakaba harimwo ukubuza ingendo muri ivyo bihugu hamwe no gufata amatungo yabo. Abantu barenga umuriyoni bo  mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur z'izindi nkehwa nibo bazwi ko bapfungiwe mu makambi ari muyi iyo ntara yo mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'Ubushinwa. Reta y'Ubushinwa yagirizwa gutera ubugumba abagore b'aba Uyghur no gusambura imiryango, mu gutandukanya abana n'abavyeyi babo. Itohoza ryakozwe na BBC ryashizwe ahabona mu kwa kabiri ririmwo amakuru yemeza ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina hamwe n'iyicarubozo bikorerwa abapfungiwe muri ayo makambi. Ubushinwa bwaciye bwihora mu gufatira ibihano abategetsi b'aba nya Burayi.

column2: CAN 1996: Intsinzi ya South Afrika n'uruhara yagize mu mpinduka z'inyuma ya apartheid
column3: Ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika ryo mu 1996 ntiryari ryitezwe kubera muri Afrika y'Epfo. Kenya nico gihugu cari catowe ko cari kuritegura, ariko hasigaye amezi 14 yarakuyemwo akarenge, ivuga ko vyari kuyisaba uburyo busumba incuro zitandatu ubwari bwitezwe. Niho mu kwa cumi na rimwe 1994, ishirahamwe rya Afrika rijejwe umupira w'amaguru (CAF) ryaca rirondera ahandi iri higanwa ryari kubera. Mu ntango z'uwo mwaka, mu kwa kane, Nelson Mandela yari yatowe nk'umukuru w'igihugu mu matora ya mbere ya demokarasi muri kahise ka Afrika y'Epfo. Niho umurwi nserukiragihugu wari ucemererwa kwinjira mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu, usubijwe mu rwego mpuzamashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, FIFA, inyuma y'aho hashingiwe ishirahamwe rishasha ry'umupira w'amaguru (FA) ry'ico gihugu rihurikiyemwo amoko atandukanye mu 1991, igihe bwa butegetsi mvanguramoko bwa apartheid bwari butanguye gusenyuka. Afrika y'Epfo niyo yatowe ngo itunganye iri higanwa. Ariko nta muntu yari yiteze ko bari kubishobora. Mu vy'ukuri, ibintu ntivyagenze neza mu ntango inyuma y'aho basubirijwe mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu mu 1991 gushika n'aho umunyamabanga mukuru wa FA Solomon Morewa yihaye iryosozi. Iri higanwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika (CAN/AFCON) ryagiye kuba ikindi kintu. Ivyabaye mu myaka ya 1990 bigahindura ibintu, maze bigasambura ubutegetsi bw'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo bwari bumaze ibinjana birenga bitatu, navyo vyarahinduye urwego rw'umupira w'amaguru wariko urakomera mu buryo budasubira inyuma. Hari ikintu kidasanzwe cari giherutse kuba muri ico gihugu, iki naco ni ugutsindira igikombe c'isi yose mu rukino rwa Rugby (Rugby World Cup) mu buryo butangaje mu 1995. Ariko, nk'uko bivugwa n'abaserukiye iki gihugu cari kivutse bushasha mu kwinjira mu ntwaro rusangi mu nkino za CAN 1996 catsindiye, iyi ntsinzi yagize ingaruka zikomeye gusumba. Cameroun niyo yahuye ubwa mbere na Afrika y'Epfo. Ku wa 13 Nzero/Mutarama, imirwi nserukirabihugu yavyo yaratanye mu mitwe ku kibuga Soccer City, hanze gato y'igisagara ca Soweto, hamwe habera ya myiyerekano y'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyeshure biyamiriza intwaro y'inkehwa z'abazungu, aho abaharurwa mu majana bagandaguwe n'igipolisi cariko kirwanya iyi myiyerekano, imyaka 20 yari iheze. Neil Tovey yari afise imyaka 33.  Uyu mukinyi w'inyuma yakinira umurwi wo muri ico gihugu Kaizer Chiefs, yatanguye gukina ku rwego mpuzamakungu mu kw'indwi 1992, inyuma y'isabukuru yiwe y'imyaka 30 y'amavuka. Uru ni rwo rwabaye urukino rwiwe rwa mbere mu murwi nserukiragihugu uhuriyemwo koko amoko menshi - rwawuhuje kandi na Cameroun ruza kurangira bayitsinze 1-0. Tovey yabwiye BBC ati: "Imbere y'iri higanwa, iyo ubaza abagize umurwi mbere na jewe nimba twari gushobora kuritsindira, sinzi nimba twari kwishura ko twari kubishobora". "Baba abafana, baba twebwe abakinyi, nta na bamwe bari bamenyereye amahiganwa mpuzamakungu y'umupira w'amaguru. Ariko uko ihiganwa ryagiye ritera imbere, niko igihugu cagiye gikomera". Umusi umwe imbere y'uko urukino rwa mbere rutangura, Perezida Mandela, kw'izina kama ryiwe nka Madiba, yaragendeye ubwa mbere uyu murwi mu ngendo zitari nke yagize muri uyu murwi. Lucas Radebe, ico gihe yakinira Leeds United, ni uwundi mukinyi yari mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Afrika y'Epfo. Ku bwiwe, kubonana na Mandela casa n'uko coba ari igikorwa c'Imana. Ati: "Igihe twari tugikura, ntitwigeze tumenya ngo yasa gute". "Twari dufise isanamu yiwe ya kera yamwerekana akiri muto, ariko igihe aza kuturaba aho twari turi mw'ikambi, aha niho twabonye  "Madiba Magic". Yari afise igihagararo kidasanzwe. Twarabuze ico tuvuga". "Uwo musi, n'iyo tugahura na Brésil twari kuyikubita. Uko rero niko twatewe intege. Umuzo wiwe wadushikanye ku rugero rwo hejuru cane, aho urukino rwose twakina, twabona ko turiko dukinira Madiba na Afrika y'Epfo". 'Madiba Magic' cari iciyumviro cari mu mitwe y'abantu ko Mandela yatera imigisha ku mirwi y'umupira w'amaguru. Ni iciyumviro cavutse ku wa 10 Rusama/Gicurasi 1994 - umusi Mandela yimikwa - ico gihe Afrika y'Epfo ikaba yatsinze Zambia ku ncuro ya mbere, umukuru w'igihugu mushasha ari ho ari. Vyasa n'uko iki ciyumviro cariko kirakora kandi. Cameroun yatsinzwe 3-0, iki kikaba cabaye ikimenyetso c'ivyari bigiye gukurikira. Umukinyi Phil Masinga wa Leeds niwe yateye ica mbere amaze amasaha 24 gusa avuye mu Bwongereza. Nk'uko bivugwa na Shaun Bartlett yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Charlton, igihe Afrika y'Epfo ifata ikibanza ca mbere mu murwi yarimwo maze ikinjira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, umurwi waciye umenyekana kw'izina rya Madiba's Boys (Abahungu ba Madiba). Ati: "Gushika n'ubu, kuvuga gusa izina ry'igihangange Mandela nca numva merereje. Igihe cose twabonanye na we, agukoze mu miwe gusa, wamengo hari ikintu aguhaye. "Ikintu kibi conyene gusa ni uko wategerezwa kuvyuka isaha cumi n'igice mu gatondo, kubera ni vyo bihe yari akirimwo vyo kuva igihe yinjira ibohero. Yavyuka mu gaturuturu agatembera. Rero twategerezwa kuvyuka kugira tubonane na we isaha cumi n'imwe z'agatondo". Ariko Afrika ntiyatsindiye iri higanwa rya Afrika ku kigumbagumba gusa, canke kumbure kubera yari ifise izindi nguvu ikuye ku yindi si. Umupira bari bawuzi, kandi bari bafise umumenyereza mwiza Clive Barker. Tovey, umukinyi yinjirije igihugu ciwe ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi mu nkino 29, avuga ati: "Yarabonye ubuhinga muri buri mukinyi wese aca arabukorerako mu kubagira abakinyi bakomeye abagira ico babaye". Imbere y'uko baja mw'ihiganwa, bari bamaze gukina inkino 13 badatsindwa, muri zo harimwo zibiri banganije n'Ubudagi hamwe na Argentina. Iciyongereye kuri izi nguvu, ni ubuhinga bw'abakinyi Radebe na Phil Masinga bakuye i Bulaya mu murwi wa Leeds, co kimwe n'umusatirizi wa Wolves, Mark Williams. Hariho kandi n'umukinyi w'inyuma Mark Fish yariko arakurikiranirwa hagufi na Manchester United, akaba muri uwo mwaka nyene yategerezwa kuja gukinira Lazio, imbere y'uko yijira muri Bolton mu 1997. Inyuma y'intsinzi idasanzwe y'umurwi wa rugby mu mwaka w'imbere y'aho, itsinzi y'umurwi wari ugizwe ahanini n'abazungu yashize hamwe igihugu, bari baronse ikindi bagenderako. Tovey ati: "Iyi yari imwe mu ntego twavuga". "Twari tuzi ko dufise kandi uruhara mu gusubiza hamwe igihugu, kandi Madiba yari azi ko mu gihe twari kuvyifatamwo neza vyari gutuma ubumwe butsimbatara mu gihugu. "Umunezero waranze intsinzi y'umurwi wa rugby wari 10% gusa w'uwari kubaho mu gihe twari kuramuka natwe dutahukanye intsinzi". Itsinzi itangaje yagize kuri Algeria mu kuyitsinda 2-1 mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, ivuye ku gitsindo ca John 'Shoes' Moshoeu ku munota wa 86, yatumye yinjira mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma aho yahura na Ghana. Iki gihugu nico cahabwa amahirwe, nk'umurwi wa mbere wa Afrika, umurwi umwe rudende utigeze utsindwa na rimwe muri iryo higanwa. Umurwi wa Ghana wari ukomeye cane kuko wari wishimiye umukinyi w'inyuma wa Bayern Munich Samuel Kuffour, umukinyi wo hagati wa Torino Abedi Pele - se wa Andre na Jordan Ayew - hamwe n'uwundi musatirizi wa Leeds yariko araduga cane Tony Yeboah. Ariko aba banya Ghana batashe zirayoye muri uru rukino bakubiswe 3-0. Tovey ati: "Urukino rwa Ghana ni rumwe mu nkino zacu zari zikomeye gushika ubwo". "Harabaye uguhangana bikomeye hagati ya Lucas na Yeboah. Hose mu kibuga, umupira wari rwacu". Amakuru y'intsinzi muri uru rukino yaravuzwe cane mu binymakauru bukeye. Ikinyamakuru Business Day canditse kiti: "Igihe Afrika y'Epfo ikubitiye Ghana, uturere twari twiganjemwo abazungu twaritabiriye umupira w'amaguru ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho mu myaka 20 yose mu gihe c'amahiganwa yaba ay'igihugu canke aya Afrika". Buca haba urukino rwa nyuma, umutwe w'inkuru nyamukuru y'ikinyamakuru gikuru Beeld casohoka buri musi mu rurimi rw'iki afrikaans yari yanditswe mu kizulu ngo: 'Yebo Bafana Bafana!' (Yeah, The Boys! twogereranya mu kirundi tuti "Komera mwa bahungu mwe!") Bategerezwa guhura na Tunisia. Isinzi ry'abantu bangana na 80.000, harimwo Perezida Mandela, umwami w'abaZulu Goodwill Zwelithini hamwe n'uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Brésil Pele, bari bakubise harazima mu kibuga ca Soccer City, amasaha atatu imbere y'uko urukino rutangura. Mandela yari yambaye agapira kanditseko inomero 9 yambarwa na Neil Tovey, mu gihe abafana benshi bari biyanditse ku bikiriza vyabo mu marangi atandukanye ubutumwa bwavuga ngo 'Make Madiba Magic'. Mu gice ca mbere c'urukino, uretse umupira watewe mw'igori na Bartlett ariko umunyegori wa Tunisia akawukurayo, umupira ntiwigeze urenga hagati mu kibuga. Ariko, mu vyaboneka ko bananiranywe, hagati mu gice ca kabiri, Williams yari yasubiriye Masinga yerekanye ubudasa. Uyu musatirizi yinjie ibitsindo bibiri mu minota ibiri nyene - ica mbere cari ic'umutwe, ica kabiri kiva mu mupira ukomeye yateresheje ibamfu - maze aha Afrika y'Epfo intsinzi idasanzwe. Ivyakurikiye wabaye umunezero utagira urugero. Radebe ati: "Ndacavyibuka neza nk'uko umengo ni ivyabaye nijoro. Mu gihugu cose nta muntu yakoza ukuguru hasi. "Ico wumva yari Soweto. Nta bantu wumva biruka, kiretse abafana hanze y'ikibuga barira, baboroga. "Igihe twariko tuva mu kibuga, twabona abantu bikubita hasi. Bamwe bari bafise ikirato, abandi nabo bafise ifi ikanura (mu kwigina 'Shoes' Moshoeu na Mark Fish). "Vyari ibintu koko bigoye kwumva. Nibaza ko ryabaye iteka ku gihugu cose". Mw'ijambo yavuze imbere y'uko apfa mu 2015 ku myaka 49 ihitanywe na kanseri yo mu mushishito, Moshoeu yibutse ingene yaturitse akarira igihe umufana w'umuzungu amusavye ko yomuterera igikumu (autograph). Afrika y'Epfo yari ikiri mu bibazo bikomeye cane, inkino zonyene ntizishobora gutorera umuti ibibazo vyose. Ariko Mandela yarizeye ubushobozi bwazo. Ati: "Inkino zirafise ubushobozi bwo guhindura isi. Zifise inguvu zo kwigisha. Zifise ubushobozi bwo gushira hamwe abantu gusumba uko ibindi vyose vyobikora. "Inkino zirafise ubushobozi bwo kuzana icizere ahahoze harangwa umwiheburo. Zisumvya inguvu reta mu gusambura imitego ishingiye ku moko". Radebe yabonye impinduka mu kanya isase. Ati: "Kwumva abazungu bavuga ngo 'uri incungu yanje, ni wewe gusa nibonamwo' vyantumye nkorora amosozi kuko nibuka ivyo twari duhitiyemwo muri iyo myaka yose. Iyi yari yo Afrika y'Epfo nshasha". "Ubwenge bwacu bwarugurutse. Amaso yacu yariko abona ibintu birengeye ivyo twari tumaze imyaka n'imyaka tubona. Vyari koko ibintu biteye igomwe. Kubera gusa umupira w'amaguru". Tovey avuga ko uwu munezero wabandanije gushika ku rugero rurengeye iyi misi yakurikiye yo kwigina intsinzi. "Kuva ubwo abazungu benshi baciye batangura kuja barinjira mu bibuga kurorera inkino z'imirwi ikomakomeye na mpuzamakungu. Abantu b'ingeri zose babandanije badufata mu mugongo uko bukeye uko bwije. "Ivyo twakoreye igihugu vyabaye ibintu bidasanzwe. Abanyagihugu 10% canke 12% bakunda rugby, ariko umupira w'amaguru wakundwa ku rugero rwa 95%. Eka n'abazungu kuva ico gihe baciye bamenya Bafana Bafana. "Ariko uku si ugukengera ivyo abakinyi ba rugby bakoreye igihugu. Ni bo babaye aba mbere kubikora mu 1995, kandi bakoze ibikorwa vyinsha cane bidasanzwe". Iragi umupira w'amaguru wasize ni ingene Afrika y'Epfo yashoboye kuronka itike yo kuja mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru c'isi incuro zibiri yikurikiranya. Mu mahiganwa abiri yakurikiye y'igikombe ca Afrika, Afrika y'Epfo yatahukanye ikibanza ca kabiri n'ica gatatu. Mu bajejwe gufata ingingo, uwari arongoye FIFA ico gihe Joao Havelange yari yemereye Afrika ko ari yo yari gutegura ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2006. Impera n'imperuka vyahavuye biba mu 2010 muri Afrika y'Epfo. Nayo ku vyerekeye Tovey, Radebe na Bartlett - bazokwama baboneka  nk'intwari ku banyagihugu b'igihugu cabo. Tovey yarahawe agashimwe na Mandela. Avuga ati: "Nk'umukinyi, ukora ivyo utegerezwa gukora. Ariko inyuma y'imyaka 26 ngeze kuri iyi ntambwe, uwu mwanya namaranye nawe wari udasanzwe, udasanzwe na gato". "Amasanamu yiwe mu kabare kanje. Ni ikintu kidashobora kwibagirwa muri kahise k'igihugu. "Ntitwari gupfa dushitse aho twashitse iyo atava mw'ibohero ngo adusubize ku rubuga mpuzamakungu rw'umupira". Kubwa Radebe, iragi riza mu mutwe ningoga ni ihadabu yatangishijwe na muri Leeds. Ati:  "Inyuma ya finale, umumenyereza wa Leeds Howard (Wilkinson) yarampamagaye ambwira ati 'nkeneye kukubona muri irya ndege'. Nshitse i Yorkshire, mu mbeho izura inzara yo mu gihe kibi c'ubukonje. Oh, Mana yanje". "Twategerezwa kuva twashitse bukeye. Naciwe ihadabu y'umushahara w'indwi yose kubera nashitse harenzeko umusi umwe. Maze gushika muri Leeds nkabona ku mboneshakure imodoka itugaye iriko irazunguruka n'igikombe, mvugishije ukuri narababaye cane". "Abakinyi bagiye ku kibuga ca Sun City bari kumwe n'abagore babo hamwe n'abakunzi babo, nanje ndiko ndakina muri Leeds mu mbeho y'ubugesera yo mu kwa kabiri izura inzara, ntivyanyoroheye. "Nari ndindiriye ko ici rishika kugira ngo ihiganwa riheze nanje nshobore kuja muhira nkigina intsinzi". Hagati aho, intsinzi yaronse mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika si yo yabaye iya nyuma yamushize hamwe na Mandela. 'Madiba' yari mu batumire ku bugeni bwiwe. Ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe twigeze tubwira ko yari kuza. Jewe gusa n'umugore wanje ni twe twari tubizi. Nibaza ko nari mfise umunezero gusumba uwo nagize igihe mbwira umugore wanje ko twokwubaka". "Umugore yashitse isaha icenda, ariko Mandela we yari yashitse isaha umunani n'iminota 45 kuko atashaka ko abashitsi bitaho we aho kwitaho umugore wanje. Uyo ni we mugabo, umugabo yama akora ibintu vyose mu bushingatahe, ibi ni vyo bintu bikeya nshobora kugumana mu buzima bwanje. "Aha nta nkeka ko ndamufise mu mafoto. Ntushobora kubwira abantu ngo yaraje ku bugeni bwawe hanyuma ngo ubure ivyemezo".

column2: Diego Maradona: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru apfuye ku myaka 60
column3: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ku myaka 60. Uyu yahoze ari rutahizamu wo hagati wa Argentine akanaba umumenyereza, yarabazwe ubwonko kandi bigenda neza, igihe yagira ikibumbe c'amaraso mu bwonko mu ntango za kuno kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe. Vyaciye bitangazwa ko azovurwa ku kibazo yari afise co kwihebera inzoga. Maradona yari umwe mu bakinyi bakomeye isi imaze kubona, akaba yarabaye kapitene wa Argentine igihe yatwara igikombe co mu 1986, akina ku buryo buteye igomwe kandi bucibukwa n'ubu. Mu rwandiko rwashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro, ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Argentine ryavuze ko "tubabajwe cane n'urupfu rwa rurangiranwa wacu", ryongerako riti: "Uzokwama mu mitima yacu." Maradona yakiniye Barcelona na Napoli mu gukinira amakipe kwiwe, atwara ibikombe vya Serie A mu Butariyano. Yinjije ibitsindo 34 mu nkino 91 za Argentine, ayiserukira mi bikombe vy'isi bine. Maradona yashikanye igihugu ciwe mu rukino rwa nyuma mu gikombe c'isi co mu Butaliyano mu 1990, igihe batsindwa n'Ubudage bw'Uburengero, imbere y'uko asubira kuba kapitene mu gikombe c'isi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 1994, ariko aza gusubizwa muhira kubera gufata imiti yongera inguvu. Mu muce wa kabiri w'ugukina kwiwe, Maradona vyaramugoye kwihanganira ikiyovyabwenge ca cocaine aranahagarikwa gukina amezi 15 nyuma yo gusanganwa mu maraso ico kiyovyabwenge mu 1991. Yagiye mu bukukuruke mu mupira w'amaguru mu 1997, ku munsi yakwiza imyaka 37 y'amavuko, mu kiringo ca kabiri akinira ikipe ikomeye yo muri Argentine, Boca Juniors. Nyuma yo kumenyereza igihe gito amakipe abiri muri Argentine igihe yari agikina, Maradona yagenywe kuba umumenyereza w'ikipe y'igihugu mu 2008 aca ava muri ako kazi nyuma y'gikombe c'isi co mu 2010, igihe ikipe yiwe yatsindwa n'Ubudage mu ca kane c'ihiganwa. Mu nyuma yaje kumenyereza amakipe muri United Arab Emirates na Mexique, anamenyereza Gimnasia y Esgrima, ikipe ikomeye cane muri Argentine, gushika ku gihe c'urupfu rwiwe.

column2: South Korea: Kompanyi y'amata yasavye imbazi kubera yerekanye abagore nk'inka
column3: Kompanyi ya mbere nini y'amata muri Korea y'Epfo vyabaye ngombwa ko isaba imbabazi kubera video yo kwamamaza (publicité, advert) yerekana abagore nk'inka. Iyo video ya Seoul Milk yerekana umugabo ariko afata rwihishwa amashusho y'abagore bari mu murima, mu nyuma baca bahinduka inka. Imaze kunegurwa cane, iyo kompanyi yaciye ivana iyo publicité kuri YouTube, ariko kuva ico gihe imaze guhererekanywa cane inyuma yo gusubizwa  ku mbuga n'abakoresha internet. Bamwe bagereranije kandi inyifato y'uwo mugabo na "molka", ingeso itemewe yo gufata amashusho abantu rwihishwa. Ishami rya Seoul Milk, Seoul Dairy Cooperative ryavuze mu mbabazi ryashize kuri internet riti: "Turasavye imbabazi bivuye ku mutima ku muntu wese yababajwe n'iyo publicité y'amata yasohotse itariki 29 mu kwezi guheze". "Twemera ko iki kibazo gikomeye kandi tozokwisuzuma, hanyuma turushirizeho kwiyubara kugira ibintu nk'ibi ntibisubire gushika muri kazoza. Turicishije bugufi mu gusaba imbabazi". Iyo video itangura yerekana umugabo afise camera ariko yitembereza mu gahinga. Ijwi ry'umugabo ryumvikana rivuga ngo: "Amaherezo twashoboye kubafata amashusho na camera mu kibanza ciza cane". Aho haca hakurikira uwo mugabo yinyegeje mu bisaka, ariko afata amashusho rwihishwa umugwi w'abagore bariko baranywa amazi mu mugezi bongera bagira yoga. Hagera aho uwo mugabo ahonyora atabishaka kw'ishami ry'igiti, abo bagore bagaca bikanga buno nyene bagaca bahinduka inka. Iyo publicité irangizwa n'aya majambo: "Amazi meza, indya nziza, amata ya Seoul Milk ni  100%. Amata atagira akanenge, avuye mw'iraro ritagira akanenge mu murima uteye igomwe wa Cheongyang." Iyo publicité/advert yatumye haba impari zikomeye mu gihugu ku bijanye n'ivangura n'ibindi bibazo bishingiye ku bitsina ariko ibineguro ntivyagarukiye ku kwerekana abagore nk'inka gusa. Bamwe barerekanye amakenga yo kuba umugabo afata rwishishwa amashusho y'abagore, mu gihe ivyaha vyo gufata amashusho rwishishwa vyagwiriye cane muri Korea y'Epfo muri iyi myaka. Molka, bisigura "camera yinyegeje", ubu yabaye ikibazo kidasanzwe ku bagore muri Korea y'Epfo. Si ubwa mbere Seoul Milk ivugwa mu binyamakuru kubera imvo zitari nziza. Mu 2003, iyo kompanyi yatunganije agakino aho abanyamideri bari gusa basukanako ikivuguto   (yoghurt). Umukuru w'igisata co kwamamaza muri Seoul Milk hamwe n'abagize uruhara muri ako gakino baratangishijwe ihadabu kubera kwerekana ibiterasoni.

column2: Rwanda-UK: 'A﻿badatinya gupfa ntibazotinya kurungikwa mu Rwanda' -uwurungika abantu mu kinyegero
column3: Jane Corbin BBC Panorma Umuntu akora  urudandazwa rwo kwinjiza abantu mu kinyegero avuga ko umugambi w’Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda  abajabuka kurondera ubuhungiro muri ico gihugu utazoca intege abakiriya biwe. Jane Corbin yagiye kumuraba aho akorera muri Turkia. Ni ku mugoroba w’ijoro ubwo ndiko ndurira ingazi zinjana mu nzu ikoreraa mu kinyegero  iri ku kabarabara katagira izina muri Istanbul, muri Tirkia. Ndi ngaha kugira mbonane n’umwe mu bakora urudandazwa rw’abantu mu kinyegero – vyasavye amezi n’ayandi kugira hatunganywe uwu mubonano, biciye ku wundi muntu w’umwizigirwa. Ni umusozo w’igikorwa c’amatohoza ya BBC Panorama ku kugene bigenda ngo abantu ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bajabuke bashike  ku nkengera z’ubumanuko bw’Ubwongereza kurondera ubuhungiro. Uwo muntu akora urwo rudandazwa aturuka mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati- akiri muto kandi avuga bukebuke, yambaye neza impuzu zirabura.  Yemeye kumbwira ivyerekeye urudandazwa rwiwe twemeye kudashira ahabona umwidondoro wiwe. Abamucungerera umutekano bari hanze baraba agakoma kose, ariko atawomenya ko arico bajejwe. Ndamubwiye ko kwinjiza abantu mu kinyegero biteye kubiri n’amategeko, ati : ”Ndazi ko ivyo bitemewe n’amategeko, ariko kuri jewe, ivyo bijanye n’ubuntu -kubikora bikenewe kuruta kwubaha amategeko. "Dufasha abantu, tubafata neza, turubaha  abagore -nta n’umwe dusuzugura canke ngo tugirire nabi.” Mu mwaka uheze hafi abantu 2.000 barapfiriye mu kiyaga Mediterranee. Mu kwezi kwa Ndamukiza (4), reta y’Ubwomgereza yumvikanye n’Urwanda ku masezerano aciye miriyoni 120 z’amafaranga y’abongereza canke pound (£), yo kurungika abarondera ubuhungiro cane cane abakiri  bonyene (batagira abagore, abagabo canke abana) kugira ivy’ubuhungiro bwabo bikorerwe mu Rwanda. Reta yavuze ko intumbero ari uguca intege urwo rudandazwa rw’abinjiza abantu mu kinyegero no guhagarika ingendo zibangamye  zo kujabuka ikiyaga Manche (English Channel). Gushika ubu muri uyu mwaka,  abantu barenga 30.000 baramaze kujabuka n’ubwato, abo  bahakwa kungana n’abajabutse mu mwaka uheze wose. Uwo muntu arungika abantu mu kinyegro arungika amajana mu Bwongereza. Ntateba kwemera ko urwo rudandazwa rwiwe rwinjiza amafaranga menshi kandi ko arufata nk’uko yoba ari ucucuruzi. Avuga ati: “Sindaba ko ari umuryango canke umuntu umwe, umuntu wese ariha  amafaranga angana n’ayo abandi. “Urugendo rwo gushika Bwongereza rusaba amadorari 17.000 [mu mafaranga y’Uburundi arenga 34.000.000] muri rusangi. None asigura gute ingene ashira ubuzima bw’abantu mu kaga mu kubajabutsa mu buryo bubangamye mu bwato  budafashe? Avuga ati: “Amasanganya arashobora gushika. Turagerageza kubatera ubwoba kugira tubace intege. “Ndababwira nti, ‘Iyo nzira irabangamye cane, ntakwigerezako. Mushobora gupfa. Nkabibwira nyina, nkabibwira na se.’” Yatweretse urupapuro - buzuza kugira bemere ko ataco azobazwa, kandi bemere ko bazi ko birimwo ingeramizi. Istambul ni mu  masanganiro hagati  ya Asia, Uburasirazuba bwo hagati, Afrika na Buraya- kandi uru rudandazwa rwo mu kinyegero rurateye imbere cane  ngaha. Kuronka abakiriya ni ihiganwa. Ku mbuga hwaniro, abinjiza abantu mu kinyegero batanga ibiciro bitandukanye bivanye n’iyo umuntu ashaka kuja. Hariho impapuro z’inzira za megendo (passports) n’impusha zo gutwara imodoka z’Ubwongereza zigurishwa. Hariho  mbere n’ibibazo vy’ubushikiranganji bw’Ubwongereza bujejwe intwaro yo  hagati kugira  bategure abaja kurondera ubuhungiro kwimenyereza kuvyishura. Uwo ajana abantu mu kinyero akura abakiriya biwe mu mazu akorera mu kinyegero muri iki gisagara, gisanzwe kirimwo impunzi zishika ku 5.000.000. Barundanirizwa mu twumba  duto duto, aho bashobora kurindirira amezi mu gihe urugendo rwabo ruba ruriko ruratunganywa. Abakozi biwe barabazanira ivyo kurya baguze mu masoko ya kijambere  (supermarkets) yo ngaho. Asigura ati: “Tubashira mu nzu tukarindira ko vyose bitungana. Vyose bikwiye, duca tukaba ama terefone yabo  kugira abaporisi ntibamenye ivyacu.” Abo barondera ubuhungiro baca burizwa imodoka mw’ijoro kuva Istanmbul bakajanwa mu misozi. Bagenda mu migwi y’abantu batandatu batandatu canke cumi cumi, gushika ku kiyaga Mediterranee, kuri bumwe mu bwato bw’uyo abajana mu kinyegero. Aho baca berekeza mu Butaliano canke mu Buguriki. Reta yavuze ko intumbero ari uguca intege urwo rudandazwa rw’abinjiza abantu mu kinyegero no guhagarika ingendo zibangamye  zo kujabuka ikiyaga Manche (English Channel).
