Uwo muntu arungika abantu mu kinyegro arungika amajana mu Bwongereza. Ntateba kwemera ko urwo rudandazwa rwiwe rwinjiza amafaranga menshi kandi ko arufata nk’uko yoba ari ucucuruzi. Avuga ati: “Sindaba ko ari umuryango canke umuntu umwe, umuntu wese ariha  amafaranga angana n’ayo abandi. “Urugendo rwo gushika Bwongereza rusaba amadorari 17.000 [mu mafaranga y’Uburundi arenga 34.000.000] muri rusangi. None asigura gute ingene ashira ubuzima bw’abantu mu kaga mu kubajabutsa mu buryo bubangamye mu bwato  budafashe? Avuga ati: “Amasanganya arashobora gushika. Turagerageza kubatera ubwoba kugira tubace intege. “Ndababwira nti, ‘Iyo nzira irabangamye cane, ntakwigerezako. Mushobora gupfa. Nkabibwira nyina, nkabibwira na se.’” Yatweretse urupapuro - buzuza kugira bemere ko ataco azobazwa, kandi bemere ko bazi ko birimwo ingeramizi. Uwo ukora urwo rudandazwa arabihakana, ariko biravugwa ko hari uwapfiriye mu bwato bwiwe. Aratwereka amwe mu ma video -abantu bakiri bato baharurwa mu mirongo buzuye ubwato bazungagiza ibiganza, basemerera, bamushimira. Ivyo ni icemezo ko bajabutse. Amafaranga baba barishe urwo rugendo aba afiswe n’abantu bari hagati y’uwo mudandaza n’abo barungikwa, akaba atangwa ari uko imiryango ibonye ko bashitse amahoro. Uwo mudandaza aranafise n’ingene arungika abifise bashobora kuriha menshi kuruta. Abo barondera ubuhungiro rero baca bafata inzira baca i Buraya gushika ku nkengera z’uburaruko bw’Ubufaransa, hanyuma bamwe, bagaca bajabuka Manche (English Channel) kugira bashike mu Bwongereza. Hari urufatangane rw’abantu bakwiragiye ku 100km mu micungaro ya Calais bo gufasha uwo ajana abantu mu kinyegro wo muri Turkia kujabuka imitego ya nyuma. Avuga ati: “Tugura ubwato butoya. Butwara hagati ya $10.000 na $20.000. “Umwe mu babugendamwo aca aronka urugendo rwa gusa kuko yemeye kubutwara. Baca bagenda ata handi baciye, bashitse bagaca bishikana ku giporisi.” Asa n’uwufise amakenga, abamucungera bibaza ko bahava bamenyekana. Iryanyuma nabonye uwo atwara abantu mu kinyegero yariko aragura ubundi bwato nk’ubwo kugira bajabuke. Urundazwa rwiwe, aho gusamburwa, ruguma rukomera. Ibitigiri vy’abantu bajabuka biguma  vyiyongeraa kurusha, mu gihe reta y’Ubwongereza yasubiye muri sentare gusigura ko umugambi wo mu Rwanda ata kibazo uteye kandi uhuye n’amategeko. Ingingo ya sentare yo kumenya niba iyo reta yotangura kurungika abo bantu mu Rwanda  yitezwe mu kwezi kuza. Uwo mukenyuro wa reta hari ico uzohindura? Ndamubajije. Ati: “N’aho borungika abantu 1.000 mu Rwanda buri munsi, abantu ntibazohagarika canke ngo  bahindure ingingo yabo. “Niba badatinya gupfa, ntibazotinya kurungikwa mu Rwanda.”

column2: Spice Diana ati 'Nsaba Imana ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza'
column3: Igisata c'umuziki muri Uganda kiriko kiratera imbere, kandi kirimwo abacuraranzi batari bake b'abagore bamaze gutera imbere. Spice Diana afise indirimbo zitari nke amaze gusohora ubu akaba ariko aritegurira urukurikirane rwiwe rwa mbere. Aherutse kandi no gushirwa ku rutonde rw'abahiganira agashimwe kitiriwe MTV Africa Music Awards  (MAMA). "Iri genwa ryantumye mbona ko nkwiye gukora ntagoheka kubera vyanyeretse ko umuziki wanje ushimwa ku mbuga mpuzamakungu hamwe no muri Afrika". "Numva umengo bambwiye bati: 'Hey, Spicey. Usanzwe ukora ibikomeye, rero utegerezwa kwihata gusumba'." Spice Diana avuga ko ibihe bigoye Uganda yari imazemwo iminsi vyagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki, akipfuza ko ibintu vyosubira mu buryo kugira ngo ibikorwa vyabo bibandanya ukuri kwamye. Spice Diana yabwiye ikiganiro This Is Africa (Iyi Ni Afrika)  ko umurwi w'abana batamba wiyise Triplets Ghetto Kids ari wo watumye ashobora gushika aho ageze. Yarabakunda cane, bimutuma abona ko akwiye kuza arabandikira indirimbo, ariko bobo bamubonyemwo ubushobozi: Ati: "Muri jewe nibwira nti: 'Oya, kuririmba ntavyo nshoboye', ariko bobo muri bo bavuga bati 'Urashobora kuririmba!' Si niyemera, ariko abo bana baranteye intege nyinshi, ku buryo nabona ntobahemukira". Umwaka uheze ntiworoheye abanyamuziki muri Uganda. Mu bitandukanye n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi byo muri Afrika, Uganda yarafashe amategeko yo kubabuza ibikorwa vyabo. Igihe abanyamuziki ba Nijeriya, Omar Ley na Tems bakora igiteramo cabo, birengagije amategeko ya Covid-19, abanyamuziki benshi ba Uganda barashavuye cane. Spice Diana ati: "Twarashavuye cane, ariko mu nyuma twamenye ko ari umunya Uganda yari yateguye ico giteramo, maze twifatanya n'aba banyanijeriya kubera twabonye ko igiporisi cakoze nabi kubahagarika mu gihe atari bo bari bagiteguye". Spice Diana  avuga kandi ko imigumuko yagiye yibonekeza mu gihugu igihe cariko citegurira amatora yagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki ba Uganda. Ati: "Abantu benshi baratakaje ubuzima bwabo, abandi baratakaza ubuzi bwabo, hanyuma igihe cose ivyo bibaye, abakunzi bacu baba biteze ko hagira ico tuvuze". Ati: "Rimwe na rimwe, usanga ata vyinshi uzi muri poritike - ugaca usanga iyo ubuze ico ushikiriza, abantu baraguhevye mbere n'umuziki wawe bakawuheba". "Rero nsaba ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza inyuma y'ibi vyose".

column2: Umuyabaga wa Barcelona ava Guinée-Bissau, Ansu Fati w’imyaka 16, yahawe ubwenegihugu bwa Espagne
column3: Umuyabaga Ansu Fati w'imyaka 16 akinira Barcelona yahawe ubwenegihugu bwa Espanye, ikaba ari inzira yuguruwe ngo ico gihugu gishobore kumukinisha mu nkino mpuzamakungu. Uyo muyabaga w'imyaka 16 afise kandi uburenganzira bw'ugukinira igihugu ciwe c'amavukiro ca  Guinée-Bissau , ariko kandi agashobora n'ugukinira Portugal aho sekuru na inakuru basanzwe bari. Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati nibwo bwafashe ico cemezo c'ukumwemerera igisabo ciwe inyuma y'aho akwirije imyaka 10 aba muri ico gihugu nk'uko bisabwa n'amategeko. Ivyo bivuga ko Fati ashobora gukinira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espanye mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi c'umupira w'amaguru w'abatarenza imyaka 17 ryimirije gutangura muri Brezili ku wa 26 z'ukwezi kw'icumi uno mwaka. Ariko n'aho azokinira Espanye mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'abatarenza imyaka 17, amategeko agenga ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi FIFA avuga ko ashobora guhindura agakina mu murwi w'abakuze. Ku munsi wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, Fati yabaye umukinyi wa mbere muto cane akiniye Barcelona mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere mu bihugu vyabo (Champions League), mu rukino rwayihuje na Borussia Dortmund rukarangira ari 0-0. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 16 ariko yerekana ibintu bidasanzwe mu mupira w'amaguru mu murwi wiwe Barcelona, ibitangaza abatari bake ku myaka yiwe. Mu nkino zine gusa za mbere Barcelona imaze gukina mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Espanye, La Liga, Fati amaze gutsinda ibitsindo bibiri. Yatanguye gukinira Barcelona igihe uyo murwi wahura na Real Betis, akaba yagiye kwinjira mu kibuga ku munota wa 78 asubiriye umukinyi yitwa Perez. Fati yatangujwe mu kibuga ubwa mbere igihe Barcelona yatana mu mitwe na Valencia ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze, aho yataye abantu mu gahundwe mu gutsinda igitsindo ca mbere ku munota wa kabiri gusa urukino rutanguye, rukaba rwagiye kurangira Barcelona inyagiye Valencia ibitsindo 5 kuri 2.

column2: Uganda Election 2021: Bariko baraharura amajwi y'amatora
column3: Hatanguye guharurwa amajwi y'amatora yabaye kuri uyu wa kane muri Uganda mu mutekano wakajijwe cane kuva hasigaye isaha imwe ngo gutora birangire. Imodoka zzirimwo abasirikare zanyuragiye ku murwa mukuru Kampala, igipolisi naco n'banyagihugu bicungerera umutekano bakaba bariko barakizura. Mu bibanza bimwe bimwe gutira kwabandanije inyuma y'isaha ico gikorwa categerezwa  gugararariko. Amategeko agenga gutora avuga ko abantu bose basanzwe  ku mirongo barekuriwe gutora inyuna y'isaha yo guhagarika ico gikorwa. Prezida Yoweri Museveni amaze imyaka 35 atwara Uganda arondera ikindi kiringo kigira gatandatu c'ubutegetsi. Museveni w'imyaka 76 ahiganwa n'abandi 10, ukomeye cane muri bo akaba ari Robert Kyagulanyi azwi cane nka Boby Wine, umuririmvyi n'umunyepolitike w'imyaka 38. Imyiyamamazo yaranzwe n'intureka irimwo n'ubwicanyi vyatose cane cane abatavuga rumwe na reta. Ku munsi w'amatora ariko  ahanini nta ngorane z'umutekano zavuzwe. Ivyavuye mu matora bizomenyeshwa ku wa gatandatu. Internet n'imbuga hwaniro   vyarahagaritswe. N'uburyo bwo guhanahana amafaranga ku buhinga bushasha ntibwakora.

column2: Britney Spears: Se yasavye guhagarika guhagararira inyungu ziwe zose
column3: Se wa Britney Spears yatanze impapuro muri sentare ya Los Angeles asaba kurangiza ubuhagarikizi yari amazemwo imyaka 13 bwatuma akurikirana ubuzima n'amatungo vy'umukobwa wiwe. Jamie Spears yanditse ko Britney "afise uburenganzira ko iyo sentare yokwihweza yitonze ko ubwo buhagarikizi butagikenewe". Britney yaragerageje kumwaka ubwo burenganzira incuro zibiri zose mu myaka ibiri iheze. Uwo muririmvyi rurangiranwa wa Pop yavuga ko imigenderanire bafitaniye yari iyo "agacinyizo" aranahagarika kuremesha ibiteramo igihe yari akimuhagarariye. Se wiwe yandikiye sentare inyuma y'amezi abiri uwo muririmvyi afata ibiyayuramutwe atangiye ubuhamya bukarishe muri sentare, asaba ko ubwo buhagarikizi burangira vuba na bwangu. Muri izo mpapuro zarungikiwe sentare nkuru ya Los Angeles handitswe ngo:" Ibiherutse kuvuga kuri ubwo buhagarikizi bwazanye ikibazo co kumenya nimba icatumye buhaba carahindutse ku buryo bitagikenewe ko bubandanya?" Urwo rwandiko rurabandanya, avuga ko umukobwa wiwe yipfuza kwikurikiranira ibibazo vyo kwa muganga hamwe n'ivyerekeye amahera. Rubandanya rugira ruti "Nk'uko Spears atahengeshanije kubivuga, ico ashaka gusa n'icobera ciza umukobwa wiwe." "Niyaba Britney Spears ashaka kurangiza ubwo buhagariki kandi akaba yumva ko ashobora ashobora gufata mu minwe ivyerekeye ubuzima bwiwe, se wiwe Spears avuga ko akwiye guhabwa ayo mahirwe." Britney Spears yigeze kuvuga ko se wiwe amufata nabi cane kandi ko yigeze kumutera ubwoba ko azomubuza kuraba abana biwe mu gihe atokwemera ivyo amusaba. Mu kwezi kw'indwi, yabwiye umucamanza ko yipfuza kwitwarira se wiwe, w'imyaka 69, ko yakoresheje nabi ububasha bwo guhagarikira inyungu ziwe. Twashitse aha gute? Ubuhagarikizi bwategetswe gushirwaho mu 2008 igihe hari amakenga ku magara yo mu mutwe y'uwo muririmvyi. Sentare yahaye uburenganzire Jamie Spears kugenzura inzu y'umukobwa iwe hamwe n'ibindi bintu bijanye n'ubuzima bwiwe. Ubwo buhagarikizi bwari mu bice bibiri. Kimwe kubijanye n'inzu hamwe n'amahera, ikindi cerekeye umukobwa wiwe ubwiwe nk'umuntu. Spears yatanze imihoho mu bijanye no gukurikirana umukobwa wiwe mu 2019 kubera ubugwayi yari afise, ariko abandanya kuraba ivyerekeye ibikorwa vyiwe bimwinjiriza amahera.

column2: U﻿kraine ibandanya gushora intete n'aho Uburusiya bwikuye mu masezerano
column3: Ikigo gihagarariwe na UN/ONU kigenzura ingene intete zishorwa ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura ki vuga ko u﻿bundi bwato butatu bwahagurutse muri Ukraine ku musi wa kabiri, n'aho uburusiya bwafashe ingingo yo kwivana muri ayo amasezerano. I﻿co kigo kivuga ko ubwo bwato 'bwemerewe kugenda na Ukraine, Turkia na Onu, mu gihe uburusiya na bwo "bwabimenyeshejwe". K﻿u musi wa mbere, amato 12 atwaye amatone 354.500 y'ibifungurwa yarahagurutse muri Ukraine. U﻿burusiya bwahagaritse gushigikira ayo masezerano ku musi wa gatandatu, bwagiriza Ukraine gukoresha inzira ubwato bucamwo mu gutera  amato yabwo y'intambara. O﻿nu ivuga ko ata bwato na bumwe bwariko buraca muri iyo nzira muri iryo joro. U﻿kraine ntiyigeze yemanga kugira uruhara muri ico gitero ca Crimme  - izinga rya Ukraine riri mu bumanuko ryigaruriwe n'Uburusiya mu 2014. P﻿rezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya "gukangisha inzara amakungu" - ivyo Uburusiya buhakana. I﻿co kigo gifise icicaro I Istanbul ntikiramenyesha ivyo ubwo bwato butatu bwavuye muri Ukraine ku wa kabiri bwikoreye. U﻿burusiya nta co buravuga kuri ivyo. U﻿muzigo wo kuri uyu wa mbere ni wo wambere munini utwaye ku musi umwe kuva ayo masezerano yo gutwara intete atanguye gushirwa mu bikorwa, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuvugizi w'ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Odesa aho yasubiwemwo na Reuters. Ubwo butegetsi bwongeyeko ko bumwe mu bwato butwaye amatoni 40.000 y'intete bwari bugenewe igihugu ca Ethiopia, aho "hashobora gutera amapfa." I﻿nyuma y'aho Uburusiya butereye Ukraine mu kwezi kwa kabiri, amato yabwo yaciye yugariza ibivuko vya Ukraine vyo ku kiyaga cirabura, bwugaranirayo imiliyoni 20 z'intete zigenewe gutwarwa hagati mu gihugu, harimwo n'ibindi bifungurwa nk'ibigori n'amavuta y'ibihoke. A﻿riko mu kwezi kw'indwi harabonetse amasezerano hagati y'Uburusiya na Ukraine bafashijwe na Turkia na Onu, bituma hashobora gusubira gushorwa intete ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura. A﻿riko ku musi wa mbere, prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yavuze ko ayo masezerano yahagaritswe , avuga ko ari kubera ibitero "vyinshi" vy'indege zitagira umudereva ku mato yabwo ku bivuko vya Sevastopol aho yavuze ko Ukraine ibifisemwo uruhara. Y﻿avuze ko hategerezwa kubanza kubaho umutekano wo mu mazi, ko kwubahiriza amasezerano yo gushora intete bikimeze uko koba ari ukwigerezako. M﻿w'ijambo ryiwe ku mboneshakure, prezida Putin yagize ati:"Ukraine itegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ko ubwato butwara abantu butazogeramigwa." U﻿kraine ntiyemeje ko yagize uruhara muri ivyo bitero, ikavuga ko Uburusiya bwateguye kuva kera kwivana muri ayo masezerano mpuzamakungu, mu kugira icitwazo ivyo bitero. U﻿muvugizi w'ibiro vya prezida w'Uburusiya, Dmitry Peskov yagize ati:"Mu gihe Uburusiya buvuga ko bidashoka kwemanga umutekano wo muri ako karere, ayo masezerano aragoye gushirwa mu bikorwa, yafashe iyindi ntumbero - harimwo ukwigerezako kurengeje. U﻿kwikura muri ayo masezerano kw'Uburusiya kwatewe ivyatsi na Amerika, yavuze ko ico ico gihugu "kiriko kirakoresha imfungurwa nk'ikigwanisho". J﻿oseph Borrell ajejwe imigenderanire y'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya EU n'amakungu, yateye akamo Uburusiya kwisubirako, avuga ko kubuza urudandazwa rw'intete n'umwavu bishobora gutera ikibazo c'inzara kw'isi. U﻿wuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika yamiriye kure ivyo vyagiriji ko igihugu ciwe kiriko kiratuma haba inzara kw'isi, yemeza ko ari akarenganyo kunebagura igihugu ciwe. U﻿burusiya bwafashe iyo ngingo mu gihe bwemeza ko bwaguye igikorwa co gukura abantu mu karere bwigaruriye ka Kherson, n'aho bwari bwavuze, mu mpera z'iyinga, bwari bwarangije ico gikorwa.

column2: 'Igituririre ni cinshi muri Afrika y'Epfo' - Akanama ka Zondo
column3: Inyuma y'icegeranyo gishira ahagaragara ubusuma bw'ama miriyaridi y'amadolari mu kigega ca reta ya Afrika y'epfo ku ntwaro y'uwamubanjirije, prezida Cyril Ramaphosa yariyemeje ko "ivyo bitazosubira kuba ." Ariko abanye Afrika y'epfo ntibemera ko hari icigwa bakuyemwo. Barababajwe no kuba amahera yibwe yari gukoreshwa mu bisata vy'amagara y'abantu n'uburezi muri ico gihugu. Ayo matohoza akomeye ku giturire co ku ntwaro ya prezida Jacob Zuma yerekanye ingene nk'ibisata vyose vya reta vyanigiwe mu menshi, birononwa n'abategetsi ba ANC  (African National Congress), uri ku butegetsi kuva mu 1994 harangiye intwaro y'abazungu bari ku rushi. Iki cegeranyo cagiriza ahanini uwo mugambwe. Prezida Ramaphosa ubwiwe yabwiwe n'ako kanama karongowe n'umucamanza, ko atakoze ibikwiye mu gukumira ubwo busuma igihe yari icegera ca Zuma. Impapuro zirenga 5.000, akanama Zondo - kiswe izina ry'umucamanza wo mu rwego rwo hejuru akarongoye - karerekana ido n'ido ry'ingene ubutunzi bwa reta bwibwe. Kiranerekana ingene abagwizatunga bavukana bo mu muryango wa Gupta, bagerageje kugira uruhara mu ngingo za politike n'ubutunzi mu ntumbero yiswe  "kwigarurira reta". Zuma yirukanywe ku butegetsi mu 2018 yagirizwa igiturire caguma congerekana, hanyuma Ramaphosa aca afata ubutegetsi yiyemeje guhanagura ivyo vyose. Igice ca nyuma c'ico cegeranyo c'akanama ka Zondo cashikirijwe ku musi wa gatatu. Prezida akaba yavuze ko ivyo babonye ari "iceyi kuri demokrasi yacu kandi vyahonyanze uburenganzira bw'abanye Afrika y'Epfo bose." Ariko bimwe muvyo ico cegeranyo casozerereyeko ni gusigira ibibazo prezida ahari ubu ategerezwa kwishura vyerekeye impamvu vyabaye arorera. Ico cegeranyo kigira kiti: "Hari inkuru nyinshi zifise ifatiro zamenyekanye (...) zashobora kumutuma agira amatohoza akanafata n'ingingo kuri bimwe bivugwa bikomeye. "Nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, yari afise ububasha bwo kubikora." Mu ntango ayo matohoza yategerezwa kuba mu misi 180, ariko ukurengukisha abantu vyatwaye imisi 400 aho ivyabona 300 vyabajijwe. Ico gikorwa cose catwaye imyaka ine. Ivyemezo vyarerekanye ingene abategetsi ba ANC, harimwo abashikiranganji b'ubu n'abakera bagiye canke bafashije mu busuma  vyatumye igihugu gihomba amahera menshi. Muri ivyo harimwo kubuza gukora igisata kijejwe gutoza amakori mu gihugu, gupfukama mu nda ishirahamwe ry'indege South Africa Airways, kwiba amahera mu gisata kijejwe ingendo za gariyamoshi muri ico gihugu no mu kwivanga mu biraba ikinyamakuru ca reta, SABC. Igisata kijejwe iperereza na co nyene caragabanuwe inguvu mu kugena abakozi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru babujije ko haba amatohoza babisabwe na Zuma n'abandi bantu bifatwa ko bamwegereye.

column2: Urucanco Ervebo rwa Ebola rwemewe muri RD Congo, mu Burundi, muri Ghana no muri Zambia
column3: Ibihugu bine vya Afrika- Repubulika y'intwaro rusangi ya Congo, u Burundi, Ghana na Zambia - vyemeje urucanco rwa Ebola rukaba rushobora gutangura gutangwa. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu, OMS/WHO rimenyesha ko iyo ari intambwe ikomeye mu rugamba wo kurwanya ico kiza. Ivyigwa vy'intangamarara vyerekana ko urwo rucanco, Ervebo rwakozwe n'ikompanyi Merck rushobora gukinga gushika ku rugero rwa 97,5%. Ivyo vyigwa vyerekana kandi ko urwo rucanco ruhawe abamaze kwandura rushobora kubongerereza amahirwe yo kubandanya babaho. Igihugu ca RD Congo  gihanzwe n'ico kiza kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani 2018 kikaba kimaze guhitana abantu bagera ku 2.249. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe OMS, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, ati: "Ni intambwe nshasha  kubona urwo rucanco rwemewe muri ivyo bihugu mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ico kiza ruburakigongwe". "Afrika yarashize inguvu hamwe kugira ngo ikomeze intambwe imaze gushikwako bigoranye mu gukingira abanyagihugu bayo umugera wa Ebola". Nivyo ko igitigiri c'abandura Ebola muri RD Congo cagabanutse bimwe bishimishije, ariko umutekano muke n'amayira ameze nabi mu burere bubangamiwe bibandanya kuba ibibazo ngorabahizi. Ivyo ni ibishikirizwa na muganga Michel Yao ajejwe ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi ku rwego rwa Afrika mw'ishirahamwe OMS, igihe yavugana na BBC ejo ku wa Mungu. Avuga ko muri ino minsi hibonekeje abantu bake cane banduye uwo mugera. Ati: "Twari dufise uburere bw'ubuvuzi bbubangamiwe bushika 29. Ubu dufise uburere bw'ubuvuzi bubiri gusa bubangamiwe, kamwe muri bwo kamaze iminsi ine ata wanduye, akandi nako haheze iminsi 17". Avuga kandi ko igitigiri c'abandura ku ndwi "cagabanutse bimwe biboneka", akavuga ko ubu ku ndwi hashobora kuboneka hagati ya bane na batanu banduye uwo mugera. Muri kino gihe, hari abashika 1800 bakurikiranirwa hafi, bitandukanye no mu kwa kane kw'umwaka uheze aho babarirwa mu 20.000, ico kibaba ari ikimenyetso ko habaye intambwe, nk'uko bivugwa na bamwe mu bahinga mu vyo amagara y'abantu muri Congo. Abajijwe ko kutoba ari ukwihuta mu kuvuga ko habaye iterambere mu kurwanya ico kiza, siko abibona, akavuga ko ibiharuro vyonyene arivyo bivyerekana.

column2: Whoopi Goldberg yahagaritswe na ABC kubera amajambo yavutse kw’ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abayahudi
column3: Whoopi Goldberg yahagaritswe mu biganiro vyo kuri televiziyo yo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika inyuma y'aho avugiye ko ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abayahudi (rikunze kwitwa "Holocaust")  ryavuye ku "mirwi ibiri y'abazungu". ABC News ivuga ko Goldberg azomara indwi zibiri atabonetse inyuma "y'amajambo yiwe y'ibinyoma kandi ababaje". Uyu munyatugenegene akongera akaba umuntu azwi cane ku mboneshakure yavugiye mu kiganiro ca ABC, The View, ko ihonyabwoko aba Nazi bakoreye Abayahudi ritari "rishingiye ku bwoko". Aba Nazi, bo biyita ko ari "ubwoko busumba amoko yose" bw'aba Aryens/Aryan, bagandaguye Abayahudi bagera ku miriyoni zitandatu muri iryo honyabwoko. Yarasavye imbabazi ariko aca akora ayandi makosa mu gihe yariko agerageza gusigura amajambo yavuze mu kiganiro kindi cabaye mw'ijoro. Mw'itangazo ryaraye ryandikiwe abakozi mw'ijoro ry'ejo ku wa kabiri, umukuru wa ABC News Kim Godwin  yanditse ati: "Kuva ubu nyene, ndahagaritse vy'agateganyo Whoopi Goldberg mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri ku majambo yiwe y'ibinyoma kandi ababaje". "N'aho Whoopi yasavye imbabazi, namusavye afate akanya ko kwiyumvira yongere yige ku nkurikizi z'amajambo yiwe. "Ishirahamwe ryose rya ABC News ririfatanije na bagenzacu bose b'Abayahudi, incuti n'umuryango wose w'Abayahudi". Yongerako ati: "Izi ngingo ntizoroshe na gato, ariko ni nkenerwa", nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru Hollywood Reporter co muri Amerika. "Mu ndwi iheze, namenyesheje ko umuco wa ABC News utomoye, usonera buri muntu, uhuza bose, ugasonera bose kandi ukorera mu muco. Amajambo ya Whoopi ntajanye n'izi ndangagaciro". Mu masaha ya kare y'ejo ku wa kabiri, Goldberg yasavye imbabazi ubugira gatatu. "Mu kiganiro, yavuze ati: "Ejo mu kiganiro naravuze nabi". "Ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abayahudi ubusanzwe rishingiye ku bwoko, kuko Hitler n'aba Nazi bafata ko Abayahudi ari ubwoko bwo hasi". "Ubu, amajambo afise uburemere, kandi na rwanje ni uko nyene. Ndababajwe n'amajambo yanje kandi ndemeye ko nakoze amakosa. Ndifatanije kandi n'abayahudi". Uyu munyatugenegene yigeze gutsindira agashimwe ka Oscar akaba aremesha ikiganiro The View kuva mu 2007, yatanguye kuvuga aya majambo yateje impari mu kiganiro co ku wa mbere igihe yariko avuga ku ngingo y'ishure ryo muri Teneessee yo kubuza igitabo c'ibicapo ku bijanye n'ihonyabwoko ry'Abayahudi ku mvo z'uko ngo cerekana abantu bambaye ubusa, kigacafuza kandi kikerekana abiyahura. Bimaze kuvyura icuka kibi, yaciye asaba imbabazi haciye amasaha make. Ariko  mu kiganiro ca CBS, The Late Show, cari kiremeshejwe na Stephen Colbert ku wa mbere mw'ijoro, mu gihe yariko agerageza gusigura amajambo yashikirije, yavuze ko aba Nazi babeshe kandi ko mu bisanzwe bari bafise ibibazo bishingiye ku bwoko atari ku rukoba, amajambo yateje ibindi bibazo. Si bwo bwa mbere Goldberg ateje ibibazo. Mu 2009, yavuze ko indongozi y'amareresi Roman Polanski  - yari yemeye icaha co gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'umwana muto" mu 1997 - ata caha co "gufata ku nguvu nya gufata ku nguvu" yakoze. Yarashigikiye kandi Bill Cosby yagirizwa ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu, imbere y'uko yigarura amaze kubona ko yateje icuka kibi.

column2: Umunonotsi wa Afrika 2021: Urutonde rwa BBC rw’abazotorwamwo rwasohotse
column3: Urutonde rwa BBC rw'abazotorwamwo umunonotsi yenuriye abandi mu 2021 mu banonotsi b'abanye-Afrika (BBC African Sports Personality of the Year) rwashizwe ahabona - kandi urashobora gutora uwo ubona ko ariwe yofata ico kibanza. Abo bahiganirwa iryo teka uko ari batandatu batowe n'umugwi w'abamenyeshamakuru bo hirya no hino muri Afrika hamwe no mu Bwongereza. Uwo mugwi watoye urutonde ushingiye ku ho Afrika yashitse ku rugero rwiza kurusha ahandi mu nkino ku rwego mpuzamakungu mu 2021 (hagati y'ukwezi kwa mbere n'ukwezi kw'icenda). Ico umukinyi yafashije birenze kuba ubwiwe yashitse kure mu nkino navyo vyarashingiweko. Ubandanije usoma hari ayandi makuru menshi kuri abo batoranijwe, aho nawe ushobora gutora uwo ushaka ko atsinda. Gutora bizorangira 23:59 GMT (ni ukuvuga 21:59 mu masaha yo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda)  ku wa mungu , itariki 19 ukwezi kwa 12  hanyuma uwatsinze atangazwe ku wa gatanu,  itariki 7 ukwezi kwa mbere  2022 mu kiganiro  Focus On Africa ca BBC kuri television no kuri radio hamwe no ku rubuga rw'inkino rwa BBC Sport. Iguhugu:  Kenya Imyaka: 37 Ico akinamwo: Yiruka marathon Ashobora kuba ari we mwirutsi wa mbere anyaruka kuri marathon mu bihe vyose hanyuma uyu mwaka,  Eliud Kipchoge yashimangiye ikibanza ciwe  inyuma yo gutahukana umudari w'inzahabu ugira kabiri yikurikiranya mu nkino za Olympic. Mu gihe yabaye uwugira gatatu mu kugwanira kugumana umudari wa Olympic muri marathon, uwo munya-Kenya mu nyuma yaciye ahabwa igihagararo c'umunonotsi  w'umugabo w'urwego mpuzamakungu rw'inkino za Olympic (International Olympic Committee). Gutahukana umudari i Tokyo vyasiguye ko atsinze 13 kuri marathon 15 amaze kwiruka kuva atanguye kwiruka kuri ico kirere mu 2013, mu vyo amaze gushikako  hakaba harimwo umwanya wa mbere mwiza kw'isi wa  2:01:39  yagize i Berlin mu  2018. Ku myaka 36,  yabaye uwutsinze marathon muri Olympic w'imyaka myinshi kurusha abandi kuva umunya-Portugal Carlos Lopez ayitsinze ku myaka 37 mu 1984 kandi akaba yatsinze ku budasa bw'umwanya bwa mbere bunini kuva mu 1972. Igihugu: Kenya Imyaka: 27 Ico akinamwo: Yiruka ibirere biri hagati na hagati Faith Kipyegon yagize umwanya wa mbere mwiza wa Olympic igihe yagwanira kugumana umudari wiwe yari yatsindiye ubwa mbere mu nkino za Rio mu 2016. Uwo mugore w'umunya-Kenya yageneye intsinzi yiwe umwana wiwe w'umukobwa w'imyaka itatu, avuga ko ariwe yatumye agira umwete inyuma yo gufata ikiruhuko  c'amezi 21 ataja mu nkino. Kugenera umwana wiwe iyo ntsinzi vyarushirije kugira insiguro kuko Kipyegon niwe mu kinyi   wa Olympic agira gatatu yagumije umudari wiwe inyuma yo kuvyara hagati y'inkino (abandi n'umunya-Australia Shirley Strickland, mu 1956, n'umunya-Cameroun Francoise Mbango, mu 2008). Imbere y'uko abica bigacika mu Buyapani, yari yagize umwe mu myanya  y'imbere y'isi ku 3:51.07 - umwanya ugira kane kw'isi muri kahise - i Monaco mu kwezi kw'indwi  muri Diamond League - ari naho yavanye iteka ryo kuba umuhizi w'umwaka mu kwezi kw'icenda. Kuva agize umwanya wa mbere wa Olympic, ubu arondera umwanya wa mbere w'isi. Ntando Mahlanguu Igihugu:Afrika y'EpfoImyaka: 19  Ico akina: gusimba ubukika no kwiruka 200m Ntando Mahlangu yaronse umudari wiwe wa mbere w'inkino za Olympic agifise imyaka 14 igihe yaronka ifeza ku 200m mu nkino za Rio mu 2016 - amaze imyaka ibiri yonyene atanguye kwiruka. Uyu mwaka yarongereje igitigiri c'imidari mu gutwara inzahabu ku  200m no gusimba ubukika mu bagabo i Tokyo. Gusimba ubukika vyamuhaye inzahabu anaca umuhigo w'isi ku 7,17m - n'ubwo yari yatanguye kwimenyereza gusimba amayinga atandatu imbere y'uko inkino ziba. Uwu muyabaga afise kazoza mu kwiruka - amaguru yiwe yaciwe kuko atatera imbere, agifise imyaka 10 - afatanya ubunonotsi n'ivyigwa. Mu kwezi kwa kane, yashinze umwanya wa mbere mwiza kw'isi ku masekunda 22.4 ku 200m mu bagabo. Igihugu: Namibia Imyaka: 18 Ico akina: yiruka ikirere kigufi "Ukwiruka kwa mbere kwiza mu buzima bwanje" - uko niko  Christine Mboma  yavuze ingene yirutse mu nkino za  Tokyo 2020 mu kuba umugore wa mbere wo muri Namibia  yatahanye umudari wa Olympic. Uwo mudari wabaye uwa mbere wa Namibia mu myaka 25, uwo muyabaga akaba yatahukanye ifeza ku 200m mu gushika inyuma y'umunya-Jamaica amaze gutwara umudari wa Olympic gatanu  Elaine Thompson-Herah. Umwanya w'amasekunda  21,81 yagize niwo wari uwa mbere muto ugizwe n'umugore afise munsi y'imyaka 20. Mu nyuma yabandanije mu gutsinda ihiganwa rya Diamond League  mu kwezi kw'icenda i Zurich, aho umwanya wiwe w'amasekunda 21,78 wongeye gushinga umwanya wa mbere muto kw'isi w'abafise munsi y'imyaka 20 uba n'uwa mbere muri Afrika. Uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 18 yatanguye kwihatira ku 200m mu ntango z'uyu mwaka aho amariye kwakwa amahirwe yo kwiruka 400m n'urwego rw'isi ruraba inkino z'ubunonotsi kubera asanzwe afise urugero ruri hejuru rw'inkabuzo ya testosterone. Igihugu: SenegalImyaka: 29 Ico akina: umunyegori mu mupira w'amaguru Edouard Mendy aratamarirwa i Stamford Bridge kuva atanguye gukinira Chelsea avuye muri Rennes yo mu Bufaransa mu kwezi kw'icenda 2020 akaba yabaye kirumara mu vyo uwo mugwi wo mu burengero bwa Londres washitseko muri Champions League mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Yashitse ku muhigo w'inkino icenda atinjijwe igitsindo mu rugendo rwo gutwara ico gikombe mu mwaka w'inkino wiwe wa mbere muri iryo higanwa. Mendy kandi yanditse amateka mu kuba umunyegoli wambere w'umunye-Afrika akinye mu rukino rwanyuma rwa Champions League aba kandi uwa mbere akinye mu rukino ruhambaye ku mugabane wa Buraya kuva aho umunye-Zimbabwe Bruce Grobbelaar abonekeye mu kibuga mu 1985 mu rukino rw'ihiganwa rya European Cup (igikombe ca Buraya), ryabanjirije Champions League, akaba yakinira Liverpool. Inkino 19 Mendy yamaze atinjijwe igitsindo mu mwaka w'inkino uheruka yaba muri Champions League canke muri Premier League, zatumye atwara agashimwe k'umunyegoli yenuriye abandi i Buraya mu mwaka w'inkino 2020-21 (Uefa Goalkeeper of 2020-21). Uyu munonotsi yanatsindiye Uefa Super Cup, yaranashizwe mu bahiganirwa agashimwe ka Fifa k'umunyegoli yenuriye abandi mu 2021, ariko uyu mugabo yatahukanye umudari w'ikibanza ca kabiri mu gikombe ca FA mu kwezi kwa gatanu, yahushije gutsindira Yashim Trophy ihabwa umunyegoli yenuriye abandi i Buraya, igikombe gitangwa n'ikinyamakuru France Football. Iguhugu: Afrika y'Epfo Imyaka: 24 Ico akina: Breaststroke (ubwoko bwo kwoga) Tatjana Schoenmaker yarabiciye biracika i Tokyo aho uretse gutahana inzahabu n'ifeza mu gihugu ciwe ca Afrika y'Epfo, yanaciye umuhigo w'isi n'uwo mu nkino  za Olynpic ku 200m no ku 100m mu kwoga ivyo bita brasse canke  breaststroke. Mu gukora ivyo yaciye aha Afrika y'Epfo umudari wa mbere wa Olympic mu kwoga mu rwego rw'anbagore kuva mu 2000 aca arangiza imyaka 25 Afrika y'Epfo yari imaze irindiriye umudari w'inzahabu mu nkino za Olympic mu kwoga kuko yahejeje ari uwa mbere ku 200m. Schoenmaker yarahatswe guheba inkino mu 2016 igihe yabura amanota yo kuronka itike yo kwitaba inkino za Rio abuze ic'ijana c'umusekunda. Ariko ntiyataye hasi maze kuva ico gihe amaze guca imihigo yo mu gihugu no ku mugabane, inzahabu zibiri mu nkino za Commonwealth hamwe n'umudari w'ifeza  ku rwego rw'isi. Yavuze ati: "Ubu ihangiro rikurikira ni irihe, ingene notera imbere kurusha? Nkeneye kubona iyo ukwoga kwanje kuzotera kuja." Ushaka gutora tugusavye kuja ngaha https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/africa/59089895 aho unasanga amategeko ajanye n'ubuzima bwite. Gutora bizohera kuwa Mungu itariki 19/12/2021 saa 23:59 GMT.

column2: Umwamikazi Elizabeth atanguye urugendo rwa nyuma, abanyagihugu baramwunamira
column3: Urugendo rwa nyuma kandi rubabaje rw’Umwamikazi  Queen Elizabeth II w’ubwongereza rwatanguye kuri uno wa Mungu, ikiziga ciwe kikaba kivanywe i Balmoral kijanwa ku kirimba c’umwami ca Holyroodhouse muri  Edinburgh. Ibihumbi n’ibihumbi baratonze ku mabarabara mu kwunamira ubwa nyuma umwamikazi. Iyi niyo ntambwe ya mbere y’ibikorwa vyo kumushingura vyitezwe mu ndwi iza i Londres/London. Ikiziga kigenda bukebuka n’imodoka gushika Edinburgh uburebure bw’ibirometero 280. Gicishwa mu bibanza bitandukanye kuva Aberdeen, Dundee, na Perth, uru rukaba ari urugendo ruza kumara amasaha atandatu. Kiza gushikanwa i Holyroodhouse – ingoro y’Umwami w’Ubwongereza ku mugwa mukuru wa Ecosse/Scotland – kikaza gushirwa mu cumba kidasanzwe. Ku muhingamo w’ejo ku wa mbere, hazoba ikigandaro mw’Isengero nkuru yitiriwe Umweranda Giles, kizokwitabirwa n’umuryango w’i bwami. Isandugu izohamara amasaha 24, kugira ngo abantu bashobore kumwunamira ubwa nyuma. Umusi uzokurikira Umuganwakazi Anne azoherekeza ikiziga ca nyina wiwe mu gihe kizoba gitwawe n’indege i Londres.  Isandugu y’ikiziga c’Umwamikazi kizovanwa ku kibuga c’indege ca Edinburgh ijanwe i Buckingham n’indege gigishijwe ku kibuga c’indege ca RAF Northolt. Ku wa gatatu, ikiziga c’Umwamikazi kizojanwa mu ngoro ya Westminster (Westminster Hall) inyuma gatoya y’isaha umunani z’umuhingamo, urugeno ruzomara iminota yaba 40, abanyagihugu bakazoronka akaryo ko kumwunamira muri uru rugendo. Niho kizoguma imbere yo gushingurwa. Ibirori vyo gushingura umwamikazi Elizabeth bizoba ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 19 Nyakanga (9), 2022 mw’isengero Westminster Abbey, nk’uko itangazo ryasohowe n’ikirimba ca Buckingham ribivuga. Uru rusengero ni urusengero rudasanzwe kuko niho abami n’abamikazi bimikirwa, harimwo n’uyu Mwamikazi nyene mu 1953, rukaba ari narwo rwabereyemwo ubugeni bwiwe n’Umuganwa Philip mu 1947. Nta birori vyo gufuba umwami vyari bwigere bibera muri uru rusengero kuva mu kinjana ca 18, n’aho ibirori vyo gushingura nyina w’uyu Mwamikazi ari ho vyabereye mu 2002. Abakuru b’ibihugu bavuye mu bihugu bitandukanye vy’isi bazofata urugendo bagiye kwifatanya n’umuryango w’I bwami kwibuka ubuzima bw’umwamikazi n’ibikorwa vyiwe. Abanyaporitike bakomakomeye n’abahoze ari abashikiranganji ba mbere b’Ubwongereza nabo nyene bazokwitabira ibi birori. Ibirori bizotangurwa no kuvana isandugu y’ikiziga c’umwamikazi mu cumba ca Westminster itwarwe mu Rusengero rwa Westminster mu modoka y’igisata ca gisirikare kirwanira mu mazi. Inyuma y’ibi birori, ikiziga kizovanwa i Westminster Abbey kijanwe ahitwa Wellington Arch, ari naho kizovanwa kigatwarwa gushingurwa i Windsor.

column2: Austria: Umuganga yaciwe ihadabu kubera ukwihenda agaca umurwayi ukuguru kutariko
column3: Umuganga abaga muri Autriche (Austria) yaciwe ihadabu kubera yaciye ukuguru kutariko umurwayi mu munsi iheze. Ukuguru kw'i buryo k'uwo murwayi ageze mu za bukuru kwaraciwe kandi yagomba gucibwa ukw'i bubamfu, ikosa rija kubonwa haheze iminsi vyabaye. Ku wa gatatu, sentare yo muri Linz yasanze uwo muganga w'imyaka 43 yagize ikosa ryo gufata ibintu minenerwe cane aca acibwa ihadabu ry'ama dorari hafi 3000 (hafi miriyoni 6 z'amafaranga y'Uburundi). Umupfakazi w'uwo murwayi, yapfuye imbere y'uko urubanza rushika muri sentare, yanahawe amadorari ashika hafi 6.000 y'indishi. Uwo murwayi yagiye muri ivyo bitaro vyo muri  Freistadt mu kwezi kwa Rusama (ukwezi kwa gatanu) kugira acibwe ukuguru ariko umuganga yashize ikimenyetso ku kuguru kwo gucibwa kutariko, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AfFP. Iryo kosa ryagiye kugaragara mu gikorwa ca minsi yose co guhindura pansuma hanyuma umurwayi aca abwirwa ko n'ukundi kuguru gutegerezwa gucibwa. Ico gihe, ibitaro vyari vyavuze ko iryo kosa ryari ryabaye  "biturutse ku rukurikirane rw'ivyashitse bibabaje". Umuyobozi wavyo yarasavye imbabazi  icese mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru. Muri sentare, uwo muganga abaga yavuze ko  habaye ikosa  ku murongo w'ingene hahererekanywa ivyo gukora mu cumba co kubaga. Abajijwe igituma yashize ikimenyetso ku kuguru kw'i buryo aho kugishira ku kuguru kw'i bubamfu, uwo muganga w'umugore yavuze yavuze ati "Ntavyo nzi". Kuva ivyo bibaye, uwo muganga yimukiye mu bindi bitaro. Iigice c'amafaranga y'ihadabu yaciwe yarahagaritswe. Amakosa nkayo  ntakunze gushika ariko vyari bimaze kuba muri kahise. Mu 1995, umuganga wo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yamenye agejeje hagati kubaga ko yariko araca ukuguru kutariko umuntu yari arwaye diabete. Vyabaye  ngombwa ko abandanya kuko yari amaze guhimbura ibitari bike.

column2: Burundi: Girumuco Téline atambukira inzu y'imideli Yves St Laurent ati: 'Nakunze umudeli kubera dawe'
column3: Umurundikazi Girumuco Téline Féerie afitaniye amasezerano y'umudeli n'inzu rurangiranwa yo mu Bufaransa Yves Saint Laurent, avuga ko yabikunda kuva akiri umwana. Uwo mwigeme avuga ko yatanguye umwuga w'umudeli mu 2016 mu nzu [agence] yitwa Winners' fashion. Agira ati:" Nabikunze nkiri umwana. Ngira aho nabirabira cane hari ku muvyeyi wanje, dawe; yakora mu bintu vy'impuzu." Indoto za Téline ngo zari izo kwambika abantu, agakora impuzu mu Burundi abantu ntibabe bakizikura mu mahanga. Uwo mwigeme yiga mu gisata co gutumatumanako amakuru ngo afise umugambi wo kuva muri ico gisata aje gutangura kwiga gushona imideli. Agitangura ivyerekeye imideli mu Burundi ngo abantu ntibabibona neza. Agira ati:" Abantu babona umenga ndiko ndata akaranga. Abavyeyi banje naragize Imana barantahura bakaza baranshigikira, ariko nk'abandi babibona mu mibano, ntibabibona neza, ariko ubu bariko barabitahura kubera babona urwego maze gushikako." Abandanya avuga ko akiri mu Burundi yagize ivyigwa nkarisha bwenge vyo gushona impuzu, abantu bakabifata nabi, kuko ntibatahura ingene yari azi ubwenge mw'ishure ariko akaja mu vyo gushona impuzu. Yaragira kandi n'ibindi vyigwa bijanye no gushona ku buhinga bwa internet, abamwigisha bakaba bari mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. Téline afise uburebure bwa metero 1.76, akaba apima ibiro 48. Atera akamo urwaruka na cane cane abigeme gukora cane kuko kenshi mu Burundi imyuga itamenyerewe badakunze kuyishigikira, bigasaba kugira inguvu nyinshi. Nta Mwuga Udakiza ni ikiganiro c'uruhererekane (Series) kizajya gihita kuri radio buri wa gatatu, no ku rubuga rwa BBC Gahuzamiryango. BBC Gahuzamiryango ihaye ikaze ibitekerezo vyanyu kuri iki kiganiro.

column2: Burundi: 'Turiyamirije abatwitiranya n'umugambwe' - Abepiskopi gatolika
column3: Inama y'Abepiskopi b'i Burundi imenyesha ko ibabajwe n'uko hari bamwe bashaka kuyitiranya n'umugambwe biturutse ku gikorwa bakoze mu matora aheruka nk'indorerezi, mbere bakanashikiriza amahinyu bayabonyewo. Biri mw'itangazo ryasomwe n'umukuru w'iyo nama musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye atanga umuco ku ruhara rwayo muri ayo matora. Iyo nama imenyesha ko itishimiye ingene sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro yavuze ivyo yashikirijwe "nk'uko yoba yaritwaye ku vyerekeye amatora". Ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu, iyo sentare niho yashikiriza ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa 20/05/2020, aho yanavuze ko utunenge twashikirijwe n'inama y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, co kimwe n'ibirego vyatanzwe n'umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ata shingiro bifise. Mw'iryo tangazo, musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye  arongoye inama y'abepiskopi amenyesha ko itigeze yitwara muri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingio. Ati: "Ico yakoze kwabaye ukugira ico ishikirije icese ku vyerekeye igikorwa c'uburorerezi yari yaronkeye uruhusha". Abasenyeri b' i Burundi bavuga ko ata mvo n'imwe yari ihari y'uko bitwara ngo kuko uruhara rwabo muri ayo matora cari igikorwa c'umurorerezi kandi bakagendera ku ngingo ngenganyifato y'abarorerezi b'amatora. Avuga ko igikorwa c'abarorerezi kwari ukwandika n'ukugumya gusa amahinyu y'ivyabaye yiboneye n'amaso yiwe gusa. Musenyeri Ntahondereye ati: "Turababajwe n'uko Inama y'abepiskopi yafashwe mu buryo butumvikana nk'uko yoba yaritwaye , ivyo navyo bigatera agapfungu mu mitima y'abantu". "Turanse ko twitiranywa n'umugambwe canke n'umuntu uwo ari we wese yahiganywe mu matora". Inama nkuru y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, CECAB, yararungitse abarorerezi bayo barenga 2,700 mu makomine yose bashoboye kuja mu tuzu tw'amatora bahisemwo, nk'uko babivuga mw'itangazo ryabo ryo ku wa 26/05, iminsi ine inyuma y'ayo matora. Mw'iryo tangazo bari bamenyesheje ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge twari gushobora gutuma ivyari gutangazwa ko vyayavuyemwo bishobora kutizigirwa. Inyuma y'iryo tangazo, hari bamwe babonye ko Ekleziya Gatorika mu Burundi itari yishimiye ivyari vyaraye bitangajwe n'umurwi CENI ko ari vyo vyavuye mu matora. Hagati aho, inyuma y'aho Evariste Ndayishimiye w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi atangarijwe burundu na sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro ko ari we yatsinze ayo matora, iyo nama y'abepiskopi yaranamukeje mw'itangazo ryayo ryo ku wa 05/06, inamusaba kuba "umukuru w'igihugu wa bose".

column2: Abavugabutumwa bo muri Africa bariko basabira Trump ngo atsinde amatora
column3: N'aho asanzwe afise imvugo y'agasuzuguro kuri Afrika, Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arakunzwe cane na bamwe mu bihaye Imana bo kuri uyu mugabane. Mu nyigisho ziwe yatanze mu kwa gatandatu, Pasitori wo muri Nijeriya, Chris Oyakhilome, umuvugabutumwa azwi cane ku mboneshakure, yagize ati: "Mumusengere [Trump] kuko iyo Imana ishize imbere umwe mu bana biwe, shetani rimwe na rimwe ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo imusambure". Agabisha kandi ko abanegura uyu mukuru w'igihugu akomoka mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu kwa cumi na rimwe banka urunuka abamushigikiye. Uyu mupasitori akunzwe cane kw'isi yose, harimwo na Amerika avuga ati: "Bafitiye ishavu ryinshi Trump kubera arwanira abakristu/abakristo, ico mukimenye. Rero abankwa ni mwebwe abakristu". Ikigo Pew Research gikora ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y'abantu kivuga ko mu gihe Perezida Trump azwi ko ari umutegetsi yacanishijemwo isi, mu bihugu nka Nijeriya na Kenya arakundwa cane nk'uko amatohoza y'iki kigo yavyerekanye mu kwa mbere uno mwaka. Kivuga ko amajambo yavuze mu 2018 yo kugereranya ibihugu vya Afrika "nk'imisarani" bobo ko ata kibazo ateye. Ibi bihugu vyompi bisanzwe bizwi ko bigendera cane ku madini. Mu bumanuko bwa Nijeriya, igihugu ca Afrika gifise abantu benshi, harangwamwo amashengero menshi, mu gihe muri Kenya naho abanyapolitike bakoresha cane amashengero mu gutanga ubutumwa ku banywanyi babo, ari naco gituma amadini afise ikibanza kinini muri ibi bihugu. Amashengero menshi ya kikristu muri Afrika, asanzwe arwanya cane ivyo gukorora inda, abubakana bahuje ibitsina, bakongera bagashigikira Israyeli, ntibigeze biyumvamwo uwasubiriwe na Trump, umu Democrate Barack Obama, n'aho afise amamuko muri Kenya. Richard Chogo, Pasitori mu rusengero rwa Deliverance ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwarahimirije umugambi w'ukwigenga (liberalisme) hano muri Afrika, kandi uwu mugambi wateje impungenge mu bategetsi bamwe bamwe b'amadini. Rero kabaye agahengwe ku butegetsi bwa Trump yahisemwo gusubiza ibirenge inyuma". Arashimagiza ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona bwarashoboye guhagarika imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe nka Marie Stopes, yafasha mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvyaro n'ugukoroza inda mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika. Iri shirahamwe ryaraneguye iyi ngingo ya Amerika yo guhagarika izi mfashanyo, rivuga ko rishira "ubuzima bw'abakenyezi mu kaga". Impari ku bijanye no gukoroza inda zimaze imyaka n'imiburiburi irenga 40. Kuva ico gihe, abavugabutumwa b'abazungu bagize uruhara rukomeye mu matora ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika kandi ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarakwiye kw'isi yose, cane cane muri Afrika. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe Abaporotesanti b'abirabure benshi muri Amerika bashigikiye umugambwe uharanira Demokarasi kandi bakanegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump, nk'uko icegeranyo gishasha ca  Pew Research kivyerekana. Emeka Ezeji, umupasitori mukuru mw'ishengero rya Anglicani mu ntara ya Enugu iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nijeriya, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya politike bishingiye "ku vyanditswe" gusa. Avuga ati: "Abakristu ba Afrika bazi ko umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Repubulika ari we mwiza kuri Amerika no kw'isi". Abandanya asengera Perezida Trump ko yotsinda umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi Joe Biden mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe, kandi ko yari yafashe umwanya iminsi yose wo gusengera uyu mukuru w'igihugu ngo akire igihe aheruka mu bitaro  kubera coronavirus. Nk'uko bimeze kuri Pasitori Chogo, na we nyene abona ko "intege nke" za Trump zidategerezwa kurengera "inyungu rusangi". Nk'akarorero, ariyamiriza rya sekeza rya Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), isekeza Trump afata ko ari "ikimenyetso c'urwanko", akavuga ko "ryanyazwe intumbero yaryo". Yibaza ibibazo vyinshi aho avuga ati: "Abandi bantu atari abazungu nta vanguraruhu bakorerwa? Ubuzima bw'umwirabure abayabaye ubu bwoba ari bwiza ugereranije n'imyaka indwi iheze? Canke umwirabure abayabaye ubu yoba ageramiwe ubu kuri Trump gusumba kuri Obama?" Bwana Trump arirata ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika gusumba abandi baperezida bose  mu mateka ya  Amerika, kenshi agafatira ku rugero ruto rw'ubushomeri mu myaka itatu ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, ico Bwana Ezeji akenguruka cane. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe akazi buvuga ko igitigiri c'abashomeri b'abirabure mu kw'icenda ari co gitigiri gito cane cabayeho kuva butanguye kwegeranya ibiharuro nk'ibi mu myaka ya 1970, n'aho ibi vyahindutse kubera coronavirus. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji  avuga ko Bwana Trump agifise igikorwa kinini ategerezwa gukora ku neza ya bose, aha akaba afatira ku mwami Cyrus (Kuro) w'umu perse avugwa muri Biblia ko yari yatoranijwe n'Imana kugira ngo yigarurire Babiloni, maze abanya Isirayeli bari bahunze  banona gusubira i Yerusalemu. Avuga ati: "Trump niwe we Kuro wa kino gihe". Bwana Emeka  avuga ati: "Imana irabivuze....ni umusuku wanje azorangura ishaka ryanje". Pasitori Juliet Eyimofe Binite ari mu gisagara ca Lagos muri Nijeriya aremeranya nawe. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Yatowe n'Imana". Buri ku ndwi, uyu mupasitori w'umugore yama asengera  Trump ngo atsinde amatora ku ncuro ya kabiri. Avuga ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa imbere y'amatora ya 2016 ko hari umuntu atunze cane yinjiye muri politike kandi ko ashigikiye ubwigenge bw'amadini, abakristu babona ko bubangamiwe. Avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yariko irarondera umukozi, umuntu w'intungane kubera hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe abantu beza badashobora gukora". "Dukeneye umuntu ashobora kurwanira agateka k'abemera". Avuga kandi ko Trump ataronka amashimwe akwiriye kuri politike yiwe mpuzamakungu, nk'akarorero amasezerano y'amahoro hagati ya Isirayeli na Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abararu (Emirats Arabes Unis). Pasitori Chogo na we nyene niko abibona: "N'aho woba uri Saddam Hussein cane Muammar Gaddafi, ntihabuze nk'ikintu kimwe canke bibiri vyiza wakoreye abanyagihugu bawe". Avuga ko Trump ashigikiwe ku mugabane wa Afrika kubera ukuntu atarya umunwa, aho avuga ko abategetsi ba Afrika bakeneye kubwirwa mu majambo yeruye kugira ngo bashobore gutunganya ibihugu vyabo. Mu butumwa butandukanye yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Bwana Trump aherutse kwibutsa abakristu bamushigikiye ko ubwisanzure mu vyo gusenga hamwe n'urugamba rwo kurwanya umugenzo wo gukoroza inda bishobora gukwama mu gihe atotsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji afata ibintu yishimikije ubuhanuzi bwa Bibiliya buvuga ibihe vya nyuma. Ati: "Ko azotsinda canke atazotsinda, ico si ikibazo ca Trump, ahubwo ni ikibazo c'ivyo Imana ivuga". "Trump ni nka ca giti co muri Biblia abihweza ibirere bafatirako mu kwihweza ibimenyetso vy'ibihe...aramutse atsinze, tuzoba tugifise igihe co kubaho, nayo akaramuka atsinzwe nta gihe tuzoba tugisigaje".
